segment.target: NVDA viac nezamrzne pri pokuse načítať dokument v MS Edge pri aktívnom UIA. (#15736)

segment.source: When using say all or commands which spell text, pauses between sentences or characters no longer gradually decrease over time. (#15739, @jcsteh)
segment.target: Pri plynulom čítaní alebo hláskovaní sa viac postupne neskracujú pauzy medzi vetami a znakmi. (#15739, @jcsteh)

segment.source: NVDA no longer sometimes freezes when speaking a large amount of text. (#15752, @jcsteh)
segment.target: NVDA viac nezamrzne pri čítaní veľkého množstva textu. (#15752, @jcsteh)

segment.source: When accessing Microsoft Edge using UI Automation, NVDA is able to activate more controls in browse mode. (#14612)
segment.target: Pri Používaní MS Edge cez UIA, NVDA dokáže aktivovať oveľa viac prvkov v režime prehliadania. (#14612)

segment.source: NVDA will not fail to start anymore when the configuration file is corrupted, but it will restore the configuration to default as it did in the past. (#15690, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Ak je poškodený súbor s nastaveniami, NVDA viac nezamrzne, ale obnoví továrne nastavenia, tak ako to bolo aj v minulosti. (#15690, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Fixed support for System List view (`SysListView32`) controls in Windows Forms applications. (#15283, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Opravená podpora pre prvky System List view (`SysListView32`) používané v aplikáciách Windows Forms. (#15283, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: It is not possible anymore to overwrite NVDA's Python console history. (#15792, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: Odteraz viac nie je možné prepísať históriu v Python Konzole. (#15792, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: NVDA should remain responsive when being flooded with many UI Automation events, e.g. when large chunks of text are printed to a terminal or when listening to voice messages in WhatsApp messenger. (#14888, #15169)
segment.target: NVDA viac nemrzne pri spracovaní veľkého množstva UIA udalostí, napríklad v terminálových oknách alebo pri prehrávaní správ cez Whatsapp. (#14888, #15169)

segment.source: This new behavior can be disabled using the new "Use enhanced event processing" setting in NVDA's advanced settings.
segment.target: Toto správanie je možné ovplyvniť nastavením "pokročilé spracovanie udalostí" v pokročilých nastaveniach.

segment.source: NVDA is again able to track the focus in applications running within Windows Defender Application Guard (WDAG). (#15164)
segment.target: NVDA opäť dokáže sledovať fokus v aplikáciáh bežiacich pod Windows Defender Application Guard (WDAG). (#15164)

segment.source: The speech text is no longer updated when the mouse moves in the Speech Viewer. (#15952, @hwf1324)
segment.target: Text v zobrazovači reči sa viac neaktualizuje, ak cezeň prechádza myš. (#15952, @hwf1324)

segment.source: NVDA will again switch back to browse mode when closing combo boxes with `escape` or `alt+upArrow` in Firefox or Chrome. (#15653)
segment.target: NVDA opäť prechádza do režimu prehliadania, ak zatvoríte zoznamový rámik skratkou `escape` alebo `alt+šípka hore` v prehliadačoch Firefox a Chrome. (#15653)

segment.source: Arrowing up and down in combo boxes in iTunes will no longer inappropriately switch back to browse mode. (#15653)
segment.target: Pohyb šípkami v zoznamových rámikoch Itunes viac neprepína NVDa do režimu prehliadania. (#15653)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.

segment.source: Note: this is an Add-on API compatibility breaking release.
segment.target: Note: this is an Add-on API compatibility breaking release.

segment.source: Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.
segment.target: Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.

segment.source: Building NVDA now requires Visual Studio 2022.
segment.target: Building NVDA now requires Visual Studio 2022.

segment.source: Please refer to the [NVDA docs](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/release-2024.1/projectDocs/dev/createDevEnvironment.md) for the specific list of Visual Studio components. (#14313)
segment.target: Please refer to the [NVDA docs](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/release-2024.1/projectDocs/dev/createDevEnvironment.md) for the specific list of Visual Studio components. (#14313)

segment.source: Added the following extension points:
segment.target: Added the following extension points:

segment.source: `treeInterceptorHandler.post_browseModeStateChange`. (#14969, @nvdaes)
segment.target: `treeInterceptorHandler.post_browseModeStateChange`. (#14969, @nvdaes)

segment.source: `speech.speechCanceled`. (#15700, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: `speech.speechCanceled`. (#15700, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `_onErrorSoundRequested` (should be retrieved calling `logHandler.getOnErrorSoundRequested()`) (#15691, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: `_onErrorSoundRequested` (should be retrieved calling `logHandler.getOnErrorSoundRequested()`) (#15691, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: It is now possible to use plural forms in an add-on's translations. (#15661, @beqabeqa473)
segment.target: It is now possible to use plural forms in an add-on's translations. (#15661, @beqabeqa473)

segment.source: Included python3.dll in the binary distribution for use by add-ons with external libraries utilizing the [stable ABI](https://docs.python.org/3.11/c-api/stable.html). (#15674, @mzanm)
segment.target: Included python3.dll in the binary distribution for use by add-ons with external libraries utilizing the [stable ABI](https://docs.python.org/3.11/c-api/stable.html). (#15674, @mzanm)

segment.source: The `BrailleDisplayDriver` base class now has `numRows` and `numCols` properties to provide information about multi line braille displays.
segment.target: The `BrailleDisplayDriver` base class now has `numRows` and `numCols` properties to provide information about multi line braille displays.

segment.source: Setting `numCells` is still supported for single line braille displays and `numCells` will return the total number of cells for multi line braille displays. (#15386)
segment.target: Setting `numCells` is still supported for single line braille displays and `numCells` will return the total number of cells for multi line braille displays. (#15386)

segment.source: Updated BrlAPI for BRLTTY to version 0.8.5, and its corresponding python module to a Python 3.11 compatible build. (#15652, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Updated BrlAPI for BRLTTY to version 0.8.5, and its corresponding python module to a Python 3.11 compatible build. (#15652, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Added the `speech.speakSsml` function, which allows you to write NVDA speech sequences using [SSML](https://www.w3.org/TR/speech-synthesis11/). (#15699, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Added the `speech.speakSsml` function, which allows you to write NVDA speech sequences using [SSML](https://www.w3.org/TR/speech-synthesis11/). (#15699, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: The following tags are currently supported and translated to appropriate NVDA speech commands:
segment.target: The following tags are currently supported and translated to appropriate NVDA speech commands:

segment.source: `Prosody` (`pitch`, `rate` and `volume`). Only multiplication (e.g. `200%` are supported.
segment.target: `Prosody` (`pitch`, `rate` and `volume`). Only multiplication (e.g. `200%` are supported.

segment.source: `say-as` with the `interpret` attribute set to `characters`
segment.target: `say-as` with the `interpret` attribute set to `characters`

segment.source: `voice` with the `xml:lang` set to an XML language
segment.target: `voice` with the `xml:lang` set to an XML language

segment.source: `break` with the `time` attribute set to a value in milliseconds, e.g. `200ms`
segment.target: `break` with the `time` attribute set to a value in milliseconds, e.g. `200ms`

segment.source: `mark` with the `name` attribute set to a mark name, e.g. `mark1`, requires providing a callback
segment.target: `mark` with the `name` attribute set to a mark name, e.g. `mark1`, requires providing a callback

segment.source: Example: `speech.speakSsml('<speak><prosody pitch="200%">hello</prosody><break time="500ms" /><prosody rate="50%">John</prosody></speak>')`
segment.target: Example: `speech.speakSsml('<speak><prosody pitch="200%">hello</prosody><break time="500ms" /><prosody rate="50%">John</prosody></speak>')`

segment.source: The SSML parsing capabilities are backed by the `SsmlParser` class in the `speechXml` module.
segment.target: The SSML parsing capabilities are backed by the `SsmlParser` class in the `speechXml` module.

segment.source: Changes to the NVDA Controller Client library:
segment.target: Changes to the NVDA Controller Client library:

segment.source: The file names of the library no longer contain a suffix denoting the architecture, i.e. `nvdaControllerClient32/64.dll` are now called `nvdaControllerClient.dll`. (#15718, #15717, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: The file names of the library no longer contain a suffix denoting the architecture, i.e. `nvdaControllerClient32/64.dll` are now called `nvdaControllerClient.dll`. (#15718, #15717, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Added an example to demonstrate using nvdaControllerClient.dll from Rust. (#15771, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Added an example to demonstrate using nvdaControllerClient.dll from Rust. (#15771, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Added the following functions to the controller client: (#15734, #11028, #5638, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Added the following functions to the controller client: (#15734, #11028, #5638, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `nvdaController_getProcessId`: To get the process id (PID) of the current instance of NVDA the controller client is using.
segment.target: `nvdaController_getProcessId`: To get the process id (PID) of the current instance of NVDA the controller client is using.

segment.source: `nvdaController_speakSsml`: To instruct NVDA to speak according to the given SSML. This function also supports:
segment.target: `nvdaController_speakSsml`: To instruct NVDA to speak according to the given SSML. This function also supports:

segment.source: Providing the symbol level.
segment.target: Providing the symbol level.

segment.source: Providing the priority of speech to be spoken.
segment.target: Providing the priority of speech to be spoken.

segment.source: Speaking both synchronously (blocking) and asynchronously (instant return).
segment.target: Speaking both synchronously (blocking) and asynchronously (instant return).

segment.source: `nvdaController_setOnSsmlMarkReachedCallback`: To register a callback of type `onSsmlMarkReachedFuncType` that is called in synchronous mode for every `<mark />` tag encountered in the SSML sequence provided to `nvdaController_speakSsml`.
segment.target: `nvdaController_setOnSsmlMarkReachedCallback`: To register a callback of type `onSsmlMarkReachedFuncType` that is called in synchronous mode for every `<mark />` tag encountered in the SSML sequence provided to `nvdaController_speakSsml`.

segment.source: Note: the new functions in the controller client only support NVDA 2024.1 and above.
segment.target: Note: the new functions in the controller client only support NVDA 2024.1 and above.

segment.source: Updated `include` dependencies:
segment.target: Updated `include` dependencies:

segment.source: w3c-aria-practices to `9a5e55ccbeb0f1bf92b6127c9865da8426d1c864`. (#15695)
segment.target: w3c-aria-practices to `9a5e55ccbeb0f1bf92b6127c9865da8426d1c864`. (#15695)

segment.source: Device info yielded by `hwPortUtils.listUsbDevices` now contain the bus reported description of the USB device (key `busReportedDeviceDescription`). (#15764, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Device info yielded by `hwPortUtils.listUsbDevices` now contain the bus reported description of the USB device (key `busReportedDeviceDescription`). (#15764, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: For USB serial devices, `bdDetect.getConnectedUsbDevicesForDriver` and `bdDetect.getDriversForConnectedUsbDevices` now yield device matches containing a `deviceInfo` dictionary enriched with data about the USB device, such as `busReportedDeviceDescription`. (#15764, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: For USB serial devices, `bdDetect.getConnectedUsbDevicesForDriver` and `bdDetect.getDriversForConnectedUsbDevices` now yield device matches containing a `deviceInfo` dictionary enriched with data about the USB device, such as `busReportedDeviceDescription`. (#15764, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: When the configuration file `nvda.ini` is corrupted, a backup copy is saved before it is reinitialized. (#15779, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: When the configuration file `nvda.ini` is corrupted, a backup copy is saved before it is reinitialized. (#15779, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: When defining a script with the script decorator, the `speakOnDemand` boolean argument can be specified to control if a script should speak while in "on-demand" speech mode. (#481, @CyrilleB79)
segment.target: When defining a script with the script decorator, the `speakOnDemand` boolean argument can be specified to control if a script should speak while in "on-demand" speech mode. (#481, @CyrilleB79)

segment.source: Scripts that provide information (e.g. say window title, report time/date) should speak in the "on-demand" mode.
segment.target: Scripts that provide information (e.g. say window title, report time/date) should speak in the "on-demand" mode.

segment.source: Scripts that perform an action (e.g. move the cursor, change a parameter) should not speak in the "on-demand" mode.
segment.target: Scripts that perform an action (e.g. move the cursor, change a parameter) should not speak in the "on-demand" mode.

segment.source: Fixed bug where deleting git-tracked files during `scons -c` resulted in missing UIA COM interfaces on rebuild. (#7070, #10833, @hwf1324)
segment.target: Fixed bug where deleting git-tracked files during `scons -c` resulted in missing UIA COM interfaces on rebuild. (#7070, #10833, @hwf1324)

segment.source: Fix a bug where some code changes were not detected when building `dist`, that prevented a new build from being triggered.
segment.target: Fix a bug where some code changes were not detected when building `dist`, that prevented a new build from being triggered.

segment.source: Now `dist` always rebuilds. (#13372, @hwf1324)
segment.target: Now `dist` always rebuilds. (#13372, @hwf1324)

segment.source: A `gui.nvdaControls.MessageDialog` with default type of standard, no longer throws a None conversion exception because no sound is assigned. (#16223, @XLTechie)
segment.target: A `gui.nvdaControls.MessageDialog` with default type of standard, no longer throws a None conversion exception because no sound is assigned. (#16223, @XLTechie)

segment.target: robotframework to 6.1.1. (#15544)

segment.target: Removed pip dependencies:

segment.source: typing_extensions, these should be supported natively in Python 3.11 (#15544)
segment.target: typing_extensions, these should be supported natively in Python 3.11 (#15544)

segment.source: nose, instead unittest-xml-reporting is used to generate XML reports. (#15544)
segment.target: nose, instead unittest-xml-reporting is used to generate XML reports. (#15544)

segment.source: `IAccessibleHandler.SecureDesktopNVDAObject` has been removed.
segment.target: `IAccessibleHandler.SecureDesktopNVDAObject` has been removed.

segment.source: Instead, when NVDA is running on the user profile, track the existence of the secure desktop with the extension point: `winAPI.secureDesktop.post_secureDesktopStateChange`. (#14488)
segment.target: Instead, when NVDA is running on the user profile, track the existence of the secure desktop with the extension point: `winAPI.secureDesktop.post_secureDesktopStateChange`. (#14488)

segment.source: `braille.BrailleHandler.handlePendingCaretUpdate` has been removed with no public replacement. (#15163, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: `braille.BrailleHandler.handlePendingCaretUpdate` has been removed with no public replacement. (#15163, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `bdDetect.addUsbDevices and bdDetect.addBluetoothDevices` have been removed.
segment.target: `bdDetect.addUsbDevices and bdDetect.addBluetoothDevices` have been removed.

segment.source: Braille display drivers should implement the `registerAutomaticDetection` class method instead.
segment.target: Braille display drivers should implement the `registerAutomaticDetection` class method instead.

segment.source: That method receives a `DriverRegistrar` object on which the `addUsbDevices` and `addBluetoothDevices` methods can be used. (#15200, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: That method receives a `DriverRegistrar` object on which the `addUsbDevices` and `addBluetoothDevices` methods can be used. (#15200, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: The default implementation of the check method on `BrailleDisplayDriver` now requires both the `threadSafe` and `supportsAutomaticDetection` attributes to be set to `True`. (#15200, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: The default implementation of the check method on `BrailleDisplayDriver` now requires both the `threadSafe` and `supportsAutomaticDetection` attributes to be set to `True`. (#15200, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: Passing lambda functions to `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread.queueAsApc` is no longer possible, as functions should be weakly referenceable. (#14627, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: Passing lambda functions to `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread.queueAsApc` is no longer possible, as functions should be weakly referenceable. (#14627, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: `IoThread.autoDeleteApcReference` has been removed. (#14924, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: `IoThread.autoDeleteApcReference` has been removed. (#14924, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: To support capital pitch changes, synthesizers must now explicitly declare their support for the `PitchCommand` in the `supportedCommands` attribute on the driver. (#15433, @LeonarddeR)
segment.target: To support capital pitch changes, synthesizers must now explicitly declare their support for the `PitchCommand` in the `supportedCommands` attribute on the driver. (#15433, @LeonarddeR)

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a security issue and installer issue.
segment.target: Táto drobná aktualizácia opravuje problémy s inštaláciou a prináša bezpečnostnú záplatu.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues following NVDA's [security policy](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).
segment.target: Bezpečnostné chyby prosím zodpovedne nahlasujte pomocou [Inštrukcií o bezpečnosti (anglicky)](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Bezpečnostné záplaty

segment.source: Prevents loading custom configuration while secure mode is forced.
segment.target: Nie je viac možné spustiť vlastné nastavenia, ak je vynútený bezpečný režim.

segment.source: ([GHSA-727q-h8j2-6p45](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-727q-h8j2-6p45))
segment.target: ([GHSA-727q-h8j2-6p45](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-727q-h8j2-6p45))

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Opravy

segment.source: Fixed bug which caused the NVDA process to fail to exit correctly. (#16123)
segment.target: Opravená chyba, ktorá spôsobovala, že sa správne neukončil proces NVDA. (#16123)

segment.source: Fixed bug where if the previous NVDA process failed to exit correctly, an NVDA installation could fail to an unrecoverable state. (#16122)
segment.target: Opravená chyba, ktorá spôsobovala, že nebolo možné nainštalovať NVDA, ak nebol správne ukončený predchádzajúci proces. (#16122)

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Táto aktualizácia prináša bezpečnostnú záplatu.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues following NVDA's [security policy](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).
segment.target: Bezpečnostné chyby prosím zodpovedne nahlasujte pomocou [Inštrukcií o bezpečnosti (anglicky)](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Bezpečnostné záplaty

segment.source: Prevents possible reflected XSS attack from crafted content to cause arbitrary code execution.
segment.target: Nie je viac možné vkladať do html kódu reťazce, ktoré spôsobia spúšťanie aplikácií v režime prehliadania NVDA.

segment.source: ([GHSA-xg6w-23rw-39r8](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-xg6w-23rw-39r8))
segment.target: ([GHSA-xg6w-23rw-39r8](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-xg6w-23rw-39r8))

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Táto aktualizácia prináša bezpečnostnú záplatu.

segment.source: The security patch in 2023.3.1 was not resolved correctly.
segment.target: Chyba z verzie 2023.3.1 nebola opravená správne.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues following NVDA's [security policy](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).
segment.target: Bezpečnostné chyby prosím zodpovedne nahlasujte pomocou [Inštrukcií o bezpečnosti (anglicky)](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Bezpečnostné záplaty

segment.source: The security patch in 2023.3.1 was not resolved correctly.
segment.target: Chyba z verzie 2023.3.1 nebola opravená správne.

segment.source: Prevents possible system access and arbitrary code execution with system privileges for unauthenticated users.
segment.target: Odteraz viac nie je umožnené neoprávnenému používateľovi pristupovať k systému a spúšťať vlastný kód.

segment.source: ([GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj))
segment.target: ([GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj))

segment.target: Táto aktualizácia prináša bezpečnostnú záplatu.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues following NVDA's [security policy](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/security.md).

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Bezpečnostné záplaty

segment.source: Prevents possible system access and arbitrary code execution with system privileges for unauthenticated users.
segment.target: Odteraz viac nie je umožnené neoprávnenému používateľovi pristupovať k systému a spúšťať vlastný kód.

segment.source: ([GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj))
segment.target: ([GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-h7pp-6jqw-g3pj))

segment.source: This release includes improvements to performance, responsiveness and stability of audio output.
segment.target: Táto verzia obsahuje vylepšenie stability a rýchlosti hlasového výstupu a zvukov NVDA.

segment.source: Options have been added to control the volume of NVDA sounds and beeps, or to have them follow the volume of the voice you are using.
segment.target: Pridali sme možnosti samostatne regulovať hlasitosť hlasového výstupu a zvukov NVDA, alebo prispôsobenie hlasitosti zvukov NVDA podľa hlasitosti hlasového výstupu.

segment.source: NVDA can now periodically refresh OCR results, speaking new text as it appears.
segment.target: NVDA odteraz dokáže automaticky obnovovať okno s rozpoznaným textom OCR a čítať nový text.

segment.source: This can be configured in the Windows OCR category of NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: Toto je možné nastaviť v nastaveniach NVDA, v kategórii rozpoznávanie textu Windows.

segment.source: There's been several braille fixes, improving device detection and caret movement.
segment.target: Došlo k opravám chýb týkajúcich sa spracovania braillovho písma, konkrétne bola vylepšená detekcia brailových riadkov a detekcia pohybu systémového kurzora.

segment.source: It is now possible to opt-out unwanted drivers from automatic detection, to improve autodetection performance.
segment.target: Odteraz je možné vylúčiť ovládače z automatického detegovania brailových riadkov, čo môže zrýchlyť odozvu.

segment.source: There are also new BRLTTY commands.
segment.target: Pribudli tiež nové príkazy pre ovládač BRLTTY.

segment.source: There's also been bug fixes for the Add-on Store, Microsoft Office, Microsoft Edge context menus, and Windows Calculator.
segment.target: Opravili sme chyby v katalógu s doplnkami, aplikáciách Microsoft Office, kontextových ponukách Microsoft Edge, a v kalkulačke.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nové vlastnosti

segment.source: Enhanced sound management:
segment.target: Vylepšená správa zvuku:

segment.source: A new Audio Settings panel:
segment.target: V nastaveniach pribudla nová kategória s označením zvuk:

segment.source: This can be opened with `NVDA+control+u`. (#15497)
segment.target: Klávesová skratka je `NVDA+ctrl+u`. (#15497)

segment.source: An option in Audio settings to have the volume of NVDA sounds and beeps follow the volume setting of the voice you are using. (#1409)
segment.target: Odteraz je možné určiť, že hlasitosť reči a hlasitosť zvukov NVDA bude rovnaká (#1409)

segment.source: An option in Audio settings to separately configure the volume of NVDA sounds. (#1409, #15038)
segment.target: Tiež je možné oddeliť hlasitosť zvukov NVDA a hlasitosť hlasového výstupu. (#1409, #15038)

segment.source: The settings to change audio output device and toggle audio ducking have been moved to the new Audio settings panel from the Select Synthesizer dialog.
segment.target: Nastavenia výstupného zariadenia a automatického stišovania boli presunuté do kategórie zvuk.

segment.source: These options will be removed from the "select synthesizer" dialog in 2024.1. (#15486, #8711)
segment.target: Možnosti odstránime z dialógu Nastavenia hlasového výstupu vo verzii 2024.1. (#15486, #8711)

segment.source: NVDA will now output audio via the Windows Audio Session API (WASAPI), which may improve the responsiveness, performance and stability of NVDA speech and sounds. (#14697, #11169, #11615, #5096, #10185, #11061)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz predvolene používa zvukové rozhranie Windows Audio Session API (WASAPI), čo zrýchľuje stabilitu a odozvu výstupu reči a zvukov NVDA. (#14697, #11169, #11615, #5096, #10185, #11061)

segment.source: Note: WASAPI is incompatible with some add-ons.
segment.target: Upozorňujeme, že WASAPI nie je kompatibilné s niektorými doplnkami.

segment.source: Compatible updates are available for these add-ons, please update them before updating NVDA.
segment.target: Sú však dostupné aktualizácie, preto prosím najprv aktualizujte doplnky a následne aktualizujte NVDA.

segment.source: Incompatible versions of these add-ons will be disabled when updating NVDA:
segment.target: Nekompatibilné doplnky budú po aktualizácii zakázané. Ide o doplnky:

segment.source: Tony's Enhancements version 1.15 or older. (#15402)
segment.target: Tony's Enhancements do verzie 1.15. (#15402)

segment.source: NVDA global commands extension 12.0.8 or older. (#15443)
segment.target: NVDA global commands extension do verzie 12.0.8. (#15443)

segment.source: NVDA is now able to continually update the result when performing optical character recognition (OCR), speaking new text as it appears. (#2797)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz dokáže pri používaní rozpoznávania textu Windows automaticky aktualizovať rozpoznaný text a prečítať zmeny. (#2797)

segment.source: To enable this functionality, enable the option "Periodically refresh recognized content" in the Windows OCR category of NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: Ak chcete túto možnosť využívať, začiarknite v nastaveniach Rozpoznávania textu Windows možnosť Pravidelne obnovovať rozpoznaný text.

segment.source: Once enabled, you can toggle speaking new text by toggling report dynamic content changes (pressing `NVDA+5`).
segment.target: Keď je táto možnosť zapnutá, oznamovanie zmien v rozpoznanom texte je možné ovplyvniť nastavením oznamovať dynamicky menený obsah (`NVDA+5`).

segment.source: When using automatic detection of braille displays, it is now possible to opt-out drivers from detection from the braille display selection dialog. (#15196)
segment.target: Ak používate automatickú detekciu brailových riadkov, môžete určiť riadky, ktoré nebudú pri detekcii zohľadnené. (#15196)

segment.source: A new option in Document Formatting settings, "Ignore blank lines for line indentation reporting". (#13394)
segment.target: V nastaveniach čítania textu pribudla nová možnosť "Ignorovať prázdne riadky pre oznamovanie odsadenia". (#13394)

segment.source: Added an unassigned gesture to navigate by tab groupings in browse mode. (#15046)
segment.target: Do režimu prehliadania pribudol nový príkaz na prechod medzi záložkami. (#15046)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Zmeny

segment.source: Braille:
segment.target: Braille:

segment.source: When the text in a terminal changes without updating the caret, the text on a braille display will now properly update when positioned on a changed line.
segment.target: Ak sa v terminály zmení text a zároveň sa nezmení pozícia systémového kurzora, zmení sa aj text na brailovom riadku.

segment.source: This includes situations where braille is tethered to review. (#15115)
segment.target: Toto sa dialo v situáciách, keď bol brailový riadok zviazaný s prezeracím kurzorom. (#15115)

segment.source: More BRLTTY key bindings are now mapped to NVDA commands (#6483):
segment.target: Pridané nové príkazy BRLTTY. (#6483):

segment.source: `learn`: toggle NVDA input help
segment.target: `learn`: Zapína a vypína nápovedu vstupu

segment.source: `prefmenu`: open the NVDA menu
segment.target: `prefmenu`: Otvorí ponuku NVDA

segment.source: `prefload`/`prefsave`: Load/save NVDA configuration
segment.target: `prefload`/`prefsave`: Načítať / uložiť nastavenia NVDA

segment.source: `time`: Show time
segment.target: `time`: Zobraziť čas

segment.source: `say_line`: Speak the current line where the review cursor is located
segment.target: `say_line`: Prečíta riadok pod kurzorom

segment.source: `say_below`: Say all using review cursor
segment.target: `say_below`: Plynulé čítanie

segment.source: The BRLTTY driver is only available when a BRLTTY instance with BrlAPI enabled is running. (#15335)
segment.target: Ovládač BRLTTY je dostupný len ak je spustená inštancia BRLTTY s povoleným BrlAPI (#15335)

segment.source: The advanced setting to enable support for HID braille has been removed in favor of a new option.
segment.target: Odstránená možnosť zapnúť a vypnúť podporu pre štandard HID, zároveň bola pridaná nová možnosť.

segment.source: You can now disable specific drivers for braille display auto detection in the braille display selection dialog. (#15196)
segment.target: Odteraz je možné vylúčiť ovládače, ktoré nemajú byť detegované pri automatickej detekcii brailových riadkov. (#15196)

segment.source: Add-on Store: Installed add-ons will now be listed in the Available Add-ons tab, if they are available in the store. (#15374)
segment.target: Katalóg s doplnkami: Nainštalované doplnky sú zobrazované aj v časti dostupné doplnky, ak pochádzajú z katalógu. (#15374)

segment.source: Some shortcut keys have been updated in the NVDA menu. (#15364)
segment.target: Aktualizované niektoré klávesové skratky v ponuke NVDA (týka sa len anglickej lokalizácie). (#15364)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Opravy

segment.source: Microsoft Office:
segment.target: Microsoft Office:

segment.source: Fixed crash in Microsoft Word when Document formatting options "report headings" and "report comments and notes" were not enabled. (#15019)
segment.target: MS Word viac nespadne, ak sú v nastaveniach čítania textu vypnuté možnosti oznamovať nadpisy a oznamovať anotácie. (#15019)

segment.source: In Word and Excel, text alignment will be correctly reported in more situations. (#15206, #15220)
segment.target: V aplikáciách Word a Excel je správne oznamované zarovnanie vo viacerých situáciách. (#15206, #15220)

segment.source: Fixes the announcement of some cell formatting shortcuts in Excel. (#15527)
segment.target: Opravené oznamovanie formátovania pri použití skratiek v Excely. (#15527)

segment.source: Microsoft Edge:
segment.target: Microsoft Edge:

segment.source: NVDA will no longer jump back to the last browse mode position when opening the context menu in Microsoft Edge. (#15309)
segment.target: NVDA viac neskočí na predošlú pozíciu v režime prehliadania po zatvorení kontextovej ponuky. (#15309)

segment.source: NVDA is once again able to read context menus of downloads in Microsoft Edge. (#14916)
segment.target: NVDA opäť správne dokáže čítať kontextovú ponuku pri stiahnutých položkách. (#14916)

segment.source: Braille:
segment.target: Braille:

segment.source: The braille cursor and selection indicators will now always be updated correctly after showing or hiding respective indicators with a gesture. (#15115)
segment.target: Brailový kurzor a vyznačenie vybratého textu sa správne zobrazuje aj vtedy, ak skratkami prepínate zobrazenie kurzora a vybratého textu. (#15115)

segment.source: Fixed bug where Albatross braille displays try to initialize although another braille device has been connected. (#15226)
segment.target: Opravená chyba, ktorá spôsobovala, že riadky Albatross sa pokúšali inicializovať, hoci už bol pripojený iný riadok. (#15226)

segment.source: Add-on Store:
segment.target: Katalóg s doplnkami:

segment.source: Fixed bug where unchecking "include incompatible add-ons" would result in incompatible add-ons still being listed in the store. (#15411)
segment.target: Ak odčiarknete možnosť nekompatibilné doplnky, nezobrazia sa nekompatibilné doplnky ani v katalógu. (#15411)

segment.source: Add-ons blocked due to compatibility reasons should now be filtered correctly when toggling the filter for enabled/disabled status. (#15416)
segment.target: Filtrovanie zakázaných a povolených doplnkov správne zobrazuje alebo vylučuje nekompatibilné doplnky. (#15416)

segment.source: Fixed bug preventing overridden enabled incompatible add-ons being upgraded or replaced using the external install tool. (#15417)
segment.target: Odteraz je možné aktualizovať z externého zdroja doplnok, ktorý je nekompatibilný. (#15417)

segment.source: Fixed bug where NVDA would not speak until restarted after add-on installation. (#14525)
segment.target: NVDA viac neprestane hovoriť po inštalácii doplnkov. (#14525)

segment.source: Fixed bug where add-ons cannot be installed if a previous download failed or was cancelled. (#15469)
segment.target: Odteraz je možné inštalovať doplnky aj v prípade, že predošlé sťahovanie zlyhalo alebo bolo prerušené. (#15469)

segment.source: Fixed issues with handling incompatible add-ons when upgrading NVDA. (#15414, #15412, #15437)
segment.target: Opravené problémy so spracovaním nekompatibilných doplnkov počas aktualizácie NVDA. (#15414, #15412, #15437)

segment.source: NVDA once again announces calculation results in the Windows 32bit calculator on Server, LTSC and LTSB versions of Windows. (#15230)
segment.target: NVDA opäť oznamuje výsledky výpočtov v kalkulačke v 32-bitových verziách Windows Server, LTSC a LTSB. (#15230)

segment.source: NVDA no longer ignores focus changes when a nested window (grand child window) gets focus. (#15432)
segment.target: NVDA viac neignoruje zmenu fokusu, ak získa fokus včlenené okno. (#15432)

segment.source: Fixed a potential cause of crashing during NVDA startup. (#15517)
segment.target: Odstránené potenciálne problémy, ktoré mohli spôsobiť pád NVDA pri štarte. (#15517)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.

segment.source: `braille.handler.handleUpdate` and `braille.handler.handleReviewMove` have been changed in order not to update instantly.
segment.target: `braille.handler.handleUpdate` and `braille.handler.handleReviewMove` have been changed in order not to update instantly.

segment.source: Before this change, when either of these methods was called very often, this would drain many resources.
segment.target: Before this change, when either of these methods was called very often, this would drain many resources.

segment.source: These methods now queue an update at the end of every core cycle instead.
segment.target: These methods now queue an update at the end of every core cycle instead.

segment.source: They should also be thread safe, making it possible to call them from background threads. (#15163)
segment.target: They should also be thread safe, making it possible to call them from background threads. (#15163)

segment.source: Added official support to register custom braille display drivers in the automatic braille display detection process.
segment.target: Added official support to register custom braille display drivers in the automatic braille display detection process.

segment.source: Consult the `braille.BrailleDisplayDriver` class documentation for more details.
segment.target: Consult the `braille.BrailleDisplayDriver` class documentation for more details.

segment.source: Most notably, the `supportsAutomaticDetection` attribute must be set to `True` and the `registerAutomaticDetection` `classmethod` must be implemented. (#15196)
segment.target: Most notably, the `supportsAutomaticDetection` attribute must be set to `True` and the `registerAutomaticDetection` `classmethod` must be implemented. (#15196)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Deprecations

segment.source: `braille.BrailleHandler.handlePendingCaretUpdate` is now deprecated with no public replacement.
segment.target: `braille.BrailleHandler.handlePendingCaretUpdate` is now deprecated with no public replacement.

segment.source: It will be removed in 2024.1. (#15163)
segment.target: It will be removed in 2024.1. (#15163)

segment.source: Importing the constants `xlCenter`, `xlJustify`, `xlLeft`, `xlRight`, `xlDistributed`, `xlBottom`, `xlTop` from `NVDAObjects.window.excel` is deprecated.
segment.target: Importing the constants `xlCenter`, `xlJustify`, `xlLeft`, `xlRight`, `xlDistributed`, `xlBottom`, `xlTop` from `NVDAObjects.window.excel` is deprecated.

segment.source: Use `XlHAlign` or `XlVAlign` enumerations instead. (#15205)
segment.target: Use `XlHAlign` or `XlVAlign` enumerations instead. (#15205)

segment.source: The mapping `NVDAObjects.window.excel.alignmentLabels` is deprecated.
segment.target: The mapping `NVDAObjects.window.excel.alignmentLabels` is deprecated.

segment.source: Use the `displayString` methods of `XlHAlign` or `XlVAlign` enumerations instead. (#15205)
segment.target: Use the `displayString` methods of `XlHAlign` or `XlVAlign` enumerations instead. (#15205)

segment.source: `bdDetect.addUsbDevices` and `bdDetect.addBluetoothDevices` have been deprecated.
segment.target: `bdDetect.addUsbDevices` and `bdDetect.addBluetoothDevices` have been deprecated.

segment.source: Braille display drivers should implement the `registerAutomaticDetection` classmethod instead.
segment.target: Braille display drivers should implement the `registerAutomaticDetection` classmethod instead.

segment.source: That method receives a `DriverRegistrar` object on which the `addUsbDevices` and `addBluetoothDevices` methods can be used. (#15200)
segment.target: That method receives a `DriverRegistrar` object on which the `addUsbDevices` and `addBluetoothDevices` methods can be used. (#15200)

segment.source: The default implementation of the check method on `BrailleDisplayDriver` uses `bdDetect.driverHasPossibleDevices` for devices that are marked as thread safe.
segment.target: The default implementation of the check method on `BrailleDisplayDriver` uses `bdDetect.driverHasPossibleDevices` for devices that are marked as thread safe.

segment.source: Starting from NVDA 2024.1, in order for the base method to use `bdDetect.driverHasPossibleDevices`, the `supportsAutomaticDetection` attribute must be set to `True` as well. (#15200)
segment.target: Starting from NVDA 2024.1, in order for the base method to use `bdDetect.driverHasPossibleDevices`, the `supportsAutomaticDetection` attribute must be set to `True` as well. (#15200)

segment.source: This release introduces the Add-on Store to replace the Add-ons Manager.
segment.target: V tejto verzii je predstavený katalóg s doplnkami, ktorý nahrádza pôvodného správcu doplnkov.

segment.source: In the Add-on Store you can browse, search, install and update community add-ons.
segment.target: V katalógu doplnkov je možné prechádzať, vyhľadávať, inštalovať a aktualizovať doplnky.

segment.source: You can now manually override incompatibility issues with outdated add-ons at your own risk.
segment.target: Odteraz je možné inštalovať nekompatibilné doplnky aj po varovaní, avšak na vlastné riziko.

segment.source: There are new braille features, commands, and display support.
segment.target: Pridané nové možnosti pre používateľov brailových riadkov, konkrétne bola pridaná podpora pre nové riadky, nové príkazy a funkcie.

segment.source: There are also new input gestures for OCR and flattened object navigation.
segment.target: Tiež boli pridané nové príkazy pre OCR a plošné prezeranie.

segment.source: Navigating and reporting formatting in Microsoft Office is improved.
segment.target: Vylepšili sme navigáciu a oznamovanie formátovania v dokumentoch MS Office.

segment.source: There are many bug fixes, particularly for braille, Microsoft Office, web browsers and Windows 11.
segment.target: Opravené množstvo chýb v ovládačoch brailových riadkov, Microsoft Office, webových prehliadačoch a Windows 11.

segment.source: eSpeak-NG, LibLouis braille translator, and Unicode CLDR have been updated.
segment.target: Aktualizovali sme hlasový výstup eSpeak-NG, brailovú prekladovú tabuľku LibLouis a databázu Unicode CLDR.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nové vlastnosti

segment.source: Add-on Store has been added to NVDA. (#13985)
segment.target: Pridaný katalóg s doplnkami. (#13985)

segment.source: Browse, search, install and update community add-ons.
segment.target: Umožňuje prezeranie, vyhľadávanie a inštaláciu doplnkov.

segment.source: Manually override incompatibility issues with outdated add-ons.
segment.target: Umožňuje na vlastné riziko inštalovať aj nekompatibilné doplnky.

segment.source: The Add-ons Manager has been removed and replaced by the Add-on Store.
segment.target: Katalóg s doplnkami nahrádza doterajšieho správcu doplnkov.

segment.source: For more information please read the updated user guide.
segment.target: Podrobnosti je možné nájsť v aktualizovanej používateľskej príručke.

segment.source: New input gestures:
segment.target: Pridané nové klávesové skratky:

segment.source: An unbound gesture to cycle through the available languages for Windows OCR. (#13036)
segment.target: Nedefinovaná skratka pre prepínanie medzi dostupnými jazykmi OCR v operačnom systéme Windows. (#13036)

segment.source: An unbound gesture to cycle through the braille show messages modes. (#14864)
segment.target: Nedefinovaná klávesová skratka, ktorá umožňuje prepínať zobrazovanie správ na brailovom riadku. (#14864)

segment.source: An unbound gesture to toggle showing the selection indicator for braille. (#14948)
segment.target: Nedefinovaná klávesová skratka, ktorá umožňuje prepínať ukazovanie výberu na brailovom riadku. (#14948)

segment.source: Added default keyboard gesture assignments to move to the next or previous object in a flattened view of the object hierarchy. (#15053)
segment.target: Pridané definované klávesové skratky na prechod na nasledujúci a predchádzajúci objekt v plošnom prezeraní. (#15053)

segment.source: Desktop: `NVDA+numpad9` and `NVDA+numpad3` to move to the previous and next objects respectively.
segment.target: Desktop: `NVDA+numerická9` a `NVDA+numerická3` slúžia na prechádzanie na nasledujúci a predchádzajúci objekt.

segment.source: Laptop: `shift+NVDA+[` and `shift+NVDA+]` to move to the previous and next objects respectively.
segment.target: Laptop: `shift+NVDA+[` a `shift+NVDA+]` slúžia na prechod na predchádzajúci a nasledujúci objekt.

segment.source: New braille features:
segment.target: Nové funkcie pre brailové riadky:

segment.source: Added support for the Help Tech Activator braille display. (#14917)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre brailový riadok Help Tech Activator (#14917)

segment.source: A new option to toggle showing the selection indicator (dots 7 and 8). (#14948)
segment.target: Pridaná možnosť zapnúť a vypnúť ukazovanie výberu bodmi 7 a 8. (#14948)

segment.source: A new option to optionally move the system caret or focus when changing the review cursor position with braille routing keys. (#14885, #3166)
segment.target: Pridaná možnosť posúvať prezerací a systémový kurzor smerovými tlačidlami. (#14885, #3166)

segment.source: When pressing `numpad2` three times to report the numerical value of the character at the position of the review cursor, the information is now also provided in braille. (#14826)
segment.target: Ak trikrát za sebou stlačíte `numerickú 2` pre zistenie numerickej hodnoty znaku pod prezeracím kurzorom, informácia sa zobrazí aj na brailovom riadku. (#14826)

segment.source: Added support for the `aria-brailleroledescription` ARIA 1.3 attribute, allowing web authors to override the type of an element shown on the braille display. (#14748)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre prvok `aria-brailleroledescription` ARIA 1.3, čo umožňuje autorom webových dokumentov zamedziť zobrazeniu určitému typu prvkov na brailovom riadku. (#14748)

segment.source: Baum braille driver: added several braille chord gestures for performing common keyboard commands such as `windows+d` and `alt+tab`.
segment.target: Pre riadky Baum boli pridané klávesové skratky, takže je možné priamo na riadku vyvolať kombinácie `windows+d` a `alt+tab`.

segment.source: Please refer to the NVDA User Guide for a full list. (#14714)
segment.target: Celý zoznam skratiek je uvedený v používateľskej príručke NVDA. (#14714)

segment.source: Added pronunciation of Unicode symbols:
segment.target: Pridaná výslovnosť pre nasledujúce Unicode symboly:

segment.source: braille symbols such as `⠐⠣⠃⠗⠇⠐⠜`. (#13778)
segment.target: Brailové symboly, ako napríklad `⠐⠣⠃⠗⠇⠐⠜`. (#13778)

segment.source: Mac Option key symbol `⌥`. (#14682)
segment.target: Symbol klávesu option pre počítače mac `⌥`. (#14682)

segment.source: Added gestures for Tivomatic Caiku Albatross braille displays. (#14844, #15002)
segment.target: Pridané nové skratky pre brailové riadky. (#14844, #15002):

segment.source: showing the braille settings dialog
segment.target: Zobrazenie vetvy Brailovo písmo v nastaveniach NVDA

segment.source: accessing the status bar
segment.target: Zobrazenie stavového riadka

segment.source: cycling the braille cursor shape
segment.target: Prepínanie tvaru brailového kurzora

segment.source: cycling the braille show messages mode
segment.target: Prepínanie zobrazovania správ

segment.source: toggling the braille cursor on/off
segment.target: Prepínanie zobrazenia brailového kurzora

segment.source: toggling the "braille show selection indicator" state
segment.target: Prepínanie ukazovania výberu

segment.source: cycling the "braille move system caret when routing review cursor" mode. (#15122)
segment.target: Prepínanie posúvania kurzora smerovými tlačidlami

segment.source: Microsoft Office features:
segment.target: Novinky v aplikáciách Microsoft Office:

segment.source: When highlighted text is enabled Document Formatting, highlight colours are now reported in Microsoft Word. (#7396, #12101, #5866)
segment.target: Ak je zapnuté v nastaveniach formátovania oznamovanie vyznačeného textu, NVDA oznamuje v dokumentoch MS Word aj farbu vyznačeného textu. (#7396, #12101, #5866)

segment.source: When colors are enabled Document Formatting, background colours are now reported in Microsoft Word. (#5866)
segment.target: Ak je v nastaveniach formátovania zapnuté oznamovanie farieb, NVDA v dokumentoch MS Word oznamuje aj farbu pozadia. (#5866)

segment.source: When using Excel shortcuts to toggle format such as bold, italic, underline and strike through of a cell in Excel, the result is now reported. (#14923)
segment.target: Automaticky sú oznamované zmeny stavu počas prepínania formátovania v bunkách MS Excel (kurzíva, tučné a pod). (#14923)

segment.source: Experimental enhanced sound management:
segment.target: Pridané experimentálne možnosti pre zvukový výstup:

segment.source: NVDA can now output audio via the Windows Audio Session API (WASAPI), which may improve the responsiveness, performance and stability of NVDA speech and sounds. (#14697)
segment.target: NVDA teraz dokáže posielať zvuk cez rozhranie Windows Audio Session API (WASAPI), čo môže zvýšiť stabilitu a odozvu hlasového výstupu a zvukov. (#14697)

segment.source: WASAPI usage can be enabled in Advanced settings.
segment.target: Toto je možné aktivovať v pokročilých nastaveniach.

segment.source: Additionally, if WASAPI is enabled, the following Advanced settings can also be configured.
segment.target: Ak je zapnuté používanie WASAPI, potom sú dostupné aj tieto možnosti:

segment.source: An option to have the volume of NVDA sounds and beeps follow the volume setting of the voice you are using. (#1409)
segment.target: Možnosť spoločného regulovania hlasitosti hlasového výstupu syntézy reči a zvukov NVDA. (#1409)

segment.source: An option to separately configure the volume of NVDA sounds. (#1409, #15038)
segment.target: Možnosť regulovať samostatne hlasitosť zvukov a hlasového výstupu. (#1409, #15038)

segment.source: There is a known issue with intermittent crashing when WASAPI is enabled. (#15150)
segment.target: Sú známe prípady, keď NVDA padá pri použití WASAPI. (#15150)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome, NVDA now reports when a control opens a dialog, grid, list or tree if the author has specified this using `aria-haspopup`. (#8235)
segment.target: V prehliadačoch Mozilla Firefox a Google Chrome NVDA odteraz oznamuje, že prvok otvára dialóg (napríklad mriežku, zoznam alebo stromové zobrazenie). Správne to funguje v prípade, že autor dokumentu špecifikuje správne vlastnosti cez `aria-haspopup`. (#8235)

segment.source: It is now possible to use system variables (such as `%temp%` or `%homepath%`) in the path specification while creating portable copies of NVDA. (#14680)
segment.target: Pri vytváraní prenosnej verzie NVDA je možné v ceste použiť systémové premenné, ako `%temp%` alebo `%homepath%`. (#14680)

segment.source: In Windows 10 May 2019 Update and later, NVDA can announce virtual desktop names when opening, changing, and closing them. (#5641)
segment.target: V systéme Windows 10 od verzie May 2019 NVDA oznamuje názov pracovnej plochy pri jej otvorení, zmene a zatvorení. (#5641)

segment.source: A system wide parameter has been added to allow users and system administrators to force NVDA to start in secure mode. (#10018)
segment.target: Pridaný parameter, ktorý umožňuje vynútiť spustenie NVDA v bezpečnom režime. (#10018)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Zmeny

segment.source: Component updates:
segment.target: Aktualizácie komponentov:

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `ed9a7bcf`. (#15036)
segment.target: Hlasový výstup eSpeak NG aktualizovanýna verziu 1.52-dev commit `ed9a7bcf`. (#15036)

segment.source: Updated LibLouis braille translator to [3.26.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.26.0). (#14970)
segment.target: Brailová prekladová tabuľka LibLouis aktualizovaná na verziu [3.26.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.26.0). (#14970)

segment.source: CLDR has been updated to version 43.0. (#14918)
segment.target: Databáza CLDR aktualizovaná na verziu 43.0. (#14918)

segment.source: LibreOffice changes:
segment.target: Zmeny pre Libre Office:

segment.source: When reporting the review cursor location, the current cursor/caret location is now reported relative to the current page in LibreOffice Writer 7.6 and newer, similar to what is done for Microsoft Word. (#11696)
segment.target: V LibreOffice Writer od verzie 7.6 skratka na oznámenie pozície kurzora oznamuje pozíciu relatívne k aktuálnej strane, rovnako ako v MS Worde. (#11696)

segment.source: Announcement of the status bar (e.g. triggered by `NVDA+end`) works for LibreOffice. (#11698)
segment.target: Správne funguje oznamovanie stavového riadka (po stlačení `NVDA+end`). (#11698)

segment.source: When moving to a different cell in LibreOffice Calc, NVDA no longer incorrectly announces the coordinates of the previously focused cell when cell coordinate announcement is disabled in NVDA's settings. (#15098)
segment.target: Pri presunutí kurzora do inej bunky v LibreOffice Calc NVDA viac neoznamuje súradnice predchádzajúcej zameranej bunky, ak je vypnuté oznamovanie súradníc. (#15098)

segment.source: Braille changes:
segment.target: Zmeny pre brailové riadky:

segment.source: When using a braille display via the Standard HID braille driver, the dpad can be used to emulate the arrow keys and enter.
segment.target: Ak sa používa brailový riadok cez štandardné HID rozhranie, je možné použiť dpad na emuláciu šípok a klávesu enter.

segment.source: Also `space+dot1` and `space+dot4` now map to up and down arrow respectively. (#14713)
segment.target: Taktiež `medzera+bod1` a `medzera+bod4` sa dajú použiť ako šípka hore a dole. (#14713)

segment.source: Updates to dynamic web content (ARIA live regions) are now displayed in braille.
segment.target: Dynamické zmeny oznamované cez ARIA live region môžu byť zobrazované aj na brailovom riadku.

segment.source: This can be disabled in the Advanced Settings panel. (#7756)
segment.target: Toto je možné vypnúť v pokročilých nastaveniach.

segment.source: Dash and em-dash symbols will always be sent to the synthesizer. (#13830)
segment.target: Do hlasového výstupu sú odteraz vždy odosielané symboly spojovník a dlhá pomlčka. (#13830)

segment.source: Distance reported in Microsoft Word will now honour the unit defined in Word's advanced options even when using UIA to access Word documents. (#14542)
segment.target: Oznamovanie vzdialenosti v dokumentoch MS Word sa teraz riadi nastavením jednotiek v nastaveniach MS Word, a to aj v prípade, že sa na prístup k dokumentu používa UIA. (#14542)

segment.source: NVDA responds faster when moving the cursor in edit controls. (#14708)
segment.target: NVDA reaguje rýchlejšie pri posúvaní kurzora v editačných poliach. (#14708)

segment.source: Script for reporting the destination of a link now reports from the caret / focus position rather than the navigator object. (#14659)
segment.target: Klávesová skratka na oznámenie URL adresy oznamuje adresu pre zameraný prvok a nie pre navigačný objekt. (#14659)

segment.source: Portable copy creation no longer requires that a drive letter be entered as part of the absolute path. (#14680)
segment.target: Cesta na uloženie prenosnej verzie viac nemusí nutne obsahovať písmeno jednotky. (#14680)

segment.source: If Windows is configured to display seconds in the system tray clock, using `NVDA+f12` to report the time now honors that setting. (#14742)
segment.target: Ak sa na systémovom panely zobrazujú hodiny aj so sekundami, skratka `NVDA+f12` zohľadňuje toto nastavenie a prečíta aj sekundy. (#14742)

segment.source: NVDA will now report unlabeled groupings that have useful position information, such as in recent versions of Microsoft Office 365 menus. (#14878)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz oznamuje nepopísané zoskupenia, ak majú užitočnú informáciu o pozícii. Toto je užitočné napríklad v menu v najnovších verziách Microsoft Office 365. (#14878)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Opravy

segment.source: Braille:
segment.target: Brailové riadky:

segment.source: Several stability fixes to input/output for braille displays, resulting in less frequent errors and crashes of NVDA. (#14627)
segment.target: Vylepšená stabilita pre vstup a výstup z brailových riadkov, čo spôsobuje menej časté mrznutie a padanie NVDA. (#14627)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer unnecessarily switch to no braille multiple times during auto detection, resulting in a cleaner log and less overhead. (#14524)
segment.target: NVDA viac počas automatickej detekcie brailových riadkov neprepína často na možnosť "žiadny zobrazovač". Záznam je tak čistejší a redukuje sa tým aj záťaž. (#14524)

segment.source: NVDA will now switch back to USB if a HID Bluetooth device (such as the HumanWare Brailliant or APH Mantis) is automatically detected and an USB connection becomes available.
segment.target: NVDA automaticky prepne na USB, ak deteguje zariadenie HID Bluetooth a zároveň je dostupná možnosť USB (týka sa riadkov HumanWare Brailliant alebo APH Mantis).

segment.source: This only worked for Bluetooth Serial ports before. (#14524)
segment.target: Doteraz toto fungovalo len pre pripojenie Bluetooth cez sériový port. (#14524)

segment.source: When no braille display is connected and the braille viewer is closed by pressing `alt+f4` or clicking the close button, the display size of the braille subsystem will again be reset to no cells. (#15214)
segment.target: Ak nie je pripojený žiadny brailový riadok a súčasne zatvoríte zobrazovač braillu stlačením `alt+f4` alebo kliknutím na tlačidlo zatvoriť, veľkosť zobrazenia v brailovom subsystéme je nastavená na 0 buniek. (#15214)

segment.source: Web browsers:
segment.target: Webové prehliadače:

segment.source: NVDA no longer occasionally causes Mozilla Firefox to crash or stop responding. (#14647)
segment.target: NVDA viac nespôsobuje občasné pády a zamrznutia prehliadača Mozilla Firefox. (#14647)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome, typed characters are no longer reported in some text boxes even when speak typed characters is disabled. (#8442)
segment.target: NVDA viac v prehliadačoch Mozilla Firefox a Google Chrome neoznamuje napísané znaky v niektorých editačných poliach, ak je oznamovanie napísaných znakov vypnuté. (#8442)

segment.source: You can now use browse mode in Chromium Embedded Controls where it was not possible previously. (#13493, #8553)
segment.target: Odteraz je možné používať režim prehliadania vo vnorených prvkoch Chromium aj na miestach, kde to doteraz nebolo možné. (#13493, #8553)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, moving the mouse over text after a link now reliably reports the text. (#9235)
segment.target: Ak v prehliadači Mozila Firefox prejdete myšou na text za odkazom, NVDA správne oznamuje text. (#9235)

segment.source: The destination of graphic links is now reported accurately in more cases in Chrome and Edge. (#14783)
segment.target: Cieľ obrázka v odkazoch je presnejšie oznamovaný v prehliadačoch Chrome a Edge. (#14783)

segment.source: When trying to report the URL for a link without a href attribute NVDA is no longer silent.
segment.target: NVDA viac neostane ticho, ak sa pokúsite zistiť URL adresu odkazu, ktorý nemá atribút a href.

segment.source: Instead NVDA reports that the link has no destination. (#14723)
segment.target: NVDA upozorní, že odkaz nemá definovaný cieľ. (#14723)

segment.source: In Browse mode, NVDA will no longer incorrectly ignore focus moving to a parent or child control e.g. moving from a control to its parent list item or gridcell. (#14611)
segment.target: NVDA v režime prehliadania viac neignoruje zmenu fokusu pri prechode na rodičovský alebo podradený prvok, napríklad pri prechode z prvku na nadradenú položku v zozname alebo bunku v mriežke. (#14611)

segment.source: Note however that this fix only applies when the Automatically set focus to focusable elements" option in Browse Mode settings is turned off (which is the default).
segment.target: Toto správne funguje len v prípade, že je vypnuté automatické presúvanie fokusu na zamerané prvky.

segment.source: Fixes for Windows 11:
segment.target: Opravy pre Windows 11:

segment.source: NVDA can once again announce Notepad status bar contents. (#14573)
segment.target: NVDA opäť dokáže oznamovať stavový riadok poznámkového bloku. (#14573)

segment.source: Switching between tabs will announce the new tab name and position for Notepad and File Explorer. (#14587, #14388)
segment.target: Prepínanie záložiek v prieskumníkovi a poznámkovom bloku oznamuje názov a pozíciu. (#14587, #14388)

segment.source: NVDA will once again announce candidate items when entering text in languages such as Chinese and Japanese. (#14509)
segment.target: NVDA opäť oznamuje návrhy pri písaní v Japončine a Čínštine. (#14509)

segment.source: It is once again possible to open the Contributors and License items on the NVDA Help menu. (#14725)
segment.target: Opäť je možné z pomocníka NVDA zobraziť mená spolupracovníkov a Licenciu. (#14725)

segment.source: Microsoft Office fixes:
segment.target: Opravy pre Microsoft office:

segment.source: When rapidly moving through cells in Excel, NVDA is now less likely to report the wrong cell or selection. (#14983, #12200, #12108)
segment.target: Pri rýchlom prechode cez bunky NVDA s menšou pravdepodobnosťou oznamuje nesprávnu bunku alebo výber. (#14983, #12200, #12108)

segment.source: When landing on an Excel cell from outside a work sheet, braille and focus highlighter are no longer needlessly updated to the object that had focus previously. (#15136)
segment.target: Ak bol fokus mimo tabuľky a následne sa presunie do bunky v tabuľke, zobrazovač fokusu a zobrazenie na brailovom riadku neostane na predchádzajúcom objekte. (#15136)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to announce focusing password fields in Microsoft Excel and Outlook. (#14839)
segment.target: NVDA dokáže oznamovať zamerané heslové polia v Microsoft Excely a Outlooku. (#14839)

segment.source: For symbols which do not have a symbol description in the current locale, the default English symbol level will be used. (#14558, #14417)
segment.target: Ak NVDA narazí na symbol, ktorý nemá popis v aktuálnej lokalizácii, použije anglické označenie aj úroveň oznamovania symbolu. (#14558, #14417)

segment.source: It is now possible to use the backslash character in the replacement field of a dictionaries entry, when the type is not set to regular expression. (#14556)
segment.target: Pri nastavovaní definovaní výslovnosti v slovníku je možné použiť znak opačná lomka aj v prípade, že nie je začiarknutá možnosť regulárny výraz. (#14556)

segment.source: In Windows 10 and 11 Calculator, a portable copy of NVDA will no longer do nothing or play error tones when entering expressions in standard calculator in compact overlay mode. (#14679)
segment.target: V kalkulačke Windows 10 a 11 funguje správne zadávanie výrazov aj v prípade, že je použitá prenosná verzia NVDA a kalkulačka je nastavená v kompaktnom režime. (#14679)

segment.source: NVDA again recovers from many more situations such as applications that stop responding which previously caused it to freeze completely. (#14759)
segment.target: NVDA lepšie zvláda pády aplikácií, ktoré neodpovedajú. (#14759)

segment.source: When forcing UIA support with certain terminal and consoles, a bug is fixed which caused a freeze and the log file to be spammed. (#14689)
segment.target: Opravené problémy, ktoré spôsobovali zamrznutie NVDA a zahltenie logu pri použití UIA v termináloch.

segment.source: NVDA will no longer refuse to save the configuration after a configuration reset. (#13187)
segment.target: NVDA viac neodmietne uloženie nastavení po ich obnovení. (#13187)

segment.source: When running a temporary version from the launcher, NVDA will not mislead users into thinking they can save the configuration. (#14914)
segment.target: NVDA sa viac nepokúša uložiť konfiguráciu, ak je spustená dočasná kópia. (#14914)

segment.source: NVDA now generally responds slightly faster to commands and focus changes. (#14928)
segment.target: Zrýchlená odozva na zadávané príkazy a zmeny fokusu. (#14928)

segment.source: Displaying the OCR settings will not fail on some systems anymore. (#15017)
segment.target: Zobrazenie nastavení OCR viac v niektorých prípadoch nepadá. (#15017)

segment.source: Fix bug related to saving and loading the NVDA configuration, including switching synthesizers. (#14760)
segment.target: Opravené problémy s ukladaním a načítavaním konfigurácie v kombinácii s prepínaním hlasových výstupov. (#14760)

segment.source: Fix bug causing text review "flick up" touch gesture to move pages rather than move to previous line. (#15127)
segment.target: Opravená chyba, ktorá spôsobila, že švihnutie hore spôsobilo presun kurzora o celú stranu. (#15127)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.

segment.source: Suggested conventions have been added to the add-on manifest specification.
segment.target: Suggested conventions have been added to the add-on manifest specification.

segment.source: These are optional for NVDA compatibility, but are encouraged or required for submitting to the Add-on Store. (#14754)
segment.target: These are optional for NVDA compatibility, but are encouraged or required for submitting to the Add-on Store. (#14754)

segment.source: Use `lowerCamelCase` for the name field.
segment.target: Use `lowerCamelCase` for the name field.

segment.source: Use `<major>.<minor>.<patch>` format for the version field (required for add-on datastore).
segment.target: Use `<major>.<minor>.<patch>` format for the version field (required for add-on datastore).

segment.source: Use `https://` as the schema for the url field (required for add-on datastore).
segment.target: Use `https://` as the schema for the url field (required for add-on datastore).

segment.source: Added a new extension point type called `Chain`, which can be used to iterate over iterables returned by registered handlers. (#14531)
segment.target: Added a new extension point type called `Chain`, which can be used to iterate over iterables returned by registered handlers. (#14531)

segment.source: Added the `bdDetect.scanForDevices` extension point.
segment.target: Added the `bdDetect.scanForDevices` extension point.

segment.source: Handlers can be registered that yield `BrailleDisplayDriver/DeviceMatch` pairs that don't fit in existing categories, like USB or Bluetooth. (#14531)
segment.target: Handlers can be registered that yield `BrailleDisplayDriver/DeviceMatch` pairs that don't fit in existing categories, like USB or Bluetooth. (#14531)

segment.source: Added extension point: `synthDriverHandler.synthChanged`. (#14618)
segment.target: Added extension point: `synthDriverHandler.synthChanged`. (#14618)

segment.source: The NVDA Synth Settings Ring now caches available setting values the first time they're needed, rather than when loading the synthesizer. (#14704)
segment.target: The NVDA Synth Settings Ring now caches available setting values the first time they're needed, rather than when loading the synthesizer. (#14704)

segment.source: You can now call the export method on a gesture map to export it to a dictionary.
segment.target: You can now call the export method on a gesture map to export it to a dictionary.

segment.source: This dictionary can be imported in another gesture by passing it either to the constructor of `GlobalGestureMap` or to the update method on an existing map. (#14582)
segment.target: This dictionary can be imported in another gesture by passing it either to the constructor of `GlobalGestureMap` or to the update method on an existing map. (#14582)

segment.source: `hwIo.base.IoBase` and its derivatives now have a new constructor parameter to take a `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread`.
segment.target: `hwIo.base.IoBase` and its derivatives now have a new constructor parameter to take a `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread`.

segment.source: If not provided, the default thread is used. (#14627)
segment.target: If not provided, the default thread is used. (#14627)

segment.source: `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread` now has a `setWaitableTimer` method to set a waitable timer using a python function.
segment.target: `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread` now has a `setWaitableTimer` method to set a waitable timer using a python function.

segment.source: Similarly, the new `getCompletionRoutine` method allows you to convert a python method into a completion routine safely. (#14627)
segment.target: Similarly, the new `getCompletionRoutine` method allows you to convert a python method into a completion routine safely. (#14627)

segment.source: `offsets.OffsetsTextInfo._get_boundingRects` should now always return `List[locationHelper.rectLTWH]` as expected for a subclass of `textInfos.TextInfo`. (#12424)
segment.target: `offsets.OffsetsTextInfo._get_boundingRects` should now always return `List[locationHelper.rectLTWH]` as expected for a subclass of `textInfos.TextInfo`. (#12424)

segment.source: `highlight-color` is now a format field attribute. (#14610)
segment.target: `highlight-color` is now a format field attribute. (#14610)

segment.source: NVDA should more accurately determine if a logged message is coming from NVDA core. (#14812)
segment.target: NVDA should more accurately determine if a logged message is coming from NVDA core. (#14812)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer log inaccurate warnings or errors about deprecated appModules. (#14806)
segment.target: NVDA will no longer log inaccurate warnings or errors about deprecated appModules. (#14806)

segment.source: All NVDA extension points are now briefly described in a new, dedicated chapter in the Developer Guide. (#14648)
segment.target: All NVDA extension points are now briefly described in a new, dedicated chapter in the Developer Guide. (#14648)

segment.source: `scons checkpot` will no longer check the `userConfig` subfolder anymore. (#14820)
segment.target: `scons checkpot` will no longer check the `userConfig` subfolder anymore. (#14820)

segment.source: Translatable strings can now be defined with a singular and a plural form using `ngettext` and `npgettext`. (#12445)
segment.target: Translatable strings can now be defined with a singular and a plural form using `ngettext` and `npgettext`. (#12445)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Deprecations

segment.source: Passing lambda functions to `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread.queueAsApc` is deprecated.
segment.target: Passing lambda functions to `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread.queueAsApc` is deprecated.

segment.source: Instead, functions should be weakly referenceable. (#14627)
segment.target: Instead, functions should be weakly referenceable. (#14627)

segment.source: Importing `LPOVERLAPPED_COMPLETION_ROUTINE` from `hwIo.base` is deprecated.
segment.target: Importing `LPOVERLAPPED_COMPLETION_ROUTINE` from `hwIo.base` is deprecated.

segment.source: Instead import from `hwIo.ioThread`. (#14627)
segment.target: Instead import from `hwIo.ioThread`. (#14627)

segment.source: `IoThread.autoDeleteApcReference` is deprecated.
segment.target: `IoThread.autoDeleteApcReference` is deprecated.

segment.source: It was introduced in NVDA 2023.1 and was never meant to be part of the public API.
segment.target: It was introduced in NVDA 2023.1 and was never meant to be part of the public API.

segment.source: Until removal, it behaves as a no-op, i.e. a context manager yielding nothing. (#14924)
segment.target: Until removal, it behaves as a no-op, i.e. a context manager yielding nothing. (#14924)

segment.source: `gui.MainFrame.onAddonsManagerCommand` is deprecated, use `gui.MainFrame.onAddonStoreCommand` instead. (#13985)
segment.target: `gui.MainFrame.onAddonsManagerCommand` is deprecated, use `gui.MainFrame.onAddonStoreCommand` instead. (#13985)

segment.source: `speechDictHandler.speechDictVars.speechDictsPath` is deprecated, use `NVDAState.WritePaths.speechDictsDir` instead. (#15021)
segment.target: `speechDictHandler.speechDictVars.speechDictsPath` is deprecated, use `NVDAState.WritePaths.speechDictsDir` instead. (#15021)

segment.source: Importing `voiceDictsPath` and `voiceDictsBackupPath` from `speechDictHandler.dictFormatUpgrade` is deprecated.
segment.target: Importing `voiceDictsPath` and `voiceDictsBackupPath` from `speechDictHandler.dictFormatUpgrade` is deprecated.

segment.source: Instead use `WritePaths.voiceDictsDir` and `WritePaths.voiceDictsBackupDir` from `NVDAState`. (#15048)
segment.target: Instead use `WritePaths.voiceDictsDir` and `WritePaths.voiceDictsBackupDir` from `NVDAState`. (#15048)

segment.source: `config.CONFIG_IN_LOCAL_APPDATA_SUBKEY` is deprecated.
segment.target: `config.CONFIG_IN_LOCAL_APPDATA_SUBKEY` is deprecated.

segment.source: Instead use `config.RegistryKey.CONFIG_IN_LOCAL_APPDATA_SUBKEY`. (#15049)
segment.target: Instead use `config.RegistryKey.CONFIG_IN_LOCAL_APPDATA_SUBKEY`. (#15049)

segment.source: A new option has been added, "Paragraph Style" in "Document Navigation".
segment.target: Pridané nové nastavenie, ktoré umožňuje určiť, ako sú definované odseky. Pozrite Nastavenia, časť navigácia v dokumente.

segment.source: This can be used with text editors that do not support paragraph navigation natively, such as Notepad and Notepad++.
segment.target: Aktuálne je teda možné používať navigáciu po odsekoch aj v aplikáciách, ktoré ju natívne nepodporujú, ako napríklad Notepad and Notepad++.

segment.source: There is a new global command to report the destination of a link, mapped to `NVDA+k`.
segment.target: Pridaná nová klávesová skratka, ktorá umožňuje zisťiť URL adresu odkazu, na ktorom je kurzor. Skratka je predvolene `NVDA+k`.

segment.source: Support for annotated web content (such as comments and footnotes) has improved.
segment.target: Vylepšená podpora pre anotácie vo webových dokumentoch (komentáre a poznámky).

segment.source: Press `NVDA+d` to cycle through summaries when annotations are reported (e.g. "has comment, has footnote").
segment.target: Ak NVDA ohlási, že prvok má komentár alebo poznámku, je možné si prečítať podrobnosti skratkou `NVDA+d`.

segment.source: Tivomatic Caiku Albatross 46/80 braille displays are now supported.
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre braillové riadky Tivomatic Caiku Albatross 46/80.

segment.source: Support for ARM64 and AMD64 versions of Windows has improved.
segment.target: Vylepšená podpora pre operačné systémy Windows vo variantoch ARM64 a AMD64.

segment.source: There are many bug fixes, notably Windows 11 fixes.
segment.target: Mnohé opravy sa týkajú hlavne systému Windows 11.

segment.source: eSpeak, LibLouis, Sonic rate boost and Unicode CLDR have been updated.
segment.target: Aktualizované knižnice eSpeak, LibLouis, funkcionalita dvojnásobnej rýchlosti a databáza Unicode CLDR.

segment.source: There are new Georgian, Swahili (Kenya) and Chichewa (Malawi) braille tables.
segment.target: Pridané nové braillové tabuľky pre jazyky Gruzínčina, Svahilčina (Keňa) a Chichewa (Malawi).

segment.source: Note:
segment.target: Upozornenie:

segment.source: This release breaks compatibility with existing add-ons.
segment.target: Táto verzia nie je kompatibilná so staršími doplnkami.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nové vlastnosti

segment.source: Microsoft Excel via UI Automation: Automatic reporting of column and row headers in tables. (#14228)
segment.target: Podpora pre MS Excel cez rozhranie UIA: Pridané automatické oznamovanie hlavičiek riadkov a stĺpcov tabuľky. (#14228)

segment.source: Note: This is referring to tables formatted via the "Table" button on the Insert pane of the Ribbon.
segment.target: Upozorňujeme, že toto sa týka len tabuliek, ktoré sú formátované cez panel tabuľka v rybbon menu.

segment.source: "First Column" and "Header Row" in "Table Style Options" correspond to column and row headers respectively.
segment.target: Je potrebné správne nastaviť "Prvý stĺpec" a "riadok hlavičky" v časti "Možnosti štýlu tabuľky".

segment.source: This is not referring to screen reader specific headers via named ranges, which is currently not supported via UI Automation.
segment.target: Toto sa netýka možnosti definovať hlavičky pre čítače obrazovky. Toto v súčasnosti cez UIA nie je podporované.

segment.source: An unassigned script has been added to toggle delayed character descriptions. (#14267)
segment.target: Automatické fonetické hláskovanie je aktuálne možné zapínať a vypínať aj pomocou klávesovej skratky. Skratka nie je predvolene definovaná a je ju možné nastaviť v dialógu klávesové skratky. (#14267)

segment.source: Added an experimental option to leverage the UIA notification support in Windows Terminal to report new or changed text in the terminal, resulting in improved stability and responsivity. (#13781)
segment.target: Pridaná možnosť automatického oznamovania nového textu v konzolách Windows terminálu cez rozhranie UIA, čo zlepšuje odozvu a stabilitu. (#13781)

segment.source: Consult the user guide for limitations of this experimental option.
segment.target: Podrobnosti a nedostatky sú vysvetlené v používateľskej príručke NVDA.

segment.source: On Windows 11 ARM64, browse mode is now available in AMD64 apps such as Firefox, Google Chrome and 1Password. (#14397)
segment.target: V systéme Windows 11 vo variante ARM64 je možné používať režim prehliadania v aplikáciách AMD64, ako Firefox, Google Chrome a 1Password. (#14397)

segment.source: A new option has been added, "Paragraph Style" in "Document Navigation".
segment.target: Pridaná nová sekcia Navigácia v dokumentoch a aktuálne jedno nové nastavenie: Za odsek považovať.

segment.source: This adds support for single line break (normal) and multi line break (block) paragraph navigation.
segment.target: umožňuje nastaviť, čo je považované za odseky. Možnosti sú jeden alebo viacero zlomov riadka.

segment.source: This can be used with text editors that do not support paragraph navigation natively, such as Notepad and Notepad++. (#13797)
segment.target: Takto je možné prechádzať po odsekoch aj v aplikáciách, ktoré to predvolene nepodporujú, ako napríklad Poznámkový blok a Notepad++. (#13797)

segment.source: The presence of multiple annotations are now reported.
segment.target: Ak je dostupných viacero anotácií, NVDA na túto skutočnosť upozorní.

segment.source: `NVDA+d` now cycles through reporting the summary of each annotation target for origins with multiple annotation targets.
segment.target: Skratkou `NVDA+d` je možné postupne prečítať všetky dostupné anotácie pre zameraný prvok.

segment.source: For example, when text has a comment and a footnote associated with it. (#14507, #14480)
segment.target: Napríklad ak text obsahuje komentár a poznámku pod čiarou. (#14507, #14480)
