segment.source: Added support for Tivomatic Caiku Albatross 46/80 braille displays. (#13045)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre brailový riadok Tivomatic Caiku Albatross 46/80. (#13045)

segment.source: New global command: Report link destination (`NVDA+k`).
segment.target: Nová klávesová skratka: Oznámiť URL adresu zameraného odkazu (`NVDA+k`).

segment.source: Pressed once will speak/braille the destination of the link that is in the navigator object.
segment.target: Oznámi resp. zobrazí na braillovom riadku URL adresu odkazu, na ktorom je navigačný objekt.

segment.source: Pressing twice will show it in a window, for more detailed review. (#14583)
segment.target: Stlačené dvakrát zobrazí URL adresu v samostatnom okne, v ktorom je možné adresu podrobne prezerať.

segment.source: New unmapped global command (Tools category): Report link destination in a window.
segment.target: Pribudla tiež možnosť definovať klávesovú skratku, ktorá zobrazí URL adresu hneď v samostatnom okne. Skratku je potrebné definovať v dialógu klávesové skratky.

segment.source: Same as pressing `NVDA+k` twice, but may be more useful for braille users. (#14583)
segment.target: Funkcia je rovnaká, ako keď stlačíte `NVDA+k` dvakrát za sebou, ale definovanie novej skratky môže byť užitočné pre používateľov braillových riadkov. (#14583)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Zmeny

segment.source: Updated LibLouis braille translator to [3.24.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.24.0). (#14436)
segment.target: Braillová prekladová tabuľka LibLouis aktualizovaná na verziu [3.24.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.24.0). (#14436)

segment.source: Major updates to Hungarian, UEB, and Chinese bopomofo braille.
segment.target: Aktualizované tabuľky pre Maďarčinu, UEB a tiež čínske znaky bopomofo.

segment.source: Support for the Danish braille standard 2022.
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre dánsky Braillový štandard 2022.

segment.source: New braille tables for Georgian literary braille, Swahili (Kenya) and Chichewa (Malawi).
segment.target: Pridané nové braillové tabuľky pre Gruzínsky kodifikovaný braill, Svahilčinu (Keňa) a Chichewa (Malawi).

segment.source: Updated Sonic rate boost library to commit `1d70513`. (#14180)
segment.target: Aktualizovaná knižnica Sonic rate boost na zdvojnásobenie rýchlosti na commit `1d70513`. (#14180)

segment.source: CLDR has been updated to version 42.0. (#14273)
segment.target: Databáza Unicode znakov CLDR aktualizovaná na 42.0. (#14273)

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `f520fecb`. (#14281, #14675)
segment.target: Hlasový výstup eSpeak NG aktualizovaný na 1.52-dev commit `f520fecb`. (#14281, #14675)

segment.source: Fixed reporting of large numbers. (#14241)
segment.target: Opravené oznamovanie veľkých čísel. (#14241)

segment.source: Java applications with controls using the selectable state will now announce when an item is not selected rather than when the item is selected. (#14336)
segment.target: V Java aplikáciách s prvkami, ktoré majú možnosť výberu oznamuje NVDA stav, keď položka nie je vybratá a nie, keď je položka vybratá. (#14336)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Opravy

segment.source: Windows 11 fixes:
segment.target: Opravy pre Windows 11:

segment.source: NVDA will announce search highlights when opening Start menu. (#13841)
segment.target: NVDA oznamuje návrhy vyhľadávania po otvorení menu štart. (#13841)

segment.source: On ARM, x64 apps are no longer identified as ARM64 applications. (#14403)
segment.target: V architektúre ARM nie sú viac 64-bitové aplikácie identifikované ako aplikácie ARM64. (#14403)

segment.source: Clipboard history menu items such as "pin item" can be accessed. (#14508)
segment.target: Odteraz je možné dostať sa k funkciám v menu histórie schránky, ako napríklad pripnúť položku. (#14508)

segment.source: In Windows 11 22H2 and newer, it is again possible to use mouse and touch interaction to interact with areas such as the system tray overflow window and "Open With" dialog. (#14538, #14539)
segment.target: Vo Windows 11 od verzie 22H2 je možné používať ovládanie myšy a dotykové ovládanie aj v oknách systémového panela a dialógu otvoriť v programe. (#14538, #14539)

segment.source: Suggestions are reported when typing an @mention in in Microsoft Excel comments. (#13764)
segment.target: V MS Excely sú zobrazované návrhy mien používateľov na spomenutie, ak do poľa s komentárom napíšete znak @. (#13764)

segment.source: In the Google Chrome location bar, suggestion controls (switch to tab, remove suggestion etc) are now reported when selected. (#13522)
segment.target: V panely s adresou Google Chrome sú oznamované po zameraní dostupné prvky (napríklad prechod na záložku, odstrániť návrh a podobne). (#13522)

segment.source: When requesting formatting information, colors are now explicitly reported in Wordpad or log viewer, rather than only "Default color". (#13959)
segment.target: Pri oznamovaní formátovania sú farby správne oznamované aj v aplikáciách Wordpad alebo zobrazovač logu. (#13959)

segment.source: In Firefox, activating the "Show options" button on GitHub issue pages now works reliably. (#14269)
segment.target: V prehliadači Firefox na stránke Gidhub, správne funguje aktivovanie tlačidla Show options (zobraziť možnosti). (#14269)

segment.source: The date picker controls in Outlook 2016 / 365 Advanced search dialog now report their label and value. (#12726)
segment.target: Prvky na výber dátumu v MS Outlooku 2016/365 v pokročilých možnostiach hľadania správne oznamujú popis a hodnoty. (#12726)

segment.source: ARIA switch controls are now actually reported as switches in Firefox, Chrome and Edge, rather than checkboxes. (#11310)
segment.target: Aria začiarkávacie tlačidlá sú v prehliadačoch Edge, Chrome a Firefox oznamované ako začiarkávacie tlačidlá a nie začiarkávacie políčka. (#11310)

segment.source: NVDA will automatically announce the sort state on an HTML table column header when changed by pressing an inner button. (#10890)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz automaticky oznamuje zoradenie v hlavičkách v HTML tabuľkách, ak zmeníte spôsob zoradenia stlačením príslušného tlačidla. (#10890)

segment.source: A landmark or region's name is always automatically spoken when jumping inside from outside using quick navigation or focus in browse mode. (#13307)
segment.target: Oblasť stránky alebo orientačný bod je oznámený, ak pomocou rýchlej navigácie alebo fokusu prejdete do vnútra oblasti alebo orientačného bodu. (#13307)

segment.source: When beep or announce 'cap' for capitals is enabled with delayed character descriptions, NVDA no longer beeps or announces 'cap' twice. (#14239)
segment.target: Ak je zapnuté oznamovanie veľkých písmen slovom "veľké" alebo pípnutím, NVDA viac nepípa a neoznamuje "veľké" aj pri automatickom fonetickom hláskovaní. (#14239)

segment.source: Controls in tables in Java applications will now be announced more accurately by NVDA. (#14347)
segment.target: Prvky v tabuľkách v Java aplikáciách sú odteraz oznamované presnejšie. (#14347)

segment.source: Some settings will no longer be unexpectedly different when used with multiple profiles. (#14170)
segment.target: Niektoré nastavenia viac nie sú rôzne pri používaní viacerých profilov. (#14170)

segment.source: The following settings have been addressed:
segment.target: Týka sa to konkrétne týchto nastavení:

segment.source: Line indentation in Document formatting settings.
segment.target: Oznamovanie zarovnania riadka v nastaveniach čítania textu.

segment.source: Cell borders in doc formatting settings
segment.target: Oznamovanie orámovania buniek tabuľky v nastaveniach čítania textu.

segment.source: Show messages in braille settings
segment.target: Interval zobrazovania správ v nastaveniach braillu.

segment.source: Tether Braille in braille settings
segment.target: Braillový kurzor zviazaný s v nastaveniach braillu.

segment.source: In some rare cases, these settings used in profiles may be unexpectedly modified when installing this version of NVDA.
segment.target: Môže sa stať, že tieto nastavenia budú zmenené po inštalácii tejto verzie NVDA.

segment.source: Please check these options in your profiles after upgrading NVDA to this version.
segment.target: Po aktualizácii NVDA odporúčame skontrolovať vyššie spomenuté nastavenia.

segment.source: Emojis should now be reported in more languages. (#14433)
segment.target: Oznamovanie symbolov Emoji je odteraz podporované v ďalších jazykoch. (#14433)

segment.source: The presence of an annotation is no longer missing in braille for some elements. (#13815)
segment.target: Informácia o dostupných anotáciách je zobrazená vždy aj na braillovom riadku. (#13815)

segment.source: Fixed an issue where config changes not save correctly when changing between a "Default" option and the value of the "Default" option. (#14133)
segment.target: Opravené problémy s ukladaním nastavení, ak bola vybratá predvolená možnosť a následne bola vybratá tá istá možnosť priamo. (#14133)

segment.source: When configuring NVDA there will always be at least one key defined as an NVDA key. (#14527)
segment.target: Pri nastavovaní je zaručené, že bude vždy aktívny aspoň jeden kláves NVDA. (#14527)

segment.source: When accessing the NVDA menu via the notification area, NVDA will not suggest a pending update anymore when no update is available. (#14523)
segment.target: Ak otvoríte ponuku NVDA zo systémového panela, NVDA viac nehlási, že je dostupná aktualizácia v prípadoch, že skutočne nie je dostupná aktualizácia. (#14523)

segment.source: Remaining, elapsed and total time is now reported correctly for audio files over a day long in foobar2000. (#14127)
segment.target: V prehrávači Foobar 2000 sú správne oznamované časy súborov dlhších ako deň. (#14127)

segment.source: In web browsers such as Chrome and Firefox, alerts such as file downloads are shown in braille in addition to being spoken. (#14562)
segment.target: Upozornenia prehliadačov Chrome a Firefox (napríklad o stiahnutom súbore) sú tiež zobrazované na braillovom riadku. (#14562)

segment.source: Bug fixed when navigating to the first and last column in a table in Firefox (#14554)
segment.target: Opravená chyba, ktorá nastávala pri prechode na prvý a posledný stĺpec v tabuľke v prehliadači Mozilla Firefox. (#14554)

segment.source: When NVDA is launched with `--lang=Windows` parameter, it is again possible to open NVDA's General settings dialog. (#14407)
segment.target: Ak je NVDA spustený s parametrom `--lang=Windows`, je opäť možné otvoriť aj v tomto prípade nastavenia NVDA. (#14407)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to continue reading in Kindle for PC after turning the page. (#14390)
segment.target: Plynulé čítanie viac nezlyhá po prechode na ďalšiu stranu v programe Kindle for PC. (#14390)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: Note: this is an Add-on API compatibility breaking release.
segment.target: Note: this is an Add-on API compatibility breaking release.

segment.source: Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.
segment.target: Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.

segment.source: System tests should now pass when run locally on non-English systems. (#13362)
segment.target: System tests should now pass when run locally on non-English systems. (#13362)

segment.source: In Windows 11 on ARM, x64 apps are no longer identified as ARM64 applications. (#14403)
segment.target: In Windows 11 on ARM, x64 apps are no longer identified as ARM64 applications. (#14403)

segment.source: It is no longer necessary to use `SearchField` and `SuggestionListItem` `UIA` `NVDAObjects` in new UI Automation scenarios, where automatic reporting of search suggestions, and where typing has been exposed via UI Automation with the `controllerFor` pattern.
segment.target: It is no longer necessary to use `SearchField` and `SuggestionListItem` `UIA` `NVDAObjects` in new UI Automation scenarios, where automatic reporting of search suggestions, and where typing has been exposed via UI Automation with the `controllerFor` pattern.

segment.source: This functionality is now available generically via `behaviours.EditableText` and the base `NVDAObject` respectively. (#14222)
segment.target: This functionality is now available generically via `behaviours.EditableText` and the base `NVDAObject` respectively. (#14222)

segment.source: The UIA debug logging category when enabled now produces significantly more logging for UIA event handlers and utilities. (#14256)
segment.target: The UIA debug logging category when enabled now produces significantly more logging for UIA event handlers and utilities. (#14256)

segment.source: NVDAHelper build standards updated. (#13072)
segment.target: NVDAHelper build standards updated. (#13072)

segment.source: Now uses the C++20 standard, was C++17.
segment.target: Now uses the C++20 standard, was C++17.

segment.source: Now uses the `/permissive-` compiler flag which disables permissive behaviors, and sets the `/Zc` compiler options for strict conformance.
segment.target: Now uses the `/permissive-` compiler flag which disables permissive behaviors, and sets the `/Zc` compiler options for strict conformance.

segment.source: Some plugin objects (e.g. drivers and add-ons) now have a more informative description in the NVDA python console. (#14463)
segment.target: Some plugin objects (e.g. drivers and add-ons) now have a more informative description in the NVDA python console. (#14463)

segment.source: NVDA can now be fully compiled with Visual Studio 2022, no longer requiring the Visual Studio 2019 build tools. (#14326)
segment.target: NVDA can now be fully compiled with Visual Studio 2022, no longer requiring the Visual Studio 2019 build tools. (#14326)

segment.source: More detailed logging for NVDA freezes to aid debugging. (#14309)
segment.target: More detailed logging for NVDA freezes to aid debugging. (#14309)

segment.source: The singleton `braille._BgThread` class has been replaced with `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread`. (#14130)
segment.target: The singleton `braille._BgThread` class has been replaced with `hwIo.ioThread.IoThread`. (#14130)

segment.source: A single instance `hwIo.bgThread` (in NVDA core) of this class provides background i/o for thread safe braille display drivers.
segment.target: A single instance `hwIo.bgThread` (in NVDA core) of this class provides background i/o for thread safe braille display drivers.

segment.source: This new class is not a singleton by design, add-on authors are encouraged to use their own instance when doing hardware i/o.
segment.target: This new class is not a singleton by design, add-on authors are encouraged to use their own instance when doing hardware i/o.

segment.source: The processor architecture for the computer can be queried from `winVersion.WinVersion.processorArchitecture attribute.` (#14439)
segment.target: The processor architecture for the computer can be queried from `winVersion.WinVersion.processorArchitecture attribute.` (#14439)

segment.source: New extension points have been added. (#14503)
segment.target: New extension points have been added. (#14503)

segment.source: `inputCore.decide_executeGesture`
segment.target: `inputCore.decide_executeGesture`

segment.source: `tones.decide_beep`
segment.target: `tones.decide_beep`

segment.source: `nvwave.decide_playWaveFile`
segment.target: `nvwave.decide_playWaveFile`

segment.source: `braille.pre_writeCells`
segment.target: `braille.pre_writeCells`

segment.source: `braille.filter_displaySize`
segment.target: `braille.filter_displaySize`

segment.source: `braille.decide_enabled`
segment.target: `braille.decide_enabled`

segment.source: `braille.displayChanged`
segment.target: `braille.displayChanged`

segment.source: `braille.displaySizeChanged`
segment.target: `braille.displaySizeChanged`

segment.source: It is possible to set useConfig to False on supported settings for a synthesizer driver. (#14601)
segment.target: It is possible to set useConfig to False on supported settings for a synthesizer driver. (#14601)

segment.source: API Breaking Changes
segment.target: API Breaking Changes

segment.source: These are breaking API changes.
segment.target: These are breaking API changes.

segment.source: Please open a GitHub issue if your Add-on has an issue with updating to the new API.
segment.target: Please open a GitHub issue if your Add-on has an issue with updating to the new API.

segment.source: The configuration specification has been altered, keys have been removed or modified:
segment.target: The configuration specification has been altered, keys have been removed or modified:

segment.source: In `[documentFormatting]` section (#14233):
segment.target: In `[documentFormatting]` section (#14233):

segment.source: `reportLineIndentation` stores an int value (0 to 3) instead of a boolean
segment.target: `reportLineIndentation` stores an int value (0 to 3) instead of a boolean

segment.source: `reportLineIndentationWithTones` has been removed.
segment.target: `reportLineIndentationWithTones` has been removed.

segment.source: `reportBorderStyle` and `reportBorderColor` have been removed and are replaced by `reportCellBorders`.
segment.target: `reportBorderStyle` and `reportBorderColor` have been removed and are replaced by `reportCellBorders`.

segment.source: In `[braille]` section (#14233):
segment.target: In `[braille]` section (#14233):

segment.source: `noMessageTimeout` has been removed, replaced by a value for `showMessages`.
segment.target: `noMessageTimeout` has been removed, replaced by a value for `showMessages`.

segment.source: `messageTimeout` cannot take the value 0 anymore, replaced by a value for `showMessages`.
segment.target: `messageTimeout` cannot take the value 0 anymore, replaced by a value for `showMessages`.

segment.source: `autoTether` has been removed; `tetherTo` can now take the value "auto" instead.
segment.target: `autoTether` has been removed; `tetherTo` can now take the value "auto" instead.

segment.source: In `[keyboard]` section (#14528):
segment.target: In `[keyboard]` section (#14528):

segment.source: `useCapsLockAsNVDAModifierKey`, `useNumpadInsertAsNVDAModifierKey`, `useExtendedInsertAsNVDAModifierKey` have been removed.
segment.target: `useCapsLockAsNVDAModifierKey`, `useNumpadInsertAsNVDAModifierKey`, `useExtendedInsertAsNVDAModifierKey` have been removed.

segment.source: They are replaced by `NVDAModifierKeys`.
segment.target: They are replaced by `NVDAModifierKeys`.

segment.source: The `NVDAHelper.RemoteLoader64` class has been removed with no replacement. (#14449)
segment.target: The `NVDAHelper.RemoteLoader64` class has been removed with no replacement. (#14449)

segment.source: The following functions in `winAPI.sessionTracking` are removed with no replacement. (#14416, #14490)
segment.target: The following functions in `winAPI.sessionTracking` are removed with no replacement. (#14416, #14490)

segment.source: `isWindowsLocked`
segment.target: `isWindowsLocked`

segment.source: `handleSessionChange`
segment.target: `handleSessionChange`

segment.source: `unregister`
segment.target: `unregister`

segment.source: `register`
segment.target: `register`

segment.source: `isLockStateSuccessfullyTracked`
segment.target: `isLockStateSuccessfullyTracked`

segment.source: It is no longer possible to enable/disable the braille handler by setting `braille.handler.enabled`.
segment.target: It is no longer possible to enable/disable the braille handler by setting `braille.handler.enabled`.

segment.source: To disable the braille handler programatically, register a handler to `braille.handler.decide_enabled`. (#14503)
segment.target: To disable the braille handler programatically, register a handler to `braille.handler.decide_enabled`. (#14503)

segment.source: It is no longer possible to update the display size of the handler by setting `braille.handler.displaySize`.
segment.target: It is no longer possible to update the display size of the handler by setting `braille.handler.displaySize`.

segment.source: To update the displaySize programatically, register a handler to `braille.handler.filter_displaySize`.
segment.target: To update the displaySize programatically, register a handler to `braille.handler.filter_displaySize`.

segment.source: Refer to `brailleViewer` for an example on how to do this. (#14503)
segment.target: Refer to `brailleViewer` for an example on how to do this. (#14503)

segment.source: There have been changes to the usage of `addonHandler.Addon.loadModule`. (#14481)
segment.target: There have been changes to the usage of `addonHandler.Addon.loadModule`. (#14481)

segment.source: `loadModule` now expects dot as a separator, rather than backslash.
segment.target: `loadModule` now expects dot as a separator, rather than backslash.

segment.source: For example "lib.example" instead of "lib\example".
segment.target: For example "lib.example" instead of "lib\example".

segment.source: `loadModule` now raises an exception when a module can't be loaded or has errors, instead of silently returning `None` without giving information about the cause.
segment.target: `loadModule` now raises an exception when a module can't be loaded or has errors, instead of silently returning `None` without giving information about the cause.

segment.source: The following symbols have been removed from `appModules.foobar2000` with no direct replacement. (#14570)
segment.target: The following symbols have been removed from `appModules.foobar2000` with no direct replacement. (#14570)

segment.source: `statusBarTimes`
segment.target: `statusBarTimes`

segment.source: `parseIntervalToTimestamp`
segment.target: `parseIntervalToTimestamp`

segment.source: `getOutputFormat`
segment.target: `getOutputFormat`

segment.source: `getParsingFormat`
segment.target: `getParsingFormat`

segment.source: The following are no longer singletons - their get method has been removed.
segment.target: The following are no longer singletons - their get method has been removed.

segment.source: Usage of `Example.get()` is now `Example()`. (#14248)
segment.target: Usage of `Example.get()` is now `Example()`. (#14248)

segment.source: `UIAHandler.customAnnotations.CustomAnnotationTypesCommon`
segment.target: `UIAHandler.customAnnotations.CustomAnnotationTypesCommon`

segment.source: `UIAHandler.customProps.CustomPropertiesCommon`
segment.target: `UIAHandler.customProps.CustomPropertiesCommon`

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.excel.ExcelCustomProperties`
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.UIA.excel.ExcelCustomProperties`

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.excel.ExcelCustomAnnotationTypes`
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.UIA.excel.ExcelCustomAnnotationTypes`

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Deprecations

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinTerminalUIA` is deprecated and usage is discouraged. (#14047)
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinTerminalUIA` is deprecated and usage is discouraged. (#14047)

segment.source: `config.addConfigDirsToPythonPackagePath` has been moved.
segment.target: `config.addConfigDirsToPythonPackagePath` has been moved.

segment.source: Use `addonHandler.packaging.addDirsToPythonPackagePath` instead. (#14350)
segment.target: Use `addonHandler.packaging.addDirsToPythonPackagePath` instead. (#14350)

segment.source: `braille.BrailleHandler.TETHER_*` are deprecated.
segment.target: `braille.BrailleHandler.TETHER_*` are deprecated.

segment.source: Use `configFlags.TetherTo.*.value` instead. (#14233)
segment.target: Use `configFlags.TetherTo.*.value` instead. (#14233)

segment.source: `utils.security.postSessionLockStateChanged` is deprecated.
segment.target: `utils.security.postSessionLockStateChanged` is deprecated.

segment.source: Use `utils.security.post_sessionLockStateChanged` instead. (#14486)
segment.target: Use `utils.security.post_sessionLockStateChanged` instead. (#14486)

segment.source: `NVDAObject.hasDetails`, `NVDAObject.detailsSummary`, `NVDAObject.detailsRole` has been deprecated.
segment.target: `NVDAObject.hasDetails`, `NVDAObject.detailsSummary`, `NVDAObject.detailsRole` has been deprecated.

segment.source: Use `NVDAObject.annotations` instead. (#14507)
segment.target: Use `NVDAObject.annotations` instead. (#14507)

segment.source: `keyboardHandler.SUPPORTED_NVDA_MODIFIER_KEYS` is deprecated with no direct replacement.
segment.target: `keyboardHandler.SUPPORTED_NVDA_MODIFIER_KEYS` is deprecated with no direct replacement.

segment.source: Consider using the class `config.configFlags.NVDAKey` instead. (#14528)
segment.target: Consider using the class `config.configFlags.NVDAKey` instead. (#14528)

segment.source: `gui.MainFrame.evaluateUpdatePendingUpdateMenuItemCommand` has been deprecated.
segment.target: `gui.MainFrame.evaluateUpdatePendingUpdateMenuItemCommand` has been deprecated.

segment.source: Use `gui.MainFrame.SysTrayIcon.evaluateUpdatePendingUpdateMenuItemCommand` instead. (#14523)
segment.target: Use `gui.MainFrame.SysTrayIcon.evaluateUpdatePendingUpdateMenuItemCommand` instead. (#14523)

segment.source: This release includes several new key commands, including table say all commands.
segment.target: Táto verzia obsahuje viacero nových klávesových skratiek, napríklad na plynulé čítanie riadkov a stĺpcov v tabuľkách.

segment.source: A "Quick Start Guide" section has been added to the User Guide.
segment.target: Do používateľskej príručky sme pridali sekciu, ako začať.

segment.source: There are also several bug fixes.
segment.target: Tiež boli opravené viaceré chyby.

segment.source: eSpeak has been updated and LibLouis has been updated.
segment.target: Aktualizovali sme hlasový výstup eSpeak a brailovú prekladovú tabuľku LibLouis.

segment.source: There are new Chinese, Swedish, Luganda and Kinyarwanda braille tables.
segment.target: Pridané boli tiež nové prekladové tabuľky pre Čínštinu, Švédčinu, Gandčinu a Rvandčinu.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nové vlastnosti

segment.source: Added a "Quick Start Guide" section to the User Guide. (#13934)
segment.target: Do používateľskej príručky pridaná sekcia Ako začať. (#13934)

segment.source: Introduced a new command to check the keyboard shortcut of the current focus. (#13960)
segment.target: Pridaná nová klávesová skratka na vyslovenie klávesovej skratky zameraného objektu. (#13960)

segment.source: Desktop: `shift+numpad2`.
segment.target: Desktop: `shift+numerická2`.

segment.source: Laptop: `NVDA+ctrl+shift+.`.
segment.target: Laptop: `NVDA+ctrl+shift+.`.

segment.source: Introduced new commands to move the review cursor by page where supported by the application. (#14021)
segment.target: Pridané klávesové skratky na posun prezeracieho kurzora po stranách. Funguje len v prípade, že zameraný objekt podporuje stránkovanie. (#14021)

segment.source: Move to previous page:
segment.target: Predchádzajúca strana:

segment.source: Desktop: `NVDA+pageUp`.
segment.target: Desktop: `NVDA+pageUp`.

segment.source: Laptop: `NVDA+shift+pageUp`.
segment.target: Laptop: `NVDA+shift+pageUp`.

segment.source: Move to next page:
segment.target: Nasledujúca strana:

segment.source: Desktop: `NVDA+pageDown`.
segment.target: Desktop: `NVDA+pageDown`.

segment.source: Laptop: `NVDA+shift+pageDown`.
segment.target: Laptop: `NVDA+shift+pageDown`.

segment.source: Added the following table commands. (#14070)
segment.target: Pridané nové klávesové skratky na pohyb v tabuľkách. (#14070)

segment.source: Say all in column: `NVDA+control+alt+downArrow`
segment.target: Plynulé čítanie stĺpcov zhora dole, posúva kurzor: `NVDA+ctrl+alt+šípka dolu`

segment.source: Say all in row: `NVDA+control+alt+rightArrow`
segment.target: Plynulé čítanie buniek v riadku, zľava doprava, posúva systémový kurzor: `NVDA+ctrl+alt+šípka doprava`

segment.source: Read entire column: `NVDA+control+alt+upArrow`
segment.target: Prečítať celý stĺpec zhora dolu, neposúva kurzor: `NVDA+ctrl+alt+šípka hore`

segment.source: Read entire row: `NVDA+control+alt+leftArrow`
segment.target: Prečítať celý riadok zľava doprava, neposúva kurzor: `NVDA+ctrl+alt+ľavá šípka`

segment.source: Microsoft Excel via UI Automation: NVDA now announces when moving out of a table within a spreadsheet. (#14165)
segment.target: Pri použití aplikácie MS Excel cez rozhranie UI Automation NVDA dokáže oznamovať opustenie tabuľky v hárku. (#14165)

segment.source: Reporting table headers can now be configured separately for rows and columns. (#14075)
segment.target: Oznamovanie hlavičiek tabuľky je odteraz možné nastaviť zvlášť pre riadky aj stĺpce. (#14075)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Zmeny

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `735ecdb8`. (#14060, #14079, #14118, #14203)
segment.target: Hlasový výstup eSpeak NG aktualizovaný na verziu 1.52-dev commit `735ecdb8`. (#14060, #14079, #14118, #14203)

segment.source: Fixed reporting of Latin characters when using Mandarin. (#12952, #13572, #14197)
segment.target: Opravené oznamovanie znakov latinky, ak je jazyk nastavený na Mandarínčinu. (#12952, #13572, #14197)

segment.source: Updated LibLouis braille translator to [3.23.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.23.0). (#14112)
segment.target: Brailová prekladová tabuľka LibLouis aktualizovaná na verziu [3.23.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.23.0). (#14112)

segment.source: Added braille tables:
segment.target: Pridané nové tabuľky:

segment.source: Chinese common braille (simplified Chinese characters)
segment.target: Čínština všeobecný brail (znaková sada zjednodušená čínština)

segment.source: Kinyarwanda literary braille
segment.target: Rwandčina plnopis

segment.source: Luganda literary braille
segment.target: Gandčina plnopis

segment.source: Swedish uncontracted braille
segment.target: Švédčina plnopis

segment.source: Swedish partially contracted braille
segment.target: Švédčina čiastočný skradkopis

segment.source: Swedish contracted braille
segment.target: Švédčina skratkopis

segment.source: Chinese (China, Mandarin) Current Braille System (no tones) (#14138)
segment.target: Čínština (Čína, Mandarínčina) aktuálny brailový zápis (bez tónov) (#14138)

segment.source: NVDA now includes the architecture of the operating system as part of user statistics tracking. (#14019)
segment.target: NVDA teraz odosiela informáciu o architektúre operačného systému ako súčasť štatistík. (#14019)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Opravy

segment.source: When updating NVDA using the Windows Package Manager CLI (aka winget), a released version of NVDA is no longer always treated as newer than whatever alpha version is installed. (#12469)
segment.target: Ak sa používa na aktualizáciu NVDA Windows správca balíkov CLI (napríklad winget), uvoľnená verzia nie je viac vždy považovaná za novšiu ako akákoľvek iná alpha verzia, ktorá je už nainštalovaná. (#12469)

segment.source: NVDA will now correctly announce Group boxes in Java applications. (#13962)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz správne oznamuje skupiny prvkov v Java aplikáciách. (#13962)

segment.source: Caret properly follows spoken text during "say all" in applications such as Bookworm, WordPad, or the NVDA log viewer. (#13420, #9179)
segment.target: Kurzor odteraz správne sleduje text pri plynulom čítaní v aplikáciách ako napríklad Bookworm, WordPad, alebo tiež v zobrazovači logu NVDA. (#13420, #9179)

segment.source: In programs using UI Automation, partially checked checkboxes will be reported correctly. (#13975)
segment.target: V aplikáciách sprístupnených cez UI Automation sú správne oznamované čiastočne začiarknuté začiarkávacie políčka. (#13975)

segment.source: Improved performance and stability in Microsoft Visual Studio, Windows Terminal, and other UI Automation based applications. (#11077, #11209)
segment.target: Zlepšená odozva a stabilita v aplikáciách Microsoft Visual Studio, Windows Terminal, a iných aplikáciách využívajúcich UI Automation. (#11077, #11209)

segment.source: These fixes apply to Windows 11 Sun Valley 2 (version 22H2) and later.
segment.target: Tieto zmeny sa týkajú operačného systému Windows 11 od verzie Sun Valley 2 ( 22H2).

segment.source: Selective registration for UI Automation events and property changes now enabled by default.
segment.target: Sledovanie zmien a udalostí UI Automation je predvolene nastavené na preferovanie vybraných.

segment.source: Text reporting, Braille output, and password suppression now work as expected in the embedded Windows Terminal control in Visual Studio 2022. (#14194)
segment.target: Oznamovanie textu, Braillový výstup a potláčanie zobrazovania hesiel odteraz správne fungujú vo vnorenom okne príkazového riadku v aplikácii Visual Studio 2022. (#14194)

segment.source: NVDA is now DPI aware when using multiple monitors.
segment.target: NVDA od teraz berie do úvahy nastavenia DPI pri používaní viacerých monitorov.

segment.source: There are several fixes for using a DPI setting higher than 100% or multiple monitors.
segment.target: Zahrnutých je niekoľko opráv pri používaní nastavenia DPI viac než 100% alebo pripojených viacerých monitorov súčasne.

segment.source: Issues may still exist with versions of Windows older than Windows 10 1809.
segment.target: Problémy sa stále môžu vyskytnúť so staršími verziami systému než Windows 10 1809.

segment.source: For these fixes to work, applications which NVDA interacts with also need to be DPI aware.
segment.target: Aby boli tieto opravy účinné, aplikácie, s ktorými NVDA spolupracuje, by tiež mali brať nastavenie DPI do úvahy.

segment.source: Note there are still known issues with Chrome and Edge. (#13254)
segment.target: Pozor, stále sú známe problémy s prehliadačmi Chrome a Edge. (#13254)

segment.source: Visual highlighting frames should now be correctly placed in most applications. (#13370, #3875, #12070)
segment.target: Rámčeky znázorňujúce vizuálne zvýraznenie položiek by mali byť správne umiestnené vo väčšine aplikácií. (#13370, #3875, #12070)

segment.source: Touch screen interaction should now be accurate for most applications. (#7083)
segment.target: Interakcie cez dotykovú obrazovku by mali byť omnoho presnejšie pre väčšinu aplikácií. (#7083)

segment.source: Mouse tracking should now work for most applications. (#6722)
segment.target: Sledovanie myši by malo správne fungovať vo väčšine aplikácií. (#6722)

segment.source: Orientation state (landscape/portrait) changes are now correctly ignored when there is no change (e.g. monitor changes). (#14035)
segment.target: Stav zmeny orientácie obrazovky (na šírku/na výšku) je správne ignorovaný v situáciách, keď nedošlo k zmene orientácie (napr. pri zmene parametrov obrazovky). (#14035)

segment.source: NVDA will announce dragging items on screen in places such as rearranging Windows 10 Start menu tiles and virtual desktops in Windows 11. (#12271, #14081)
segment.target: NVDA dokáže oznamovať preusporiadanie položiek na obrazovke: presúvanie dlaždíc v ponuke štart vo Windows 10 a virtuálne plochy vo Windows 11. (#12271, #14081)

segment.source: In advanced settings, "Play a sound for logged errors" option is now correctly restored to its default value when pressing the "Restore defaults" button. (#14149)
segment.target: Pokročilé nastavenie "Zaznamenané chyby signalizovať zvukom" je správne obnovené na predvolenú hodnotu po stlačení tlačidla "Obnoviť pôvodné nastavenia". (#14149)

segment.source: NVDA can now select text using the `NVDA+f10` keyboard shortcut on Java applications. (#14163)
segment.target: Klávesová skratka `NVDA+f10` na výber textu funguje aj v aplikáciách Java. (#14163)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer get stuck in a menu when arrowing up and down threaded conversations in Microsoft Teams. (#14355)
segment.target: NVDA sa viac nezasekne v ponuke pri navigácii šípkami vo vláknach konverzácií programu Microsoft Teams. (#14355)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.
segment.target: Please refer to [the developer guide](https://www.nvaccess.org/files/nvda/documentation/developerGuide.html#API) for information on NVDA's API deprecation and removal process.

segment.source: The [NVDA API Announcement mailing list](https://groups.google.com/a/nvaccess.org/g/nvda-api/about) was created. (#13999)
segment.target: The [NVDA API Announcement mailing list](https://groups.google.com/a/nvaccess.org/g/nvda-api/about) was created. (#13999)

segment.source: NVDA no longer processes `textChange` events for most UI Automation applications due to their extreme negative performance impact. (#11002, #14067)
segment.target: NVDA no longer processes `textChange` events for most UI Automation applications due to their extreme negative performance impact. (#11002, #14067)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Deprecations

segment.source: `core.post_windowMessageReceipt` is deprecated, use `winAPI.messageWindow.pre_handleWindowMessage` instead.
segment.target: `core.post_windowMessageReceipt` is deprecated, use `winAPI.messageWindow.pre_handleWindowMessage` instead.

segment.source: `winKernel.SYSTEM_POWER_STATUS` is deprecated and usage is discouraged, this has been moved to `winAPI._powerTracking.SystemPowerStatus`.
segment.target: `winKernel.SYSTEM_POWER_STATUS` is deprecated and usage is discouraged, this has been moved to `winAPI._powerTracking.SystemPowerStatus`.

segment.source: `winUser.SM_*` constants are deprecated, use `winAPI.winUser.constants.SystemMetrics` instead.
segment.target: `winUser.SM_*` constants are deprecated, use `winAPI.winUser.constants.SystemMetrics` instead.

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix issues with 2022.3.2, 2022.3.1 and 2022.3.
segment.target: Táto drobná aktualizácia prináša opravy chýb, ktoré boli spôsobené vo verziách 2022.3.2, 2022.3.1 a 2022.3.

segment.source: This also addresses a security issue.
segment.target: Oprava zahŕňa aj jednu bezpečnostnú záplatu.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Bezpečnostné opravy

segment.source: Prevents possible system access (e.g. NVDA Python console) for unauthenticated users.
segment.target: Odteraz viac nie je možné používať Python konzolu, ak používateľ nie je prihlásený.

segment.source: ([GHSA-fpwc-2gxx-j9v7](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-fpwc-2gxx-j9v7))
segment.target: ([GHSA-fpwc-2gxx-j9v7](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-fpwc-2gxx-j9v7))

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Opravy

segment.source: Fixed bug where if NVDA freezes when locking, NVDA will allow access to the users desktop while on the Windows lock screen. (#14416)
segment.target: Opravená chyba, ktorá spôsobovala, že ak NVDA zamrzlo pri zamykaní systému, bolo možné získať prístup k pracovnej ploche používateľa aj ak bol systém už zamknutý. (#14416)

segment.source: Fixed bug where if NVDA freezes when locking, NVDA will not behave correctly, as if the device was still locked. (#14416)
segment.target: Opravená chyba, ktorá spôsobovala, že ak NVDA zamrzlo počas zamykania systému, správalo sa neštandardne, ako keby bol systém stále zamknutý a to aj po opätovnom odomknutí. (#14416)

segment.source: Fixed accessibility issues with the Windows "forgot my PIN" process and Windows update/install experience. (#14368)
segment.target: Opravené problémy s prístupnosťou v časti "zabudnutý pin" a tiež počas inštalácie a aktualizácie. (#14368)

segment.source: Fixed bug when trying to install NVDA in some Windows environments, e.g. Windows Server. (#14379)
segment.target: Opravené problémy s inštaláciou NVDA v niektorých prostrediach, napríklad Windows Server. (#14379)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Deprecations

segment.source: `utils.security.isObjectAboveLockScreen(obj)` is deprecated, instead use `obj.isBelowLockScreen`. (#14416)
segment.target: `utils.security.isObjectAboveLockScreen(obj)` is deprecated, instead use `obj.isBelowLockScreen`. (#14416)

segment.source: The following functions in `winAPI.sessionTracking` are deprecated for removal in 2023.1. (#14416)
segment.target: The following functions in `winAPI.sessionTracking` are deprecated for removal in 2023.1. (#14416)

segment.source: `isWindowsLocked`
segment.target: `isWindowsLocked`

segment.source: `handleSessionChange`
segment.target: `handleSessionChange`

segment.source: `unregister`
segment.target: `unregister`

segment.source: `register`
segment.target: `register`

segment.source: `isLockStateSuccessfullyTracked`
segment.target: `isLockStateSuccessfullyTracked`

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix regressions with 2022.3.1 and address a security issue.
segment.target: Toto je drobná aktualizácia, ktorá opravuje problémy vzniknuté vo verzii 2022.3.1 a rieši jeden bezpečnostný problém.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Bezpečnostné opravy

segment.source: Prevents possible system level access for unauthenticated users.
segment.target: Zabraňuje možnému prístupu s oprávneniami na úrovni systému pre neautorizovaných používateľov.

segment.source: ([GHSA-3jj9-295f-h69w](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-3jj9-295f-h69w))
segment.target: ([GHSA-3jj9-295f-h69w](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-3jj9-295f-h69w))

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Opravy

segment.source: Fixes a regression from 2022.3.1 where certain functionality was disabled on secure screens. (#14286)
segment.target: Oprava nedostatku verzii 2022.3.1, čo spôsobovalo nedostupnosť niektorých funkcií na zabezpečených obrazovkách. (#14286)

segment.source: Fixes a regression from 2022.3.1 where certain functionality was disabled after sign-in, if NVDA started on the lock screen. (#14301)
segment.target: Oprava nedostatku verzii 2022.3.1, čo spôsobovalo nedostupnosť niektorých funkcií po prihlásení do systému, ak sa NVDA spustil pri uzamknutej obrazovke. (#14301)

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix several security issues.
segment.target: Toto je drobná aktualizácia obsahujúca niekoľko bezpečnostných opráv.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues to <info@nvaccess.org>.
segment.target: Prosíme vás, aby ste informácie o bezpečnostných ryzikách odoslali na adresu <info@nvaccess.org> (anglicky), prípadne na <ondrej@ondrosik.sk> v Slovenčine.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Bezpečnostné opravy

segment.source: Fixed exploit where it was possible to elevate from user to system privileges.
segment.target: Odstránená zraniteľnosť umožňujúca prechod z používateľských oprávnení na oprávnenia na úrovni systému.

segment.source: ([GHSA-q7c2-pgqm-vvw5](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-q7c2-pgqm-vvw5))
segment.target: ([GHSA-q7c2-pgqm-vvw5](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-q7c2-pgqm-vvw5))

segment.source: Fixed a security issue allowing access to the python console on the lock screen via a race condition for NVDA startup.
segment.target: Odstránený bezpečnostný problém umožňujúci prístup ku konzole python hneď po spustení NVDA.

segment.source: ([GHSA-72mj-mqhj-qh4w](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-72mj-mqhj-qh4w))
segment.target: ([GHSA-72mj-mqhj-qh4w](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-72mj-mqhj-qh4w))

segment.source: Fixed issue where speech viewer text is cached when locking Windows.
segment.target: Opravený problém s uchovávaním obsahu zobrazovača reči pri uzamknutí systému.

segment.source: ([GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4))
segment.target: ([GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4))

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Opravy

segment.source: Prevent an unauthenticated user from updating settings for speech and Braille viewer on the lock screen. ([GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4))
segment.target: Zabránené neautorizovaným používateľom meniť nastavenia zobrazovača reči a braillu na zamknutej obrazovke. ([GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-grvr-j2h8-3qm4))

segment.source: A significant amount of this release was contributed by the NVDA development community.
segment.target: Značná časť tejto verzie vznikla vďaka vývojárskej komunite NVDA.

segment.source: This includes delayed character descriptions and improved Windows Console support.
segment.target: Zahŕňa automatické fonetické hláskovanie a tiež podporu pre Windows konzoly.

segment.source: This release also includes several bug fixes.
segment.target: Táto verzia tiež obsahuje viacero opráv.

segment.source: Notably, up-to-date versions of Adobe Acrobat/Reader will no longer crash when reading a PDF document.
segment.target: Konkrétne, aktuálne verzie aplikácie Adobe Acrobat/Reader viac nepadajú pri čítaní PDF dokumentu.

segment.source: eSpeak has been updated, which introduces 3 new languages: Belarusian, Luxembourgish and Totontepec Mixe.
segment.target: Hlasový výstup eSpeak bol aktualizovaný na novú verziu a prináša 3 nové jazyky: Bielorušťinu, Luxemburčinu a Totontepec Mixe.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nové vlastnosti

segment.source: In the Windows Console Host used by Command Prompt, PowerShell, and the Windows Subsystem for Linux on Windows 11 version 22H2 (Sun Valley 2) and later:
segment.target: Vo windows konzolách, ktoré sa používajú v príkazovom riadku, PowerShell, a Windows Subsystéme pre Linux od verzie Windows 11 22H2 (Sun Valley 2):

segment.source: Vastly improved performance and stability. (#10964)
segment.target: Vylepšená odozva a stabilita. (#10964)

segment.source: When pressing `control+f` to find text, the review cursor position is updated to follow the found term. (#11172)
segment.target: Po stlačení `ctrl+f` na vyhľadanie textu, sa prezerací kurzor presúva na vyhľadaný výraz. (#11172)

segment.source: Reporting of typed text that does not appear on-screen (such as passwords) is disabled by default.
segment.target: Predvolene je vypnuté oznamovanie napísaného textu, ktorý sa nezobrazuje na obrazovke (zvyčajne ide o heslá).

segment.source: It can be re-enabled in NVDA's advanced settings panel. (#11554)
segment.target: Toto je možné zapnúť v pokročilých nastaveniach NVDA. (#11554)

segment.source: Text that has scrolled offscreen can be reviewed without scrolling the console window. (#12669)
segment.target: Text, ktorý nie je viditeľný na obrazovke, je stále možné prezerať bez nutnosti posúvať okno konzoly. (#12669)

segment.source: More detailed text formatting information is available. ([microsoft/terminal PR 10336](https://github.com/microsoft/terminal/pull/10336))
segment.target: Odteraz je možné získať podrobnejšie informácie o formátovaní. ([microsoft/terminal PR 10336](https://github.com/microsoft/terminal/pull/10336))

segment.source: A new Speech option has been added to read character descriptions after a delay. (#13509)
segment.target: Pridaná možnosť automaticky foneticky hláskovať znaky pri čítaní po znakoch. (#13509)

segment.source: A new Braille option has been added to determine if scrolling the display forward/back should interrupt speech. (#2124)
segment.target: Pridaná nová možnosť, ktorá určuje, či má posúvanie braillového riadka prerušiť reč. (#2124)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Zmeny

segment.source: eSpeak NG has been updated to 1.52-dev commit `9de65fcb`. (#13295)
segment.target: Hlasový výstup eSpeak NG aktualizovaný na verziu 1.52-dev commit `9de65fcb`. (#13295)

segment.source: Added languages:
segment.target: Pridané jazyky:

segment.source: Belarusian
segment.target: Bieloruština

segment.source: Luxembourgish
segment.target: Luxemburčina

segment.source: Totontepec Mixe
segment.target: Totontepec Mixe

segment.source: When using UI Automation to access Microsoft Excel spreadsheet controls, NVDA is now able to report when a cell is merged. (#12843)
segment.target: Ak sa načítanie hárkov v programe MS Excel používa UI Automation, NVDA dokáže identifikovaťa oznámiť zlúčené bunky. (#12843)

segment.source: Instead of reporting "has details" the purpose of details is included where possible, for example "has comment". (#13649)
segment.target: NVDA viac neoznamuje "obsahuje detaily", ale konkrétne povie druh detailu, napríklad "obsahuje komentáre". (#13649)

segment.source: The installation size of NVDA is now shown in Windows Programs and Feature section. (#13909)
segment.target: V aplikáciách a súčastiach sa teraz pri programe NVDA objavuje aj veľkosť nainštalovaných dát. (#13909)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: opravy

segment.source: Adobe Acrobat / Reader 64 bit will no longer crash when reading a PDF document. (#12920)
segment.target: Adobe Acrobat / Reader 64 bit viac nespadne pri čítaní PDF dokumentu. (#12920)

segment.source: Note that the most up to date version of Adobe Acrobat / Reader is also required to avoid the crash.
segment.target: Aby ste zabránili pádom, Je potrebné používať aktuálnu verziu Adobe Acrobat / Reader.

segment.source: Font size measurements are now translatable in NVDA. (#13573)
segment.target: Rôzne jednotky veľkosti písma sú odteraz dostupné na preklad pre prekladateľov a objavujú sa aj správne v Slovenskom jazyku. (#13573)

segment.source: Ignore Java Access Bridge events where no window handle can be found for Java applications.
segment.target: NVDA ignoruje udalosti z Java Access Bridge, ak nemá fokus žiadne okno Java aplikácie.

segment.source: This will improve performance for some Java applications including IntelliJ IDEA. (#13039)
segment.target: Toto zlepší odozvu niektorých Java aplikácií, napríklad IntelliJ IDEA. (#13039)

segment.source: Announcement of selected cells for LibreOffice Calc is more efficient and no longer results in a Calc freeze when many cells are selected. (#13232)
segment.target: Vylepšené sledovanie vybratých buniek v LibreOffice Calc, pričom viac nedochádza k zamrznutiu, ak je vybratých viacero buniek. (#13232)

segment.source: When running under a different user, Microsoft Edge is no longer inaccessible. (#13032)
segment.target: Odteraz je možné používať MS Edge aj v situáciách, ak ste prihlásený pod kontom iného používateľa. (#13032)

segment.source: When rate boost is off, eSpeak's rate does not drop anymore between rates 99% and 100%. (#13876)
segment.target: Ak je vypnuté použitie dvojnásobnej rýchlosti, hlasový výstup eSpeak nepoužíva skracovanie hlások, ktoré sa zvyčajne používa pri použití dvojnásobnej rýchlosti ani v prípade, že je tempo nastavené na 100%. (#13876)

segment.source: Fix bug which allowed 2 Input Gestures dialogs to open. (#13854)
segment.target: Odteraz nie je možné otvoriť dve okná s nastavením klávesových skratiek súčasne. (#13854)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: Updated Comtypes to version 1.1.11. (#12953)
segment.target: Updated Comtypes to version 1.1.11. (#12953)

segment.source: In builds of Windows Console (`conhost.exe`) with an NVDA API level of 2 (`FORMATTED`) or greater, such as those included with Windows 11 version 22H2 (Sun Valley 2), UI Automation is now used by default. (#10964)
segment.target: In builds of Windows Console (`conhost.exe`) with an NVDA API level of 2 (`FORMATTED`) or greater, such as those included with Windows 11 version 22H2 (Sun Valley 2), UI Automation is now used by default. (#10964)

segment.source: This can be overridden by changing the "Windows Console support" setting in NVDA's advanced settings panel.
segment.target: This can be overridden by changing the "Windows Console support" setting in NVDA's advanced settings panel.

segment.source: To find your Windows Console's NVDA API level, set "Windows Console support" to "UIA when available", then check the NVDA+F1 log opened from a running Windows Console instance.
segment.target: To find your Windows Console's NVDA API level, set "Windows Console support" to "UIA when available", then check the NVDA+F1 log opened from a running Windows Console instance.

segment.source: The Chromium virtual buffer is now loaded even when the document object has the MSAA `STATE_SYSTEM_BUSY` exposed via IA2. (#13306)
segment.target: The Chromium virtual buffer is now loaded even when the document object has the MSAA `STATE_SYSTEM_BUSY` exposed via IA2. (#13306)

segment.source: A config spec type `featureFlag` has been created for use with experimental features in NVDA. See `devDocs/featureFlag.md` for more information. (#13859)
segment.target: A config spec type `featureFlag` has been created for use with experimental features in NVDA. See `devDocs/featureFlag.md` for more information. (#13859)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Deprecations

segment.source: There are no deprecations proposed in 2022.3.
segment.target: There are no deprecations proposed in 2022.3.

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Toto je drobná aktualizácia, ktorej cieľom je odstrániť bezpečnostný problém.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Opravy

segment.source: Fixed an exploit where it was possible to open the NVDA python console via the log viewer on the lock screen.
segment.target: Odstránená zraniteľnosť, ktorá umožňovala z okna zobrazovač logu spustiť python konzolu NVDA na zamknutej obrazovke.

segment.source: ([GHSA-585m-rpvv-93qg](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-585m-rpvv-93qg))
segment.target: ([GHSA-585m-rpvv-93qg](https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/security/advisories/GHSA-585m-rpvv-93qg))

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix an accidental API breakage introduced in 2022.2.1.
segment.target: Táto opravná verzia opravuje chybu, ktorá sa nedopatrením dostala do verzie 2022.2.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: opravy

segment.source: Fixed a bug where NVDA did not announce "Secure Desktop" when entering a secure desktop.
segment.target: Opravená chyba, ktorá spôsobovala, že NVDA neoznamoval hlásenie "zabezpečená pracovná plocha".

segment.source: This caused NVDA remote to not recognize secure desktops. (#14094)
segment.target: Toto spôsobovalo, že doplnok NVDA Remote nemohol rozpoznať zabezpečené okná. (#14094)

segment.source: This is a patch release to fix a bug introduced in 2022.2.1 with input gestures.
segment.target: Táto verzia opravuje chybu, ktorá nastala vo verzii 2022.2.1 v súvislosti s dialógom klávesové skratky.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: opravy

segment.source: Fixed a bug where input gestures didn't always work. (#14065)
segment.target: Opravená chyba, ktorá spôsobovala, že klávesové skratky nefungovali vždy správne. (#14065)

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Táto drobná verzia opravuje niektoré chyby súvisiace s bezpečnosťou.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues to <info@nvaccess.org>.
segment.target: Prosíme vás, aby ste informácie o bezpečnostných ryzikách odoslali na adresu <info@nvaccess.org> (anglicky), prípadne na <ondrej@ondrosik.sk> v Slovenčine.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Bezpečnostné záplaty

segment.source: Fixed exploit where it was possible to run a python console from the lockscreen. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)
segment.target: Odstránená možnosť spustiť Python konzolu zo zamknutej obrazovky. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)

segment.source: Fixed exploit where it was possible to escape the lockscreen using object navigation. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)
segment.target: Odstránená možnosť opustiť zamknutú obrazovku pomocou objektovej navigácie. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: Deprecations
segment.target: Deprecations

segment.source: These deprecations are currently not scheduled for removal.
segment.target: These deprecations are currently not scheduled for removal.

segment.source: The deprecated aliases will remain until further notice.
segment.target: The deprecated aliases will remain until further notice.

segment.source: Please test the new API and provide feedback.
segment.target: Please test the new API and provide feedback.

segment.source: For add-on authors, please open a GitHub issue if these changes stop the API from meeting your needs.
segment.target: For add-on authors, please open a GitHub issue if these changes stop the API from meeting your needs.

segment.source: `appModules.lockapp.LockAppObject` should be replaced with `NVDAObjects.lockscreen.LockScreenObject`. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)
segment.target: `appModules.lockapp.LockAppObject` should be replaced with `NVDAObjects.lockscreen.LockScreenObject`. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)

segment.source: `appModules.lockapp.AppModule.SAFE_SCRIPTS` should be replaced with `utils.security.getSafeScripts()`. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)
segment.target: `appModules.lockapp.AppModule.SAFE_SCRIPTS` should be replaced with `utils.security.getSafeScripts()`. (GHSA-rmq3-vvhq-gp32)

segment.source: This release includes many bug fixes.
segment.target: Táto verzia obsahuje viacero opráv.

segment.source: Notably, there are significant improvements for Java based applications, braille displays and Windows features.
segment.target: Konkrétne ide o opravy v prístupnosti Java aplikácií, brailové riadky a aplikácie Windows.

segment.source: New table navigation commands have been introduced.
segment.target: Pridali sme nové klávesové skratky pre navigáciu v tabuľkách.

segment.source: Unicode CLDR has been updated.
segment.target: Aktualizovali sme databázu symbolov CLDR.

segment.source: LibLouis has been updated, which includes a new German braille table.
segment.target: Aktualizovali sme brailovú prekladovú tabuľku LibLouis. Aktuálne obsahuje novú Nemeckú tabuľku.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nové vlastnosti

segment.source: Support for interacting with Microsoft Loop Components in Microsoft Office products. (#13617)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre interakciu s komponentom Microsoft Loop v produktoch MS Office. (#13617)

segment.source: New table navigation commands have been added. (#957)
segment.target: Pridané nové klávesové skratky pre navigáciu v tabuľkách. (#957)

segment.source: `control+alt+home/end` to jump to first/last column.
segment.target: `ctrl+alt+home/end` na prechod do prvého a posledného stĺpca.

segment.source: `control+alt+pageUp/pageDown` to jump to first/last row.
segment.target: `ctrl+alt+pageUp/pageDown` na prechod do prvého a posledného riadka.

segment.source: An unassigned script to cycle through language and dialect switching modes has been added. (#10253)
segment.target: Pridaná možnosť pomocou skratiek zapínať prepínanie jazyka a dialektu. Skratka nie je predvolene definovaná. (#10253)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: zmeny

segment.source: NSIS has been updated to version 3.08. (#9134)
segment.target: NSIS aktualizovaný na verziu 3.08. (#9134)

segment.source: CLDR has been updated to version 41.0. (#13582)
segment.target: Databáza symbolov CLDR aktualizovaná na verziu 41.0. (#13582)

segment.source: Updated LibLouis braille translator to [3.22.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.22.0). (#13775)
segment.target: Brailová prekladová tabuľka LibLouis aktualizovaná na verziu [3.22.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.22.0). (#13775)

segment.source: New braille table: German grade 2 (detailed)
segment.target: Nová brailová tabuľka: Nemčina grade 2 (detailný)

segment.source: Added new role for "busy indicator" controls. (#10644)
segment.target: Pridaná nová rola pre indikátory priebehu typu "zaneprázdnené". (#10644)

segment.source: NVDA now announces when an NVDA action cannot be performed. (#13500)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz upozorní, ak nie je možné vykonať požadovanú akciu. (#13500)

segment.source: This includes when:
segment.target: Toto zahŕňa:

segment.source: Using the NVDA Windows Store version.
segment.target: Použitie funkcie, ktorá nie je podporovaná v NVDA z Windows obchodu.

segment.source: In a secure context.
segment.target: Použitie funkcie, ktorá nie je dostupná v bezpečnom režime.

segment.source: Waiting for a response to a modal dialog.
segment.target: Použitie funkcie, ktorá vyžaduje zatvorenie dialógu NVDA.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: opravy

segment.source: Fixes for Java based applications:
segment.target: Opravy pre java aplikácie:

segment.source: NVDA will now announce read-only state. (#13692)
segment.target: NVDA oznamuje odteraz stav iba na čítanie. (#13692)

segment.source: NVDA will now announce disabled/enabled state correctly. (#10993)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz správne oznamuje stav zapnuté, vypnuté. (#10993)

segment.source: NVDA will now announce function key shortcuts. (#13643)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz oznamuje klávesové skratky. (#13643)

segment.source: NVDA can now beep or speak on progress bars. (#13594)
segment.target: NVDA dokáže pípať alebo hlasom oznamovať indikátor priebehu. (#13594)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer incorrectly remove text from widgets when presenting to the user. (#13102)
segment.target: NVDA viac neodstraňuje text z vidgetov. (#13102)

segment.source: NVDA will now announce the state of toggle buttons. (#9728)
segment.target: NVDA správne oznamuje stav prepínacích tlačidiel. (#9728)

segment.source: NVDA will now identify the window in a Java application with multiple windows. (#9184)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz správne dokáže identifikovať okná, ak má Java aplikácia viac okien. (#9184)

segment.source: NVDA will now announce position information for tab controls. (#13744)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz správne oznamuje pozíciu záložiek. (#13744)

segment.source: Braille fixes:
segment.target: Opravy pre brailovo písmo:

segment.source: Fix braille output when navigating certain text in Mozilla rich edit controls, such as drafting a message in Thunderbird. (#12542)
segment.target: Opravené problémy pri navigácii v niektorých textových poliach v prvku Mozilla rich edit, napríklad písanie správy v Mozilla Thunderbird. (#12542)

segment.source: When braille is tethered automatically and the mouse is moved with mouse tracking enabled,
segment.target: Ak je brailový kurzor zviazaný automaticky a súčasne je presunutý kurzor myšy pri aktívnom sledovaní myšy,

segment.source: text review commands now update the braille display with the spoken content. (#11519)
segment.target: skratky na prezeranie textu aktualizujú obsah na brailovom riadku. (#11519)

segment.source: It is now possible to pan the braille display through content after use of text review commands. (#8682)
segment.target: Odteraz je možné použiť príkazy na prezeranie obsahu na brailovom riadku po tom, čo boli použité skratky na prezeranie textu. (#8682)

segment.source: The NVDA installer can now run from directories with special characters. (#13270)
segment.target: Inštalátor NVDA je odteraz možné spustiť aj z adresárov, v ktorých názvoch sú špeciálne znaky. (#13270)

segment.source: In Firefox, NVDA no longer fails to report items in web pages when aria-rowindex, aria-colindex, aria-rowcount or aria-colcount attributes are invalid. (#13405)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz oznamuje položky na webových stránkach otvorených v Mozilla Firefox aj v prípade, že sú atribúty aria-rowindex, aria-colindex, aria-rowcount alebo aria-colcount nesprávne. (#13405)

segment.source: The cursor does not switch row or column anymore when using table navigation to navigate through merged cells. (#7278)
segment.target: Kurzor viac nepreskakuje medzi riadkami a stĺpcami pri navigácii v tabuľke, ak sú stĺpce zlúčené. (#7278)

segment.source: When reading non-interactive PDFs in Adobe Reader, the type and state of form fields (such as checkboxes and radio buttons) are now reported. (#13285)
segment.target: Pri čítaní neinteraktívnych pdf dokumentov v aplikácii Adobe Reader, NVDA oznamuje typ a stav formulárových prvkov (napríklad prepínačov a začiarkávacích polí). (#13285)

segment.source: "Reset configuration to factory defaults" is now accessible in the NVDA menu during secure mode. (#13547)
segment.target: V bezpečnom režime je možné z menu resetovať nastavenia NVDA na predvolené hodnoty. (#13547)

segment.source: Any locked mouse keys will be unlocked when NVDA exits, previously the mouse button would remain locked. (#13410)
segment.target: Zamknuté tlačidlá myšy sú automaticky odomknuté po ukončení NVDA. Doteraz ostávali zamknuté. (#13410)

segment.source: Visual Studio now reports line numbers. (#13604)
segment.target: Odteraz je podporované oznamovanie čísel riadkov vo Visual Studio. (#13604)

segment.source: Note that for line number reporting to work, showing line numbers must be enabled in Visual Studio and NVDA.
segment.target: Aby toto správne fungovalo, zapnite oznamovanie čísel riadkov v zobrazení Visual studio a tiež v nastaveniach čítania textu v NVDA.

segment.source: Visual Studio now correctly reports line indentation. (#13574)
segment.target: Odteraz je správne oznamované odsadenie riadka vo Visual Studio. (#13574)

segment.source: NVDA will once again announce Start menu search result details in recent Windows 10 and 11 releases. (#13544)
segment.target: NVDA opäť správne oznamuje detaily o výsledkoch hľadania v ponuke štart v aktuálnych verziách systémov Windows 10 a 11. (#13544)

segment.source: In Windows 10 and 11 Calculator version 10.1908 and later,
segment.target: Vo vstavanej kalkulačke V systéme Windows 10 a 11, od verzie 10.1908,

segment.source: NVDA will announce results when more commands are pressed, such as commands from scientific mode. (#13383)
segment.target: NVDA oznamuje výsledky aj v prípade, že je použitých viacero príkazov, napríklad príkazy vo vedeckom režime. (#13383)

segment.source: In Windows 11, it is again possible to navigate and interact with user interface elements,
segment.target: V systéme Windows 11 je opäť možné pracovať s panelom úloh a zobrazením úloh

segment.source: such as Taskbar and Task View using mouse and touch interaction. (#13506)
segment.target: pomocou myšy a dotyku. (#13506)

segment.source: NVDA will announce status bar content in Windows 11 Notepad. (#13688)
segment.target: NVDA dokáže oznamovať stavový riadok poznámkového bloku vo Windows 11. (#13688)

segment.source: Navigator object highlighting now shows up immediately upon activation of the feature. (#13641)
segment.target: Vizuálna prezentácia navigačného objektu sa objaví na obrazovke okamžite po aktivovaní funkcie. (#13641)

segment.source: Fix reading single column list view items. (#13659, #13735)
segment.target: Opravené čítanie zoznamov s jednobunkovými položkami. (#13659, #13735)

segment.source: Fix eSpeak automatic language switching for English and French falling back to British English and French (France). (#13727)
segment.target: Opravená chyba, ktorá spôsobovala nesprávne prepínanie jazykov a dialektov v eSpeaku pre angličtinu a Francúzštinu. (#13727)

segment.source: Fix OneCore automatic language switching when trying to switch to a formerly installed language. (#13732)
segment.target: Opravené prepínanie jazykov a dialektov pri používaní hlasov Onecore. (#13732)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: Compiling NVDA dependencies with Visual Studio 2022 (17.0) is now supported.
segment.target: Compiling NVDA dependencies with Visual Studio 2022 (17.0) is now supported.

segment.source: For development and release builds, Visual Studio 2019 is still used. (#13033)
segment.target: For development and release builds, Visual Studio 2019 is still used. (#13033)

segment.source: When retrieving the count of selected children via accSelection,
segment.target: When retrieving the count of selected children via accSelection,

segment.source: the case where a negative child ID or an IDispatch is returned by `IAccessible::get_accSelection` is now handled properly. (#13277)
segment.target: the case where a negative child ID or an IDispatch is returned by `IAccessible::get_accSelection` is now handled properly. (#13277)

segment.source: New convenience functions `registerExecutableWithAppModule` and `unregisterExecutable` were added to the `appModuleHandler` module.
segment.target: New convenience functions `registerExecutableWithAppModule` and `unregisterExecutable` were added to the `appModuleHandler` module.

segment.source: They can be used to use a single App Module with multiple executables. (#13366)
segment.target: They can be used to use a single App Module with multiple executables. (#13366)

segment.target: Deprecations

segment.target: These are proposed API breaking changes.

segment.target: The deprecated part of the API will continue to be available until the specified release.

segment.target: If no release is specified, the plan for removal has not been determined.

segment.target: Note, the roadmap for removals is 'best effort' and may be subject to change.

segment.source: Please test the new API and provide feedback.
segment.target: Please test the new API and provide feedback.

segment.source: For add-on authors, please open a GitHub issue if these changes stop the API from meeting your needs.
segment.target: For add-on authors, please open a GitHub issue if these changes stop the API from meeting your needs.

segment.source: `appModuleHandler.NVDAProcessID` is deprecated, use `globalVars.appPid` instead. (#13646)
segment.target: `appModuleHandler.NVDAProcessID` is deprecated, use `globalVars.appPid` instead. (#13646)

segment.source: `gui.quit` is deprecated, use `wx.CallAfter(mainFrame.onExitCommand, None)` instead. (#13498)
segment.target: `gui.quit` is deprecated, use `wx.CallAfter(mainFrame.onExitCommand, None)` instead. (#13498)

segment.target: Some alias appModules are marked as deprecated.

segment.source: Code which imports from one of them, should instead import from the replacement module. (#13366)
segment.target: Code which imports from one of them, should instead import from the replacement module. (#13366)

segment.source: This release includes major improvements to UIA support with MS Office.
segment.target: Táto verzia zahŕňa vylepšenú podporu pre sprístupnenie prvkov v dokumentoch MS Word cez rozhranie UI Automation.

segment.source: For Microsoft Office 16.0.15000 and higher on Windows 11, NVDA will use UI Automation to access Microsoft Word documents by default.
segment.target: NVDA predvolene používa rozhranie UI Automation pre MS Office od verzie 16.0.15000 v systéme Windows 11.

segment.source: This provides a significant performance improvement over the old Object model access.
segment.target: Toto prináša výrazné zrýchlenie, oproti doposiaľ používanému spôsobu cez objektové modely.

segment.source: There are improvements to braille display drivers including Seika Notetaker, Papenmeier and HID Braille.
segment.target: Došlo k zlepšeniu ovládačov pre brailové riadky Seika, Papenmeier a HID.

segment.source: There are also various Windows 11 bug fixes, for apps such as Calculator, Console, Terminal, Mail and Emoji Panel.
segment.target: Takisto došlo k vylepšeniam prístupnosti v oknách a aplikáciách systému Windows 11, ako napríklad kalkulačka, konzola, terminál, pošta a panel emotikonov.

segment.source: eSpeak-NG and LibLouis have been updated, adding new Japanese, German and Catalan tables.
segment.target: Bol aktualizovaný hlasový výstup eSpeak NG a tiež prekladová tabuľka Liblouis, ktorá zahŕňa nové tabuľky pre Japončinu, nemčinu a Katalánčinu.

segment.source: Note:
segment.target: Upozornenie:

segment.source: This release breaks compatibility with existing add-ons.
segment.target: Táto verzia nepodporuje staršie doplnky.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nové vlastnosti

segment.source: Support for reporting notes in MS Excel with UI Automation enabled on Windows 11. (#12861)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre oznamovanie poznámok v dokumentoch MS Excel cez rozhranie UI Automation v systéme Windows 11. (#12861)

segment.source: In recent builds of Microsoft Word via UI Automation on Windows 11, the existence of bookmarks, draft comments and resolved comments are now reported in both speech and braille. (#12861)
segment.target: V systéme Windows 11 je v dokumentoch v aktuálnych verziách MS Word prostredníctvom UI Automation oznamovaná prítomnosť záložiek, rozpísaných a vyriešených komentárov. Oznamovanie je možné v braily i hlasovým výstupom. (#12861)

segment.source: The new `--lang` command line parameter allows overriding the configured NVDA language. (#10044)
segment.target: Z príkazového riadka je možné NVDA ako parameter odoslať príkaz `--lang`, ktorým vynútime nastavenie jazyka NVDA. (#10044)

segment.source: NVDA now warns about command line parameters which are unknown and not used by any add-ons. (#12795)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz upozorní, ak dostane z príkazového riadka parameter, ktorý nepozná a ktorý nie je použitý ani v doplnkoch. (#12795)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word accessed via UI Automation, NVDA will now make use of mathPlayer to read and navigate Office math equations. (#12946)
segment.target: NVDA pri sprístupnení dokumentov MS OFfice cez UI Automation používa na čítanie matematického obsahu MathPlayer. (#12946)

segment.source: For this to work, you must be running Microsoft Word 365/2016 build 14326 or later.
segment.target: Pre správnu funkčnosť je potrebné používať Microsoft Word od verzie 365/2016 zostava 14326.

segment.source: MathType equations must also be manually converted to Office Math by selecting each, opening the context menu, choosing Equation options, Convert to Office Math.
segment.target: matematické rovnice je tiež potrebné ručne konvertovať na Office math. Z kontextovej ponuky zvoľte možnosti rovníc a tu položka konvertovať na office math.

segment.source: Reporting of "has details" and the associated command to summarize the details relation have been updated to work in focus mode. (#13106)
segment.target: Dostupnosť detailov pre prvky je odteraz oznamovaná aj v režime fokusu. Takisto je v režime fokusu možné aj prezrieť si detaily skratkou NVDA+d. (#13106)

segment.source: Seika Notetaker can now be auto-detected when connected via USB and Bluetooth. (#13191, #13142)
segment.target: Zápisníky Seika sú odteraz automaticky detegované, ak sú pripojené cez USB a Bluetooth. (#13191, #13142)

segment.source: This affects the following devices: MiniSeika (16, 24 cells), V6, and V6Pro (40 cells)
segment.target: Toto sa týka týchto zariadení: MiniSeika (16, 24 bunkové), V6, a V6Pro (40 bunkové)

segment.source: Manually selecting the bluetooth COM port is also now supported.
segment.target: Tiež je odteraz možné ručne zvoliť možnosť Bluetooth com portu.

segment.source: Added a command to toggle the braille viewer; there is no default associated gesture. (#13258)
segment.target: Pridaná možnosť definovať klávesovú skratku pre zobrazenie a skrytie okna zobrazovača brailu. Predvolene nie je skratka nastavená. (#13258)

segment.source: Added commands for toggling multiple modifiers simultaneously with a Braille display (#13152)
segment.target: Pridaná možnosť nastaviť vlastné skratky, ktoré sa na brailovom riadku budú používať na odosielanie modifikačných kláves (ako shift či ctrl) do systému. Nastavenie vykonajte v okne klávesové skratky. (#13152)

segment.source: The Speech Dictionary dialog now features a "Remove all" button to help clear a whole dictionary. (#11802)
segment.target: V okne s rečovými slovníkmi pribudlo tlačidlo Odstrániť všetky, ktoré umožňuje vymazať všetky záznamy v slovníku. (#11802)

segment.source: Added support for Windows 11 Calculator. (#13212)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre aplikáciu Kalkulačka v systéme Windows 11. (#13212)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word with UI Automation enabled on Windows 11, line numbers and section numbers can now be reported. (#13283, #13515)
segment.target: Pri čítaní dokumentov MS Word cez rozhranie UI Automation v systéme Windows 11 je možné zisťovať čísla riadkov a sekcií. (#13283, #13515)

segment.source: For Microsoft Office 16.0.15000 and higher on Windows 11, NVDA will use UI Automation to access Microsoft Word documents by default, providing a significant performance improvement over the old Object model access. (#13437)
segment.target: NVDA predvolene používa rozhranie UI Automation pre MS Office od verzie 16.0.15000 v systéme Windows 11. Toto prináša výrazné zrýchlenie, oproti doposiaľ používanému spôsobu cez objektové modely. (#13437)

segment.source: This includes documents in Microsoft Word itself, and also the message reader and composer in Microsoft Outlook.
segment.target: Toto zahŕňa dokumenty MS Word a tiež čítanie a písanie správ v programe MS Outlook.

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: zmeny

segment.source: Espeak-ng has been updated to 1.51-dev commit `7e5457f91e10`. (#12950)
segment.target: Hlasový výstup Espeak-ng aktualizovaný na verziu 1.51-dev commit `7e5457f91e10`. (#12950)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to [3.21.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.21.0). (#13141, #13438)
segment.target: Brailová prekladová tabuľka liblouis aktualizovaná na verziu [3.21.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.21.0). (#13141, #13438)

segment.source: Added new braille table: Japanese (Kantenji) literary braille.
segment.target: Pridaná tabuľka Japončina (Kantenji) plnopis.

segment.source: Added new German 6 dot computer braille table.
segment.target: Pridaná tabuľka pre nemecký 6-bodový počítačový kód.

segment.source: Added Catalan grade 1 braille table. (#13408)
segment.target: Pridaná tabuľka Katalánskeho plnopisu. (#13408)

segment.source: NVDA will report selection and merged cells in LibreOffice Calc 7.3 and above. (#9310, #6897)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz dokáže oznamovať vybraté a zlúčené bunky v LibreOffice Calc od verzie 7.3. (#9310, #6897)

segment.source: Updated Unicode Common Locale Data Repository (CLDR) to 40.0. (#12999)
segment.target: Databáza unicode konzorcia (CLDR) aktualizovaná na verziu 40.0. (#12999)

segment.source: `NVDA+Numpad Delete` reports the location of the caret or focused object by default. (#13060)
segment.target: Skratka `NVDA+Num Delete` oznamuje predvolene polohu textového kurzora alebo objektu. (#13060)

segment.source: `NVDA+Shift+Numpad Delete` reports the location of the review cursor. (#13060)
segment.target: Skratka `NVDA+Shift+Num Delete` oznamuje polohu prezeracieho kurzora. (#13060)

segment.source: Added default bindings for toggling modifier keys to Freedom Scientific displays (#13152)
segment.target: Pridané skratky pre prepínanie preraďovačov v brailových riadkoch od Freedom scientific. (#13152)

segment.source: "Baseline" is no longer reported via the report text formatting command (`NVDA+f`). (#11815)
