segment.target: NVDA viac neoznamuje "bez indexov" pri oznamovaní formátovania dokumentu (`NVDA+f`). (#11815)

segment.source: Activate long description no longer has a default gesture assigned. (#13380)
segment.target: Skratka na zobrazenie dlhého popisu bola odstránená, ale je stále možné ju nanovo definovať. (#13380)

segment.source: Report details summary now has a default gesture (`NVDA+d`). (#13380)
segment.target: Pridaná skratka na oznámenie detailov prvku (`NVDA+d`). (#13380)

segment.source: NVDA needs to be restarted after installing MathPlayer. (#13486)
segment.target: Odteraz je potrebné reštartovať NVDA po inštalácii MathPlayera. (#13486)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: opravy

segment.source: Clipboard manager pane should no longer incorrectly steal focus when opening some Office programs. (#12736)
segment.target: Panel schránky viac nestratí fokus, ak otvoríte niektorú z aplikácii MS Office. (#12736)

segment.source: On a system where the user has chosen to swap the primary mouse button from the left to the right, NVDA will no longer accidentally bring up a context menu instead of activating an item, in applications such as web browsers. (#12642)
segment.target: Ak je nastavené zamenenie ľavého a pravého tlačidla myšy, NVDA viac pri pokuse aktivovať prvky napríklad v prehliadačoch, neotvára kontextovú ponuku. (#12642)

segment.source: When moving the review cursor past the end of text controls, such as in Microsoft Word with UI Automation, "bottom" is correctly reported in more situations. (#12808)
segment.target: Pri pokuse presunúť prezerací kurzor za textový prvok (napríklad v programe MS Word pri aktívnej podpore cez UI Automation), NVDA dokáže vo viacerých situáciách správne oznámiť spodok objektu. (#12808)

segment.source: NVDA can report the application name and version for binaries placed in system32 when running under 64-bit version of Windows. (#12943)
segment.target: NVDA dokáže oznámiť názov a verziu aplikácie aj v prípade, že beží na 64-bitovom systéme a aplikácia je umiestnená v časti system32. (#12943)

segment.source: Improved consistency of output reading in terminal programs. (#12974)
segment.target: Čítanie textu v konzolách a termináloch bolo vylepšené. (#12974)

segment.source: Note that in some situations, when inserting or deleting characters in the middle of a line, the characters after the caret may again be read out.
segment.target: Upozorňujeme, že pri odstránení znakov uprostred riadka môže byť aj naďalej zvyšok riadka čítaný dokonca.

segment.source: MS word with UIA: heading quick nav in browse mode no longer gets stuck on the final heading of a document, nor is this heading shown twice in the NVDA elements list. (#9540)
segment.target: V dokumentoch MS Word sprístupnených cez UI Automation sa viac kurzor v režime prehliadania pri rýchlej navigácii nezasekne na poslednom nadpise a tento tiež nie je oznamovaný v zozname nadpisov dvakrát. (#9540)

segment.source: In Windows 8 and later, the File Explorer status bar can now be retrieved using the standard gesture NVDA+end (desktop) / NVDA+shift+end (laptop). (#12845)
segment.target: V systéme Windows od verzie 8 je možné čítať stavový riadok prieskumníka skratkami NVDA+end (desktop) / NVDA+shift+end (laptop). (#12845)

segment.source: Incoming messages in the chat of Skype for Business are reported again. (#9295)
segment.target: Opäť sú oznamované prichádzajúce správy v aplikácii Skype pre Business. (#9295)

segment.source: NVDA can again duck audio when using the SAPI5 synthesizer on Windows 11. (#12913)
segment.target: NVDA opäť dokáže správne stišovať ostatné zvuky, ak je hlasový výstup v systéme Windows 11 nastavený na Sapi5. (#12913)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Calculator, NVDA will announce labels for history and memory list items. (#11858)
segment.target: NVDA v Kalkulačke v systéme Windows 10 oznamuje popisky pre prvky história a pamäte. (#11858)

segment.source: Gestures such as scrolling and routing again work with HID Braille devices. (#13228)
segment.target: Skrolovanie a presúvanie kurzora na znak opäť funguje pre riadky pripojené cez HID. (#13228)

segment.source: Windows 11 Mail: After switching focus between apps, while reading a long email, NVDA no longer gets stuck on a line of the email. (#13050)
segment.target: Pri čítaní e-mailu v pošte Windows 11 a súčasnom prepínaní aplikácii sa NVDA nezasekne na riadku z e-mailu. (#13050)

segment.source: HID braille: chorded gestures (e.g. `space+dot4`) can be successfully performed from the Braille display. (#13326)
segment.target: Na riadkoch pripojených cez HID Braille je odteraz možné používať akordy (napríklad skratky `medzera+bod4`). (#13326)

segment.source: Fixed an issue where multiple settings dialogs could be opened at the same time. (#12818)
segment.target: Opravená chyba, ktorá spôsobovala, že bolo možné súčasne otvoriť viacero dialógov nastavení NVDA. (#12818)

segment.source: Fixed a problem where some Focus Blue Braille displays would stop working after waking the computer from sleep. (#9830)
segment.target: Riadky Focus odteraz správne pracujú aj v prípadoch, že bol počítač prebudený z režimu spánku. (#9830)

segment.source: "Baseline" is no longer spuriously reported when the "report superscript and subscript" option is active. (#11078)
segment.target: NVDA viac náhodne neoznamuje "bez indexov" ak je zapnuté oznamovanie horného a dolného indexu. (#11078)

segment.source: In Windows 11, NVDA will no longer prevent navigation in emoji panel when selecting emojis. (#13104)
segment.target: Odteraz správne funguje navigácia v panely Emoji v systéme Windows 11 (#13104)

segment.source: Prevents a bug causing double-reporting when using Windows Console and Terminal. (#13261)
segment.target: Opravená chyba, ktorá spôsobovala dvojité oznamovanie textu v termináloch a konzolách. (#13261)

segment.source: Fixed several cases where list items could not be reported in 64 bit applications, such as REAPER. (#8175)
segment.target: Opravená chyba, ktorá znemožňovala oznamovanie položiek v zoznamoch v 64-bitových aplikáciách, ako napríklad Reaper. (#8175)

segment.source: In the Microsoft Edge downloads manager, NVDA will now automatically switch to focus mode once the list item with the most recent download gains focus. (#13221)
segment.target: Keď získa fokus zoznam stiahnutých súborov v aplikácii MS Edge, NVDA sa automaticky prepne do režimu fokusu. (#13221)

segment.source: NVDA no longer causes 64-bit versions of Notepad++ 8.3 and above to crash. (#13311)
segment.target: NVDA viac nespôsobuje pády 64-bitovej aplikácie Notepad++ od verzie 8.3. (#13311)

segment.source: Adobe Reader no longer crashes on startup if Adobe Reader's protected mode is enabled. (#11568)
segment.target: Adobe Reader sa viac nezrúti, ak je spustený v chránenom režime v kombinácii s NVDA. (#11568)

segment.source: Fixed a bug where selecting the Papenmeier Braille Display Driver caused NVDA to crash. (#13348)
segment.target: NVDA sa viac nezrúti, ak ako brailový riadok zvolítePapenmeier. (#13348)

segment.source: In Microsoft word with UIA: page number and other formatting is no longer inappropriately announced when moving from a blank table cell to a cell with content, or from the end of the document into existing content. (#13458, #13459)
segment.target: V aplikácii MS Word sprístupnenej cez UIA viac NVDA neoznamuje náhodne čísla strán a iné parametre formátovania, ak prejde kurzor z prázdnej bunky tabuľky do bunky, ktorá obsahuje text, prípadne z konca dokumentu k inému obsahu dokumentu. (#13458, #13459)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer fail to report the page title and start automatically reading, when a page loads in Google chrome 100. (#13571)
segment.target: NVDA opäť dokáže správne oznámiť názov stránky a spustiť plynulé čítanie, ak je stránka načítaná v Google Chrome 100. (#13571)

segment.source: NVDA no longer crashes when resetting the NVDA configuration to factory defaults while speak command keys is on. (#13634)
segment.target: NVDA sa viac nezrúti, ak je aktivované čítanie príkazových skratiek a súčasne vyvoláte možnosť obnoviť nastavenia. (#13634)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: Note: this is a Add-on API compatibility breaking release. Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.
segment.target: Note: this is a Add-on API compatibility breaking release. Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.

segment.source: Although NVDA still requires Visual Studio 2019, Builds should no longer fail if a newer version of Visual Studio (E.g. 2022) is installed along side 2019. (#13033, #13387)
segment.target: Although NVDA still requires Visual Studio 2019, Builds should no longer fail if a newer version of Visual Studio (E.g. 2022) is installed along side 2019. (#13033, #13387)

segment.source: Updated SCons to version 4.3.0. (#13033)
segment.target: Updated SCons to version 4.3.0. (#13033)

segment.source: Updated py2exe to version 0.11.1.0. (#13510)
segment.target: Updated py2exe to version 0.11.1.0. (#13510)

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinConsoleUIA.isImprovedTextRangeAvailable` has been removed. Use `apiLevel` instead. (#12955, #12660)
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinConsoleUIA.isImprovedTextRangeAvailable` has been removed. Use `apiLevel` instead. (#12955, #12660)

segment.source: `TVItemStruct` has been removed from `sysTreeView32`. (#12935)
segment.target: `TVItemStruct` has been removed from `sysTreeView32`. (#12935)

segment.source: `MessageItem` has been removed from the Outlook appModule. (#12935)
segment.target: `MessageItem` has been removed from the Outlook appModule. (#12935)

segment.source: `audioDucking.AUDIODUCKINGMODE_*` constants are now a `DisplayStringIntEnum`. (#12926)
segment.target: `audioDucking.AUDIODUCKINGMODE_*` constants are now a `DisplayStringIntEnum`. (#12926)

segment.source: usages should be replaced with `AudioDuckingMode.*`
segment.target: usages should be replaced with `AudioDuckingMode.*`

segment.source: usages of `audioDucking.audioDuckingModes` should be replaced with `AudioDuckingMode.*.displayString`
segment.target: usages of `audioDucking.audioDuckingModes` should be replaced with `AudioDuckingMode.*.displayString`

segment.source: `audioDucking.ANRUS_ducking_*` constants usages should be replaced with `ANRUSDucking.*`. (#12926)
segment.target: `audioDucking.ANRUS_ducking_*` constants usages should be replaced with `ANRUSDucking.*`. (#12926)

segment.source: `synthDrivers.sapi5` changes (#12927):
segment.target: `synthDrivers.sapi5` changes (#12927):

segment.source: `SPAS_*` usages should be replaced with `SPAudioState.*`
segment.target: `SPAS_*` usages should be replaced with `SPAudioState.*`

segment.source: `constants.SVSF*` usages should be replaced with `SpeechVoiceSpeakFlags.*`
segment.target: `constants.SVSF*` usages should be replaced with `SpeechVoiceSpeakFlags.*`

segment.source: Note: `SVSFlagsAsync` should be replaced with `SpeechVoiceSpeakFlags.Async` not `SpeechVoiceSpeakFlags.lagsAsync`
segment.target: Note: `SVSFlagsAsync` should be replaced with `SpeechVoiceSpeakFlags.Async` not `SpeechVoiceSpeakFlags.lagsAsync`

segment.source: `constants.SVE*` usages should be replaced with `SpeechVoiceEvents.*`
segment.target: `constants.SVE*` usages should be replaced with `SpeechVoiceEvents.*`

segment.source: The `soffice` appModule has the following classes and functions removed `JAB_OOTableCell`, `JAB_OOTable`, `gridCoordStringToNumbers`. (#12849)
segment.target: The `soffice` appModule has the following classes and functions removed `JAB_OOTableCell`, `JAB_OOTable`, `gridCoordStringToNumbers`. (#12849)

segment.source: `core.CallCancelled` is now `exceptions.CallCancelled`. (#12940)
segment.target: `core.CallCancelled` is now `exceptions.CallCancelled`. (#12940)

segment.source: All constants starting with RPC from `core` and `logHandler` are moved into `RPCConstants.RPC` enum. (#12940)
segment.target: All constants starting with RPC from `core` and `logHandler` are moved into `RPCConstants.RPC` enum. (#12940)

segment.source: It is recommended that `mouseHandler.doPrimaryClick` and `mouseHandler.doSecondaryClick` functions should be used to click the mouse to perform a logical action such as activating (primary) or secondary (show context menu),
segment.target: It is recommended that `mouseHandler.doPrimaryClick` and `mouseHandler.doSecondaryClick` functions should be used to click the mouse to perform a logical action such as activating (primary) or secondary (show context menu),

segment.source: rather than using `executeMouseEvent` and specifying the left or right mouse button specifically.
segment.target: rather than using `executeMouseEvent` and specifying the left or right mouse button specifically.

segment.source: This ensures code will honor the Windows user setting for swapping the primary mouse button. (#12642)
segment.target: This ensures code will honor the Windows user setting for swapping the primary mouse button. (#12642)

segment.source: `config.getSystemConfigPath` has been removed - there is no replacement. (#12943)
segment.target: `config.getSystemConfigPath` has been removed - there is no replacement. (#12943)

segment.source: `shlobj.SHGetFolderPath` has been removed - please use `shlobj.SHGetKnownFolderPath` instead. (#12943)
segment.target: `shlobj.SHGetFolderPath` has been removed - please use `shlobj.SHGetKnownFolderPath` instead. (#12943)

segment.source: `shlobj` constants have been removed. A new enum has been created, `shlobj.FolderId` for usage with `SHGetKnownFolderPath`. (#12943)
segment.target: `shlobj` constants have been removed. A new enum has been created, `shlobj.FolderId` for usage with `SHGetKnownFolderPath`. (#12943)

segment.source: `diffHandler.get_dmp_algo` and `diffHandler.get_difflib_algo` have been replaced with `diffHandler.prefer_dmp` and `diffHandler.prefer_difflib` respectively. (#12974)
segment.target: `diffHandler.get_dmp_algo` and `diffHandler.get_difflib_algo` have been replaced with `diffHandler.prefer_dmp` and `diffHandler.prefer_difflib` respectively. (#12974)

segment.source: `languageHandler.curLang` has been removed - to get the current NVDA language use `languageHandler.getLanguage()`. (#13082)
segment.target: `languageHandler.curLang` has been removed - to get the current NVDA language use `languageHandler.getLanguage()`. (#13082)

segment.source: A `getStatusBarText` method can be implemented on an appModule to customize the way NVDA fetches the text from the status bar. (#12845)
segment.target: A `getStatusBarText` method can be implemented on an appModule to customize the way NVDA fetches the text from the status bar. (#12845)

segment.source: `globalVars.appArgsExtra` has been removed. (#13087)
segment.target: `globalVars.appArgsExtra` has been removed. (#13087)

segment.source: If your add-on need to process additional command line arguments see the documentation of `addonHandler.isCLIParamKnown` and the developer guide for details.
segment.target: If your add-on need to process additional command line arguments see the documentation of `addonHandler.isCLIParamKnown` and the developer guide for details.

segment.source: The UIA handler module and other UIA support modules are now part of a UIAHandler package. (#10916)
segment.target: The UIA handler module and other UIA support modules are now part of a UIAHandler package. (#10916)

segment.source: `UIAUtils` is now `UIAHandler.utils`
segment.target: `UIAUtils` is now `UIAHandler.utils`

segment.source: `UIABrowseMode` is now `UIAHandler.browseMode`
segment.target: `UIABrowseMode` is now `UIAHandler.browseMode`

segment.source: `_UIAConstants` is now `UIAHandler.constants`
segment.target: `_UIAConstants` is now `UIAHandler.constants`

segment.source: `_UIACustomProps` is now `UIAHandler.customProps`
segment.target: `_UIACustomProps` is now `UIAHandler.customProps`

segment.source: `_UIACustomAnnotations` is now `UIAHandler.customAnnotations`
segment.target: `_UIACustomAnnotations` is now `UIAHandler.customAnnotations`

segment.source: The `IAccessibleHandler` `IA2_RELATION_*` constants have been replaced with the `IAccessibleHandler.RelationType` enum. (#13096)
segment.target: The `IAccessibleHandler` `IA2_RELATION_*` constants have been replaced with the `IAccessibleHandler.RelationType` enum. (#13096)

segment.source: Removed `IA2_RELATION_FLOWS_FROM`
segment.target: Removed `IA2_RELATION_FLOWS_FROM`

segment.source: Removed `IA2_RELATION_FLOWS_TO`
segment.target: Removed `IA2_RELATION_FLOWS_TO`

segment.source: Removed `IA2_RELATION_CONTAINING_DOCUMENT`
segment.target: Removed `IA2_RELATION_CONTAINING_DOCUMENT`

segment.source: `LOCALE_SLANGUAGE`, `LOCALE_SLIST` and `LOCALE_SLANGDISPLAYNAME` are removed from `languageHandler` - use members of `languageHandler.LOCALE` instead. (#12753)
segment.target: `LOCALE_SLANGUAGE`, `LOCALE_SLIST` and `LOCALE_SLANGDISPLAYNAME` are removed from `languageHandler` - use members of `languageHandler.LOCALE` instead. (#12753)

segment.source: Switched from Minhook to Microsoft Detours as a hooking library for NVDA. Hooking with this library is mainly used to aid the display model. (#12964)
segment.target: Switched from Minhook to Microsoft Detours as a hooking library for NVDA. Hooking with this library is mainly used to aid the display model. (#12964)

segment.source: `winVersion.WIN10_RELEASE_NAME_TO_BUILDS` is removed. (#13211)
segment.target: `winVersion.WIN10_RELEASE_NAME_TO_BUILDS` is removed. (#13211)

segment.source: SCons now warns to build with a number of jobs that is equal to the number of logical processors in the system.
segment.target: SCons now warns to build with a number of jobs that is equal to the number of logical processors in the system.

segment.source: This can dramatically decrease build times on multi core systems. (#13226, #13371)
segment.target: This can dramatically decrease build times on multi core systems. (#13226, #13371)

segment.source: `characterProcessing.SYMLVL_*` constants are removed - please use `characterProcessing.SymbolLevel.*` instead. (#13248)
segment.target: `characterProcessing.SYMLVL_*` constants are removed - please use `characterProcessing.SymbolLevel.*` instead. (#13248)

segment.source: Functions `loadState` and `saveState` are removed from addonHandler - please use `addonHandler.state.load` and `addonHandler.state.save` instead. (#13245)
segment.target: Functions `loadState` and `saveState` are removed from addonHandler - please use `addonHandler.state.load` and `addonHandler.state.save` instead. (#13245)

segment.source: Moved the UWP/OneCore interaction layer of NVDAHelper [from C++/CX to C++/Winrt](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/uwp/cpp-and-winrt-apis/move-to-winrt-from-cx). (#10662)
segment.target: Moved the UWP/OneCore interaction layer of NVDAHelper [from C++/CX to C++/Winrt](https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/uwp/cpp-and-winrt-apis/move-to-winrt-from-cx). (#10662)

segment.source: It is now mandatory to subclass `DictionaryDialog` to use it. (#13268)
segment.target: It is now mandatory to subclass `DictionaryDialog` to use it. (#13268)

segment.source: `config.RUN_REGKEY`, `config.NVDA_REGKEY` are deprecated, please use `config.RegistryKey.RUN`, `config.RegistryKey.NVDA` instead. These will be removed in 2023. (#13242)
segment.target: `config.RUN_REGKEY`, `config.NVDA_REGKEY` are deprecated, please use `config.RegistryKey.RUN`, `config.RegistryKey.NVDA` instead. These will be removed in 2023. (#13242)

segment.source: `easeOfAccess.ROOT_KEY`, `easeOfAccess.APP_KEY_PATH` are deprecated, please use`easeOfAccess.RegistryKey.ROOT`, `easeOfAccess.RegistryKey.APP` instead. These will be removed in 2023. (#13242)
segment.target: `easeOfAccess.ROOT_KEY`, `easeOfAccess.APP_KEY_PATH` are deprecated, please use`easeOfAccess.RegistryKey.ROOT`, `easeOfAccess.RegistryKey.APP` instead. These will be removed in 2023. (#13242)

segment.source: `easeOfAccess.APP_KEY_NAME` has been deprecated, to be removed in 2023. (#13242)
segment.target: `easeOfAccess.APP_KEY_NAME` has been deprecated, to be removed in 2023. (#13242)

segment.source: `DictionaryDialog` and `DictionaryEntryDialog` are moved from `gui.settingsDialogs` to `gui.speechDict`. (#13294)
segment.target: `DictionaryDialog` and `DictionaryEntryDialog` are moved from `gui.settingsDialogs` to `gui.speechDict`. (#13294)

segment.source: IAccessible2 relations are now shown in developer info for IAccessible2 objects. (#13315)
segment.target: IAccessible2 relations are now shown in developer info for IAccessible2 objects. (#13315)

segment.source: `languageHandler.windowsPrimaryLCIDsToLocaleNames` has been removed, instead use `languageHandler.windowsLCIDToLocaleName` or `winKernel.LCIDToLocaleName`. (#13342)
segment.target: `languageHandler.windowsPrimaryLCIDsToLocaleNames` has been removed, instead use `languageHandler.windowsLCIDToLocaleName` or `winKernel.LCIDToLocaleName`. (#13342)

segment.source: `UIAAutomationId` property for UIA objects should be preferred over `cachedAutomationId`. (#13125, #11447)
segment.target: `UIAAutomationId` property for UIA objects should be preferred over `cachedAutomationId`. (#13125, #11447)

segment.source: `cachedAutomationId` can be used if obtained directly from the element.
segment.target: `cachedAutomationId` can be used if obtained directly from the element.

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.window.scintilla.CharacterRangeStruct` has moved to `NVDAObjects.window.scintilla.Scintilla.CharacterRangeStruct`. (#13364)
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.window.scintilla.CharacterRangeStruct` has moved to `NVDAObjects.window.scintilla.Scintilla.CharacterRangeStruct`. (#13364)

segment.source: Boolean `gui.isInMessageBox` is removed, please use the function `gui.message.isModalMessageBoxActive` instead. (#12984, #13376)
segment.target: Boolean `gui.isInMessageBox` is removed, please use the function `gui.message.isModalMessageBoxActive` instead. (#12984, #13376)

segment.source: `controlTypes` has been split up into various submodules. (#12510, #13588)
segment.target: `controlTypes` has been split up into various submodules. (#12510, #13588)

segment.source: `ROLE_*` and `STATE_*` have been replaced with `Role.*` and `State.*`.
segment.target: `ROLE_*` and `STATE_*` have been replaced with `Role.*` and `State.*`.

segment.source: Although still available, the following should be considered deprecated:
segment.target: Although still available, the following should be considered deprecated:

segment.source: `ROLE_*` and `STATE_*`, use `Role.*` and `State.*` instead.
segment.target: `ROLE_*` and `STATE_*`, use `Role.*` and `State.*` instead.

segment.source: `roleLabels`, `stateLabels` and `negativeStateLabels`, usages like `roleLabels[ROLE_*]` should be replaced with their equivalent `Role.*.displayString` or `State.*.negativeDisplayString`.
segment.target: `roleLabels`, `stateLabels` and `negativeStateLabels`, usages like `roleLabels[ROLE_*]` should be replaced with their equivalent `Role.*.displayString` or `State.*.negativeDisplayString`.

segment.source: `processPositiveStates` and `processNegativeStates` should use `processAndLabelStates` instead.
segment.target: `processPositiveStates` and `processNegativeStates` should use `processAndLabelStates` instead.

segment.source: Excel cell state constants (`NVSTATE_*`) are now values in the `NvCellState` enum, mirrored in the `NvCellState` enum in `NVDAObjects/window/excel.py` and mapped to `controlTypes.State` via _nvCellStatesToStates. (#13465)
segment.target: Excel cell state constants (`NVSTATE_*`) are now values in the `NvCellState` enum, mirrored in the `NvCellState` enum in `NVDAObjects/window/excel.py` and mapped to `controlTypes.State` via _nvCellStatesToStates. (#13465)

segment.source: `EXCEL_CELLINFO` struct member `state` is now `nvCellStates`.
segment.target: `EXCEL_CELLINFO` struct member `state` is now `nvCellStates`.

segment.source: `mathPres.ensureInit` has been removed, MathPlayer is now initialized when NVDA starts. (#13486)
segment.target: `mathPres.ensureInit` has been removed, MathPlayer is now initialized when NVDA starts. (#13486)

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix a security issue.
segment.target: Toto je menšia verzia, ktorá obsahuje opravu bezpečnostnej chyby.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues to <info@nvaccess.org>.
segment.target: Prosíme vás, aby ste informácie o bezpečnostných ryzikách odoslali na adresu <info@nvaccess.org> (anglicky), prípadne na <ondrej@ondrosik.sk> v Slovenčine.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Bezpečnostné záplaty

segment.source: Addressed security advisory `GHSA-xc5m-v23f-pgr7`.
segment.target: Opravená chyba `GHSA-xc5m-v23f-pgr7`.

segment.source: The symbol pronunciation dialog is now disabled in secure mode.
segment.target: V bezpečnom režime nie je možné používať dialóg Výslovnosť interpunkčných a špeciálnych znakov.

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix several security issues raised.
segment.target: Toto je menšia verzia, v ktorej prinášame bezpečnostné záplaty.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues to <info@nvaccess.org>.
segment.target: Prosíme vás, aby ste informácie o bezpečnostných ryzikách odoslali na adresu <info@nvaccess.org> (anglicky), prípadne na <ondrej@ondrosik.sk> v Slovenčine.

segment.source: Security Fixes
segment.target: Bezpečnostné záplaty

segment.source: Addressed security advisory `GHSA-354r-wr4v-cx28`. (#13488)
segment.target: Opravená bezpečnostná chyba `GHSA-354r-wr4v-cx28`. (#13488)

segment.source: Remove the ability to start NVDA with debug logging enabled when NVDA runs in secure mode.
segment.target: V bezpečnom režime nie je viac možné nastaviť úroveň záznamu na debug.

segment.source: Remove the ability to update NVDA when NVDA runs in secure mode.
segment.target: V bezpečnom režime nie je viac možné aktualizovať NVDA.

segment.source: Addressed security advisory `GHSA-wg65-7r23-h6p9`. (#13489)
segment.target: Opravená bezpečnostná chyba `GHSA-wg65-7r23-h6p9`. (#13489)

segment.source: Remove the ability to open the input gestures dialog in secure mode.
segment.target: Odstránená možnosť otvoriť dialóg Klávesové skratky v bezpečnom režime.

segment.source: Remove the ability to open the default, temporary and voice dictionary dialogs in secure mode.
segment.target: Odstránená možnosť otvoriť dialógy rečových slovníkov v bezpečnom režime.

segment.source: Addressed security advisory `GHSA-mvc8-5rv9-w3hx`. (#13487)
segment.target: Opravená bezpečnostná chyba `GHSA-mvc8-5rv9-w3hx`. (#13487)

segment.source: The wx GUI inspection tool is now disabled in secure mode.
segment.target: Nástroj na inšpekciu prvkov wx GUI je v bezpečnom režime vypnutý.

segment.source: This release is identical to 2021.3.2.
segment.target: Táto verzia je rovnaká ako 2021.3.2.

segment.source: A bug existed in NVDA 2021.3.2 where it incorrectly identified itself as 2021.3.1.
segment.target: Vo verzii 2021.3.2 bola chyba, ktorá spôsobovala, že sa NVDA identifikovalo ako verzia 2021.3.1.

segment.source: This release correctly identifies itself as 2021.3.3.
segment.target: Táto verzia správne rozpoznáva vlastnú verziu ako 2021.3.3.

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix several security issues raised.
segment.target: Táto verzia opravuje viaceré bezpečnostné chyby.

segment.source: Please responsibly disclose security issues to <info@nvaccess.org>.
segment.target: Na bezpečnostné problémy prosím upozorňujte anglicky emailom na adresu<info@nvaccess.org>.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Opravy

segment.source: Security fix: Prevent object navigation outside of the lockscreen on Windows 10 and Windows 11. (#13328)
segment.target: Opravená bezpečnostná chyba, ktorá umožňovala v objektovej navigácii prejsť mimo zamknutú obrazovku v systémoch Windows 10 a 11. (#13328)

segment.source: Security fix: The addons manager dialog is now disabled on secure screens. (#13059)
segment.target: Bezpečnostná záplata: V bezpečnom režime nie je viac možné spustiť správcu doplnkov. (#13059)

segment.source: Security fix: NVDA context help is no longer available on secure screens. (#13353)
segment.target: Bezpečnostná záplata: V bezpečnom režime nie je viac možné spúšťať kontextovú nápovedu. (#13353)

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix several issues in 2021.3.
segment.target: Táto verzia opravuje drobné chyby z verzie 2021.3.

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: zmeny

segment.source: The new HID Braille protocol is no longer preferred when another braille display driver can be used. (#13153)
segment.target: Ak je pripojený riadok s vlastným ovládačom, je preferovaný vlastný ovládač a nie nový HID štandard. (#13153)

segment.source: The new HID Braille protocol can be disabled via a setting in the advanced settings panel. (#13180)
segment.target: HID štandard je možné vypnúť v pokročilých nastaveniach. (#13180)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: opravy

segment.source: Landmark is once again abbreviated in braille. #13158
segment.target: Oblasti stránky sú opäť oznamované aj na brailovom riadku (#13158

segment.source: Fixed unstable braille display auto detection for Humanware Brailliant and APH Mantis Q40 braille displays when using Bluetooth. (#13153)
segment.target: Opravené nestabilné automatické detegovanie brailových riadkov Humanware Brailliant a APH Mantis Q40 pripojených cez Bluetooth. (#13153)

segment.source: This release introduces support for the new HID Braille specification.
segment.target: Táto verzia prináša podporu pre brailové riadky podporujúce HID štandard.

segment.source: This specification aims to standardise support for Braille Displays without needing individual drivers.
segment.target: Tento štandard má v budúcnosti zaručiť, že nebude potrebné mať pre každý riadok samostatný ovládač.

segment.source: There are updates to eSpeak-NG and LibLouis, including new Russian and Tshivenda tables.
segment.target: V tejto verzii je aktualizovaný hlasový výstup eSpeak-NG a brailová tabuľka LibLouis. LibLouis prináša nové tabuľky pre Ruštinu a Tshivenda.

segment.source: Error sounds can be enabled in stable builds of NVDA via a new advanced settings option.
segment.target: V pokročilých nastaveniach pribudla možnosť prepínať zvukové hlásenie chýb zapísaných do logu. Teraz je možné takéto hlásenie zapnúť aj pre stabilné verzie NVDA.

segment.source: Say all in Word now scrolls the view to keep the current position visible.
segment.target: Počas plynulého čítania v dokumente MS Word sa posúva aj zobrazenie, aby bolo možné sledovať pozíciu kurzora.

segment.source: There are lots of improvements when using Office with UIA.
segment.target: Táto verzia prináša tiež mnohé vylepšenia pre aplikácie MS Office s využitím technológie UIA.

segment.source: One UIA fix is that Outlook now ignores more types of layout tables in messages.
segment.target: Spomeňme, že vďaka tomu je napríklad v Outlooku možné ignorovať viac tabuliek formujúcich vzhľad.

segment.source: Important notes:
segment.target: Dôležité poznámky:

segment.source: Due to an update to our security certificate, a small number of users get an error when NVDA 2021.2 checks for updates.
segment.target: Z dôvodu aktualizácie nášho bezpečnostného certifikátu sa môže niektorým používateľom stať, že NVDA 2021.2 pri kontrole aktualizácií vypíše chybu.

segment.source: NVDA now asks Windows to update security certificates, which will prevent this error in future.
segment.target: Preto NVDA odteraz pravidelne žiada systém Windows o aktualizovanie certifikátov, čo v budúcnosti odstráni podobné problémy.

segment.source: Affected users will need to download this update manually.
segment.target: Používatelia, ktorí narazia na túto chybu, musia NVDA aktualizovať ručne.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nové vlastnosti

segment.source: Adds an input gesture for toggling settings for reporting the style of cell borders. (#10408)
segment.target: Pridaná možnosť definovať skratku pre oznamovanie orámovania buniek tabuľky. (#10408)

segment.source: Support for the new HID Braille specification which aims to standardise support for Braille Displays. (#12523)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre HID Štandard, ktorý umožňuje používať brailové riadky bez nutnosti mať samostatný ovládač pre každý riadok. (#12523)

segment.source: Devices that support this specification will be auto detected by NVDA.
segment.target: Zariadenia, ktoré podporujú tento štandard, NVDA automaticky rozpozná.

segment.source: For technical details on NVDA's implementation of this specification, see https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/devDocs/hidBrailleTechnicalNotes.md
segment.target: Technickú špecifikáciu a spôsob inplementácie na strane NVDA je možné nájsť na https://github.com/nvaccess/nvda/blob/master/devDocs/hidBrailleTechnicalNotes.md (anglicky).

segment.source: Add support for the VisioBraille Vario 4 Braille Device. (#12607)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre brailový riadok VisioBraille Vario 4. (#12607)

segment.source: Error notifications can be enabled (advanced settings) when using any version of NVDA. (#12672)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz môže oznamovať chyby zapísané do logu aj v stabilných verziách. Nastavenie sa nachádza v pokročilých nastaveniach. (#12672)

segment.source: In Windows 10 and later, NVDA will announce the suggestion count when entering search terms in apps such as Settings and Microsoft Store. (#7330, #12758, #12790)
segment.target: V systéme Windows od verzie 10 NVDA pri vyhľadávaní v ponuke štart a iných oknách (napríklad nastaveniach) oznamuje počet návrhov. (#7330, #12758, #12790)

segment.source: Table navigation is now supported in grid controls created using the Out-GridView cmdlet in PowerShell. (#12928)
segment.target: Odteraz je podporovaná navigácia v tabuľkách v mriežkovom zobrazení (prvok grid control vytvorený v PowerShell ako Out-GridView cmdlet). (#12928)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Zmeny

segment.source: Espeak-ng has been updated to 1.51-dev commit `74068b91bcd578bd7030a7a6cde2085114b79b44`. (#12665)
segment.target: Hlasový výstup Espeak-ng aktualizovaný na verziu 1.51-dev commit `74068b91bcd578bd7030a7a6cde2085114b79b44`. (#12665)

segment.source: NVDA will default to eSpeak if no installed OneCore voices support the NVDA preferred language. (#10451)
segment.target: Ak nie sú v systéme onecore hlasy, ktoré dokážu hovoriť nastaveným jazykom NVDA, potom sa predvolene používa eSpeak. (#10451)

segment.source: If OneCore voices consistently fail to speak, revert to eSpeak as a synthesizer. (#11544)
segment.target: Ak sa nedarí inicializovať Onecore hlasy, NVDA nastaví ako predvolený hlas eSpeak. (#11544)

segment.source: When reading status bar with `NVDA+end`, the review cursor is no longer moved to its location.
segment.target: Pri čítaní stavového riadka príkazom `NVDA+end` sa odteraz nepresúva prehliadací kurzor na pozíciu stavového riadka.

segment.source: If you need this functionality please assign a gesture to the appropriate script in the Object Navigation category in the Input Gestures dialog. (#8600)
segment.target: Pokiaľ potrebujete presúvať kurzor na pozíciu stavového riadka, nastavte skratku v dialógu klávesové skratky, časť objektová navigácia. (#8600)

segment.source: When opening a settings dialog which is already open, NVDA sets focus on the existing dialog rather than raise an error. (#5383)
segment.target: Ak otvoríte dialóg s nastaveniami a súčasne je už takýto dialóg otvorený, NVDA viac nevypíše chybu, ale presunie fokus do otvoreného okna na príslušné miesto. (#5383)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to [3.19.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.19.0). (#12810)
segment.target: brailová prekladová tabuľka liblouis aktualizovaná na verziu [3.19.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.19.0). (#12810)

segment.source: New braille tables: Russian grade 1, Tshivenda grade 1, Tshivenda grade 2
segment.target: Nové tabuľky: Ruština plnopis, Tshivenda skratkopis a plnopis.

segment.source: Instead of "marked content" or "mrkd", "highlight" or "hlght" will be announced for speech and braille respectively. (#12892)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz oznamuje označený text (aria atribút 'mark' alebo 'amark') ako vyznačený resp. vyzn na brailovom riadku. (#12892)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer attempt to exit when dialogs are awaiting a required action (eg Confirm/Cancel). (#12984)
segment.target: NVDA viac nie je možné ukončiť, ak je otvorený nejaký dialóg NVDA. (#12984)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Opravy

segment.source: Tracking keyboard modifiers (such as Control, or Insert) is more robust when watchdog is recovering. (#12609)
segment.target: Sledovanie stavu kláves ako ctrl a shift je robustnejšie aj v oknách, ktoré na chvíľu zamrznú. (#12609)

segment.source: It is once again possible to check for NVDA updates on certain systems; e.g. clean Windows installs. (#12729)
segment.target: Odteraz je možné skontrolovať aktualizácie NVDA aj na nových čistých inštaláciách systému Windows. (#12729)

segment.source: NVDA correctly announces blank table cells in Microsoft Word when using UI automation. (#11043)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz správne oznamuje prázdne bunky tabuľky v dokumentoch MS Word cez UIA (#11043)

segment.source: In ARIA data grid cells on the web, the Escape key will now be passed through to the grid and no longer turn off focus mode unconditionally. (#12413)
segment.target: Ak stlačíte kláves ESC na webe v mriežke s dátami zobrazenej cez aria data grid, kláves je odoslaný do prehliadača a nevypína viac režim fokusu. (#12413)

segment.source: When reading a header cell of a table in Chrome, fix the column name being announced twice. (#10840)
segment.target: NVDA viac dvakrát neopakuje názov stĺpca pri čítaní hlavičky bunky tabuľky v prehliadači Chrome. (#10840)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reports a numerical value for UIA sliders that have a textual representation of their value defined. (UIA ValuePattern is now preferred over RangeValuePattern). (#12724)
segment.target: NVDA viac nečíta numerickú hodnotu posuvníkov v oknách prezentovaných cez UIA, ak je dostupný aj textový popis. (Preferujeme UIA ValuePattern pred RangeValuePattern) (#12724)

segment.source: NVDA no longer treats the value of UIA sliders as always percentage based.
segment.target: NVDA viac nespracúva všetky UIA posuvníky v percentách.

segment.source: Reporting the location of a cell in Microsoft Excel when accessed via UI Automation again works correctly on Windows 11. (#12782)
segment.target: Oznamovanie pozície bunky v tabuľke MS Excel funguje správne pri použití UIA v systéme Windows 11. (#12782)

segment.source: NVDA no longer sets invalid Python locales. (#12753)
segment.target: Vylepšená synchronizácia jazyka NVDA a jazyka systému Windows. (#12753)

segment.source: If a disabled addon is uninstalled and then re-installed it is re-enabled. (#12792)
segment.target: Ak je zakázaný doplnok odinštalovaný a neskôr opätovne nainštalovaný, je aj automaticky povolený. (#12792)

segment.source: Fixed bugs around updating and removing addons where the addon folder has been renamed or has files opened. (#12792, #12629)
segment.target: Opravené problémy, ktoré nastávali počas aktualizácie a odstraňovania doplnkov v súvislosti s premenovaním priečinkov prípadne otvorenými súbormi. (#12792, #12629)

segment.source: When using UI Automation to access Microsoft Excel spreadsheet controls, NVDA no longer redundantly announces when a single cell is selected. (#12530)
segment.target: Ak sa na prezentovanie tabuľky MS Excel používa UIA, NVDA neopakuje vybratie jednej bunky. (#12530)

segment.source: More dialog text is automatically read in LibreOffice Writer, such as in confirmation dialogs. (#11687)
segment.target: NVDA dokáže identifikovať viac textu v dialógoch aplikácie LibreOffice Writer, napríklad v potvrdzovacích oknách. (#11687)

segment.source: Reading / navigating with browse mode in Microsoft Word via UI automation now ensures the document is always scrolled so that the current browse mode position is visible, and that the caret position in focus mode correctly reflects the browse mode position. (#9611)
segment.target: Pri pohybe v dokumente MS Word v režime prehliadania s použitím UIA sa mení aj zobrazenie, takže je možné sledovať pozíciu kurzora. Súčasne s tým sa mení aj pozícia kurzora v režime fokusu. (#9611)

segment.source: When performing Say all in Microsoft Word via UI automation, the document is now automatically scrolled, and the caret position is correctly updated. (#9611)
segment.target: Pri plynulom čítaní v dokumente MS Word sa automaticky posúva aj zobrazenie a poloha kurzora. (#9611)

segment.source: When reading emails in Outlook and NVDA is accessing the message with UI Automation, certain tables are now marked as layout tables, which means they will no longer be reported by default. (#11430)
segment.target: Pri čítaní správ v MS outlooku cez UIA NVDA dokáže rozpoznať a ignorovať viacej tabuliek formujúcich vzhľad. (#11430)

segment.source: A rare error when changing audio devices has been fixed. (#12620)
segment.target: Opravené problémy, ktoré nastávali pri zmene zvukového zariadenia. (#12620)

segment.source: Input with literary braille tables should behave more reliably when in edit fields. (#12667)
segment.target: Písanie v plnopise je odteraz presnejšie. (#12667)

segment.source: When navigating the Windows system tray calendar, NVDA now reports the day of the week in full. (#12757)
segment.target: Pri prezeraní kalendára na panely úloh, NVDA oznamuje plným názvom deň v týždni. (#12757)

segment.source: When using a Chinese input method such as Taiwan - Microsoft Quick in Microsoft Word, scrolling the braille display forward and backward no longer incorrectly keeps jumping back to the original caret position. (#12855)
segment.target: Pri písaní pomocou čínskych metód vstupu, ako napríklad Taiwan - Microsoft Quick v MS Worde, posúvanie brailového riadka viac nespôsobí posunutie na pôvodnú pozíciu kurzora. (#12855)

segment.source: When accessing Microsoft Word documents via UIA, navigating by sentence (alt+downArrow / alt+upArrow) is again possible. (#9254)
segment.target: V dokumentoch MS Word je aj s použitím UIA odteraz možné pohybovať sa po vetách skratkami alt+šípka hore a alt+šípka dole. (#9254)

segment.source: When accessing MS Word with UIA, paragraph indenting is now reported. (#12899)
segment.target: V dokumentoch MS Word je aj s použitím UIA oznamované odsadenie odsekov. (#12899)

segment.source: When accessing MS Word with UIA, change tracking command and some other localized commands are now reported in Word . (#12904)
segment.target: V dokumentoch MS Word s použitím UIA je oznamované sledovanie zmien a iné lokalizované funkcie. (#12904)

segment.source: Fixed duplicate braille and speech when 'description' matches 'content' or 'name'. (#12888)
segment.target: Odstránené opakované oznamovanie cez hlasový výstup a brailový riadok, ak sa v režime prehliadania zhoduje názov, obsah a popis prvku. (#12888)

segment.source: In MS Word with UIA enabled, more accurate playing of spelling error sounds as you type. (#12161)
segment.target: V dokumentoch MS Word s použitím UIA sú zvukom presnejšie oznamované pravopisné chyby. (#12161)

segment.source: In Windows 11, NVDA will no longer announce "pane" when pressing Alt+Tab to switch between programs. (#12648)
segment.target: V systéme Windows 11 NVDA viac pri prechádzaní medzi oknami cez alt+tab neoznamuje "pane". (#12648)

segment.source: The new Modern Comments side track pane is now supported in MS Word when not accessing the document via UIA. Press alt+f12 to move between the side track pane and the document. (#12982)
segment.target: Moderné stromové zobrazenie komentárov v dokumentoch MS Word je možné prezerať aj s použitím NVDA v prípade, že je vypnutá podpora UIA. Medzi dokumentom a zobrazením komentárov sa prepínajte skratkou alt+f12. (#12982)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: Building NVDA now requires Visual Studio 2019 16.10.4 or later.
segment.target: Building NVDA now requires Visual Studio 2019 16.10.4 or later.

segment.source: To match the production build environment, update Visual Studio to keep in sync with the [current version AppVeyor is using](https://www.appveyor.com/docs/windows-images-software/#visual-studio-2019). (#12728)
segment.target: To match the production build environment, update Visual Studio to keep in sync with the [current version AppVeyor is using](https://www.appveyor.com/docs/windows-images-software/#visual-studio-2019). (#12728)

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinConsoleUIA.isImprovedTextRangeAvailable` has been deprecated for removal in 2022.1. (#12660)
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.WinConsoleUIA.isImprovedTextRangeAvailable` has been deprecated for removal in 2022.1. (#12660)

segment.source: Instead use `apiLevel` (see the comments at `_UIAConstants.WinConsoleAPILevel` for details).
segment.target: Instead use `apiLevel` (see the comments at `_UIAConstants.WinConsoleAPILevel` for details).

segment.source: Transparency of text background color sourced from GDI applications (via the display model), is now exposed for add-ons or appModules. (#12658)
segment.target: Transparency of text background color sourced from GDI applications (via the display model), is now exposed for add-ons or appModules. (#12658)

segment.source: `LOCALE_SLANGUAGE`, `LOCALE_SLIST` and `LOCALE_SLANGDISPLAYNAME` are moved to the `LOCALE` enum in languageHandler.
segment.target: `LOCALE_SLANGUAGE`, `LOCALE_SLIST` and `LOCALE_SLANGDISPLAYNAME` are moved to the `LOCALE` enum in languageHandler.

segment.source: They are still available at the module level but are deprecated and to be removed in NVDA 2022.1. (#12753)
segment.target: They are still available at the module level but are deprecated and to be removed in NVDA 2022.1. (#12753)

segment.source: The usage of functions `addonHandler.loadState` and `addonHandler.saveState` should be replaced with their equivalents `addonHandler.state.save` and `addonHandler.state.load` before 2022.1. (#12792)
segment.target: The usage of functions `addonHandler.loadState` and `addonHandler.saveState` should be replaced with their equivalents `addonHandler.state.save` and `addonHandler.state.load` before 2022.1. (#12792)

segment.source: Braille output can now be checked in system tests. (#12917)
segment.target: Braille output can now be checked in system tests. (#12917)

segment.source: This release introduces preliminary Windows 11 support.
segment.target: Prednosti tejto verzie zahŕňajú prvotnú podporu pre operačný systém Windows 11.

segment.source: While Windows 11 is yet to be released, this release has been tested on preview versions of Windows 11.
segment.target: NVDA bolo testované s aktuálne dostupnými verziami Windows 11.

segment.source: This includes an important fix for Screen Curtain (see important notes).
segment.target: Táto verzia tiež zahŕňa opravu tienenia obrazovky (pozri dôležité poznámky).

segment.source: The COM Registration Fixing Tool can now resolve more problems when running NVDA.
segment.target: Opravný nástroj COM aktuálne dokáže vyriešiť oveľa viac problémov.

segment.source: There are updates to the synthesizer eSpeak and braille translator LibLouis.
segment.target: Boli tiež aktualizované dáta hlasovej syntézy eSpeak a prekladovej tabuľky LibLouis.

segment.source: There are also various bug fixes and improvements, notably for braille support and Windows terminals, calculator, emoji panel and clipboard history.
segment.target: Vylepšili sme podporu pre kalkulačku, okná terminálov, históriu schránky, panel s emotikonmi a brailové riadky.

segment.source: Important notes
segment.target: Dôležité poznámky

segment.source: Due to a change in the Windows Magnification API, Screen Curtain had to be updated to support the newest versions of Windows.
segment.target: Keďže v najnovších verziách systému Windows došlo k úpravám v API na zväčšovanie, bolo potrebné v NVDA aktualizovať spôsob, akým sa zabezpečuje tienenie obrazovky.

segment.source: Use NVDA 2021.2 to activate Screen Curtain with Windows 10 21H2 (10.0.19044) or later.
segment.target: Použite NVDA od verzie 2021.2 v kombinácii s Windows od verzie 10 21H2 (10.0.19044).

segment.source: This includes Windows 10 Insiders and Windows 11.
segment.target: Toto zahŕňa aj verzie Windows 10 insider a Windows 11.

segment.source: For security purposes, when using a new version of Windows, get visual confirmation that the Screen Curtain makes the screen entirely black.
segment.target: Z bezpečnostných dôvodov odporúčame, aby ste sa pri prvom použití tienenia obrazovky uistili vlastným zrakom, alebo prostredníctvom vidiacej osoby, či je obrazovka skutočne čierna.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nové vlastnosti

segment.source: Experimental support for ARIA annotations:
segment.target: Pridaná experimentálna podpora pre aria revízie:

segment.source: adds a command to read a summary of details of an object with aria-details. (#12364)
segment.target: Pridaná možnosť asociovať klávesovú skratku, ktorá prečíta aria podrobnosti zameraného prvku. (#12364)

segment.source: adds an option in advanced preferences to report if an object has details in browse mode. (#12439)
segment.target: V pokročilých nastaveniach pribudla možnosť zapnúť oznamovanie situácií, keď prvok obsahuje podrobnosti. (#12439)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Version 1909 and later (including Windows 11), NVDA will announce suggestion count when performing searches in File Explorer. (#10341, #12628)
segment.target: V systémoch Windows od verzie 10 1909 (vrátane Windows 11) NVDA oznamuje počet možných návrhov pri vyhľadávaní cez prieskumníka Windows. (#10341, #12628)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, NVDA now announces the result of indent and hanging indent shortcuts when executed. (#6269)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz v aplikácii MS Word oznamuje pridanie zarážky a opakovanej zarážky pri použití príslušnej klávesovej skratky. (#6269)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Zmeny

segment.source: Espeak-ng has been updated to 1.51-dev commit `ab11439b18238b7a08b965d1d5a6ef31cbb05cbb`. (#12449, #12202, #12280, #12568)
segment.target: Rečová syntéza Espeak-ng aktualizovaná na verziu 1.51-dev commit `ab11439b18238b7a08b965d1d5a6ef31cbb05cbb`. (#12449, #12202, #12280, #12568)

segment.source: If article is enabled in the user preferences for document formatting, NVDA announces "article" after the content. (#11103)
segment.target: Ak je v nastaveniach čítania textu aktivované oznamovanie článkov, NVDA oznamuje "článok" až po vyslovení obsahu. (#11103)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to [3.18.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.18.0). (#12526)
segment.target: brailová prekladová tabuľka liblouis aktualizovaná na verziu [3.18.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.18.0). (#12526)

segment.source: New braille tables: Bulgarian grade 1, Burmese grade 1, Burmese grade 2, Kazakh grade 1, Khmer grade 1, Northern Kurdish grade 0, Sepedi grade 1, Sepedi grade 2, Sesotho grade 1, Sesotho grade 2, Setswana grade 1, Setswana grade 2, Tatar grade 1, Vietnamese grade 0, Vietnamese grade 2, Southern Vietnamese grade 1, Xhosa grade 1, Xhosa grade 2, Yakut grade 1, Zulu grade 1, Zulu grade 2
segment.target: Nové tabuľky: Maďarčina plnopis, Barmčina plnopis a skratkopis, Kazachčina plnopis, Khmérčina plnopis, Severná Kurdčina počítačový kód, severná sothčina plnopis a skratkopis, sothčina plnopis a skratkopis, Čwančina plnopis a skratkopis, Tatárčina plnopis, Vietnamčina počítačový kód a skratkopis, Južná Vietnamčina plnopis, xhoština plnopis a skratkopis, Jakutčina plnopis, zuluština plnopis a skratkopis.

segment.source: Windows 10 OCR was renamed to Windows OCR. (#12690)
segment.target: Rozpoznávanie textu Windows 10 bolo premenované na rozpoznávanie textu Windows. (#12690)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Opravy

segment.source: In Windows 10 Calculator, NVDA will announce calculator expressions on a braille display. (#12268)
segment.target: Výrazy z kalkulačky Windows sa teraz zobrazujú aj na brailových riadkoch. (#12268)

segment.source: In terminal programs on Windows 10 version 1607 and later, when inserting or deleting characters in the middle of a line, the characters to the right of the caret are no longer read out. (#3200)
segment.target: pri pridávaní alebo mazaní znakov uprostred riadka v konzolách Windows od verzie Windows 10 1607 NVDA viac nečíta znaky napravo od kurzora. (#3200)

segment.source: Diff Match Patch now enabled by default. (#12485)
segment.target: Odteraz sa predvolene používa algoritmus Diff Match Patch. (#12485)

segment.source: The braille input works properly with the following contracted tables: Arabic grade 2, Spanish grade 2, Urdu grade 2, Chinese (China, Mandarin) grade 2. (#12541)
segment.target: Písanie v skratkopise cez klávesnicu brailových riadkov funguje správne aj s týmito tabuľkami: Arabčina, Španielčina, Urdčina, Čínština (Čínština a Mandarínčina). (#12541)

segment.source: The COM Registration Fixing Tool now resolves more issues, especially on 64 bit Windows. (#12560)
segment.target: Opravný nástroj COM odteraz dokáže vyriešiť omnoho viac problémov, hlavne na 64-bitových verziách systému Windows. (#12560)

segment.source: Improvements to button handling for the Seika Notetaker braille device from Nippon Telesoft. (#12598)
segment.target: Vylepšené spracovanie príkazov zo zariadení Seika od Nippon Telesoft. (#12598)

segment.source: Improvements to announcing the Windows emoji panel and clipboard history. (#11485)
segment.target: Vylepšené oznamovanie v panely emotikonov a histórii schránky Windows. (#11485)

segment.source: Updated the Bengali alphabet character descriptions. (#12502)
segment.target: Aktualizované fonetické hláskovanie v Bengálčine. (#12502)

segment.source: NVDA exits safely when a new process is started. (#12605)
segment.target: Ak je spustený nový proces NVDA, pôvodný sa automaticky správne ukončí. (#12605)

segment.source: Reselecting the Handy Tech braille display driver from the Select Braille Display dialog no longer causes errors. (#12618)
segment.target: Opätovné vybratie ovládača brailového riadka Handy Tech v zozname riadkov viac nespôsobuje chyby. (#12618)

segment.source: Windows version 10.0.22000 or later is recognized as Windows 11, not Windows 10. (#12626)
segment.target: Windows od verzie 10.0.22000 je už rozpoznávaný ako Windows 11. (#12626)

segment.source: Screen curtain support has been fixed and tested for Windows versions up until 10.0.22000. (#12684)
segment.target: Tienenie obrazovky bolo testované a opravené pre Windows 10.0.22000. (#12684)

segment.source: If no results are shown when filtering input gestures, the input gesture configuration dialog continues to work as expected. (#12673)
segment.target: Ak filtrovanie v dialógu klávesové skratky nezobrazí žiadne výsledky, dialóg sa správa štandardne a nespôsobuje problémy. (#12673)

segment.source: Fixed a bug where the first menu item of a submenu is not announced in some contexts. (#12624)
segment.target: Prvá položka podmenu je odteraz vždy správne oznamovaná. (#12624)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: `characterProcessing.SYMLVL_*` constants should be replaced using their equivalent `SymbolLevel.*` before 2022.1. (#11856, #12636)
segment.target: `characterProcessing.SYMLVL_*` constants should be replaced using their equivalent `SymbolLevel.*` before 2022.1. (#11856, #12636)

segment.source: `controlTypes` has been split up into various submodules, symbols marked for deprecation must be replaced before 2022.1. (#12510)
segment.target: `controlTypes` has been split up into various submodules, symbols marked for deprecation must be replaced before 2022.1. (#12510)

segment.source: `ROLE_*` and `STATE_*` constants should be replaced to their equivalent `Role.*` and `State.*`.
segment.target: `ROLE_*` and `STATE_*` constants should be replaced to their equivalent `Role.*` and `State.*`.

segment.source: `roleLabels`, `stateLabels` and `negativeStateLabels` have been deprecated, usages such as `roleLabels[ROLE_*]` should be replaced to their equivalent `Role.*.displayString` or `State.*.negativeDisplayString`.
segment.target: `roleLabels`, `stateLabels` and `negativeStateLabels` have been deprecated, usages such as `roleLabels[ROLE_*]` should be replaced to their equivalent `Role.*.displayString` or `State.*.negativeDisplayString`.

segment.source: `processPositiveStates` and `processNegativeStates` have been deprecated for removal.
segment.target: `processPositiveStates` and `processNegativeStates` have been deprecated for removal.

segment.source: On Windows 10 Version 1511 and later (including Insider Preview builds), the current Windows feature update release name is obtained from Windows Registry. (#12509)
segment.target: On Windows 10 Version 1511 and later (including Insider Preview builds), the current Windows feature update release name is obtained from Windows Registry. (#12509)

segment.source: Deprecated: `winVersion.WIN10_RELEASE_NAME_TO_BUILDS` will be removed in 2022.1, there is no direct replacement. (#12544)
segment.target: Deprecated: `winVersion.WIN10_RELEASE_NAME_TO_BUILDS` will be removed in 2022.1, there is no direct replacement. (#12544)

segment.source: This release includes optional experimental support for UIA in Excel and Chromium browsers.
segment.target: Prednosti tejto verzie zahŕňajú voliteľnú experimentálnu podporu rozhrania UIA v aplikácii MS Excel a prehliadačoch postavených na jadre Chromium.

segment.source: There are fixes for several languages, and for accessing links in Braille.
segment.target: Takisto boli opravené niektoré preklady a pridaná možnosť aktivovať odkazy z brailových riadkov.

segment.source: There are updates to Unicode CLDR, mathematical symbols, and LibLouis.
segment.target: Tiež boli pridané nové matematické symboly, aktualizované tabuľky LibLouis a aktualizovaná databáza Unicode CLDR.

segment.source: As well as many bug fixes and improvements, including in Office, Visual Studio, and several languages.
segment.target: Spomeňme aj vylepšenú podporu pre MS Office a Visual studio.

segment.source: Note:
segment.target: Upozorňujeme:

segment.source: This release breaks compatibility with existing add-ons.
segment.target: Od tejto verzie nie sú podporované doplnky pre staršie verzie NVDA.

segment.source: This release also drops support for Adobe Flash.
segment.target: NVDA viac nepodporuje prvky Adobe Flash.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nové vlastnosti

segment.source: Early support for UIA with Chromium based browsers (such as Edge). (#12025)
segment.target: Prvotná podpora pre rozhranie UIA v prehliadačoch postavených na jadre Chromium (napríklad Edge). (#12025)

segment.source: Optional experimental support for Microsoft Excel via UI Automation. Only recommended for Microsoft Excel build 16.0.13522.10000 or higher. (#12210)
segment.target: Pridaná voliteľná experimentálna podpora pre sprístupnenie aplikácie MS Excel cez UI Automation. Funguje pre Microsoft Excel od zostavy 16.0.13522.10000 (#12210)

segment.source: Easier navigation of output in NVDA Python Console. (#9784)
segment.target: Vylepšená navigácia vo výstupe z Python konzoly NVDA. (#9784)

segment.source: alt+up/down jumps to the previous/next output result (add shift for selecting).
segment.target: alt+šípka hore alebo dole prechádza na predchádzajúci alebo nasledujúci výsledok výstupu. (pre výber použite shift).

segment.source: control+l clears the output pane.
segment.target: ctrl+l vymaže záznam.

segment.source: NVDA now reports the categories assigned to an appointment in Microsoft Outlook, if any. (#11598)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz v aplikácii MS Outlook oznamuje kategórie priradené k udalostiam, ak sú zadané. (#11598)

segment.source: Support for the Seika Notetaker braille display from Nippon Telesoft. (#11514)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre zápisník a brailový riadok Seika od spoločnosti Nippon Telesoft. (#11514)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: zmeny

segment.source: In browse mode, controls can now be activated with braille cursor routing on their descriptor (ie. "lnk" for a link). This is especially useful for activating eg. check-boxes with no labels. (#7447)
segment.target: V režime prehliadania je teraz možné z brailového riadka aktivovať prvky aj v prípade, že sa kurzor nachádza nie na názve, ale na type prvku (napríklad kurzor stojí na skratke odk pre odkaz). Toto je užitočné napríklad vtedy, ak chcete takto začiarknuť políčko, ktoré nemá popis. (#7447)

segment.source: NVDA now prevents the user from performing Windows 10 OCR if screen curtain is enabled. (#11911)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz upozorní, že nie je možné opticky rozpoznať text na obrazovke, ak je aktivované tienenie obrazovky. (#11911)

segment.source: Updated Unicode Common Locale Data Repository (CLDR) to 39.0. (#11943, #12314)
segment.target: Aktualizovaná databáza Unicode konzorcia (CLDR) na verziu 39.0. (#11943, #12314)

segment.source: Added more mathematical symbols to the symbols dictionary. (#11467)
segment.target: Pridané nové matematické symboly. (#11467)

segment.source: The user guide, changes file, and key commands listing now have a refreshed appearance. (#12027)
segment.target: Dokumentácia, zoznam skratiek a zoznam zmien majú vynovený vzhľad. (#12027)

segment.source: "Unsupported" now reported when attempting to toggle screen layout in applications that do not support it, such as Microsoft Word. (#7297)
segment.target: Ak nie je možné prepínať zachovanie vzhľadu ako na obrazovke, NVDA na túto skutočnosť upozorní. (#7297)

segment.source: 'Attempt to cancel speech for expired focus events' option in the advanced settings panel now enabled by default. (#10885)
segment.target: Pokročilá Funkcia prerušiť reč po vypršaní zameranej udalosti je odteraz predvolene zapnutá. (#10885)

segment.source: This behaviour can be disabled by setting this option to "No".
segment.target: Stále je možné v pokročilých nastaveniach NVDA túto možnosť vypnúť.

segment.source: Web applications (E.G. Gmail) no longer speak outdated information when moving focus rapidly.
segment.target: Webové aplikácie (napríklad Gmail) takto už viac neoznamujú staré nepresné informácie pri rýchlej práci.

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to [3.17.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.17.0). (#12137)
segment.target: brailová tabuľka liblouis aktualizovaná na verziu [3.17.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.17.0). (#12137)

segment.source: New braille tables: Belarusian literary braille, Belarusian computer braille, Urdu grade 1, Urdu grade 2.
segment.target: Nové brailové prekladové tabuľky: Bieloruský počítačový 8 bodový brail, Bieloruština plnopis, Urdčina plnopis a Urdčina skratkopis.

segment.source: Support for Adobe Flash content has been removed from NVDA due to the use of Flash being actively discouraged by Adobe. (#11131)
segment.target: Keďže spoločnosť Adobe viac nepokračuje vo vývoji Adobe Flash, NVDA takisto viac nepodporuje tieto prvky. (#11131)

segment.source: NVDA will exit even with windows still open, the exit process now closes all NVDA windows and dialogs. (#1740)
segment.target: Ak sa pokúsite ukončiť NVDA a súčasne sú stále otvorené nejaké dialógi NVDA, tieto sa automaticky zatvoria a NVDA sa ukončí. (#1740)

segment.source: The Speech Viewer can now be closed with `alt+F4` and has a standard close button for easier interaction with users of pointing devices. (#12330)
segment.target: Zobrazovač reči je odteraz možné ukončiť klávesovou skratkou `alt+F4` a tiež je možné myšou aktivovať tlačidlo zatvoriť. (#12330)

segment.source: The Braille Viewer now has a standard close button for easier interaction with users of pointing devices. (#12328)
segment.target: Zobrazovač braillu je možné ukončiť myšou aktivovaním tlačidla zatvoriť. (#12328)

segment.source: In the Elements List dialog, the accelerator key on the "Activate" button has been removed in some locales to avoid collision with an element type radio button label. When available, the button is still the default of the dialog and as such can still be invoked by simply pressing enter from the elements list itself. (#6167)
segment.target: Zo zoznamu prvkov bola odstránená klávesová skratka na aktivovanie tlačidla Aktivovať, keďže v niektorých jazykoch skratka kolidovala s prepínačom prvkov. Tlačidlo Aktivovať je stále predvoleným tlačidlom, preto je ho možné aktivovať stlačením klávesu enter kdekoľvek v zozname prvkov. (#6167)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: opravy

segment.source: The list of messages in Outlook 2010 is once again readable. (#12241)
segment.target: Opäť je možné čítať zoznam správ v aplikácii MS Outlook 2010. (#12241)

segment.source: In terminal programs on Windows 10 version 1607 and later, when inserting or deleting characters in the middle of a line, the characters to the right of the caret are no longer read out. (#3200)
segment.target: Pri práci v terminálových oknách v systéme Windows 10 od verzie 1607, NVDA viac po vložení alebo zmazaní znakov uprostred riadka nečíta znaky za systémovým kurzorom. (#3200)

segment.source: This experimental fix must be manually enabled in NVDA's advanced settings panel by changing the diff algorithm to Diff Match Patch.
segment.target: Túto opravu je potrebné ručne aktivovať v pokročilých nastaveniach NVDA, nastavením Algoritmu počítania rozdielov na Diff Match Patch.

segment.source: In MS Outlook, inappropriate distance reporting when shift+tabbing from the message body to the subject field should not occur anymore. (#10254)
segment.target: NVDA viac v aplikácii MS Outlook neoznamuje vzdialenosť, ak prejdete skratkou shift+tab z tela správy na predmet. (#10254)

segment.source: In the Python Console, inserting a tab for indentation at the beginning of a non-empty input line and performing tab-completion in the middle of an input line are now supported. (#11532)
segment.target: V python konzole pridaná možnosť vložiť odsadenie na riadku, ktorý nie je prázdny. (#11532)

segment.source: Formatting information and other browseable messages no longer present unexpected blank lines when screen layout is turned off. (#12004)
segment.target: Ak je vypnutá možnosť zachovať vzhľad ako na obrazovke a zobrazíte si v režime prehliadania napríklad informácie o formátovaní, NVDA viac nezobrazuje zbytočné prázdne riadky. (#12004)

segment.source: It is now possible to read comments in MS Word with UIA enabled. (#9285)
segment.target: Odteraz je možné v aplikácii MS Word čítať komentáre, ak je povolený prístup cez UIA. (#9285)

segment.source: Performance when interacting with Visual Studio has been improved. (#12171)
segment.target: Zrýchlená odozva v aplikácii Visual Studio. (#12171)

segment.source: Fix graphical bugs such as missing elements when using NVDA with a right-to-left layout. (#8859)
segment.target: Opravené nesprávne zobrazenie grafických prvkov NVDA pri rozložení zprava doľava. (#8859)

segment.source: Respect the GUI layout direction based on the NVDA language, not the system locale. (#638)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz rešpektuje rozloženie nastavené podľa systému a nie podľa jazyka NVDA. (#638)

segment.source: known issue for right-to-left languages: the right border of groupings clips with labels/controls. (#12181)
segment.target: Stále je známi problém, že pri zobrazení zprava doľava sa pravá hranica skupín prvkov spája s popismi alebo prvkami. (#12181)

segment.source: The python locale is set to match the language selected in preferences consistently, and will occur when using the default language. (#12214)
segment.target: Lokalizácia Python je nastavená na rovnakú hodnotu ako jazyk NVDA a použije sa v prípadoch, keď sa vyžaduje informácia o predvolenom jazyku. (#12214)

segment.source: TextInfo.getTextInChunks no longer freezes when called on Rich Edit controls such as the NVDA log viewer. (#11613)
segment.target: TextInfo.getTextInChunks viac nezamrzne pri vyvolaný v editačných poliach, napríklad v zobrazovači logu. (#11613)

segment.source: It is once again possible to use NVDA in languages containing underscores in the locale name such as de_CH on Windows 10 1803 and 1809. (#12250)
segment.target: Opäť je možné používať NVDA v jazykoch, ktoré majú v názve podčiarkovník ako napríklad de_CH v systémoch Windows 10 1803 a 1809. (#12250)

segment.source: In WordPad, configuration of superscript/subscript reporting works as expected. (#12262)
segment.target: V aplikácii Wordpad správne funguje oznamovanie indexov. (#12262)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to announce the newly focused content on a web page if the old focus disappears and is replaced by the new focus in the same position. (#12147)
segment.target: NVDA správne oznamuje obsah vo webových dokumentoch, ak sa stratí zameranie a je nahradené novým fokusom na tom istom mieste. (#12147)

segment.source: Strikethrough, superscript and subscript formatting for entire Excel cells are now reported if the corresponding option is enabled. (#12264)
segment.target: Prečiarknutie, horný a dolný index pre celé bunky v aplikácii MS excel sú správne oznamované, ak je táto možnosť zapnutá. (#12264)

segment.source: Fixed copying config during installation from a portable copy when default destination config directory is empty. (#12071, #12205)
segment.target: Opravené kopírovanie priečinka s používateľskými nastaveniami NVDA pri inštalácii z prenosnej verzie, ak je cieľový priečinok prázdny. (#12071, #12205)

segment.source: Fixed incorrect announcement of some letters with accents or diacritic when 'Say cap before capitals' option is checked. (#11948)
segment.target: Opravené nesprávne oznamovanie veľkých písmen s prízvukom alebo diakritikou pri zapnutom slovnom oznamovaní veľkých písmen. (#11948)

segment.source: Fixed the pitch change failure in SAPI4 speech synthesizer. (#12311)
segment.target: Opravené oznamovanie veľkých písmen zmenou výšky hlasu pri syntézach reči používajúcich rozhranie Sapi4. (#12311)

segment.source: The NVDA installer now also honors the `--minimal` command line parameter and does not play the start-up sound, following the same documented behavior as an installed or portable copy NVDA executable. (#12289)
segment.target: Inštalátor NVDA rešpektuje parameter príkazového riadka `--minimal`, takže neprehráva úvodný zvuk, rovnako ako prenosná alebo inštalovaná kópia NVDA. (#12289)

segment.source: In MS Word or Outlook, the table quick navigation key can now jump to layout table if "Include layout tables" option is enabled in Browse mode settings. (#11899)
segment.target: V aplikáciách MS Word alebo Outlook funguje rýchla navigácia po tabuľkách formujúcich vzhľad, ak je zapnutá možnosť Zahrnúť tabuľky formujúce vzhľad v nastaveniach režimu prehliadania. (#11899)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer announce "↑↑↑" for emojis in particular languages. (#11963)
segment.target: NVDA viac pri emotikonoch v niektorých jazykoch neoznamuje "↑↑↑". (#11963)

segment.source: Espeak now supports Cantonese and Mandarin again. (#10418)
segment.target: Espeak opäť podporuje Kantonský a Mandarínsky jazyk. (#10418)

segment.source: In the new Chromium based Microsoft Edge, text fields such as the address bar are now announced when empty. (#12474)
segment.target: V aplikácii MS Edge postavenej na jadre Chromium NVDA oznamuje textové prvky, napríklad adresný riadok, ak sú prázdne. (#12474)

segment.source: Fix Seika Braille driver. (#10787)
segment.target: Opravený ovládač pre brailový riadok Seika. (#10787)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: Note: this is an Add-on API compatibility breaking release. Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.
segment.target: Note: this is an Add-on API compatibility breaking release. Add-ons will need to be re-tested and have their manifest updated.

segment.source: NVDA's build system now fetches all Python dependencies with pip and stores them in a Python virtual environment. This is all done transparently.
segment.target: NVDA's build system now fetches all Python dependencies with pip and stores them in a Python virtual environment. This is all done transparently.

segment.source: To build NVDA, SCons should continue to be used in the usual way. E.g. executing scons.bat in the root of the repository. Running `py -m SCons` is no longer supported, and `scons.py` has also been removed.
segment.target: To build NVDA, SCons should continue to be used in the usual way. E.g. executing scons.bat in the root of the repository. Running `py -m SCons` is no longer supported, and `scons.py` has also been removed.

segment.source: To run NVDA from source, rather than executing `source/nvda.pyw` directly, the developer should now use `runnvda.bat` in the root of the repository. If you do try to execute `source/nvda.pyw`, a message box will alert you this is no longer supported.
segment.target: To run NVDA from source, rather than executing `source/nvda.pyw` directly, the developer should now use `runnvda.bat` in the root of the repository. If you do try to execute `source/nvda.pyw`, a message box will alert you this is no longer supported.

segment.source: To perform unit tests, execute `rununittests.bat [<extra unittest discover options>]`
segment.target: To perform unit tests, execute `rununittests.bat [<extra unittest discover options>]`

segment.source: To perform system tests: execute `runsystemtests.bat [<extra robot options>]`
segment.target: To perform system tests: execute `runsystemtests.bat [<extra robot options>]`

segment.source: To perform linting, execute `runlint.bat <base branch>`
segment.target: To perform linting, execute `runlint.bat <base branch>`

segment.source: Please refer to readme.md for more details.
segment.target: Please refer to readme.md for more details.

segment.source: The following Python dependencies have also been upgraded:
segment.target: The following Python dependencies have also been upgraded:

segment.source: comtypes updated to 1.1.8.
segment.target: comtypes updated to 1.1.8.

segment.source: pySerial updated to 3.5.
segment.target: pySerial updated to 3.5.

segment.source: wxPython updated to 4.1.1.
segment.target: wxPython updated to 4.1.1.

segment.source: Py2exe updated to 0.10.1.0.
segment.target: Py2exe updated to 0.10.1.0.

segment.source: `LiveText._getTextLines` has been removed. (#11639)
segment.target: `LiveText._getTextLines` has been removed. (#11639)

segment.source: Instead, override `_getText` which returns a string of all text in the object.
segment.target: Instead, override `_getText` which returns a string of all text in the object.

segment.source: `LiveText` objects can now calculate diffs by character. (#11639)
segment.target: `LiveText` objects can now calculate diffs by character. (#11639)

segment.source: To alter the diff behaviour for some object, override the `diffAlgo` property (see the docstring for details).
segment.target: To alter the diff behaviour for some object, override the `diffAlgo` property (see the docstring for details).

segment.source: When defining a script with the script decorator, the 'allowInSleepMode' boolean argument can be specified to control if a script is available in sleep mode or not. (#11979)
segment.target: When defining a script with the script decorator, the 'allowInSleepMode' boolean argument can be specified to control if a script is available in sleep mode or not. (#11979)

segment.source: The following functions are removed from the config module. (#11935)
segment.target: The following functions are removed from the config module. (#11935)

segment.source: canStartOnSecureScreens - use config.isInstalledCopy instead.
segment.target: canStartOnSecureScreens - use config.isInstalledCopy instead.

segment.source: hasUiAccess and execElevated - use them from the systemUtils module.
segment.target: hasUiAccess and execElevated - use them from the systemUtils module.

segment.source: getConfigDirs - use globalVars.appArgs.configPath instead.
segment.target: getConfigDirs - use globalVars.appArgs.configPath instead.

segment.source: Module level REASON_* constants are removed from controlTypes - please use controlTypes.OutputReason instead. (#11969)
segment.target: Module level REASON_* constants are removed from controlTypes - please use controlTypes.OutputReason instead. (#11969)

segment.source: REASON_QUICKNAV has been removed from browseMode - use controlTypes.OutputReason.QUICKNAV instead. (#11969)
segment.target: REASON_QUICKNAV has been removed from browseMode - use controlTypes.OutputReason.QUICKNAV instead. (#11969)

segment.source: `NVDAObject` (and derivatives) property `isCurrent` now strictly returns Enum class `controlTypes.IsCurrent`. (#11782)
segment.target: `NVDAObject` (and derivatives) property `isCurrent` now strictly returns Enum class `controlTypes.IsCurrent`. (#11782)

segment.source: `isCurrent` is no longer Optional, and thus will not return None.
segment.target: `isCurrent` is no longer Optional, and thus will not return None.

segment.source: When an object is not current `controlTypes.IsCurrent.NO` is returned.
segment.target: When an object is not current `controlTypes.IsCurrent.NO` is returned.

segment.source: The `controlTypes.isCurrentLabels` mapping has been removed. (#11782)
segment.target: The `controlTypes.isCurrentLabels` mapping has been removed. (#11782)

segment.source: Instead use the `displayString` property on a `controlTypes.IsCurrent` enum value.
segment.target: Instead use the `displayString` property on a `controlTypes.IsCurrent` enum value.

segment.source: For example: `controlTypes.IsCurrent.YES.displayString`.
segment.target: For example: `controlTypes.IsCurrent.YES.displayString`.

segment.source: `winKernel.GetTimeFormat` has been removed - use `winKernel.GetTimeFormatEx` instead. (#12139)
segment.target: `winKernel.GetTimeFormat` has been removed - use `winKernel.GetTimeFormatEx` instead. (#12139)

segment.source: `winKernel.GetDateFormat` has been removed - use `winKernel.GetDateFormatEx` instead. (#12139)
segment.target: `winKernel.GetDateFormat` has been removed - use `winKernel.GetDateFormatEx` instead. (#12139)

segment.source: `gui.DriverSettingsMixin` has been removed - use `gui.AutoSettingsMixin`. (#12144)
segment.target: `gui.DriverSettingsMixin` has been removed - use `gui.AutoSettingsMixin`. (#12144)

segment.source: `speech.getSpeechForSpelling` has been removed - use `speech.getSpellingSpeech`. (#12145)
segment.target: `speech.getSpeechForSpelling` has been removed - use `speech.getSpellingSpeech`. (#12145)

segment.source: Commands cannot be directly imported from speech as `import speech; speech.ExampleCommand()` or `import speech.manager; speech.manager.ExampleCommand()` - use `from speech.commands import ExampleCommand` instead. (#12126)
segment.target: Commands cannot be directly imported from speech as `import speech; speech.ExampleCommand()` or `import speech.manager; speech.manager.ExampleCommand()` - use `from speech.commands import ExampleCommand` instead. (#12126)
