segment.source: `speakTextInfo` will no longer send speech through `speakWithoutPauses` if reason is `SAYALL`, as `SayAllHandler` does this manually now. (#12150)
segment.target: `speakTextInfo` will no longer send speech through `speakWithoutPauses` if reason is `SAYALL`, as `SayAllHandler` does this manually now. (#12150)

segment.source: The `synthDriverHandler` module is no longer star imported into `globalCommands` and `gui.settingsDialogs` - use `from synthDriverHandler import synthFunctionExample` instead. (#12172)
segment.target: The `synthDriverHandler` module is no longer star imported into `globalCommands` and `gui.settingsDialogs` - use `from synthDriverHandler import synthFunctionExample` instead. (#12172)

segment.source: `ROLE_EQUATION` has been removed from controlTypes - use `ROLE_MATH` instead. (#12164)
segment.target: `ROLE_EQUATION` has been removed from controlTypes - use `ROLE_MATH` instead. (#12164)

segment.source: `autoSettingsUtils.driverSetting` classes are removed from `driverHandler` - please use them from `autoSettingsUtils.driverSetting`. (#12168)
segment.target: `autoSettingsUtils.driverSetting` classes are removed from `driverHandler` - please use them from `autoSettingsUtils.driverSetting`. (#12168)

segment.source: `autoSettingsUtils.utils` classes are removed from `driverHandler` - please use them from `autoSettingsUtils.utils`. (#12168)
segment.target: `autoSettingsUtils.utils` classes are removed from `driverHandler` - please use them from `autoSettingsUtils.utils`. (#12168)

segment.source: Support of `TextInfo`s that do not inherit from `contentRecog.BaseContentRecogTextInfo` is removed. (#12157)
segment.target: Support of `TextInfo`s that do not inherit from `contentRecog.BaseContentRecogTextInfo` is removed. (#12157)

segment.source: `speech.speakWithoutPauses` has been removed - please use `speech.speechWithoutPauses.SpeechWithoutPauses(speakFunc=speech.speak).speakWithoutPauses` instead. (#12195, #12251)
segment.target: `speech.speakWithoutPauses` has been removed - please use `speech.speechWithoutPauses.SpeechWithoutPauses(speakFunc=speech.speak).speakWithoutPauses` instead. (#12195, #12251)

segment.source: `speech.re_last_pause` has been removed - please use `speech.speechWithoutPauses.SpeechWithoutPauses.re_last_pause` instead. (#12195, #12251)
segment.target: `speech.re_last_pause` has been removed - please use `speech.speechWithoutPauses.SpeechWithoutPauses.re_last_pause` instead. (#12195, #12251)

segment.source: `WelcomeDialog`, `LauncherDialog` and `AskAllowUsageStatsDialog` are moved to the `gui.startupDialogs`. (#12105)
segment.target: `WelcomeDialog`, `LauncherDialog` and `AskAllowUsageStatsDialog` are moved to the `gui.startupDialogs`. (#12105)

segment.source: `getDocFilePath` has been moved from `gui` to the `documentationUtils` module. (#12105)
segment.target: `getDocFilePath` has been moved from `gui` to the `documentationUtils` module. (#12105)

segment.source: The gui.accPropServer module as well as the AccPropertyOverride and ListCtrlAccPropServer classes from the gui.nvdaControls module have been removed in favor of WX native support for overriding accessibility properties. When enhancing accessibility of WX controls, implement wx.Accessible instead. (#12215)
segment.target: The gui.accPropServer module as well as the AccPropertyOverride and ListCtrlAccPropServer classes from the gui.nvdaControls module have been removed in favor of WX native support for overriding accessibility properties. When enhancing accessibility of WX controls, implement wx.Accessible instead. (#12215)

segment.source: Files in `source/comInterfaces/` are now more easily consumable by developer tools such as IDEs. (#12201)
segment.target: Files in `source/comInterfaces/` are now more easily consumable by developer tools such as IDEs. (#12201)

segment.source: Convenience methods and types have been added to the winVersion module for getting and comparing Windows versions. (#11909)
segment.target: Convenience methods and types have been added to the winVersion module for getting and comparing Windows versions. (#11909)

segment.source: isWin10 function found in winVersion module has been removed.
segment.target: isWin10 function found in winVersion module has been removed.

segment.source: class winVersion.WinVersion is a comparable and order-able type encapsulating Windows version information.
segment.target: class winVersion.WinVersion is a comparable and order-able type encapsulating Windows version information.

segment.source: Function winVersion.getWinVer has been added to get a winVersion.WinVersion representing the currently running OS.
segment.target: Function winVersion.getWinVer has been added to get a winVersion.WinVersion representing the currently running OS.

segment.source: Convenience constants have been added for known Windows releases, see winVersion.WIN* constants.
segment.target: Convenience constants have been added for known Windows releases, see winVersion.WIN* constants.

segment.source: IAccessibleHandler no longer star imports everything from IAccessible and IA2 COM interfaces - please use them directly. (#12232)
segment.target: IAccessibleHandler no longer star imports everything from IAccessible and IA2 COM interfaces - please use them directly. (#12232)

segment.source: TextInfo objects now have start and end properties which can be compared mathematically with operators such as < <= == != >= >. (#11613)
segment.target: TextInfo objects now have start and end properties which can be compared mathematically with operators such as < <= == != >= >. (#11613)

segment.source: E.g. ti1.start <= ti2.end
segment.target: E.g. ti1.start <= ti2.end

segment.source: This usage is now prefered instead of ti1.compareEndPoints(ti2,"startToEnd") <= 0
segment.target: This usage is now prefered instead of ti1.compareEndPoints(ti2,"startToEnd") <= 0

segment.source: TextInfo start and end properties can also be set to each other. (#11613)
segment.target: TextInfo start and end properties can also be set to each other. (#11613)

segment.source: E.g. ti1.start = ti2.end
segment.target: E.g. ti1.start = ti2.end

segment.source: This usage is prefered instead of ti1.SetEndPoint(ti2,"startToEnd")
segment.target: This usage is prefered instead of ti1.SetEndPoint(ti2,"startToEnd")

segment.source: `wx.CENTRE_ON_SCREEN` and `wx.CENTER_ON_SCREEN` are removed, use `self.CentreOnScreen()` instead. (#12309)
segment.target: `wx.CENTRE_ON_SCREEN` and `wx.CENTER_ON_SCREEN` are removed, use `self.CentreOnScreen()` instead. (#12309)

segment.source: `easeOfAccess.isSupported` has been removed, NVDA only supports versions of Windows where this evaluates to `True`. (#12222)
segment.target: `easeOfAccess.isSupported` has been removed, NVDA only supports versions of Windows where this evaluates to `True`. (#12222)

segment.source: `sayAllHandler` has been moved to `speech.sayAll`. (#12251)
segment.target: `sayAllHandler` has been moved to `speech.sayAll`. (#12251)

segment.source: `speech.sayAll.SayAllHandler` exposes the functions `stop`, `isRunning`, `readObjects`, `readText`, `lastSayAllMode`.
segment.target: `speech.sayAll.SayAllHandler` exposes the functions `stop`, `isRunning`, `readObjects`, `readText`, `lastSayAllMode`.

segment.source: `SayAllHandler.stop` also resets the `SayAllHandler` `SpeechWithoutPauses` instance.
segment.target: `SayAllHandler.stop` also resets the `SayAllHandler` `SpeechWithoutPauses` instance.

segment.source: `CURSOR_REVIEW` and `CURSOR_CARET` has been replaced with `CURSOR.REVIEW` and `CURSOR.CARET`.
segment.target: `CURSOR_REVIEW` and `CURSOR_CARET` has been replaced with `CURSOR.REVIEW` and `CURSOR.CARET`.

segment.source: `speech.SpeechWithoutPauses` has been moved to `speech.speechWithoutPauses.SpeechWithoutPauses`. (#12251)
segment.target: `speech.SpeechWithoutPauses` has been moved to `speech.speechWithoutPauses.SpeechWithoutPauses`. (#12251)

segment.source: `speech.curWordChars` has been renamed `speech._curWordChars`. (#12395)
segment.target: `speech.curWordChars` has been renamed `speech._curWordChars`. (#12395)

segment.source: the following have been removed from `speech` and can be accessed through `speech.getState()`. These are readonly values now. (#12395)
segment.target: the following have been removed from `speech` and can be accessed through `speech.getState()`. These are readonly values now. (#12395)

segment.source: speechMode
segment.target: speechMode

segment.source: speechMode_beeps_ms
segment.target: speechMode_beeps_ms

segment.source: beenCanceled
segment.target: beenCanceled

segment.source: isPaused
segment.target: isPaused

segment.source: to update `speech.speechMode` use `speech.setSpeechMode`. (#12395)
segment.target: to update `speech.speechMode` use `speech.setSpeechMode`. (#12395)

segment.source: the following have been moved to `speech.SpeechMode`. (#12395)
segment.target: the following have been moved to `speech.SpeechMode`. (#12395)

segment.source: `speech.speechMode_off` becomes `speech.SpeechMode.off`
segment.target: `speech.speechMode_off` becomes `speech.SpeechMode.off`

segment.source: `speech.speechMode_beeps` becomes `speech.SpeechMode.beeps`
segment.target: `speech.speechMode_beeps` becomes `speech.SpeechMode.beeps`

segment.source: `speech.speechMode_talk` becomes `speech.SpeechMode.talk`
segment.target: `speech.speechMode_talk` becomes `speech.SpeechMode.talk`

segment.source: `IAccessibleHandler.IAccessibleObjectIdentifierType` is now `IAccessibleHandler.types.IAccessibleObjectIdentifierType`. (#12367)
segment.target: `IAccessibleHandler.IAccessibleObjectIdentifierType` is now `IAccessibleHandler.types.IAccessibleObjectIdentifierType`. (#12367)

segment.source: The following in `NVDAObjects.UIA.WinConsoleUIA` have been changed (#12094)
segment.target: The following in `NVDAObjects.UIA.WinConsoleUIA` have been changed (#12094)

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.is21H1Plus` renamed `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.isImprovedTextRangeAvailable`.
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.is21H1Plus` renamed `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.isImprovedTextRangeAvailable`.

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.consoleUIATextInfo` renamed to start class name with upper case.
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.consoleUIATextInfo` renamed to start class name with upper case.

segment.source: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.consoleUIATextInfoPre21H1` renamed `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.ConsoleUIATextInfoWorkaroundEndInclusive`
segment.target: `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.consoleUIATextInfoPre21H1` renamed `NVDAObjects.UIA.winConsoleUIA.ConsoleUIATextInfoWorkaroundEndInclusive`

segment.source: The implementation works around both end points being inclusive (in text ranges) before [microsoft/terminal PR 4018](https://github.com/microsoft/terminal/pull/4018)
segment.target: The implementation works around both end points being inclusive (in text ranges) before [microsoft/terminal PR 4018](https://github.com/microsoft/terminal/pull/4018)

segment.source: Workarounds for `expand`, `collapse`, `compareEndPoints`, `setEndPoint`, etc
segment.target: Workarounds for `expand`, `collapse`, `compareEndPoints`, `setEndPoint`, etc

segment.source: This release includes new Chinese Input methods, an update to Liblouis and the elements list (NVDA+f7) now works in focus mode.
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre nové Čínske metódy vstupu, aktualizovanú prekladovú tabuľku Liblouis a pridanú možnosť aktivovať zoznam prvkov (NVDA+F7) v režime fokusu.

segment.source: Context sensitive help is now available when pressing F1 in NVDA dialogs.
segment.target: V dialógoch NVDA je možné získať pomoc k funkciám po stlačení skratky F1.

segment.source: Improvements to symbol pronunciation rules, speech dictionary, Braille message and skim reading.
segment.target: Vylepšené čítanie symbolov, úpravy v slovníkoch reči, zobrazovanie správ na brailovom riadku a rýchla navigácia počas plynulého čítania.

segment.source: Bug fixes and improvements to Mail, Outlook, Teams, Visual Studio, Azure Data Studio, Foobar2000.
segment.target: Vylepšená podpora pre Poštu, Outlook, Teams, Visual Studio, Azure Data Studio, Foobar2000.

segment.source: On the web, there are improvements to Google Docs, and greater support for ARIA.
segment.target: Vylepšenia pre Google dokumenty a podporu ARIA.

segment.source: Plus many other important bug fixes and improvements.
segment.target: A mnohé ďalšie opravy a vylepšenia.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nové vlastnosti

segment.source: Pressing F1 inside NVDA dialogs will now open the help file to most relevant section. (#7757)
segment.target: V dialógoch NVDA je odteraz možné Skratkou F1 otvoriť pomocníka, pričom kurzor bude nastavený do príslušnej sekcie. (#7757)

segment.source: Support for auto complete suggestions (IntelliSense) in Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio plus Visual Studio 2017 and higher. (#7504)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre automatické dokončovanie (známe aj ako (IntelliSense) v aplikáciách Microsoft SQL Server Management Studio plus Visual Studio od verzie 2017 (#7504)

segment.source: Symbol pronunciation: Support for grouping in a complex symbol definition and support group references in a replacement rule making them simpler and more powerful. (#11107)
segment.target: Pri tvorbe symbolov je teraz možné definovať komplexné symboli s využívaním pamäte (napríklad \\1 \\2) (#11107)

segment.source: Users are now notified when attempting to create Speech Dictionary entries with invalid regular expression substitutions. (#11407)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz upozorní, ak sa pokúsite uložiť v rečovom slovníku zadanie, ktoré obsahuje chybu. (#11407)

segment.source: Specifically grouping errors are now detected.
segment.target: Konkrétne je teraz oznamované aj hlásenie chýb súvisiacich s pamäťou.

segment.source: Added support for the new chinese Traditional Quick and Pinyin Input methods in Windows 10. (#11562)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre Čínske metódy vstupu Pinyin a Quick dostupné v systéme Windows 10. (#11562)

segment.source: Tab headers are now considered form fields with quick navigation f key. (#10432)
segment.target: Záložky sú odteraz považované za prvky formulára a preto je možné presunúť sa na ne aj pomocou rýchlej navigácie skratkou F. (#10432)

segment.source: Added a command to toggle reporting of marked (highlighted) text; There is no default associated gesture. (#11807)
segment.target: Odteraz je možné definovať skratku na zapnutie a vypnutie oznamovania označeného textu. Predvolene nie je definovaná žiadna skratka. (#11807)

segment.source: Added the --copy-portable-config command line parameter that allows you to automatically copy the provided configuration to the user account when silently installing NVDA. (#9676)
segment.target: Pri inštalácii NVDA je možné z príkazového riadka parametrom --copy-portable-config určiť cestu prenosnej verzie, z ktorej sa nastavenia presunú do inštalovanej verzie NVDA. (#9676)

segment.source: Braille routing is now supported with the Braille Viewer for mouse users, hover to route to a braille cell. (#11804)
segment.target: V zobrazovači Braillu je možné testovať aj funkciu presunúť na znak. Na znak je potrebné presunúť kurzor myši. (#11804)

segment.source: NVDA will now automatically detect the Humanware Brailliant BI 40X and 20X devices via both USB and Bluetooth. (#11819)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre riadky Humanware Brailliant BI 40X a 20X pripojené cez USB a Bluetooth. (#11819)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Zmeny

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to version 3.16.1:
segment.target: Prekladová tabuľka liblouis aktualizovaná na verziu 3.16.1:

segment.source: Addresses multiple crashes
segment.target: Opravené viaceré pády

segment.source: Adds Bashkir grade 1 Braille table
segment.target: Pridaná prekladová tabuľka baškirčina plnopis

segment.source: Adds Coptic 8 dot computer braille table
segment.target: Pridaný Koptský počítačový 8 bodový brail

segment.source: Adds Russian literary braille and Russian literary braille (detailed) tables
segment.target: Aktualizované tabuľky pre Ruský plnopis

segment.source: Adds Added Afrikaans grade 2 braille table
segment.target: Pridaná tabuľka Afrikánčina skratkopis

segment.source: Removes the Russian grade 1 Braille table
segment.target: Odstránená pôvodná tabuľka Ruština plnopis

segment.source: When reading with say all in browse mode, the find next and find previous commands do not stop reading anymore if Allow skim reading option is enabled; say all rather resumes from after the next or previous found term. (#11563)
segment.target: Ak je v režime prehliadania aktivované plynulé čítanie, funkcie na vyhľadanie predchádzajúceho a nasledujúceho výskytu hľadaného reťazca neprerušia plynulé čítanie. (#11563)

segment.source: For HIMS braille displays F3 has been remapped to Space + dots 148. (#11710)
segment.target: Na brailových riadkoch Hims bola zmenená kombinácia bodov pre simuláciu klávesu f3, nová kombinácia je medzera plus body 148. (#11710)

segment.source: Improvements to the UX of the "braille message timeout" and "Show messages indefinitely" options. (#11602)
segment.target: Upravené nastavenie pre zobrazovanie správ na brailovom riadku. (#11602)

segment.source: In web browsers and other applications that support browse mode, the Elements List dialog (NVDA+F7) can now be invoked when in focus mode. (#10453)
segment.target: Vo webových prehliadačoch a aplikáciách, v ktorých je možné použiť režim prehliadania funguje skratka NVDA+F7 na vyvolanie zoznamu prvkov aj vtedy, ak je aktivovaný režim fokusu. (#10453)

segment.source: Updates to ARIA live regions are now suppressed when reporting of dynamic content changes is disabled. (#9077)
segment.target: Ak je vypnuté oznamovanie dynamicky meneného obsahu, NVDA neoznamuje ani zmeny odosielané cez ARIA live regions. (#9077)

segment.source: NVDA will now report "Copied to clipboard" before the copied text. (#6757)
segment.target: NVDA pred textom skopírovaným do schránky oznámi aj správu skopírované do schránky. (#6757)

segment.source: Presentation of graphical view table in disk management has been improved. (#10048)
segment.target: Vylepšená práca v grafickom zobrazení v správe diskov. (#10048)

segment.source: Labels for controls are now disabled (greyed out) when the control is disabled. (#11809)
segment.target: V dialógoch NVDA sú sivou farbou označené a naozaj aj vypnuté prvky, ktoré sú nedostupné. (#11809)

segment.source: Updated CLDR emoji annotation to version 38. (#11817)
segment.target: Tabuľka CLDR emoji aktualizovaná na verziu 38. (#11817)

segment.source: The inbuilt "Focus Highlight" feature has been renamed "Vision Highlight". (#11700)
segment.target: Zvýraznenie fokusu bolo premenované na zvýraznenie na obrazovke. (#11700)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Opravy

segment.source: NVDA once again works correctly with edit fields when using the Fast Log Entry application. (#8996)
segment.target: NVDA opäť správne pracuje v editačných poliach aplikácie Fast Log Entry. (#8996)

segment.source: Report elapsed time in Foobar2000 if no total time is available (e.g. when playing a live stream). (#11337)
segment.target: Opravené oznamovanie času v aplikácii Foobar 2000 aj v prípadoch, ak nevieme zistiť zostávajúci čas (napríklad pri prehrávaní živého vysielania). (#11337)

segment.source: NVDA now honors the aria-roledescription attribute on elements in editable content in web pages. (#11607)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz zvažuje atribút aria-roledescription v prvkoch s editovateľným obsahom. (#11607)

segment.source: 'list' is no longer announced on every line of a list in Google Docs or other editable content in Google Chrome. (#7562)
segment.target: NVDA viac neoznamuje zoznam pri každej položke zoznamu v Google dokumentoch resp. v editovateľných prvkoch v prehliadači Google Chrome. (#7562)

segment.source: When arrowing by character or word from one list item to another in editable content on the web, entering the new list item is now announced. (#11569)
segment.target: Ak sa pri navigácii po znakoch alebo slovách dostanete z jedného zoznamu do druhého v editovateľných prvkoch v prehliadači Google Chrome, NVDA prechod medzi zoznamami oznámi. (#11569)

segment.source: NVDA now reads the correct line when the caret is placed at the end of a link on the end of a list item in Google Docs or other editable content on the web. (#11606)
segment.target: NVDA oznamuje správny riadok, ak presuniete kurzor na posledný znak odkazu v zozname v editovateľnom prvku v prehliadači Google chrome. (#11606)

segment.source: On Windows 7, opening and closing the start menu from the desktop now sets focus correctly. (#10567)
segment.target: V systéme Windows 7 sa po otvorení a zatvorení ponuky štart z pracovnej plochy správne vráti fokus na pôvodné miesto. (#10567)

segment.source: When "attempt to cancel expired focus events" is enabled, the title of the tab is now announced again when switching tabs in Firefox. (#11397)
segment.target: Ak je zapnuté "Prerušiť reč po vypršaní zameranej udalosti", potom NVDA oznamuje názov záložiek pri prepínaní záložiek v prehliadači *Mozilla Firefox. (#11397)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to announce a list item after typing a character in a list when speaking with the SAPI5 Ivona voices. (#11651)
segment.target: NVDA opäť správne oznamuje položku v zozname, po napísaní textu do zoznamu a súčasnom používaní Sapi5 hlasov Ivona. (#11651)

segment.source: It is again possible to use browse mode when reading emails in Windows 10 Mail 16005.13110 and later. (#11439)
segment.target: Opäť je možné používať režim prehliadania pri čítaní správ v aplikácii pošta od verzie 16005.13110. (#11439)

segment.source: When using the SAPI5 Ivona voices from harposoftware.com, NVDA is now able to save configuration, switch synthesizers, and no longer will stay silent after restarting. (#11650)
segment.target: Ak používate Sapi5 hlasový výstup Ivona od harposoftware.com, NVDA viac nemá problém uložiť nastavenia, zmeniť hlasový výstup a po reštarte neostáva ticho. (#11650)

segment.source: It is now possible to enter number 6 in computer braille from a braille keyboard on HIMS displays. (#11710)
segment.target: Na brailových riadkoch Hims je opäť možné v počítačovom kóde zadať číslicu 6. (#11710)

segment.source: Major performance improvements in Azure Data Studio. (#11533, #11715)
segment.target: Zrýchlená odozva v Azure Data Studio. (#11533, #11715)

segment.source: With "Attempt to Cancel speech for expired focus events" enabled the title of the NVDA Find dialog is announced again. (#11632)
segment.target: Ak je zapnuté "prerušiť reč po vypršaní zameranej udalosti", NVDA stále správne oznamuje názov okna hľadania. (#11632)

segment.source: NVDA should no longer freeze when waking the computer and focus lands in a Microsoft Edge document. (#11576)
segment.target: NVDA viac nezamrzne po prebudení systému z režimu spánku, ak bol fokus v okne MS Edge. (#11576)

segment.source: It is no longer necessary to press tab or move focus after closing a context menu in MS Edge for browse mode to be functional again. (#11202)
segment.target: Odteraz nie je potrebné po opustení kontextovej ponuky v MS Edge stlačiť kláves tab, prípadne inak zmeniť fokus, aby opäť fungoval režim prehliadania. (#11202)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to read items in list views within a 64-bit application such as Tortoise SVN. (#8175)
segment.target: NVDA dokáže odteraz čítať položky v zoznamoch v 64-bitových aplikáciách, ako napríklad Tortoise SVN. (#8175)

segment.source: ARIA treegrids are now exposed as normal tables in browse mode in both Firefox and Chrome. (#9715)
segment.target: Prvok ARIA treegrids je spracovaný a prezentovaný ako tabuľka v režime prehliadania v prehliadačoch Firefox aj Chrome. (#9715)

segment.source: A reverse search can now be initiated with 'find previous' via NVDA+shift+F3 (#11770)
segment.target: Skratkou NVDA+shift+F3 je možné odteraz hľadať nahor. (#11770)

segment.source: An NVDA script is no longer treated as being repeated if an unrelated key press happens in between the two executions of the script. (#11388)
segment.target: NVDA skripty sa odteraz nespracúvajú ako opakované, ak medzi nimi stlačíte iný kláves. (#11388)

segment.source: Strong and emphasis tags in Internet Explorer can again be suppressed from being reported by turning off Report Emphasis in NVDA's Document Formatting settings. (#11808)
segment.target: Ak vypnete oznamovanie zvýraznenia, NVDA toto rešpektuje aj v prehliadači Internet explorer. (#11808)

segment.source: A freeze of several seconds experienced by a small amount of users when arrowing between cells in Excel should no longer occur. (#11818)
segment.target: NVDA viac nemrzne pri pohybe medzi bunkami v MS Excely. (#11818)

segment.source: In Microsoft Teams builds with version numbers like 1.3.00.28xxx, NVDA no longer fails reading messages in chats or Teams channels due to an incorrectly focused menu. (#11821)
segment.target: NVDA správne číta správy v aplikácii Microsoft Teams v zostavách od verzie 1.3.00.28xxx, opravený problém spôsobený nesprávnym fokusom v menu. (#11821)

segment.source: Text marked both as being a spelling and grammar error at the same time in Google Chrome will be appropriately announced as both a spelling and grammar error by NVDA. (#11787)
segment.target: Ak je text označený ako pravopisná a súčasne gramatická chyba v prehliadači Chrome, aj NVDA ho označí ako gramatickú a pravopisnú chybu. (#11787)

segment.source: When using Outlook (French locale), the shortcut for 'Reply all' (control+shift+R) works again. (#11196)
segment.target: Ak používate Outlook vo Francúzštine, opäť funguje skratka odpovedať všetkým ctrl+shift+r. (#11196)

segment.source: In Visual Studio, IntelliSense tool tips that provide additional details about the currently selected IntelliSense item are now only reported once. (#11611)
segment.target: V aplikácii Visual Studio sú správy IntelliSense oznamované vždy len raz. (#11611)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Calculator, NVDA will not announce progress of calculations if speak typed characters is disabled. (#9428)
segment.target: Ak používate Kalkulačku v systéme Windows 10 a súčasne máte vypnuté oznamovanie napísaných znakov, potom NVDA neoznamuje ani priebeh výpočtu. (#9428)

segment.source: NVDA no longer crashes when using English US grade 2 and expand to computer Braille at the cursor is on, when displaying certain content such as a URL in Braille. (#11754)
segment.target: NVDA viac nespadne, ak máte nastavenú brailovú tabuľku Angličtina skratkopis, prepnete na počítačový kód a súčasne máte kurzor na konkrétnom obsahu, napríklad na url adrese. (#11754)

segment.source: It is again possible to report formatting information for the focused Excel cell using NVDA+F. (#11914)
segment.target: Opäť funguje Oznamovanie formátovania bunky v tabuľkách excelu skratkou NVDA+f. (#11914)

segment.source: QWERTY input on Papenmeier braille displays that support it again works and no longer causes NVDA to randomly freeze. (#11944)
segment.target: Písanie na QWERTY klávesnici brailových riadkov Papenmeier funguje správne a nespôsobuje mrznutie NVDA. (#11944)

segment.source: In Chromium based browsers, several cases were solved where table navigation didn't work and NVDA didn't report the number of rows/columns of the table. (#12359)
segment.target: Vo webových prehliadačoch založených na jadre chromium bolo opravených niekoľko prípadov nefunkčnej navigácie v tabuľkách, kde NVDA neoznamoval ani počet riadkov / stĺpcov tabuľky. (#12359)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: System tests can now send keys using spy.emulateKeyPress, which takes a key identifier that conforms to NVDA's own key names, and by default also blocks until the action is executed. (#11581)
segment.target: System tests can now send keys using spy.emulateKeyPress, which takes a key identifier that conforms to NVDA's own key names, and by default also blocks until the action is executed. (#11581)

segment.source: NVDA no longer requires the current directory to be the NVDA application directory in order to function. (#6491)
segment.target: NVDA no longer requires the current directory to be the NVDA application directory in order to function. (#6491)

segment.source: The aria live politeness setting for live regions can now be found on NVDA Objects using the liveRegionPoliteness property. (#11596)
segment.target: The aria live politeness setting for live regions can now be found on NVDA Objects using the liveRegionPoliteness property. (#11596)

segment.source: It is now possible to define separate gestures for Outlook and Word document. (#11196)
segment.target: It is now possible to define separate gestures for Outlook and Word document. (#11196)

segment.source: This release includes several large improvements to stability and performance particularly in Microsoft Office applications. There are new settings to toggle touchscreen support and graphics reporting.
segment.target: Prednosti tejto verzie zahŕňajú zrýchlenie odozvy v aplikáciách Microsoft Office. Tiež boli pridané možnosti zapnúť a vypnúť oznamovanie grafiky a zapnúť a vypnúť dotykové gestá.

segment.source: The existence of marked (highlighted) content can be reported in browsers, and there are new German braille tables.
segment.target: Pridali sme tiež nové nemecké brailové tabuľky a oznamovanie označeného textu vo webových prehliadačoch.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: nové vlastnosti

segment.source: You can now toggle reporting of graphics from NVDA's document formatting settings. Note that disabling this option will still read the alternative texts of graphics. (#4837)
segment.target: V nastaveniach čítania textu je odteraz možné zapnúť a vypnúť oznamovanie grafiky. NVDA bude naďalej v oboch prípadoch oznamovať alternatívny text. (#4837)

segment.source: You can now toggle NVDA's touchscreen support. An option has been added to the Touch Interaction panel of NVDA's settings. The default gesture is NVDA+control+alt+t. (#9682)
segment.target: V nastaveniach dotykovej obrazovky je možné zapnúť a vypnúť podporu pre dotykové gestá. Nastavenie je možné meniť aj skratkou NVDA+ctrl+alt+t. (#9682)

segment.source: Added new German braille tables. (#11268)
segment.target: Pridané nové brailové tabuľky pre Nemčinu. (#11268)

segment.source: NVDA now detects read-only text UIA controls. (#10494)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz správne rozpoznáva UIA prvky, ktoré majú atribút len na čítanie. (#10494)

segment.source: The existence of marked (highlighted) content is reported in both speech and braille in all web browsers. (#11436)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz dokáže upozorniť na text, ktorý tvorcovia stránky vyznačili. Funguje to vo všetkých webových prehliadačoch. (#11436)

segment.source: This can be toggled on and off by a new NVDA Document Formatting option for Highlighting.
segment.target: Oznamovanie je možné zapnúť a vypnúť v nastaveniach čítania textu.

segment.source: New emulated system keyboard keys can be added from NVDA's Input gestures dialog. (#6060)
segment.target: V dialógu klávesové skratky je možné pridávať emulované klávesové skratky. (#6060)

segment.source: To do this, press the add button after you selected the Emulated system keyboard keys category.
segment.target: Ak chcete pridať skratku, vyberte vetvu emulované klávesy a aktivujte tlačidlo pridať.

segment.source: Handy Tech Active Braille with joystick is now supported. (#11655)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre joystick v brailových riadkoch Handy Tech. (#11655)

segment.source: "Automatic focus mode for caret movement" setting is now compatible with disabling "Automatically set focus to focusable elements". (#11663)
segment.target: Nastavenie "Automaticky aktivovať režim fokusu pri pohybe kurzorom" funguje správne v kombinácii s vypnutým nastavením "automaticky presúvať fokus na zamerané prvky". (#11663)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Zmeny

segment.source: The Report formatting script (NVDA+f) has now been changed to report the formatting at the system caret rather than at the review cursor position. To report formatting at the review cursor position now use NVDA+shift+f. (#9505)
segment.target: Skratka NVDA+F odteraz oznamuje vždy formátovanie na pozícii systémového kurzora. Ak potrebujete zistiť formátovanie textu pod prezeracím kurzorom, použite novú skratku NVDA+shift+f. (#9505)

segment.source: NVDA no longer automatically sets the system focus to focusable elements by default in browse mode, improving performance and stability. (#11190)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz automaticky nezameriava prvky, ktoré je možné zamerať. Toto zrýchľuje odozvu a nastavenie je možné v prípade potreby zmeniť. (#11190)

segment.source: CLDR updated from version 36.1 to version 37. (#11303)
segment.target: Tabuľka CLDR aktualizovaná z verzie 36.1 na verziu 37. (#11303)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak-NG to 1.51-dev, commit 1fb68ffffea4
segment.target: Hlasový výstup eSpeak-NG aktualizovaný na verziu 1.51-dev, commit 1fb68ffffea4

segment.source: You can now utilize table navigation in list boxes with checkable list items when the particular list has multiple columns. (#8857)
segment.target: V zoznamoch so začiarkávacími poliami odteraz správne fungujú príkazy na navigáciu po tabuľkách. (#8857)

segment.source: In the Add-ons manager, when prompted to confirm removal of an add-on, "No" is now the default. (#10015)
segment.target: V dialógu pri odstraňovaní doplnku je teraz predvolená možnosť nie. (#10015)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, the Elements List dialog now presents formulas in their localized form. (#9144)
segment.target: V aplikácii MS Excel sú v zozname prvkov oznamované vzorce v správnom jazyku. (#9144)

segment.source: NVDA now reports the correct terminology for notes in MS Excel. (#11311)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz pri oznamovaní poznámok v MS Excely používa správnu terminológiu. (#11311)

segment.source: When using the "move review cursor to focus" command in browse mode, the review cursor is now set at the position of the virtual caret. (#9622)
segment.target: Pri presunutí prezeracieho kurzora na fokus sa kurzor presunie na správne miesto kde je virtuálny systémový kurzor. (#9622)

segment.source: Information reported in browse mode, such as the formatting info with NVDA+F, are now displayed in a slightly bigger window centered on screen. (#9910)
segment.target: Informácie, ktoré sa zobrazujú v režime prehliadania, ako napríklad informácia o formátovaní, sú zobrazené vo väčšom a vycentrovanom okne. (#9910)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: opravy

segment.source: NVDA now always speaks when navigating by word and landing on any single symbol followed by white space, whatever the verbosity settings. (#5133)
segment.target: Ak pri navigácii po slovách narazíte na symbol nasledovaný bielym znakom, NVDA tento symbol oznámy bez ohľadu na úroveň interpunkcie. (#5133)

segment.source: In applications using QT 5.11 or newer, object descriptions are again reported. (#8604)
segment.target: NVDA opäť oznamuje popisky objektov v aplikáciách využívajúcich QT od verzie 5.11. (#8604)

segment.source: When deleting a word with control+delete, NVDA no longer remains silent. (#3298, #11029)
segment.target: Pri odstránení slova skratkou ctrl+delete NVDA nie je viac ticho. (#3298, #11029)

segment.source: Now the word to the right of the deleted word is announced.
segment.target: Odteraz oznamuje nasledujúce slovo od práve zmazaného slova.

segment.source: In general settings panel, the language list is now sorted correctly. (#10348)
segment.target: Vo všeobecných nastaveniach je odteraz správne zoradený zoznam jazykov. (#10348)

segment.source: In the Input Gestures dialog, significantly improved performance while filtering. (#10307)
segment.target: Zrýchlená odozva pri filtrovaní v dialógu klávesové skratky. (#10307)

segment.source: You can now send Unicode characters beyond U+FFFF from a braille display. (#10796)
segment.target: Z brailových riadkov je odteraz možné odosielať aj znaky pod hranicou unicode U+FFFF. (#10796)

segment.source: NVDA will announce Open With dialog content in Windows 10 May 2020 Update. (#11335)
segment.target: NVDA oznamuje prvky v dialógu Otvoriť v programe v májovej aktualizácii Windows 10. (#11335)

segment.source: A new experimental option in Advanced settings (Enable selective registration for UI Automation events and property changes) can provide major performance improvements in Microsoft Visual Studio and other UIAutomation based applications if enabled. (#11077, #11209)
segment.target: V časti pokročilé nastavenia pribudla možnosť Sledovať zmeny a udalosti UI Automation len pre zamerané prvky. Jej zapnutie môže zrýchlyť prácu v Microsoft Visual Studio a iných UIAutomation aplikáciách. (#11077, #11209)

segment.source: For checkable list items, the selected state is no longer announced redundantly, and if applicable, the unselected state is announced instead. (#8554)
segment.target: Pri položkách, ktoré je možné začiarknuť a odčiarknuť, viac NVDA neoznamuje opakovane vybraté alebo nevybraté. Ak je to potrebné, oznamuje stav nevybraté. (#8554)

segment.source: On Windows 10 May 2020 Update, NVDA now shows the Microsoft Sound Mapper when viewing output devices from synthesizer dialog. (#11349)
segment.target: Od Májovej aktualizácie Windows 10 NVDA opäť medzi zvukovými zariadeniami v nastaveniach hlasového výstupu zobrazuje Microsoft soundmapper. (#11349)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer, numbers are now announced correctly for ordered lists if the list does not start with 1. (#8438)
segment.target: NVDA správne oznamuje čísla v číslovaných zoznamoch v aplikácii Internet Explorer aj v prípadoch, že prvé číslo zoznamu nie je 1. (#8438)

segment.source: In Google chrome, NVDA will now report not checked for all checkable controls (not just check boxes) that are currently not checked. (#11377)
segment.target: V aplikácii Google Chrome oznamuje NVDA nezačiarknutý stav nie len pre zoznamy, ale pre všetky prvky, ktoré nie sú začiarknuté. (#11377)

segment.source: It is once again possible to navigate in various controls when NVDA's language is set to Aragonese. (#11384)
segment.target: Opravená navigácia, ktorá nefungovala, ak bol jazyk NVDA nastavený na Aragónčinu. (#11384)

segment.source: NVDA should no longer sometimes freeze in Microsoft Word when rapidly arrowing up and down or typing characters with Braille enabled. (#11431, #11425, #11414)
segment.target: NVDA viac nezamrzne pri rýchlom posúvaní alebo písaní v dokumentoch MS Word, ak je aktívne zobrazenie na brailovom riadku. (#11384)

segment.source: NVDA no longer appends nonexistent trailing space when copying the current navigator object to the clipboard. (#11438)
segment.target: NVDA viac nevkladá medzeru na koniec textu pri kopírovaní obsahu navigačného objektu do schránky. (#11438)

segment.source: NVDA no longer activates the Say All profile if there is nothing to read. (#10899, #9947)
segment.target: NVDA viac neaktivuje profil plynulé čítanie, ak neexistuje žiadny text na prečítanie. (#10899, #9947)

segment.source: NVDA is no longer unable to read the features list in Internet Information Services (IIS) Manager. (#11468)
segment.target: NVDA opäť dokáže čítať zoznam vlastností v aplikácii Internet Information Services (IIS). (#11468)

segment.source: NVDA now keeps the audio device open improving performance on some sound cards (#5172, #10721)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz necháva na dlhší čas otvorené audio zariadenie, čo zrýchľuje odozvu pri niektorých zvukových kartách. (#5172, #10721)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer freeze or exit when holding down control+shift+downArrow in Microsoft Word. (#9463)
segment.target: NVDA viac nezamrzne a nespadne pri dlhšom podržaní skratky ctrl+shift+šípka dole v aplikácii MS Word. (#9463)

segment.source: The expanded / collapsed state of directories in the navigation treeview on drive.google.com is now always reported by NVDA. (#11520)
segment.target: Odteraz je vždy oznamované Rozbalenie a zbalenie priečinkov v Google Drive. (#11520)

segment.source: NVDA will auto detect the NLS eReader Humanware braille display via Bluetooth as its Bluetooth name is now "NLS eReader Humanware". (#11561)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz dokáže automaticky nájsť brailový riadok NLS eReader Humanware cez Bluetooth, keďže názov zariadenia je teraz "NLS eReader Humanware". (#11561)

segment.source: Major performance improvements in Visual Studio Code. (#11533)
segment.target: Drobné úpravy pre Visual Studio. (#11533)

segment.source: Changes For Developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: The GUI Helper's BoxSizerHelper.addDialogDismissButtons supports a new "separated" keyword argument, for adding a standard horizontal separator to dialogs (other than messages and single input dialogs). (#6468)
segment.target: The GUI Helper's BoxSizerHelper.addDialogDismissButtons supports a new "separated" keyword argument, for adding a standard horizontal separator to dialogs (other than messages and single input dialogs). (#6468)

segment.source: Additional properties were added to app modules, including path for the executable (appPath), is a Windows Store app (isWindowsStoreApp), and machine architecture for the app (appArchitecture). (#7894)
segment.target: Additional properties were added to app modules, including path for the executable (appPath), is a Windows Store app (isWindowsStoreApp), and machine architecture for the app (appArchitecture). (#7894)

segment.source: It is now possible to create app modules for apps hosted inside wwahost.exe on Windows 8 and later. (#4569)
segment.target: It is now possible to create app modules for apps hosted inside wwahost.exe on Windows 8 and later. (#4569)

segment.source: A fragment of the log can now be delimited and then copied to clipboard using NVDA+control+shift+F1. (#9280)
segment.target: A fragment of the log can now be delimited and then copied to clipboard using NVDA+control+shift+F1. (#9280)

segment.source: NVDA-specific objects that are found by Python's cyclic garbage collector are now logged when being deleted by the collector to aide in removing reference cycles from NVDA. (#11499)
segment.target: NVDA-specific objects that are found by Python's cyclic garbage collector are now logged when being deleted by the collector to aide in removing reference cycles from NVDA. (#11499)

segment.source: The majority of NVDA's classes are tracked including NVDAObjects, appModules, GlobalPlugins, SynthDrivers, and TreeInterceptors.
segment.target: The majority of NVDA's classes are tracked including NVDAObjects, appModules, GlobalPlugins, SynthDrivers, and TreeInterceptors.

segment.source: A class that needs to be tracked should inherit from garbageHandler.TrackedObject.
segment.target: A class that needs to be tracked should inherit from garbageHandler.TrackedObject.

segment.source: Significant debug logging for MSAA events can be now enabled in NVDA's Advanced settings. (#11521)
segment.target: Significant debug logging for MSAA events can be now enabled in NVDA's Advanced settings. (#11521)

segment.source: MSAA winEvents for the currently focused object are no longer filtered out along with other events if the event count for a given thread is exceeded. (#11520)
segment.target: MSAA winEvents for the currently focused object are no longer filtered out along with other events if the event count for a given thread is exceeded. (#11520)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include support for a new braille display from Nattiq, better support for ESET antivirus GUI and Windows Terminal, performance improvements in 1Password, and with Windows OneCore synthesizer. Plus many other important bug fixes and improvements.
segment.target: Prednosti tejto verzie zahŕňajú podporu brailových riadkov od spoločnosti Nattiq, vylepšenú podporu pre produkty spoločnosti Eset, vylepšenia pri práci s terminálmi v systéme Windows, vylepšenia stability pri práci s aplikáciou 1Password, vylepšenia pre používateľov hlasov Windows Onecore.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nové vlastnosti

segment.source: Support for new braille displays:
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre nové brailové riadky:

segment.source: Nattiq nBraille (#10778)
segment.target: Nattiq nBraille (#10778)

segment.source: Added script to open NVDA configuration directory (no default gesture). (#2214)
segment.target: Pridaná možnosť definovať klávesovú skratku, ktorá otvorí priečinok s nastaveniami NVDA. Predvolene nie je definovaná žiadna skratka. (#2214)

segment.source: Better support for ESET antivirus GUI. (#10894)
segment.target: Vylepšená podpora rozhrania v aplikáciách Eset. (#10894)

segment.source: Added support for Windows Terminal. (#10305)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre Windows Terminál. (#10305)

segment.source: Added a command to report the active configuration profile (no default gesture). (#9325)
segment.target: Odteraz je možné definovať klávesovú skratku, ktorá oznámi názov aktívneho profilu. Predvolene skratka nie je definovaná. (#9325)

segment.source: Added a command to toggle reporting of subscripts and superscripts (no default gesture). (#10985)
segment.target: Odteraz je možné klávesovou skratkou zapínať a vypínať oznamovanie indexov. Skratky je potrebné nastaviť v dialógu klávesové skratky. (#10985)

segment.source: Web applications (E.G. Gmail) no longer speak outdated information when moving focus rapidly. (#10885)
segment.target: Webové aplikácie (napríklad gmail) nehlásia zastaralé informácie pri rýchlom prechádzaní. (#10885)

segment.source: This experimental fix must be manually enabled via the 'Attempt to cancel speech for expired focus events' option in the advanced settings panel.
segment.target: Toto je zatiaľ potrebné zapnúť v pokročilých nastaveniach, nastavenie prerušiť reč po vypršaní zameranej udalosti.

segment.source: Many more symbols have been added to the default symbols dictionary. (#11105)
segment.target: Pridané nové symboly, ktoré NVDA dokáže rozpoznať. (#11105)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: zmeny

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator from 3.12 to [3.14.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.14.0). (#10832, #11221)
segment.target: Aktualizovaná prekladová tabuľka liblouis z verzie 3.12 na [3.14.0](https://github.com/liblouis/liblouis/releases/tag/v3.14.0). (#10832, #11221)

segment.source: The reporting of superscripts and subscripts is now controlled separately to the reporting of font attributes. (#10919)
segment.target: Oznamovanie indexov bolo oddelené od oznamovania iných atribútov písma. (#10919)

segment.source: Due to changes made in VS Code, NVDA no longer disables browse mode in Code by default. (#10888)
segment.target: NVDA viac predvolene nevypína režim prehliadania v aplikácii VS Code. (#10888)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reports "top" and "bottom" messages when moving the review cursor directly to the first or last line of the current navigator object with the move to top and move to bottom review cursor scripts respectively. (#9551)
segment.target: NVDA viac neoznamuje "vrch" a "spodok", ak použijete skratky, ktoré presúvajú prezerací kurzor na prvý resp. posledný riadok objektu. (#9551)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reports "left" and "right" messages when directly moving the review cursor to the first or last character of the line for the current navigator object with the move to beginning of line and move to end of line review cursor scripts respectively. (#9551)
segment.target: Rovnako NVDA neohlasuje "vľavo" a "vpravo" ak presúvate prezerací kurzor na prvý alebo posledný znak riadka. (#9551)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Opravy

segment.source: NVDA now starts correctly when the log file cannot be created. (#6330)
segment.target: Odteraz sa NVDA dokáže spustiť aj v prípade, že nie je možné vytvoriť log. (#6330)

segment.source: In recent releases of Microsoft Word 365, NVDA will no longer announce "delete back word" when Control+Backspace is pressed while editing a document. (#10851)
segment.target: NVDA v aktuálnych vydaniach MS Word 365 po stlačení skratky ctrl+backspace neoznamuje hlásenie "zmazať slovo". (#10851)

segment.source: In Winamp, NVDA will once again announce toggle status of shuffle and repeat. (#10945)
segment.target: NVDA opäť hlási stav náhodného prehrávania a opakovania v prehrávači Winamp. (#10945)

segment.source: NVDA is no longer extremely sluggish when moving within the list of items in 1Password. (#10508)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz rýchlo reaguje pri pohybe v zoznamoch aplikácie 1Password. (#10508)

segment.source: The Windows OneCore speech synthesizer no longer lags between utterances. (#10721)
segment.target: Hlasy Windows one core majú rýchlejšiu odozvu a nerobia zbytočné pauzy. (#10721)

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes when you open the context menu for 1Password in the system notification area. (#11017)
segment.target: NVDA viac nezamrzne pri otvorení kontextovej ponuky aplikácie 1Password zo systémového panela. (#11017)

segment.source: In Office 2013 and older:
segment.target: Pre MS Office do verzie 2013:

segment.source: Ribbons are announced when focus moves to them for the first time. (#4207)
segment.target: Ribbon ponuky sú oznamované pri prvom zameraní. (#4207)

segment.source: Context menu items are once again reported properly. (#9252)
segment.target: Opravené oznamovanie v kontextových ponukách. (#9252)

segment.source: Ribbon sections are consistently announced when navigating with Control+arrows. (#7067)
segment.target: Opäť sú správne oznamované sekcie v ribbon ponukách pri navigácii skratkami ctrl+šípky. (#7067)

segment.source: In browse mode in Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome, text no longer incorrectly appears on a separate line when web content uses CSS display: inline-flex. (#11075)
segment.target: V prehliadačoch Mozilla Firefox a Google chrome sa viac v režime prehliadania neobjavuje text rozseknutý na novom riadku, ak je použitý css atribút display: inline-flex. (#11075)

segment.source: In browse mode with Automatically set system focus to focusable elements disabled, it is now possible to activate elements that aren't focusable.
segment.target: Ak je vypnuté automatické aktivovanie režimu fokusu pri zmene fokusu, je odteraz možné aktivovať aj prvky, ktoré nie je možné zamerať.

segment.source: In browse mode with Automatically set system focus to focusable elements disabled, it is now possible to activate elements reached by pressing the tab key. (#8528)
segment.target: Ak je vypnuté automatické aktivovanie režimu fokusu pri zmene fokusu, je opäť možné aktivovať prvky zamerané klávesom tab. (#8528)

segment.source: In browse mode with Automatically set system focus to focusable elements disabled, activating certain elements no longer clicks in an incorrect location. (#9886)
segment.target: Ak je vypnuté automatické aktivovanie režimu fokusu pri zmene fokusu, NVDA vždy aktivuje správny prvok. (#9886)

segment.source: NVDA error sounds are no longer heard when accessing DevExpress text controls. (#10918)
segment.target: NVDA neprehráva zvuk chyby pri práci s prvkami DevExpress text. (#10918)

segment.source: The tool-tips of the icons in the system tray are no longer reported upon keyboard navigation if their text is equal to the name of the icons, to avoid double announcing. (#6656)
segment.target: NVDA neoznamuje dvakrát ikony zo systémového panela, ak je text a ikona rovnaká. (#6656)

segment.source: In browse mode with 'Automatically set system focus to focusable elements' disabled, switching to focus mode with NVDA+space now focuses the element under the caret. (#11206)
segment.target: Ak je vypnuté automatické aktivovanie režimu fokusu pri zmene fokusu, po stlačení NVDA+medzera je zameraný prvok, na ktorom je systémový kurzor. (#11206)

segment.source: It is once again possible to check for NVDA updates on certain systems; e.g. clean Windows installs. (#11253)
segment.target: Opäť je možné kontrolovať aktualizácie NVDA na všetkých, aj čistých inštaláciách Windows. (#11253)

segment.source: Focus is not moved in Java application when the selection is changed in an unfocused tree, table or list. (#5989)
segment.target: Ak sa pri používaní Java aplikácie zmení výber v prvku, ktorý nie je zameraný (zoznam, strom alebo tabuľka), NVDA náhodne nepresúva fokus. (#5989)

segment.source: Changes For Developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: execElevated and hasUiAccess have moved from config module to systemUtils module. Usage via config module is deprecated. (#10493)
segment.target: execElevated and hasUiAccess have moved from config module to systemUtils module. Usage via config module is deprecated. (#10493)

segment.source: Updated configobj to 5.1.0dev commit f9a265c4. (#10939)
segment.target: Updated configobj to 5.1.0dev commit f9a265c4. (#10939)

segment.source: Automated testing of NVDA with Chrome and a HTML sample is now possible. (#10553)
segment.target: Automated testing of NVDA with Chrome and a HTML sample is now possible. (#10553)

segment.source: IAccessibleHandler has been converted into a package, OrderedWinEventLimiter has been extracted to a module and unit tests added (#10934)
segment.target: IAccessibleHandler has been converted into a package, OrderedWinEventLimiter has been extracted to a module and unit tests added (#10934)

segment.source: Updated BrlApi to version 0.8 (BRLTTY 6.1). (#11065)
segment.target: Updated BrlApi to version 0.8 (BRLTTY 6.1). (#11065)

segment.source: Status bar retrieval may now be customized by an AppModule. (#2125, #4640)
segment.target: Status bar retrieval may now be customized by an AppModule. (#2125, #4640)

segment.source: NVDA no longer listens for IAccessible EVENT_OBJECT_REORDER. (#11076)
segment.target: NVDA no longer listens for IAccessible EVENT_OBJECT_REORDER. (#11076)

segment.source: A broken ScriptableObject (such as a GlobalPlugin missing a call to its base class' init method) no longer breaks NVDA's script handling. (#5446)
segment.target: A broken ScriptableObject (such as a GlobalPlugin missing a call to its base class' init method) no longer breaks NVDA's script handling. (#5446)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include support for several new braille displays from HumanWare and APH, plus many other important bug fixes such as the ability to again read math in Microsoft Word using MathPlayer / MathType.
segment.target: Prednosti tejto verzie zahŕňajú podporu pre nové brailové riadky od HumanWare a APH a drobné opravy, napríklad opätovnú možnosť čítať matematický zápis v aplikácii MS Word cez Math player.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nové vlastnosti

segment.source: The currently selected item in listboxes is again presented in browse mode in Chrome, similar to NVDA 2019.1. (#10713)
segment.target: NVDA opätovne hlási vybratú položku v zozname v prehliadači Google Chrome. (#10713)

segment.source: You can now perform right mouse clicks on touch devices by doing a one finger tap and hold. (#3886)
segment.target: Tlačidlo kontextovej ponuky resp. kliknutie pravým tlačidlom myši je možné vykonať aj pomocou dotykového gesta klepnúť a podržať. (#3886)

segment.source: Support for New braille displays: APH Chameleon 20, APH Mantis Q40, HumanWare BrailleOne, BrailleNote Touch v2, and NLS eReader. (#10830)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre nové brailové riadky: APH Chameleon 20, APH Mantis Q40, HumanWare BrailleOne, BrailleNote Touch v2, a NLS eReader. (#10830)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: zmeny

segment.source: NVDA will prevent the system from locking or going to sleep when in say all. (#10643)
segment.target: Windows sa viac nezamkne a neprejde do režimu spánku počas plynulého čítania. (#10643)

segment.source: Support for out-of-process iframes in Mozilla Firefox. (#10707)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre rámiky v prehliadači Mozilla Firefox, ktoré sú spracované v samostatnom procese. (#10707)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to version 3.12. (#10161)
segment.target: Prekladová tabuľka liblouis aktualizovaná na verziu 3.12. (#10161)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: opravy

segment.source: Fixed NVDA not announcing Unicode minus symbol (U+2212). (#10633)
segment.target: NVDA opäť správne hlási znak mínus (unicode U+2212). (#10633)

segment.source: When installing add-on from add-ons manager, names of files and folders in the browse window are no longer reported twice. (#10620, #2395)
segment.target: V správcovi doplnkov pri prehľadávaní súborov NVDA viac neoznamuje názov súboru dvakrát. (#10620, #2395)

segment.source: In Firefox, when loading Mastodon with the advanced web interface enabled, all timelines now render correctly in browse mode. (#10776)
segment.target: Všetky časové osy v aplikácii Mastodon sa zobrazujú správne v prehliadači firefox pri použití pokročilého zobrazenia. (#10776)

segment.source: In browse mode, NVDA now reports "not checked" for unchecked check boxes where it sometimes didn't previously. (#10781)
segment.target: NVDA správne oznamuje v režime prehliadania nezačiarknuté políčka. (#10781)

segment.source: ARIA switch controls no longer report confusing information such as "not pressed checked" or "pressed checked". (#9187)
segment.target: NVDA viac v režime prehliadania nehlási mätúce informácie, ako napríklad nestlačené začiarknuté, alebo stlačené začiarknuté. (#9187)

segment.source: SAPI4 voices should no longer refuse to speak certain text. (#10792)
segment.target: Hlasové syntézy sapi4 viac nevynechávajú text. (#10792)

segment.source: NVDA can again read and interact with math equations in Microsoft Word. (#10803)
segment.target: NVDA opäť podporuje čítanie matematického zápisu v MS Word. (#10803)

segment.source: NVDA will again announce text being unselected in browse mode if pressing an arrow key while text is selected. (#10731).
segment.target: NVDA opäť oznámi zrušenie výberu textu v režime prehliadania. (#10731)

segment.source: NVDA no longer exits if there is an error initializing eSpeak. (#10607)
segment.target: NVDA sa viac nezrúti, ak sa nepodarí inicializovať hlasový výstup eSpeak. (#10607)

segment.source: Errors caused by unicode in translations for shortcuts no longer stop the installer, mitigated by falling back to the English text. (#5166, #6326)
segment.target: Ak sa v prekladoch do národných jazykov objavia nepresnosti pri preklade klávesových skratiek, NVDA viac nespadne, ale použije nastavenie z anglickej lokalizácie. (#5166, #6326)

segment.source: Arrowing out and away from lists and tables in sayAll with skim reading enabled no longer continuously announces exiting the list or table. (#10706)
segment.target: NVDA viac opakovane dookola nehlási opustenie zoznamu a tabuľky, ak je aktívne plynulé čítanie. (#10706)

segment.source: Fix mouse tracking for some MSHTML elements in Internet Explorer. (#10736)
segment.target: Opravené sledovanie kurzora myši pre niektoré prvky MSHTML v aplikácii Internet Explorer. (#10736)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: Developer documentation is now build using sphinx. (#9840)
segment.target: Developer documentation is now build using sphinx. (#9840)

segment.source: Several speech functions have been split into two. (#10593)
segment.target: Several speech functions have been split into two. (#10593)

segment.source: The speakX version remains, but now depends on a getXSpeech function which returns a speech sequence.
segment.target: The speakX version remains, but now depends on a getXSpeech function which returns a speech sequence.

segment.source: speakObjectProperties now relies on getObjectPropertiesSpeech
segment.target: speakObjectProperties now relies on getObjectPropertiesSpeech

segment.source: speakObject now relies on getObjectSpeech
segment.target: speakObject now relies on getObjectSpeech

segment.source: speakTextInfo now relies on getTextInfoSpeech
segment.target: speakTextInfo now relies on getTextInfoSpeech

segment.source: speakWithoutPauses has been converted into a class, and refactored, but should not break compatibility.
segment.target: speakWithoutPauses has been converted into a class, and refactored, but should not break compatibility.

segment.source: getSpeechForSpelling is deprecated (though still available) use getSpellingSpeech instead.
segment.target: getSpeechForSpelling is deprecated (though still available) use getSpellingSpeech instead.

segment.source: Private changes that should not affect addon developers:
segment.target: Private changes that should not affect addon developers:

segment.source: _speakPlaceholderIfEmpty is now _getPlaceholderSpeechIfTextEmpty
segment.target: _speakPlaceholderIfEmpty is now _getPlaceholderSpeechIfTextEmpty

segment.source: _speakTextInfo_addMath is now _extendSpeechSequence_addMathForTextInfo
segment.target: _speakTextInfo_addMath is now _extendSpeechSequence_addMathForTextInfo

segment.source: Speech 'reason' has been converted to an Enum, see controlTypes.OutputReason class. (#10703)
segment.target: Speech 'reason' has been converted to an Enum, see controlTypes.OutputReason class. (#10703)

segment.source: Module level 'REASON_*' constants are deprecated.
segment.target: Module level 'REASON_*' constants are deprecated.

segment.source: Compiling NVDA dependencies now requires Visual Studio 2019 (16.2 or newer). (#10169)
segment.target: Compiling NVDA dependencies now requires Visual Studio 2019 (16.2 or newer). (#10169)

segment.source: Updated SCons to version 3.1.1. (#10169)
segment.target: Updated SCons to version 3.1.1. (#10169)

segment.source: Again allow behaviors._FakeTableCell to have no location defined (#10864)
segment.target: Again allow behaviors._FakeTableCell to have no location defined (#10864)

segment.source: NVDA 2019.3 is a very significant release containing many under-the-hood changes including the upgrade of Python 2 to Python 3, and a major re-write of NVDA's speech subsystem.
segment.target: Táto verzia prináša významné zmeny pod kapotou. Ide o prechod z prostredia Python 2 na Python 3 a tiež výrazné prestavanie systému na spracovanie reči.

segment.source: Although these changes do break compatibility with older NVDA add-ons, the upgrade to Python 3 is necessary for security, and the changes to speech allow for some exciting innovations in the near future.
segment.target: Tieto zmeny spôsobili nekompatibilitu starších doplnkov. Prechod na Python 3 je dôležitý z bezpečnostného hľadiska a prepracovanie systému na spracovanie reči prinesie v blízkej budúcnosti zaujímavé funkcie.

segment.source: Other highlights in this release include 64 bit support for Java VMs, Screen Curtain and Focus Highlight functionality, support for more braille displays and a new Braille viewer, and many many other bug fixes.
segment.target: Táto verzia prináša okrem iného podporu pre 64 bit Java VMs, funkciu tienenia obrazovky, zvýraznenia fokusu, podporu pre ďalšie brailové riadky, zobrazovač braillu a mnoho ďalšieho.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nové vlastnosti

segment.source: The accuracy of the move mouse to navigator object command has been improved in text fields in Java applications. (#10157)
segment.target: Vylepšená presnosť presunu myši na navigačný objekt v editačných poliach v Java aplikáciách. (#10157)

segment.source: Added support for the following Handy Tech Braille displays (#8955):
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre nasledujúce brailové riadky Handy Tech: (#8955):

segment.source: Basic Braille Plus 40
segment.target: Basic Braille Plus 40

segment.source: Basic Braille Plus 32
segment.target: Basic Braille Plus 32

segment.source: Connect Braille
segment.target: Connect Braille

segment.source: All user-defined gestures can now be removed via a new "Reset to factory defaults" button in the Input Gestures dialog. (#10293)
segment.target: Klávesové skratky, ktoré ste definovali, môžete teraz jednoducho odstrániť tlačidlom "Obnoviť predvolené nastavenia" v dialógu klávesové skratky. (#10293)

segment.source: Font reporting in Microsoft Word now includes if text is marked as hidden. (#8713)
segment.target: Informácia o formátovaní v dokumentoch MS Word odteraz oznamuje aj situácie, ak je text skrytý. (#8713)

segment.source: Added a command to move the review cursor to the position previously set as start marker for selection or copy: NVDA+shift+F9. (#1969)
segment.target: V editačných poliach je možné skočiť na začiatok vyznačeného bloku na kopírovanie skratkou NVDA+Shift+F9. (#1969)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer, Microsoft Edge and recent versions of Firefox and Chrome, landmarks are now reported in focus mode and object navigation. (#10101)
segment.target: Oblasti stránky sú teraz oznamované počas objektovej navigácie aj v režime fokusu v prehliadačoch Internet Explorer, Microsoft Edge a aktuálnych verziách Firefoxu a Chrome. (#10101)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer, Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox, You can now navigate by article and grouping using quick navigation scripts. These scripts are unbound by default and can be assigned in the Input Gestures dialog when the dialog is opened from a browse mode document. (#9485, #9227)
segment.target: V prehliadačoch Internet Explorer, Google Chrome a Mozilla Firefox je možné teraz skákať po článkoch a zoskupeniach. Tieto skratky nie sú predvolene definované a je potrebné ich nastaviť v dialógu klávesové skratky. Dialóg otvorte z aktívneho okna režimu prehliadania. (#9485, #9227)

segment.source: Figures are also reported. They are considered objects and therefore navigable with the o quick navigation key.
segment.target: NVDA odteraz oznamuje aj ilustrácie. Ide o samostatné objekty a je možné po nich skákať písmenom O.

segment.source: In Internet Explorer, Google Chrome and Mozilla Firefox, article elements are now reported with object navigation, and optionally in browse mode if turned on in Document Formatting settings. (#10424)
segment.target: NVDA oznamuje typ prvku Článok v prehliadačoch Internet Explorer, Google Chrome a Mozilla Firefox pri navigácii po objektoch a tiež pri čítaní textu v režime prehliadania, ak je oznamovanie povolené v nastaveniach čítania textu. (#10424)

segment.source: Added screen curtain, which when enabled, makes the whole screen black on Windows 8 and later. (#7857)
segment.target: Pridaná funkcia tienenia obrazovky (funguje od systému Windows 8). Po aktivovaní sa celá obrazovka zatieni čiernou farbou. (#7857)

segment.source: Added a script to enable screen curtain (until next restart with one press, or always while NVDA is running with two presses), no default gesture is assigned.
segment.target: V dialógu Klávesové skratky môžete definovať skratku, ktorá pri prvom stlačení zapne tienenie obrazovky do najbližšieho reštartu NVDA, alebo po dvojitom stlačení zatieni obrazovku natrvalo. Skratka nie je predvolene nastavená.

segment.source: Can be enabled and configured via the 'vision' category in NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: Tienenie obrazovky je možné nastaviť v Nastaveniach, kategória zrak.

segment.source: Added screen highlight functionality to NVDA. (#971, #9064)
segment.target: Pridaná funkcia na zvýraznenie objektov na obrazovke. (#971, #9064)

segment.source: Highlighting of the focus, navigator object, and browse mode caret position can be enabled and configured via the 'vision' category in NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: Je možné nastaviť zvýraznenie navigačného objektu, fokusu a kurzora v režime prehliadania. Všetko sa dá nastaviť v nastaveniach v kategórii zrak.

segment.source: Note: This feature is incompatible with the focus highlight add-on, however, the add-on can still be used while the built-in highlighter is disabled.
segment.target: Upozorňujeme, že doposiaľ používaný doplnok Zvýrazňovač fokusu (Focus highlight) nie je kompatibilný s touto funkciou. Doplnok môžete aj naďalej používať ale len vtedy, ak vypnete vstavané zvýraznenie objektov v NVDA.

segment.source: Added Braille Viewer tool, allows viewing braille output via an on-screen window. (#7788)
segment.target: Pridaná funkcia Zobrazovač braillu. Umožňuje na obrazovke zobraziť brailový výstup, ktorý by inak NVDA posielalo do fyzického brailového riadka. (#7788)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Zmeny

segment.source: The user guide now describes how to use NVDA in the Windows Console. (#9957)
segment.target: V používateľskej príručke je podrobne popísané, ako používať konzolu v prostredí operačného systému Windows. (#9957)

segment.source: Running nvda.exe now defaults to replacing an already running copy of NVDA. The -r|--replace command line parameter is still accepted, but ignored. (#8320)
segment.target: Ak NVDA beží a spustíte súbor nvda.exe, NVDA sa automaticky reštartuje. Argumenty -r|--replace sú podporované ale ignorované. (#8320)

segment.source: On Windows 8 and later, NVDA will now report product name and version information for hosted apps such as apps downloaded from Microsoft Store using information provided by the app. (#4259, #10108)
segment.target: V systéme Windows 8 a novších NVDA oznamuje verziu a názov nainštalovanej aplikácie, napríklad z Windows obchodu, pričom vychádza z dát samotnej aplikácie. (#4259, #10108)

segment.source: When toggling track changes on and off with the keyboard in Microsoft Word, NVDA will announce the state of the setting. (#942)
segment.target: Pri prepínaní sledovania zmien v dokumentoch MS Word klávesovou skratkou NVDA oznamuje aktuálny stav. (#942)

segment.source: The NVDA version number is now logged as the first message in the log. This occurs even if logging has been disabled from the GUI. (#9803)
segment.target: Do logu NVDA sa teraz na prvý riadok zapisuje aktuálna verzia NVDA a to aj v prípadoch, ak je zaznamenávanie úplne vypnuté z dialógu nastavenia. (#9803)

segment.source: The settings dialog no longer allows for changing the configured log level if it has been overridden from the command line. (#10209)
segment.target: Ak je cez príkazový riadok vynútená úroveň záznamu, nie je ju odteraz možné zmeniť z dialógu nastavenia. (#10209)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, NVDA now announces the display state of non printable characters when pressing the toggle shortcut Ctrl+Shift+8 . (#10241)
segment.target: Ak zapínate a vypínate zobrazenie netlačiteľných znakov v dokumentoch MS Word pomocou klávesovej skratky ctrl+shift+8, NVDA oznamuje aktuálne nastavenie. (#10241)

segment.source: Updated Liblouis braille translator to commit 58d67e63. (#10094)
segment.target: brailová prekladová tabuľka Liblouis bola aktualizovaná na verziu commit 58d67e63. (#10094)

segment.source: When CLDR characters (including emojis) reporting is enabled, they are announced at all punctuation levels. (#8826)
segment.target: Ak je aktivované používanie databázy znakov z Unicode konzorcia, znaky sú oznamované len pri nastavení úrovne interpunkcie na všetka. (#8826)

segment.source: Third party python packages included in NVDA, such as comtypes, now log their warnings and errors to the NVDA log. (#10393)
segment.target: Python Balíky tretíh strán, ktoré sa používajú v NVDA (napríklad comtypes), odteraz zapisujú varovania a chyby do logu NVDA. (#10393)

segment.source: Updated Unicode Common Locale Data Repository emoji annotations to version 36.0. (#10426)
segment.target: Databáza znakov a emoji Unicode konzorcia (CLDR) aktualizovaná na verziu 36.0. (#10426)

segment.source: When focussing a grouping in browse mode, the description is now also read. (#10095)
segment.target: Ak sa v režime prehliadania presunie fokus na zoskupenie, NVDA to oznámy aj s popisom. (#10095)

segment.source: The Java Access Bridge is now included with NVDA to enable access to Java applications, including for 64 bit Java VMs. (#7724)
segment.target: Java Access bridge je odteraz súčasťou NVDA vrátane 64 bit Java VMs, aby bolo možné sprístupňovať Java aplikácie. (#7724)

segment.source: If the Java Access Bridge is not enabled for the user, NVDA automatically enables it at NVDA startup. (#7952)
segment.target: Ak pri štarte NVDA nie je aktívne Java Access Bridge, NVDA ho automaticky zapne. (#7952)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak-NG to 1.51-dev, commit ca65812ac6019926f2fbd7f12c92d7edd3701e0c. (#10581)
segment.target: Hlasový výstup eSpeak NG aktualizovaný na verziu eSpeak-NG to 1.51-dev, commit ca65812ac6019926f2fbd7f12c92d7edd3701e0c. (#10581)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Opravy

segment.source: Emoji and other 32 bit unicode characters now take less space on a braille display when they are shown as hexadecimal values. (#6695)
segment.target: Emoji a iné 32-bitové unicode znaky teraz zaberajú na brailovom riadku menej miesta, ak sú zobrazené ako hexadecimálne hodnoty. (#6695)

segment.source: In Windows 10, NVDA will announce tooltips from universal apps if NVDA is configured to report tooltips in object presentation dialog. (#8118)
segment.target: NVDA bude oznamovať bublinkovú nápovedu aj z moderných aplikácií v systéme Windows 10, ak aktivujete automatické oznamovanie notifikácií v nastaveniach prezentácie objektov. (#8118)

segment.source: On Windows 10 Anniversary Update and later, typed text is now reported in Mintty. (#1348)
segment.target: NVDA od výročnej aktualizácie Windows 10 oznamuje napísané znaky v Mintty. (#1348)

segment.source: On Windows 10 Anniversary Update and later, output in the Windows Console that appears close to the caret is no longer spelled out. (#513)
segment.target: V systéme Windows 10 od výročnej aktualizácie NVDA viac na príkazovom riadku nehláskuje text, ktorý sa objaví blízko kurzora. (#513)

segment.source: Controls in Audacitys compressor dialog are now announced when navigating the dialog. (#10103)
segment.target: NVDA pri pohybe v dialógu kompresora v programe Audacity oznamuje prvky a popisky. (#10103)

segment.source: NVDA no longer treats spaces as words in object review in Scintilla based editors such as Notepad++. (#8295)
segment.target: NVDA viac nepovažuje medzery za slová pri prezeraní objektu v Scintilla textových editoroch (ako napríklad Notepad++). (#8295)

segment.source: NVDA will prevent the system from entering sleep mode when scrolling through text with braille display gestures. (#9175)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz zabráni tomu, aby sa systém prepol do režimu spánku, keď si čítate a posúvate text tlačidlami na brailovom riadku. (#9175)

segment.source: On Windows 10, braille will now follow when editing cell contents in Microsoft Excel and in other UIA text controls where it was lagging behind. (#9749)
segment.target: V systéme Windows 10 brailový kurzor nezaostáva pri editácii buniek v dokumentoch MS excel prípadne v iných UIA prvkoch. (#9749)

segment.source: NVDA will once again report suggestions in the Microsoft Edge address bar. (#7554)
segment.target: NVDA opäť oznamuje návrhy pri písaní v adresnom riadku MS Edge. (#7554)

segment.source: NVDA is no longer silent when focusing an HTML tab control header in Internet Explorer. (#8898)
segment.target: NVDA viac nezmĺkne, ak prejde fokus na HTML hlavičku záložky v prehliadači Internet explorer. (#8898)

segment.source: In Microsoft Edge based on EdgeHTML, NVDA will no longer play search suggestion sound when the window becomes maximized. (#9110, #10002)
segment.target: V prehliadači MS Edge postavenom na Edge HTML viac NVDA neprehráva zvuk návrhu výsledkov vyhľadávania pri maximalizovaní okna. (#9110, #10002)

segment.source: ARIA 1.1 combo boxes are now supported in Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome. (#9616)
segment.target: Zoznamové rámiky ARIA 1.1 sú odteraz podporované v prehliadačoch Mozilla Firefox a Google Chrome. (#9616)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer report content of visually hidden columns for list items in SysListView32 controls. (#8268)
segment.target: NVDA viac neoznamuje obsah skrytých položiek v zoznamoch SysListView32. (#8268)

segment.source: The settings dialog no longer shows "info" as the current log level when in secure mode. (#10209)
segment.target: Úroveň záznamu sa v nastaveniach nezobrazuje ako "info", ak je NVDA spustené v zabezpečenom režime. (#10209)

segment.source: In Start menu for Windows 10 Anniversary Update and later, NVDA will announce details of search results. (#10340)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz oznamuje detaily výsledkov hľadania v ponuke štart od Výročnej aktualizácie Windows 10. (#10232)

segment.source: In browse mode, if moving the cursor or using quick navigation causes the document to change, NVDA no longer speaks incorrect content in some cases. (#8831, #10343)
segment.target: NVDA správne číta dokument, ak sa pri navigácii spoužitím kurzora alebo skratiek rýchlej navigácie v režime prehliadania zmení obsah dokumentu. (#8831, #10343)

segment.source: Some bullet names in Microsoft Word have been corrected. (#10399)
segment.target: Opravené názvy niektorých odrážok v programe MS Word. (#10399)

segment.source: In Windows 10 May 2019 Update and later, NVDA will once again announce first selected emoji or clipboard item when emoji panel and clipboard history opens, respectively. (#9204)
segment.target: Keď otvoríte panel emoji alebo históriu schránky Windows, NVDA opäť automaticky oznámi prvú položku (funguje od systému Windows 10 Máj 2019). (#9204)

segment.source: In Poedit, it is once again possible to view some translations for right to left languages. (#9931)
segment.target: V programe Poedit je možné zobraziť niektoré preklady v jazykoch, ktoré sa čítajú zprava doľava. (#9931)

segment.source: In the Settings app in Windows 10 April 2018 Update and later, NVDA will no longer announce progress bar information for volume meters found in the System/Sound page. (#10412)
segment.target: NVDA viac neopakuje hodnotu indikátorov priebehu pri nastavovaní parametrov zvuku v Systéme Windows 10 od verzie Apríl 2018. (#10284)

segment.source: Invalid regular expressions in speech dictionaries no longer completely break speech in NVDA. (#10334)
segment.target: Ak nesprávne zadáte regulárny výraz v slovníku, nespôsobí to viac zamrznutie a nefunkčnosť reči. (#10334)

segment.source: When reading bulleted items in Microsoft Word with UIA enabled, the bullet from the next list item is no longer inappropriately announced. (#9613)
segment.target: NVDA viac neoznamuje odrážku z nasledujúcej položky v zozname pri čítaní dokumentov MS Word a aktívnom UIA. (#9613)

segment.source: Some rare braille translation issues and errors with liblouis have been resolved. (#9982)
segment.target: Opravené drobné problémy, ktoré nastali pri prekladaní pomocou tabuľky liblouis. (#9982)

segment.source: Java applications started before NVDA are now accessible without the need to restart the Java app. (#10296)
segment.target: Java aplikácie, ktoré boli spustené pred spustením NVDA, sú prístupné a nie je viac potrebné reštartovať Java aplikáciu. (#10296)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, when the focused element becomes marked as current (aria-current), this change is no longer spoken multiple times. (#8960)
segment.target: Ak je v prehliadači Mozilla Firefox označený aktuálny prvok ako aktuálny (pomocou atribútu aria-current), NVDA túto skutočnosť neopakuje viackrát. (#8960)
