segment.source: NVDA will now treat certain composit unicode characters such as e-acute as one single character when moving through text. (#10550)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz spracúva pri pohybe po znakoch viaceré zložené znaky sady Unicode, ako napr E s dĺžňom, ako jeden znak. (#10550)

segment.source: Spring Tool Suite Version 4 is now supported. (#10001)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre Spring Tool Suite od verzie 4. (#10001)

segment.source: Don't double speak name when aria-labelledby relation target is an inner element. (#10552)
segment.target: NVDA viac neopakuje prvok, ak je použité aria-labelledby vo vnorenom prvku. (#10552)

segment.source: On Windows 10 version 1607 and later, typed characters from Braille keyboards are spoken in more situations. (#10569)
segment.target: Od verzie Windows 10 1607 NVDA vo viacerých situáciách oznamuje znaky napísané na brailovom riadku. (#10569)

segment.source: When changing the audio output device, tones played by NVDA will now play through the newly selected device. (#2167)
segment.target: Pri zmene zvukovej karty sa do novej zvukovej karty posiela nie len reč, ale aj ostatné zvuky NVDA. (#2167)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, moving focus in browse mode is faster. This makes moving the cursor in browse mode more responsive in many cases. (#10584)
segment.target: Zrýchlený pohyb kurzora v prehliadači Mozilla Firefox. (#10584)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: Updated Python to 3.7. (#7105)
segment.target: Updated Python to 3.7. (#7105)

segment.source: Updated pySerial to version 3.4. (#8815)
segment.target: Updated pySerial to version 3.4. (#8815)

segment.source: Updated wxPython to 4.0.3 to support Python 3.5 and later. (#9630)
segment.target: Updated wxPython to 4.0.3 to support Python 3.5 and later. (#9630)

segment.source: Updated six to version 1.12.0. (#9630)
segment.target: Updated six to version 1.12.0. (#9630)

segment.source: Updated py2exe to version 0.9.3.2 (in development, commit b372a8e from albertosottile/py2exe#13). (#9856)
segment.target: Updated py2exe to version 0.9.3.2 (in development, commit b372a8e from albertosottile/py2exe#13). (#9856)

segment.source: Updated UIAutomationCore.dll comtypes module to version 10.0.18362. (#9829)
segment.target: Updated UIAutomationCore.dll comtypes module to version 10.0.18362. (#9829)

segment.source: The tab-completion in the Python console only suggests attributes starting with an underscore if the underscore is first typed. (#9918)
segment.target: The tab-completion in the Python console only suggests attributes starting with an underscore if the underscore is first typed. (#9918)

segment.source: Flake8 linting tool has been integrated with SCons reflecting code requirements for Pull Requests. (#5918)
segment.target: Flake8 linting tool has been integrated with SCons reflecting code requirements for Pull Requests. (#5918)

segment.source: As NVDA no longer depends on pyWin32, modules such as win32api and win32con are no longer available to add-ons. (#9639)
segment.target: As NVDA no longer depends on pyWin32, modules such as win32api and win32con are no longer available to add-ons. (#9639)

segment.source: win32api calls can be replaced with direct calls to win32 dll functions via ctypes.
segment.target: win32api calls can be replaced with direct calls to win32 dll functions via ctypes.

segment.source: win32con constants should be defined in your files.
segment.target: win32con constants should be defined in your files.

segment.source: The "async" argument in nvwave.playWaveFile has been renamed to "asynchronous". (#8607)
segment.target: The "async" argument in nvwave.playWaveFile has been renamed to "asynchronous". (#8607)

segment.source: speakText and speakCharacter methods on synthDriver objects are no longer supported.
segment.target: speakText and speakCharacter methods on synthDriver objects are no longer supported.

segment.source: This functionality is handled by SynthDriver.speak.
segment.target: This functionality is handled by SynthDriver.speak.

segment.source: SynthSetting classes in synthDriverHandler have been removed. Now use driverHandler.DriverSetting classes instead.
segment.target: SynthSetting classes in synthDriverHandler have been removed. Now use driverHandler.DriverSetting classes instead.

segment.source: SynthDriver classes should no longer expose index via the lastIndex property.
segment.target: SynthDriver classes should no longer expose index via the lastIndex property.

segment.source: Instead, they should notify the synthDriverHandler.synthIndexReached action with the index, once all previous audio has finished playing before that index.
segment.target: Instead, they should notify the synthDriverHandler.synthIndexReached action with the index, once all previous audio has finished playing before that index.

segment.source: SynthDriver classes must now notify the synthDriverHandler.synthDoneSpeaking action, once all audio from a SynthDriver.speak call has completed playing.
segment.target: SynthDriver classes must now notify the synthDriverHandler.synthDoneSpeaking action, once all audio from a SynthDriver.speak call has completed playing.

segment.source: SynthDriver classes must support the speech.PitchCommand in their speak method, as changes in pitch for speak spelling now depends on this functionality.
segment.target: SynthDriver classes must support the speech.PitchCommand in their speak method, as changes in pitch for speak spelling now depends on this functionality.

segment.source: The speech function getSpeechTextForProperties has been renamed to getPropertiesSpeech. (#10098)
segment.target: The speech function getSpeechTextForProperties has been renamed to getPropertiesSpeech. (#10098)

segment.source: The braille function getBrailleTextForProperties has been renamed to getPropertiesBraille. (#10469)
segment.target: The braille function getBrailleTextForProperties has been renamed to getPropertiesBraille. (#10469)

segment.source: Several speech functions have been changed to return speech sequences. (#10098)
segment.target: Several speech functions have been changed to return speech sequences. (#10098)

segment.source: getControlFieldSpeech
segment.target: getControlFieldSpeech

segment.source: getFormatFieldSpeech
segment.target: getFormatFieldSpeech

segment.source: getSpeechTextForProperties now called getPropertiesSpeech
segment.target: getSpeechTextForProperties now called getPropertiesSpeech

segment.source: getIndentationSpeech
segment.target: getIndentationSpeech

segment.source: getTableInfoSpeech
segment.target: getTableInfoSpeech

segment.source: Added a textUtils module to simplify string differences between Python 3 strings and Windows unicode strings. (#9545)
segment.target: Added a textUtils module to simplify string differences between Python 3 strings and Windows unicode strings. (#9545)

segment.source: See the module documentation and textInfos.offsets module for example implementations.
segment.target: See the module documentation and textInfos.offsets module for example implementations.

segment.source: Deprecated functionality now removed. (#9548)
segment.target: Deprecated functionality now removed. (#9548)

segment.source: AppModules removed:
segment.target: AppModules removed:

segment.source: Windows XP sound recorder.
segment.target: Windows XP sound recorder.

segment.source: Klango Player, which is abandoned software.
segment.target: Klango Player, which is abandoned software.

segment.source: configobj.validate wrapper removed.
segment.target: configobj.validate wrapper removed.

segment.source: New code should use from configobj import validate instead of import validate
segment.target: New code should use from configobj import validate instead of import validate

segment.source: textInfos.Point and textInfos.Rect replaced by locationHelper.Point and locationHelper.RectLTRB respectively.
segment.target: textInfos.Point and textInfos.Rect replaced by locationHelper.Point and locationHelper.RectLTRB respectively.

segment.source: braille.BrailleHandler._get_tether and braille.BrailleHandler.set_tether have been removed.
segment.target: braille.BrailleHandler._get_tether and braille.BrailleHandler.set_tether have been removed.

segment.source: config.getConfigDirs has been removed.
segment.target: config.getConfigDirs has been removed.

segment.source: config.ConfigManager.getConfigValidationParameter has been replaced by getConfigValidation
segment.target: config.ConfigManager.getConfigValidationParameter has been replaced by getConfigValidation

segment.source: inputCore.InputGesture.logIdentifier property has been removed.
segment.target: inputCore.InputGesture.logIdentifier property has been removed.

segment.source: Use _get_identifiers in inputCore.InputGesture instead.
segment.target: Use _get_identifiers in inputCore.InputGesture instead.

segment.source: synthDriverHandler.SynthDriver.speakText/speakCharacter have been removed.
segment.target: synthDriverHandler.SynthDriver.speakText/speakCharacter have been removed.

segment.source: Removed several synthDriverHandler.SynthSetting classes.
segment.target: Removed several synthDriverHandler.SynthSetting classes.

segment.source: Previously kept for backwards compatibility (#8214), now considered obsolete.
segment.target: Previously kept for backwards compatibility (#8214), now considered obsolete.

segment.source: Drivers that used the SynthSetting classes should be updated to use the DriverSetting classes.
segment.target: Drivers that used the SynthSetting classes should be updated to use the DriverSetting classes.

segment.source: Some legacy code has been removed, particularly:
segment.target: Some legacy code has been removed, particularly:

segment.source: Support for the Outlook pre 2003 message list.
segment.target: Support for the Outlook pre 2003 message list.

segment.source: An overlay class for the classic start menu, only found in Windows Vista and earlier.
segment.target: An overlay class for the classic start menu, only found in Windows Vista and earlier.

segment.source: Dropped support for Skype 7, as it is definitely not working any more.
segment.target: Dropped support for Skype 7, as it is definitely not working any more.

segment.source: Added a framework to create vision enhancement providers; modules that can change screen contents, optionally based on input from NVDA about object locations. (#9064)
segment.target: Added a framework to create vision enhancement providers; modules that can change screen contents, optionally based on input from NVDA about object locations. (#9064)

segment.source: Add-ons can bundle their own providers in a visionEnhancementProviders folder.
segment.target: Add-ons can bundle their own providers in a visionEnhancementProviders folder.

segment.source: See the vision and visionEnhancementProviders modules for the implementation of the framework and examples, respectively.
segment.target: See the vision and visionEnhancementProviders modules for the implementation of the framework and examples, respectively.

segment.source: Vision enhancement providers are enabled and configured via the 'vision' category in NVDA's settings dialog.
segment.target: Vision enhancement providers are enabled and configured via the 'vision' category in NVDA's settings dialog.

segment.source: Abstract class properties are now supported on objects that inherit from baseObject.AutoPropertyObject (e.g. NVDAObjects and TextInfos). (#10102)
segment.target: Abstract class properties are now supported on objects that inherit from baseObject.AutoPropertyObject (e.g. NVDAObjects and TextInfos). (#10102)

segment.source: Introduced displayModel.UNIT_DISPLAYCHUNK as a textInfos unit constant specific to DisplayModelTextInfo. (#10165)
segment.target: Introduced displayModel.UNIT_DISPLAYCHUNK as a textInfos unit constant specific to DisplayModelTextInfo. (#10165)

segment.source: This new constant allows walking over the text in a DisplayModelTextInfo in a way that more closely resembles how the text chunks are saved in the underlying model.
segment.target: This new constant allows walking over the text in a DisplayModelTextInfo in a way that more closely resembles how the text chunks are saved in the underlying model.

segment.source: displayModel.getCaretRect now returns an instance of locationHelper.RectLTRB. (#10233)
segment.target: displayModel.getCaretRect now returns an instance of locationHelper.RectLTRB. (#10233)

segment.source: The UNIT_CONTROLFIELD and UNIT_FORMATFIELD constants have been moved from virtualBuffers.VirtualBufferTextInfo to the textInfos package. (#10396)
segment.target: The UNIT_CONTROLFIELD and UNIT_FORMATFIELD constants have been moved from virtualBuffers.VirtualBufferTextInfo to the textInfos package. (#10396)

segment.source: For every entry in the NVDA log, information about the originating thread is now included. (#10259)
segment.target: For every entry in the NVDA log, information about the originating thread is now included. (#10259)

segment.source: UIA TextInfo objects can now be moved/expanded by the page, story and formatField text units. (#10396)
segment.target: UIA TextInfo objects can now be moved/expanded by the page, story and formatField text units. (#10396)

segment.source: External modules (appModules and globalPlugins) are now less likely to be able to break the creation of NVDAObjects.
segment.target: External modules (appModules and globalPlugins) are now less likely to be able to break the creation of NVDAObjects.

segment.source: Exceptions caused by the "chooseNVDAObjectOverlayClasses" and "event_NVDAObject_init" methods are now properly caught and logged.
segment.target: Exceptions caused by the "chooseNVDAObjectOverlayClasses" and "event_NVDAObject_init" methods are now properly caught and logged.

segment.source: The aria.htmlNodeNameToAriaLandmarkRoles dictionary has been renamed to aria.htmlNodeNameToAriaRoles. It now also contains roles that aren't landmarks.
segment.target: The aria.htmlNodeNameToAriaLandmarkRoles dictionary has been renamed to aria.htmlNodeNameToAriaRoles. It now also contains roles that aren't landmarks.

segment.source: scriptHandler.isCurrentScript has been removed due to lack of use. There is no replacement. (#8677)
segment.target: scriptHandler.isCurrentScript has been removed due to lack of use. There is no replacement. (#8677)

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix several crashes present in 2019.2. Fixes include:
segment.target: Toto je malá aktualizácia, ktorá opravuje chyby spôsobené aktualizáciou 2019.2. KOnkrétne:

segment.source: Addressed several crashes in Gmail seen in both Firefox and Chrome when interacting with particular popup menus such as when creating filters or changing certain Gmail settings. (#10175, #9402, #8924)
segment.target: NVDA viac nepadá pri použití webovej aplikácie Gmail v prehliadačoch Firefox a Chrome v prípadoch, keď sa zobrazilo vyskakovacie menu pri zmene nastavení alebo vytváraní filtrov. (#10175, #9402, #8924)

segment.source: In Windows 7, NVDA no longer causes Windows Explorer to crash when the mouse is used in the start menu. (#9435)
segment.target: NVDA viac nepadá v prieskumníkovi v systéme Windows 7, ak v menu štart použijete myš. (#9435)

segment.source: Windows Explorer on Windows 7 no longer crashes when accessing metadata edit fields. (#5337)
segment.target: NVDA nespôsobuje pád prieskumníka v systéme Windows 7 pri prezeraní metadát súborov. (#5337)

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes when interacting with images with a base64 URI in Mozilla Firefox or Google Chrome. (#10227)
segment.target: NVDA nezamrzne, keď pri prezeraní dokumentu v prehliadačoch Firefox a Chrome narazíte na obrázok base64 URI. (#10227)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include auto detection of Freedom Scientific braille displays, an experimental setting in the Advanced panel to stop browse mode from automatically moving focus (which may provide performance improvements), a rate boost option for the Windows OneCore synthesizer to achieve very fast rates, and many other bug fixes.
segment.target: Prednosti tejto verzie zahŕňajú automatickú detekciu brailových riadkov od spoločnosti Freedom Scientific, pridanú experimentálnu možnosť vypnúť aktualizáciu fokusu v režime prehliadania (čím sa môže zrýchliť prehliadanie), možnosť znásobenia rýchlosti pri hlasoch Onecore a ďalšie užitočné funkcie.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nové vlastnosti

segment.source: NVDA's Miranda NG support works with newer versions of the client. (#9053)
segment.target: Podpora pre klienta Miranda NG funguje aj s novšími verziami aplikácie Miranda. (#9053)

segment.source: You can now disable browse mode by default by disabling the new "Enable browse mode on page load" option in NVDA's browse mode settings. (#8716)
segment.target: Odteraz je možné NVDA nastaviť tak, aby sa neaktivoval režim prehliadania automaticky po načítaní dokumentu alebo aplikácie. Nastavenie hľadajte v kategórii Režim prehliadania. (#8716)

segment.source: Note that when this option is disabled, you can still enable browse mode manually by pressing NVDA+space.
segment.target: Aj v tomto prípade je možné aktivovať režim prehliadania ručne skratkou NVDA+medzera.

segment.source: You can now filter symbols in the punctuation/symbol pronunciation dialog, similar to how filtering works in the elements list and input gestures dialog. (#5761)
segment.target: V dialógu Výslovnosť interpunkčných a špeciálnych symbolov môžete odteraz filtrovať znaky aj pomocou editačného poľa tak, ako ste zvyknutí v zozname prvkov a klávesových skratiek. (#5761)

segment.source: A command has been added to change the mouse text unit resolution (how much text will be spoken when the mouse moves), it has not been assigned a default gesture. (#9056)
segment.target: Odteraz si môžete definovať klávesovú skratku, ktorá bude prepínať, koľko textu prečíta NVDA pri pohybe kurzorom myši. Skratka predvolene nie je definovaná, treba ju nastaviť v dialógu Klávesové skratky. (#9056)

segment.source: The windows OneCore synthesizer now has a rate boost option, which allows for significantly faster speech. (#7498)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora znásobenia tempa pre hlasy Windows onecore. Hlasy je odteraz možné nastaviť, aby hovorili rýchlejšie. (#7498)

segment.source: The Rate Boost option is now configurable from the Synth Settings Ring for supported speech synthesizers. (Currently eSpeak-NG and Windows OneCore). (#8934)
segment.target: Znásobenie tempa je odteraz možné vypnúť a zapnúť aj klávesovými skratkami v kruhu nastavení hlasového výstupu. Túto možnosť v súčasnosti podporuje hlas eSpeak a Hlasy Onecore. (#8934)

segment.source: Configuration profiles can now be manually activated with gestures. (#4209)
segment.target: Každému konfiguračnému profilu môžete odteraz priradiť klávesovú skratku. (#4209)

segment.source: The gesture must be configured in the "Input gestures" dialog.
segment.target: Skratku nastavíte v dialógu Klávesové skratky.

segment.source: In Eclipse, added support for autocompletion in code editor. (#5667)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre automatické dopĺňanie v editore kódu Eclipse. (#5667)

segment.source: Additionally, Javadoc information can be read from the editor when it is present by using NVDA+d.
segment.target: Navyše je odteraz možné prečítať informáciu Javadoc po stlačení skratky NVDA+d.

segment.source: Added an experimental option to the Advanced Settings panel that allows you to stop the system focus from following the browse mode cursor (Automatically set system focus to focusable elements). (#2039) Although this may not be suitable to turn off for all websites, this may fix:
segment.target: V časti Pokročilé nastavenia pribudlo nastavenie Automaticky presúvať fokus na zamerané prvky. Ak je vypnuté, systémový fokus nesleduje pohyb kurzora v režime prehliadania. (#2039) Neodporúčame vypnúť túto možnosť pri všetkých webových stránkach, ale môže to pomôcť vyriešiť nasledujúce problémy:

segment.source: Rubber band effect: NVDA sporadically undoes the last browse mode keystroke by jumping to the previous location.
segment.target: Ak NVDA po stlačení skratky najprv prejde na požadovaný objekt, a potom sa vráti naspäť na pôvodné miesto.

segment.source: Edit boxes steal system focus when arrowing down through them on some websites.
segment.target: Pri pohybe cez editačné polia sa stratí systémový fokus.

segment.source: Browse mode keystrokes are slow to respond.
segment.target: Skratky v režime prehliadania reagujú pomaly.

segment.source: For braille display drivers that support it, driver settings can now be changed from the braille settings category in NVDA's settings dialog. (#7452)
segment.target: Pri vybraných brailových riadkoch je odteraz možné meniť nastavenia ovládača priamo v nastaveniach NVDA. (#7452)

segment.source: Freedom Scientific braille displays are now supported by braille display auto detection. (#7727)
segment.target: Odteraz funguje automatická detekcia aj pre brailové riadky od Freedom Scientific. (#7727)

segment.source: Added a command to show the replacement for the symbol under the review cursor. (#9286)
segment.target: Pridaná funkcia na zobrazenie nahradenia symbolu. (#9286)

segment.source: Added an experimental option to the Advanced Settings panel that allows you to try out a new, work-in-progress rewrite of NVDA's Windows Console support using the Microsoft UI Automation API. (#9614)
segment.target: V pokročilých nastaveniach pridaná možnosť zapnúť experimentálnu podporu pre príkazové riadky Windows v režime UI Automation. (#9614)

segment.source: In the Python Console, the input field now supports pasting multiple lines from the clipboard. (#9776)
segment.target: Do textového poľa v Python konzole je odteraz možné naraz vložiť viac riadkov kódu. (#9776)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Zmeny

segment.source: Synthesizer volume is now increased and decreased by 5 instead of 10 when using the settings ring. (#6754)
segment.target: Pri zmene hlasitosti cez kruh nastavení hlasového výstupu sa posúva úroveň po 5 a nie po 10. (#6754)

segment.source: Clarified the text in the add-on manager when NVDA is launched with the --disable-addons flag. (#9473)
segment.target: Upravený text, ktorý sa zobrazí v správcovi doplnkov, ak je NVDA spustené s vypnutými doplnkami. (#9473)

segment.source: Updated Unicode Common Locale Data Repository emoji annotations to version 35.0. (#9445)
segment.target: Aktualizovaná databáza Unicode Common na verziu 35.0. (#9445)

segment.source: The hotkey for the filter field in the elements list in browse mode has changed to alt+y. (#8728)
segment.target: Aktualizovaná sada tabuliek liblouis na verziu 3.10.0. (#9439, #9678)

segment.source: When an auto detected braille display is connected via Bluetooth, NVDA will keep searching for USB displays supported by the same driver and switch to a USB connection if it becomes available. (#8853)
segment.target: Aktualizovaný hlasový výstup eSpeak-NG na verziu 67324cc.

segment.source: Updated eSpeak-NG to commit 67324cc.
segment.target: Zjednotené klávesové skratky pre editačné pole Filter. V Slovenskej verzii sa teraz všade používa alt+E, v Anglickej alt+y. (#8728)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to version 3.10.0. (#9439, #9678)
segment.target: Ak je automaticky detegovaný brailový riadok cez Bluetooth, NVDA bude pokračovať v hľadaní ďalších riadkov cez USB. Ak taký riadok nájde, automaticky pripojí tento riadok. (#8853)

segment.source: NVDA will now report the word 'selected' after reporting the text a user has just selected.(#9028, #9909)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz oznamuje najprv vybratý text a až potom hlásenie "vybraté". (#9028, #9909)

segment.source: In Microsoft Visual Studio Code, NVDA is in focus mode by default. (#9828)
segment.target: V Microsoft Visual Studio Code je predvolene vypnutý režim prehliadania. (#9828)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Opravy

segment.source: NVDA no longer crashes when an add-on directory is empty. (#7686)
segment.target: NVDA viac nezamrzne, ak je priečinok s doplnkami prázdny. (#7686)

segment.source: LTR and RTL marks are no longer reported in Braille or per-character speech when accessing the properties window. (#8361)
segment.target: Značky LTR a RTL sa viac nezobrazujú vo vlastnostiach súboru pri zobrazení na brailovom riadku alebo pri prezeraní po znakoch. (#8361)

segment.source: When jumping to form fields with Browse Mode quick navigation, the entire form field is now announced rather than just the first line. (#9388)
segment.target: Pri skoku na prvok formulára je odteraz oznámený celý prvok, nie len prvý riadok. (#9388)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer become silent after exiting the Windows 10 Mail app. (#9341)
segment.target: Opravená chyba, ktorá spôsobovala, že pri ukončení aplikácie Pošta vo Windows 10 NVDA prestalo rozprávať. (#9341)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to start when the users regional settings are set to a locale unknown to NVDA, such as English (Netherlands). (#8726)
segment.target: NVDA sa odteraz spustí aj v prípade, ak je jazyk systému nastavený na jazyk, ktorý je pre NVDA neznámi, napríklad Angličtina (Holandsko). (#8726)

segment.source: When browse mode is enabled in Microsoft Excel and you switch to a browser in focus mode or vice versa, browse mode state is now reported appropriately. (#8846)
segment.target: NVDA správne oznamuje stav režimu prehliadania, ak aktivujete režim prehliadania v programe Excel, prepnete sa do internetového prehliadača a vrátite sa späť do Excelu. (#8846)

segment.source: NVDA now properly reports the line at the mouse cursor in Notepad++ and other Scintilla based editors. (#5450)
segment.target: NVDA správne oznamuje riadky zamerané myšou v aplikácii Notepad++ a iných editoroch využívajúcich Scintilla rozhranie. (#5450)

segment.source: In Google Docs (and other web-based editors), braille no longer sometimes incorrectly shows "lst end" before the cursor in the middle of a list item. (#9477)
segment.target: V aplikácii Google dokumenty a iných webových editoroch sa viac na brailových riadkoch nezobrazuje koniec zoznamu pred kurzorom uprostred zoznamu. (#9477)

segment.source: In the Windows 10 May 2019 Update, NVDA no longer speaks many volume notifications if changing the volume with hardware buttons when File Explorer has focus. (#9466)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz neopakuje notifikáciu o zmene hlasitosti, ak je spustená aktualizácia Windows 10 z mája 2019, máte otvorené okno správcu súborov a meníte hlasitosť pomocou hardwarových tlačidiel. (#9466)

segment.source: Loading the punctuation/symbol pronunciation dialog is now much faster when using symbol dictionaries containing over 1000 entries. (#8790)
segment.target: Zrýchlené načítanie dialógu na úpravu výslovnosti symbolov, ak zoznam symbolov obsahuje viac ako 1000 položiek. (#8790)

segment.source: In Scintilla controls such as Notepad++, NVDA can read the correct line when wordwrap is enabled. (#9424)
segment.target: V rozhraní Scintilla (ako napríklad Notepad++) NVDA dokáže správne čítať riadok aj vtedy, ak je zapnuté zalamovanie riadkov. (#9424)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, the cell location is announced after it changes due to the shift+enter or shift+numpadEnter gestures. (#9499)
segment.target: Ak sa zmení pozícia bunky v tabuľke MS Excel pri použití skratiek shift+enter alebo shift+numerický enter, NVDA túto zmenu ohlási. (#9499)

segment.source: In Visual Studio 2017 and up, in the Objects Explorer window, the selected item in objects tree or members tree with categories is now reported correctly. (#9311)
segment.target: Odteraz je správne oznamovaný objekt v strome objektov alebo členov s kategóriami v zozname objektov v aplikácii Visual Studio od verzie 2017. (#9311)

segment.source: Add-ons with names that only differ in capitalization are no longer treated as separate add-ons. (#9334)
segment.target: Pri rozpoznávaní doplnkov NVDA viac nerozlišuje malé a veľké písmená. (#9334)

segment.source: For Windows OneCore voices, the rate set in NVDA is no longer affected by the rate set in Windows 10 Speech Settings. (#7498)
segment.target: Nastavenie rýchlosti hlasu Onecore v systéme Windows viac neovplyvňuje nastavenie v NVDA. (#7498)

segment.source: The log can now be opened with NVDA+F1 when there is no developer info for the current navigator object. (#8613)
segment.target: Odteraz je možné otvoriť log NVDA skratkou NVDA+F1 aj vtedy, ak zameraný objekt neobsahuje informáciu pre vývojárov. (#8613)

segment.source: It is again possible to use NVDA's table navigation commands in Google Docs, in Firefox and Chrome. (#9494)
segment.target: Odteraz je opäť možné použiť skratky na navigáciu po tabuľkách v Google dokumentoch v prehliadačoch Firefox a Chrome. (#9494)

segment.source: The bumper keys now work correctly on Freedom Scientific braille displays. (#8849)
segment.target: Všetky tlačidlá opäť správne fungujú na brailových riadkoch od Freedom Scientific. (#8849)

segment.source: When reading the first character of a document in Notepad++ 7.7 X64, NVDA no longer freezes for up to ten seconds. (#9609)
segment.target: NVDA viac nezamrzne, ak presuniete kurzor na prvý znak v dokumente Notepad++ 7.7 X64. (#9609)

segment.source: HTCom can now be used with a Handy Tech Braille display in combination with NVDA. (#9691)
segment.target: HTCom je možné používať s brailovými riadkami od Handy Tech v kombinácii s NVDA. (#9691)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, updates to a live region are no longer reported if the live region is in a background tab. (#1318)
segment.target: V prehliadači Mozilla Firefox NVDA neoznamuje zmeny v live regione, ak sa aktualizuje na neaktívnej záložke. (#1318)

segment.source: NVDA's browse mode Find dialog no longer fails to function if NVDA's About dialog is currently open in the background. (#8566)
segment.target: Vyhľadávanie v režime prehliadania funguje aj vtedy, ak je otvorený dialóg s informáciami o NVDA. (#8566)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: You can now set the "disableBrowseModeByDefault" property on app modules to leave browse mode off by default. (#8846)
segment.target: You can now set the "disableBrowseModeByDefault" property on app modules to leave browse mode off by default. (#8846)

segment.source: The extended window style of a window is now exposed using the `extendedWindowStyle` property on Window objects and their derivatives. (#9136)
segment.target: The extended window style of a window is now exposed using the `extendedWindowStyle` property on Window objects and their derivatives. (#9136)

segment.source: Updated comtypes package to 1.1.7. (#9440, #8522)
segment.target: Updated comtypes package to 1.1.7. (#9440, #8522)

segment.source: When using the report module info command, the order of information has changed to present the module first. (#7338)
segment.target: When using the report module info command, the order of information has changed to present the module first. (#7338)

segment.source: Added an example to demonstrate using nvdaControllerClient.dll from C#. (#9600)
segment.target: Added an example to demonstrate using nvdaControllerClient.dll from C#. (#9600)

segment.source: Added a new isWin10 function to the winVersion module which returns whether or not this copy of NVDA is running on (at least) the supplied release version of Windows 10 (such as 1903). (#9761)
segment.target: Added a new isWin10 function to the winVersion module which returns whether or not this copy of NVDA is running on (at least) the supplied release version of Windows 10 (such as 1903). (#9761)

segment.source: The NVDA Python console now contains more useful modules in its namespace (such as appModules, globalPlugins, config and textInfos). (#9789)
segment.target: The NVDA Python console now contains more useful modules in its namespace (such as appModules, globalPlugins, config and textInfos). (#9789)

segment.source: The result of the last executed command in the NVDA Python console is now accessible from the _ (line) variable. (#9782)
segment.target: The result of the last executed command in the NVDA Python console is now accessible from the _ (line) variable. (#9782)

segment.source: Note that this shadows the gettext translation function also called "_". To access the translation function: del _
segment.target: Note that this shadows the gettext translation function also called "_". To access the translation function: del _

segment.source: This point release fixes the following bugs:
segment.target: V tejto verzii boli opravené nasledujúce chyby:

segment.source: NVDA no longer causes Excel 2007 to crash or refuses to report if a cell has a formula. (#9431)
segment.target: Opravená chyba, ktorá spôsobila pád aplikácie MS Excel alebo nesprávne oznamovanie buniek v tabuľke, ak boli použité vzorce. (#9431)

segment.source: Google Chrome no longer crashes when interacting with certain listboxes. (#9364)
segment.target: Opravená chyba, ktorá spôsobovala pád Google chrome pri niektorých zoznamových rámikoch. (#9364)

segment.source: An issue has been fixed which prevented copying a users configuration to the system configuration profile. (#9448)
segment.target: Opravená chyba, ktorá spôsobovala nemožnosť skopírovať nastavenia NVDA do systémového priečinka. (#9448)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel, NVDA again uses the localized message when reporting the location of merged cells. (#9471)
segment.target: Opravená chyba, ktorá spôsobovala, že v aplikácii MS Excel NVDA oznamovalo umiestnenie a názvy zlúčených buniek v Angličtine. (#9471)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include performance improvements when accessing both Microsoft word and Excel, stability and security improvements such as support for add-ons with version compatibility information, and many other bug fixes.
segment.target: Prednosti tejto verzie zahŕňajú vylepšenia pri používaní aplikácií Word a Excel, úpravy týkajúce sa stability a bezpečnosti, keďže sa vyžaduje väčšia kontrola kompatibility doplnkov a pár ďalších vylepšení.

segment.source: Please note that starting from this release of NVDA, custom appModules, globalPlugins, braille display drivers and synth drivers will no longer be automatically loaded from your NVDA user configuration directory.
segment.target: Od tejto verzie NVDA automaticky nebude načítavať aplikačné moduly, ovládače pre brailové riadky, hlasové výstupy a globálne pluginy uložené priamo v adresári s nastaveniami NVDA.

segment.source: Rather these should be installed as part of an NVDA add-on. For those developing code for an add-on, code for testing can be placed in a new developer scratchpad directory in the NVDA user configuration directory, if the Developer scratchpad option is turned on in NVDA's new Advanced settings panel.
segment.target: Pre bežné použitie by mali byť skompilované ako doplnok nvda-addon. Ak pracujete na vývoji doplnku a potrebujete testovať svoj kód, začiarknite v pokročilých nastaveniach načítanie vlastných modulov a následne uložte súbory do priečinka scratchpad v priečinku s vašou konfiguráciou NVDA.

segment.source: These changes are necessary to better ensure compatibility of custom code, so that NVDA does not break when this code becomes incompatible with newer releases.
segment.target: Tieto zmeny sú dôležité, aby sme zaistili kompatibilitu vlastnoručne písaného kódu, a aby nedochádzalo k pádom NVDA v prípade, že po aktualizácii prestane byť kód nekompatibilný.

segment.source: Please refer to the list of changes further down for more details on this and how add-ons are now better versioned.
segment.target: Podrobnosti nájdete popísané nižšie v zozname zmien.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nové vlastnosti

segment.source: New braille tables: Afrikaans, Arabic 8 dot computer braille, Arabic grade 2, Spanish grade 2. (#4435, #9186)
segment.target: Pridané nové brailové tabuľky: Afrikánčina, Arabský 8-bodový počítačový kód, Arabčina skratkopis, Španielčina skratkopis. (#4435, #9186)

segment.source: Added an option to NVDA's mouse settings to make NVDA handle situations where the mouse is controlled by another application. (#8452)
segment.target: V nastaveniach môžete určiť, ako sa má NVDA správať, ak s myšou pracuje iná aplikácia. (#8452)

segment.source: This will allow NVDA to track the mouse when a system is controlled remotely using TeamViewer or other remote control software.
segment.target: Toto umožňuje sledovať kurzor myši aj v prípade, ak ju ovláda napríklad aplikácia TeamViewer.

segment.source: Added the `--enable-start-on-logon` command line parameter to allow configuring whether silent installations of NVDA set NVDA to start at Windows logon or not. Specify true to start at logon or false to not start at logon. If the --enable-start-on-logon argument is not specified at all then NVDA will default to starting at logon, unless it was already configured not to by a previous installation. (#8574)
segment.target: Pri inštalácii NVDA z príkazového riadka je možné použiť parameter `--enable-start-on-logon`. Pomocou tohto parametra je možné určiť, či chcete NVDA spúšťať po prihlásení do systému (hodnota true) alebo NVDA nechcete spúšťať automaticky (hodnota false). Ak nie je tento parameter určený, pri prvej inštalácii NVDA sa bude predvolene NVDA spúšťať po štarte systému. Ak ide o aktualizáciu NVDA, kde používateľ určil, že sa nemá NVDA spúšťať po štarte, bude toto nastavenie zachované. (#8574)

segment.source: It is possible to turn NVDA's logging features off by setting logging level to "disabled" from General settings panel. (#8516)
segment.target: Vo všeobecných nastaveniach je teraz možné vypnúť zaznamenávanie do log súboru nastavením hodnoty na "zakázaný". (#8516)

segment.source: The presence of formulae in LibreOffice and Apache OpenOffice spreadsheets is now reported. (#860)
segment.target: Odteraz sú oznamované vzorce v aplikáciách LibreOffice a tabuľkách Apache OpenOffice. (#860)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome, browse mode now reports the selected item in list boxes and trees.
segment.target: V prehliadačoch Mozilla Firefox a Google Chrome NVDA oznamuje vybraté položky v stromoch a zoznamoch.

segment.source: This works in Firefox 66 and later.
segment.target: Toto funguje od verzie Firefox 66.

segment.source: This does not work for certain list boxes (HTML select controls) in Chrome.
segment.target: Toto nefunguje v niektorých zoznamoch (HTML select controls) v prehliadači Chrome.

segment.source: Early support for apps such as Mozilla Firefox on computers with ARM64 (e.g. Qualcomm Snapdragon) processors. (#9216)
segment.target: Prvotná podpora pre aplikácie ako napríklad Mozilla Firefox na počítačoch s procesorom ARM64 (napríklad Qualcomm Snapdragon). (#9216)

segment.source: A new Advanced Settings category has been added to NVDA's Settings dialog, including an option to try out NVDA's new support for Microsoft Word via the Microsoft UI Automation API. (#9200)
segment.target: V nastaveniach sme pridali novú kategóriu pokročilé. Tu je napríklad možné zapnúť podporu pre Office aplikácie cez UI Automation. (#9200)

segment.source: Added support for the graphical view in Windows Disk Management. (#1486)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre grafické rozhranie v aplikácii správa diskov. (#1486)

segment.source: Added support for Handy Tech Connect Braille and Basic Braille 84. (#9249)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre brailové riadky Handy Tech Connect Braille a Basic Braille 84. (#9249)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: zmeny

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to version 3.8.0. (#9013)
segment.target: Prekladová tabuľka liblouis aktualizovaná na verziu 3.8.0. (#9013)

segment.source: Add-on authors now can enforce a minimum required NVDA version for their add-ons. NVDA will refuse to install or load an add-on whose minimum required NVDA version is higher than the current NVDA version. (#6275)
segment.target: Autori doplnkov teraz môžu určiť minimálnu verziu NVDA, s ktorou ich doplnok spolupracuje. NVDA nenačíta a nenainštaluje doplnky, ktoré vyžadujú novšiu verziu NVDA. (#6275)

segment.source: Add-on authors can now specify the last version of NVDA the add-on has been tested against. If an add-on has been only tested against a version of NVDA lower than the current version, then NVDA will refuse to install or load the add-on. (#6275)
segment.target: Autori doplnkov môžu určiť, s ktorou verziou NVDA bol doplnok testovaný. Ak bol doplnok testovaný so staršou verziou NVDA, opäť NVDA nenainštaluje a nenačíta doplnok. (#6275)

segment.source: This version of NVDA will allow installing and loading of add-ons that do not yet contain Minimum and Last Tested NVDA version information, but upgrading to future versions of NVDA (E.g. 2019.2) may automatically cause these older add-ons to be disabled.
segment.target: Táto verzia NVDA ešte načíta doplnky, ktoré nemajú špecifikovanú minimálnu a poslednú vyžadovanú verziu NVDA. Po aktualizácii na verziu 2019.2 však môžu byť tieto doplnky zakázané.

segment.source: The move mouse to navigator object command is now available in Microsoft Word as well as for UIA controls, particularly Microsoft Edge. (#7916, #8371)
segment.target: Príkaz presunúť myš na miesto zamerané objektovou navigáciou je teraz dostupný v aplikácii MS Word a v UIA prvkoch, konkrétne v aplikácii Microsoft Edge. (#7916, #8371)

segment.source: Reporting of text under the mouse has been improved within Microsoft Edge and other UIA applications. (#8370)
segment.target: Vylepšené oznamovanie textu pod kurzorom myši v aplikácii MS Edge a iných UIA aplikáciách. (#8370)

segment.source: When NVDA is started with the `--portable-path` command line parameter, the provided path is automatically filled in when trying to create a portable copy of NVDA using the NVDA menu. (#8623)
segment.target: Ak je NVDA spustené s argumentom `--portable-path`, pri vytváraní prenosnej verzie sa vyplní cesta z argumentu. (#8623)

segment.source: Updated the path to the Norwegian braille table to reflect the standard from the year 2015. (#9170)
segment.target: Opravená cesta pre Nórsku brailovú tabuľku, čím sa odteraz rešpektuje kodifikácia z roku 2015. (#9170)

segment.source: When navigating by paragraph (control+up or down arrows) or navigating by table cell (control+alt+arrows), the existence of spelling errors will no longer be announced, even if NVDA is configured to announce these automatically. This is because paragraphs and table cells can be quite large, and detecting spelling errors in some applications can be very costly. (#9217)
segment.target: Pri pohybe po odsekoch (ctrl+šípky hore dole) alebo po bunkách tabuľky (ctrl+alt+šípky) NVDA neoznamuje pravopisné chyby a to ani v takom prípade, ak je oznamovanie pravopisných chýb zapnuté. Odseky a stĺpce v tabuľkách môžu byť totiž dlhé a detegovanie chýb je náročné na výkon. (#9217)

segment.source: NVDA no longer automatically loads custom appModules, globalPlugins and braille and synth drivers from the NVDA user configuration directory. This code should be instead packaged as an add-on with correct version information, ensuring that incompatible code is not run with current versions of NVDA. (#9238)
segment.target: NVDA viac automaticky nespúšťa aplikačné moduly, ovládače pre brailové riadky a rečové syntézy a globálne pluginy priamo z používateľského priečinka NVDA. Tieto je potrebné skompilovať ako doplnok nvda-addon a určiť správne verzie, s ktorými je doplnok kompatibilný. (#9238)

segment.source: For developers who need to test code as it is being developed, enable NVDA's developer scratchpad directory in the Advanced category of NVDA settings, and place your code in the 'scratchpad' directory found in the NVDA user configuration directory when this option is enabled.
segment.target: Ak pracujete na vývoji vlastného kódu, povoľte načítanie vlastného kódu v pokročilých nastaveniach. Následne umiestnite kód do priečinka scratchpad v priečinku s nastaveniami NVDA.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Opravy

segment.source: When using OneCore speech synthesizer on Windows 10 April 2018 Update and later, large chunks of silence are no longer inserted between speech utterances. (#8985)
segment.target: Pri použití hlasového výstupu Onecore v systéme Windows 10 od verzie Apríl 2018, nie sú vkladané zbytočné pauzy. (#8985)

segment.source: When moving by character in plain text controls (such as Notepad) or browse mode, 32 bit emoji characters consisting of two UTF-16 code points (such as 🤦) will now read properly. (#8782)
segment.target: Pri pohybe po znakoch v editačných poliach (napríklad v poznámkovom bloku) alebo v režime prehliadania, NVDA správne oznamuje 32-bitové emoji pozostávajúce z dvoch buniek UTF-16 (napríklad đź¤¦). (#8782)

segment.source: Improved restart confirmation dialog after changing NVDA's interface language. The text and the button labels are now more concise and less confusing. (#6416)
segment.target: Upravený dialóg, ktorý sa objaví pri zmene jazyka. Text a tlačidlá sú teraz zrozumiteľnejšie. (#6416)

segment.source: If a 3rd party speech synthesizer fails to load, NVDA will fall back to Windows OneCore speech synthesizer on Windows 10, rather than espeak. (#9025)
segment.target: Ak nie je možné použiť nastavený hlasový výstup, NVDA sa v systéme Windows 10 vráti k hlasu Onecore a nie k syntéze eSpeak. (#9025)

segment.source: Removed the "Welcome Dialog" entry in the NVDA menu while on secure screens. (#8520)
segment.target: Položka Vitajte v NVDA bola odstránená z menu NVDA na zabezpečených obrazovkách. (#8520)

segment.source: When tabbing or using quick navigation in browse mode, legends on tab panels are now reported more consistently. (#709)
segment.target: V režime prehliadania pri použití tabulátora alebo skratiek rýchlej navigácie, NVDA presnejšie oznamuje popisy pre tab panely. (#709)

segment.source: NVDA will now announce selection changes for certain time pickers such as in the Alarms and Clock app in Windows 10. (#5231)
segment.target: NVDA správne oznamuje výber času v aplikáciách budík a hodiny v systéme Windows 10. (#5231)

segment.source: In Windows 10's Action Center, NVDA will announce status messages when toggling quick actions such as brightness and focus assist. (#8954)
segment.target: V centre akcií v systéme Windows 10 NVDA odteraz oznamuje stav pri zmene jasu alebo asistenta na lepšie sústredenie. (#8954)

segment.source: In action Center in Windows 10 October 2018 Update and earlier, NVDA will recognize brightness quick action control as a button instead of a toggle button. (#8845)
segment.target: Od októbrovej aktualizácie Windows 10 NVDA správne rozpoznáva tlačidlo jas v centre akcií ako tlačidlo a nie ako prepínacie tlačidlo. (#8845)

segment.source: NVDA will again track cursor and announce deleted characters in the Microsoft Excel go to and find edit fields. (#9042)
segment.target: NVDA opäť správne sleduje kurzor a oznamuje vymazané znaky v aplikácii Excel v dialógoch ísť na a vyhľadávanie. (#9042)

segment.source: Fixed a rare browse mode crash in Firefox. (#9152)
segment.target: Opravené občasné pády v režime prehliadania v prehliadači Firefox. (#9152)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to report the focus for some controls in the Microsoft Office 2016 ribbon when collapsed.
segment.target: NVDA správne oznamuje fokus v zbalených prvkoch v rybbonoch v aplikácii MS Office 2016.

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to report the suggested contact when entering addresses in new messages in Outlook 2016. (#8502)
segment.target: NVDA správne oznamuje navrhnutý kontakt pri písaní e-mailovej adresy v novej správe v aplikácii Outlook 2016. (#8502)

segment.source: The last few cursor routing keys on 80 cell eurobraille displays no longer route the cursor to a position at or just after the start of the braille line. (#9160)
segment.target: Posledné klávesy na presun kurzora na bunku na 80-znakovom riadku eurobraille viac nesmerujú kurzor na začiatok alebo tesne po začiatku riadka. (#9160)

segment.source: Fixed table navigation in threaded view in Mozilla Thunderbird. (#8396)
segment.target: Opravená navigácia po tabuľkách ak je použité zobrazenie po vláknach v aplikácii Mozilla Thunderbird. (#8396)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome, switching to focus mode now works correctly for certain list boxes and trees (where the list box/tree is not itself focusable but its items are) . (#3573, #9157)
segment.target: V prehliadačoch Mozilla Firefox a Google Chrome je možné aktivovať režim fokusu v zoznamoch a stromoch, ktoré samotné síce nemôžu mať fokus, ale položky v nich už áno. (#3573, #9157)

segment.source: Browse mode is now correctly turned on by default when reading messages in Outlook 2016/365 if using NVDA's experimental UI Automation support for Word Documents. (#9188)
segment.target: V aplikácii Outlook 2016 sa automaticky aktivuje režim prehliadania aj v prípade, že je povolené experimentálne použitie UI Automation. (#9188)

segment.source: NVDA is now less likely to freeze in such a way that the only way to escape is signing out from your current windows session. (#6291)
segment.target: NVDA viac nemrzne takým spôsobom, že jediné východisko je odhlásenie a opätovné prihlásenie používateľa. (#6291)

segment.source: In Windows 10 October 2018 Update and later, when opening cloud clipboard history with clipboard empty, NVDA will announce clipboard status. (#9103)
segment.target: V systéme Windows 10 od aktualizácie október 2018, NVDA oznámi, ak je schránka prázdna a pokúšate sa otvoriť zoznam textov pridaných do schránky Windows. (#9103)

segment.source: In Windows 10 October 2018 Update and later, when searching for emojis in emoji panel, NVDA will announce top search result. (#9105)
segment.target: V systéme Windows 10 od verzie Október 2018 NVDA pri prezeraní Emoji panela pri vyhľadávaní oznámi prvý navrhnutý symbol. (#9105)

segment.source: NVDA no longer freezes in the main window of Oracle VirtualBox 5.2 and above. (#9202)
segment.target: NVDA viac nezamrzne v hlavnom okne aplikácie Oracle VirtualBox od verzie 5.2. (#9202)

segment.source: Responsiveness in Microsoft Word when navigating by line, paragraph or table cell may be significantly improved in some documents. A reminder that for best performance, set Microsoft Word to Draft view with alt+w,e after opening a document. (#9217)
segment.target: Zrýchlená odozva pre niektoré dokumenty MS Word pri navigácii po riadkoch, odsekoch a bunkách v tabuľke. Odporúča sa použiť zobrazenie koncept. (#9217)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome, empty alerts are no longer reported. (#5657)
segment.target: V prehliadačoch Mozilla Firefox a Google Chrome NVDA viac neoznamuje prázdne upozornenia. (#5657)

segment.source: Significant performance improvements when navigating cells in Microsoft Excel, particularly when the spreadsheet contains comments and or validation dropdown lists. (#7348)
segment.target: Zrýchlená navigácia v dokumentoch MS Excel v prípadoch, ak tabuľka obsahuje komentáre alebo zoznamy návrhov zmien. (#7348)

segment.source: It should be no longer necessary to turn off in-cell editing in Microsoft Excel's options to access the cell edit control with NVDA in Excel 2016/365. (#8146).
segment.target: Nie je viac potrebné vypnúť editáciu vo vnútry bunky v aplikácii MS Excel 2016/365, aby bolo možné prejsť do editačného poľa bunky. (#8146)

segment.source: Fixed a freeze in Firefox sometimes seen when quick navigating by landmarks, if the Enhanced Aria add-on is in use. (#8980)
segment.target: Opravená chyba, ktorá spôsobila zamrznutie v režime prehliadania v prehliadači Mozilla Firefox pri navigácii po oblastiach stránky, ak je použité pokročilé Enhanced Aria add-on. (#8980)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: NVDA can now be built with all editions of Microsoft Visual Studio 2017 (not just the Community edition). (#8939)
segment.target: NVDA can now be built with all editions of Microsoft Visual Studio 2017 (not just the Community edition). (#8939)

segment.source: You can now include log output from liblouis into the NVDA log by setting the louis boolean flag in the debugLogging section of the NVDA configuration. (#4554)
segment.target: You can now include log output from liblouis into the NVDA log by setting the louis boolean flag in the debugLogging section of the NVDA configuration. (#4554)

segment.source: Add-on authors are now able to provide NVDA version compatibility information in add-on manifests. (#6275, #9055)
segment.target: Add-on authors are now able to provide NVDA version compatibility information in add-on manifests. (#6275, #9055)

segment.source: minimumNVDAVersion: The minimum required version of NVDA for an add-on to work properly.
segment.target: minimumNVDAVersion: The minimum required version of NVDA for an add-on to work properly.

segment.source: lastTestedNVDAVersion: The last version of NVDA an add-on has been tested with.
segment.target: lastTestedNVDAVersion: The last version of NVDA an add-on has been tested with.

segment.source: OffsetsTextInfo objects can now implement the _getBoundingRectFromOffset method to allow retrieval of bounding rectangles per characters instead of points. (#8572)
segment.target: OffsetsTextInfo objects can now implement the _getBoundingRectFromOffset method to allow retrieval of bounding rectangles per characters instead of points. (#8572)

segment.source: Added a boundingRect property to TextInfo objects to retrieve the bounding rectangle of a range of text. (#8371)
segment.target: Added a boundingRect property to TextInfo objects to retrieve the bounding rectangle of a range of text. (#8371)

segment.source: Properties and methods within classes can now be marked as abstract in NVDA. These classes will raise an error if instantiated. (#8294, #8652, #8658)
segment.target: Properties and methods within classes can now be marked as abstract in NVDA. These classes will raise an error if instantiated. (#8294, #8652, #8658)

segment.source: NVDA can log the time since input when text is spoken, which helps in measuring perceived responsiveness. This can be enabled by setting the timeSinceInput setting to True in the debugLog section of the NVDA configuration. (#9167)
segment.target: NVDA can log the time since input when text is spoken, which helps in measuring perceived responsiveness. This can be enabled by setting the timeSinceInput setting to True in the debugLog section of the NVDA configuration. (#9167)

segment.source: This release fixes a crash at start up if NVDA's user interface language is set to Aragonese. (#9089)
segment.target: Táto verzia opravuje pád, ktorý nastával, ak bol jazyk NVDA nastavený na Aragónčinu.

segment.source: Highlights of this release include performance improvements in recent Mozilla Firefox versions, announcement of emojis with all synthesizers, reporting of replied/forwarded status in Outlook, reporting the distance of the cursor to the edge of a Microsoft Word page, and many bug fixes.
segment.target: Prednosti tejto verzie zahŕňajú lepšiu podporu pre nové verzie prehliadača Mozilla Firefox, oznamovanie emotikonov cez všetky hlasové výstupy, oznamovanie stavu pri správach v aplikácii MS Outlook (odpovedané, preposlané), oznamovanie vzdialenosti kurzora v dokumentoch MS Word a viacero opráv.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nové vlastnosti

segment.source: New braille tables: Chinese (China, Mandarin) grade 1 and grade 2. (#5553)
segment.target: Nové brailové tabuľky pre Čínsky skratkopis a plnopis. (#5553)

segment.source: Replied / Forwarded status is now reported on mail items in the Microsoft Outlook message list. (#6911)
segment.target: V zozname správ v programe MS Outlook NVDA oznamuje, ak je správa preposlaná alebo ste na ňu už odpovedali. (#6911)

segment.source: NVDA is now able to read descriptions for emoji as well as other characters that are part of the Unicode Common Locale Data Repository. (#6523)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz dokáže využívať na interpretáciu špeciálnych symbolov databázu Unicode Konzorcia. (#6523)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, the cursor's distance from the top and left edges of the page can be reported by pressing NVDA+numpadDelete. (#1939)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz oznamuje vzdialenosť kurzora od okrajov stránky v dokumentoch MS Word. Vzdialenosť zistíte skratkou NVDA+numerický delete. (#1939)

segment.source: In Google Sheets with braille mode enabled, NVDA no longer announces 'selected' on every cell when moving focus between cells. (#8879)
segment.target: NVDA viac pri pohybe v Google tabuľkách a súčasnom aktívnom brailovom výstupe zbytočne neoznamuje "vybraté". (#8879)

segment.source: Added support for Foxit Reader and Foxit Phantom PDF. (#8944)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre aplikácie Foxit Reader a Foxit Phantom PDF. (#8944)

segment.source: Added support for the DBeaver database tool. (#8905)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre databázový nástroj DBeaver. (#8905)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Zmeny

segment.source: "Report help balloons" in the Object Presentations dialog has been renamed to "Report notifications" to include reporting of toast notifications in Windows 8 and later. (#5789)
segment.target: Položka "oznamovať bublinkovú nápovedu" v nastaveniach prezentácie objektov bola premenovaná na "oznamovať notifikácie". Odteraz totiž toto nastavenie zahŕňa aj oznamovanie notifikácií v Systéme Windows 8 a novších. (#5789)

segment.source: In NVDA's keyboard settings, the checkboxes to enable or disable NVDA modifier keys are now displayed in a list rather than as separate checkboxes.
segment.target: V nastaveniach klávesnice sú začiarkávacie polia pre výber klávesu NVDA zobrazené v zozname a nie samostatne.

segment.source: NVDA will no longer present redundant information when reading clock system tray on some versions of Windows. (#4364)
segment.target: NVDA viac neoznamuje nadbytočné informácie pri čítaní dátumu a času zo systémového panela. (#4364)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to version 3.7.0. (#8697)
segment.target: Prekladová tabuľka liblouis aktualizovaná na verziu 3.7.0. (#8697)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak-NG to commit 919f3240cbb.
segment.target: Hlasový výstup eSpeak-NG aktualizovaný na verziu 919f3240cbb.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Opravy

segment.source: In Outlook 2016/365, the category and flag status are reported for messages. (#8603)
segment.target: V aplikácii Outlook 2016/365 sú oznamované značky pre kategórie a stav správy. (#8603)

segment.source: When NVDA is set to languages such as Kirgyz, Mongolian or Macedonian, it no longer shows a dialog on start-up warning that the language is not supported by the Operating System. (#8064)
segment.target: Ak je v NVDA nastavený jazyk Kirgyjčina, Mongolčina alebo Macedónčina, pri štarte NVDA sa viac neobjavuje varovanie, že tento jazyk nie je podporovaný operačným systémom. (#8064)

segment.source: Moving the mouse to the navigator object will now much more accurately move the mouse to the browse mode position in Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome and Acrobat Reader DC. (#6460)
segment.target: Presunutie myši na navigačný objekt je odteraz presnejšie v režime prehliadania v aplikáciách Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome a Acrobat Reader DC. (#6460)

segment.source: Interacting with combo boxes on the web in Firefox, Chrome and Internet Explorer has been improved. (#8664)
segment.target: Vylepšená práca so zoznamovými rámikmi v prehliadačoch Firefox, Chrome a Internet Explorer. (#8664)

segment.source: If running on the Japanese version of Windows XP or Vista, NVDA now displays OS version requirements message as expected. (#8771)
segment.target: Ak NVDA spustíte na Japonskej verzii Windows XP a Vista, zobrazí sa varovanie tak, ako na ostatných systémoch. (#8771)

segment.source: Performance improvements when navigating large pages with lots of dynamic changes in Mozilla Firefox. (#8678)
segment.target: Zrýchlená navigácia po veľkých a dynamických stránkach v prehliadači Mozilla Firefox. (#8678)

segment.source: Braille no longer shows font attributes if they have been disabled in Document Formatting settings. (#7615)
segment.target: Na brailovom riadku sa viac nezobrazujú informácie o formátovaní, ak je oznamovanie vypnuté v nastaveniach. (#7615)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to track focus in File Explorer and other applications using UI Automation when another app is busy (such as batch processing audio). (#7345)
segment.target: NVDA viac nestráca fokus v zozname súborov v prieskumníkovy (príp v okne otvoriť / uložiť ako) ak sa používa UI Automation a súčasne je zaneprázdnená iná aplikácia (napríklad ak beží na pozadí konvertovanie audio súborov). (#7345)

segment.source: In ARIA menus on the web, the Escape key will now be passed through to the menu and no longer turn off focus mode unconditionally. (#3215)
segment.target: Ak je vo webovom dokumente ARIA menu, kláves escape bude odoslaný priamo do prehliadača a nevypína režim fokusu. (#3215)

segment.source: In the new Gmail web interface, when using quick navigation inside messages while reading them, the entire body of the message is no longer reported after the element to which you just navigated. (#8887)
segment.target: Vo webovom rozhraní Gmailu viac NVDA pri použití klávesnice na navigáciu nečíta stále nanovo obsah správy. (#8887)

segment.source: After updating NVDA, Browsers such as Firefox and google Chrome should no longer crash, and browse mode should continue to correctly reflect updates to any currently loaded documents. (#7641)
segment.target: Po aktualizácii NVDA odteraz správne funguje režim prehliadania v prehliadačoch, ktoré boli spustené v čase aktualizácie a takisto funguje aktualizovanie dynamického obsahu dokumentov. (#7641)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reports clickable multiple times in a row when navigating clickable content in Browse Mode. (#7430)
segment.target: NVDA viac neoznamuje nadbytočne typ prvku "pri kliknutí" pri navigácii v režime prehliadania. (#7430)

segment.source: Gestures performed on baum Vario 40 braille displays will no longer fail to execute. (#8894)
segment.target: Opravená podpora pre skratky na brailovom riadku baum Vario 40. (#8894)

segment.source: In Google Slides with Mozilla Firefox, NVDA no longer reports selected text on every control with focus. (#8964)
segment.target: V Tabuľkách Google v prehliadači Firefox NVDA neoznamuje nadbytočne pri pohybe "vybraté". (#8964)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: gui.nvdaControls now contains two classes to create accessible lists with check boxes. (#7325)
segment.target: gui.nvdaControls now contains two classes to create accessible lists with check boxes. (#7325)

segment.source: CustomCheckListBox is an accessible subclass of wx.CheckListBox.
segment.target: CustomCheckListBox is an accessible subclass of wx.CheckListBox.

segment.source: AutoWidthColumnCheckListCtrl adds accessible check boxes to an AutoWidthColumnListCtrl, which itself is based on wx.ListCtrl.
segment.target: AutoWidthColumnCheckListCtrl adds accessible check boxes to an AutoWidthColumnListCtrl, which itself is based on wx.ListCtrl.

segment.source: If you need to make a wx widget accessible which isn't already, it is possible to do so by using an instance of gui.accPropServer.IAccPropServer_impl. (#7491)
segment.target: If you need to make a wx widget accessible which isn't already, it is possible to do so by using an instance of gui.accPropServer.IAccPropServer_impl. (#7491)

segment.source: See the implementation of gui.nvdaControls.ListCtrlAccPropServer for more info.
segment.target: See the implementation of gui.nvdaControls.ListCtrlAccPropServer for more info.

segment.source: Updated configobj to 5.1.0dev commit 5b5de48a. (#4470)
segment.target: Updated configobj to 5.1.0dev commit 5b5de48a. (#4470)

segment.source: The config.post_configProfileSwitch action now takes the optional prevConf keyword argument, allowing handlers to take action based on differences between configuration before and after the profile switch. (#8758)
segment.target: The config.post_configProfileSwitch action now takes the optional prevConf keyword argument, allowing handlers to take action based on differences between configuration before and after the profile switch. (#8758)

segment.source: This is a minor release to work around a crash in Google Chrome when navigating tweetts on [www.twitter.com](http://www.twitter.com). (#8777)
segment.target: Táto verzia opravuje chybu, ktorá spôsobovala pád aplikácie Chrome pri navigácii po stránke [www.twitter.com](http://www.twitter.com). (#8777)

segment.source: This is a minor release to fix a critical bug in NVDA which caused 32 bit versions of Mozilla Firefox to crash. (#8759)
segment.target: Táto verzia opravuje chybu, ktorá spôsobovala pád 32-bitovej verzie Mozilla Firefox. (#8759)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include automatic detection of many Braille displays, support for new Windows 10 features including the Windows 10 Emoji input panel, and many other bug fixes.
segment.target: Prednosti tejto verzie zahŕňajú automatické pripájanie k mnohým brailovým riadkom, podporu pre nové funkcie operačného systému Windows 10 vrátane panela pre zadávanie emoji, a ďalšie opravy.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nové vlastnosti

segment.source: NVDA will report grammar errors when appropriately exposed by web pages in Mozilla Firefox and Google Chrome. (#8280)
segment.target: Ak sa na webovej stránke zobrazujú gramatické chyby, NVDA ich dokáže oznamovať. Funguje v prehliadačoch Firefox a Chrome. (#8280)

segment.source: Content marked as being either inserted or deleted in web pages is now reported in Google Chrome. (#8558)
segment.target: V prehliadači Google Chrome je oznamovaný obsah, ktorý je označený ako vložený alebo odstránený. (#8558)

segment.source: Added support for BrailleNote QT and Apex BT's scroll wheel when BrailleNote is used as a braille display with NVDA. (#5992, #5993)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre skrolovacie koliesko so smerovými tlačidlami na riadkoch BrailleNote QT a Apex BT. (#5992, #5993)

segment.source: Added scripts for reporting elapsed and total time of current track in Foobar2000. (#6596)
segment.target: Pridané klávesové skratky na oznamovanie uplynutého času a celkovej dĺžky skladby v prehrávači Foobar 2000. (#6596)

segment.source: The Mac command key symbol (⌘) is now announced when reading text with any synthesizer. (#8366)
segment.target: Symbol pre kláves Command (na klávesnici MAC ⌘) je odteraz správne oznamovaný všetkými syntézami reči. (#8366)

segment.source: Custom roles via the aria-roledescription attribute are now supported in all web browsers. (#8448)
segment.target: Vlastné označenia rolí pri využití atribútu aria-roledescription sú odteraz oznamované vo všetkých webových prehliadačoch. (#8448)

segment.source: New braille tables: Czech 8 dot, Central Kurdish, Esperanto, Hungarian, Swedish 8 dot computer braille. (#8226, #8437)
segment.target: Nové brailové tabuľky: Český 8-bodový počítačový braill, Stredná kurdčina, Esperanto, Maďarčina, Švédsky 8-bodový počítačový braill. (#8226, #8437)

segment.source: Support has been added to automatically detect braille displays in the background. (#1271)
segment.target: Pridaná automatická detekcia brailových riadkov na pozadí. (#1271)

segment.source: ALVA, Baum/HumanWare/APH/Orbit, Eurobraille, Handy Tech, Hims, SuperBraille and HumanWare BrailleNote and Brailliant BI/B displays are currently supported.
segment.target: Podporované sú riadky ALVA, Baum/HumanWare/APH/Orbit, Eurobraille, Handy Tech, Hims, SuperBraille a HumanWare BrailleNote a Brailliant BI/B.

segment.source: You can enable this feature by selecting the automatic option from the list of braille displays in NVDA's braille display selection dialog.
segment.target: Ak chcete využívať túto funkciu, ako brailový riadok v nastaveniach zvoľte možnosť automatické.

segment.source: Please consult the documentation for additional details.
segment.target: Podrobnosti nájdete v používateľskej príručke.

segment.source: Added support for various modern input features introduced in recent Windows 10 releases. These include emoji panel (Fall Creators Update), dictation (Fall Creators Update), hardware keyboard input suggestions (April 2018 Update), and cloud clipboard paste (October 2018 Update). (#7273)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre rôzne metódy vstupu predstavené v systéme Windows 10. Jedná sa o panel na vkladanie Emoji (pridané v aktualizácii Fall Creators), diktovanie hlasom(slovenčina nie je podporovaná, funkcia bola pridaná vo verzii Windows 10 Fall Creators), automatické návrhy pre písanie na hardwarovej klávesnici (aktualizácia z Apríla 2018), a použitie zdieľanej schránky v cloude (aktualizácia október 2018). (#7273)

segment.source: Content marked as a block quote using ARIA (role blockquote) is now supported in Mozilla Firefox 63. (#8577)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz oznamuje Obsah označený ako citácia cez atribút aria role blockquote v prehliadači Mozilla Firefox 63. (#8577)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Zmeny

segment.source: The list of available languages in NVDA's General Settings is now sorted based on language names instead of ISO 639 codes. (#7284)
segment.target: Odteraz je zoznam jazykov v kategórii všeobecné nastavenia zoradený abecedne a nie podľa špecifikácie ISO 639. (#7284)

segment.source: Added default gestures for Alt+Shift+Tab and Windows+Tab with all supported Freedom Scientific braille displays. (#7387)
segment.target: Pre všetky podporované riadky od spoločnosti Freedom scientific boli pridané emulácie skratiek alt+shift+tab a windows+tab. (#7387)

segment.source: For ALVA BC680 and protocol converter displays, it is now possible to assign different functions to the left and right smart pad, thumb and etouch keys. (#8230)
segment.target: Na riadkoch ALVA BC680 a protocol converter je možné používať rozšírené klávesy umiestnené po stranách riadka a Etouch tlačidlá. (#8230)

segment.source: For ALVA BC6 displays, the key combination sp2+sp3 will now announce the current date and time, whereas sp1+sp2 emulates the Windows key. (#8230)
segment.target: Upravené skratky na riadku ALVA BC6. Odteraz kombinácia sp2+sp3 oznamuje aktuálny čas a dátum, skratka sp1+sp2 emuluje kláves Windows. (#8230)

segment.source: The user is asked once when NVDA starts if they are happy sending usage statistics to NV Access when checking for NVDA updates. (#8217)
segment.target: Po štarte sa vás NVDA pýta, či súhlasí so zasielaním a zhromažďovaním údajov z počítača. (#8217)

segment.source: When checking for updates, if the user has agreed to allow sending usage statistics to NV Access, NVDA will now send the name of the current synth driver and braille display in use, to aide in better prioritization for future work on these drivers. (#8217)
segment.target: Ak odsúhlasíte zhromažďovanie údajov, NVDA vždy pri kontrole aktualizácií odošle na server informáciu o používanom hlasovom výstupe a brailovom riadku. Vývojári tak dokážu zistiť, ktoré ovládače majú mať pri vývoji prednosť. (#8217)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to version 3.6.0. (#8365)
segment.target: Prekladová tabuľka liblouis aktualizovaná na verziu 3.6.0. (#8365)

segment.source: Updated the path to the correct Russian eight-dots Braille table. (#8446)
segment.target: Opravená cesta k tabuľke pre Ruský 8-bodový počítačový kód. (#8446)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak-ng to 1.49.3dev commit 910f4c2. (#8561)
segment.target: Hlasový výstup eSpeak-ng aktualizovaný na verziu 1.49.3dev commit 910f4c2. (#8561)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: opravy

segment.source: Accessible labels for controls in Google Chrome are now more readily reported in browse mode when the label does not appear as content itself. (#4773)
segment.target: Prístupné Označenia prvkov sú lepšie oznamované v prehliadači Google chrome aj vtedy, ak nie sú priamo obsahom webovej stránky. (#4773)

segment.source: Notifications are now supported in Zoom. For example, this includes mute/unmute status, and incoming messages. (#7754)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre upozornenia v programe Zoom. NVDA tak odteraz oznamuje prichádzajúce správy, stlmenie a zapnutie mikrofónu. (#7754)

segment.source: Switching braille context presentation when in browse mode no longer causes braille output to stop following browse mode cursor. (#7741)
segment.target: Ak zmeníte prezentáciu kontextu v režime prehliadania, brailový kurzor správne sleduje prezerací kurzor. (#7741)

segment.source: ALVA BC680 braille displays no longer intermittently fail to initialize. (#8106)
segment.target: Opravená chyba s inicializáciou riadka ALVA BC680. (#8106)

segment.source: By default, ALVA BC6 displays will no longer execute emulated system keyboard keys when pressing key combinations involving sp2+sp3 to trigger internal functionality. (#8230)
segment.target: Ak na riadku ALVA BC6 stlačíte kombináciu zahŕňajúcu tlačidlá sp2+sp3, riadok viac nebude emulovať skratky z počítačovej klávesnice. (#8230)

segment.source: Pressing sp2 on an ALVA BC6 display to emulate the alt key now works as advertised. (#8360)
segment.target: Skratka sp2 na riadku ALVA BC6 emuluje kláves alt tak, ako je uvedené v používateľskej príručke. (#8360)

segment.source: NVDA no longer announces redundant keyboard layout changes. (#7383, #8419)
segment.target: NVDA viac zbytočne neoznamuje zmeny rozloženia klávesnice. (#7383, #8419)

segment.source: Mouse tracking is now much more accurate in Notepad and other plain text edit controls when in a document with more than 65535 characters. (#8397)
segment.target: Sledovanie myšky je odteraz oveľa presnejšie v poznámkovom bloku a editačných poliach obsahujúcich čistý text, v ktorých je viac ako 65535 znakov. (#8397)

segment.source: NVDA will recognize more dialogs in Windows 10 and other modern applications. (#8405)
segment.target: NVDA dokáže rozpoznať viac dialógov v systéme Windows 10 a moderných aplikáciách. (#8405)

segment.source: On Windows 10 October 2018 Update and Server 2019 and above, NVDA no longer fails to track the system focus when an application freezes or floods the system with events. (#7345, #8535)
segment.target: NVDA dokáže správne sledovať systémový fokus na systémoch Windows 10 (aktualizácia z októbra 2018, server 2019 a novších) aj v prípade, že aplikácia zamrzne alebo zahltí systém udalosťami. (#7345, #8535)

segment.source: Users are now informed when attempting to read or copy an empty status bar. (#7789)
segment.target: NVDA oznámi, ak sa pokúsite prečítať alebo skopírovať do schránky prázdny stavový riadok. (#7789)

segment.source: Fixed an issue where the "not checked" state on controls is not reported in speech if the control has previously been half checked. (#6946)
segment.target: Odteraz NVDA správne hlasom oznamuje, ak odčiarknete začiarkávacie políčko, ktoré bolo predtým čiastočne začiarknuté. (#6946)

segment.source: In the list of languages in NVDA's General Settings, language name for Burmese is displayed correctly on Windows 7. (#8544)
segment.target: Vo všeobecných nastaveniach NVDA v systéme Windows 7 sa správne zobrazuje jazyk Barmčina. (#8544)

segment.source: In Microsoft Edge, NVDA will announce notifications such as reading view availability and page load progress. (#8423)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz oznamuje upozornenia v prehliadači Microsoft Edge (napríklad načítanie stránky, dostupnosť zobrazenia na čítanie). (#8423)

segment.source: When navigating into a list on the web, NVDA will now report its label if the web author has provided one. (#7652)
segment.target: Pri vstupe do zoznamu v režime prehliadania NVDA oznámi názov zoznamu, ak je uvedený. (#7652)

segment.source: When manually assigning functions to gestures for a particular braille display, these gestures now always show up as being assigned to that display. Previously, they showed up as if they were assigned to the currently active display. (#8108)
segment.target: Ak priradíte skratky konkrétnemu brailovému riadku, zobrazujú sa skutočne len pre tento brailový riadok. Doteraz sa zobrazovali pre riadok, ktorý bol zvolený v nastaveniach. (#8108)

segment.source: The 64-bit version of Media Player Classic is now supported. (#6066)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre 64-bitovú verziu prehrávača Media player Classic. (#6066)

segment.source: Several improvements to braille support in Microsoft Word with UI Automation enabled:
segment.target: Vylepšená podpora pre brailové riadky v aplikácii MS Word s použitím UI Automation:

segment.source: Similar to other multiline text fields, When positioned at the start of a document in Braille, the display is now panned such that the first character of the document is at the start of the display. (#8406)
segment.target: Ak sa vo viacriadkovom editačnom poli presuniete na začiatok riadka, prvý znak sa zobrazí na prvom znaku brailového riadka. (#8406)

segment.source: Reduced overly verbose focus presentation in both speech and braille when focusing a Word document. (#8407)
segment.target: NVDA neoznamuje nadbytočné informácie ak získa fokus dokument MS Word. (#8407)

segment.source: Cursor routing in braille now works correctly when in a list in a Word document. (#7971)
segment.target: prechod na znak v brailly funguje aj v zoznamoch v dokumentoch MS Word. (#7971)

segment.source: Newly inserted bullets/numbers in a Word document are correctly reported in both speech and braille. (#7970)
segment.target: Odteraz sú správne oznamované novopridané odrážky a položky v zoznamoch v dokumentoch MS Word. (#7970)

segment.source: In Windows 10 1803 and later, it is now possible to install add-ons if the "Use Unicode UTF-8 for worldwide language support" feature is enabled. (#8599)
segment.target: Odteraz je možné inštalovať doplnky do NVDA v systémoch Windows 10 od verzie 1803 aj v prípade, ak je začiarknutá možnosť použiť kódovanie unicode UTF-8 pre celosvetovú jazykovú podporu. (#8599)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer make iTunes 12.9 and newer completely unusable to interact with. (#8744)
segment.target: NVDA viac neblokuje akúkoľvek interakciu v aplikácii iTunes 12.9 a novších. (#8744)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: Added scriptHandler.script, which can function as a decorator for scripts on scriptable objects. (#6266)
segment.target: Added scriptHandler.script, which can function as a decorator for scripts on scriptable objects. (#6266)

segment.source: A system test framework has been introduced for NVDA. (#708)
segment.target: A system test framework has been introduced for NVDA. (#708)

segment.source: Some changes have been made to the hwPortUtils module: (#1271)
segment.target: Some changes have been made to the hwPortUtils module: (#1271)

segment.source: listUsbDevices now yields dictionaries with device information including hardwareID and devicePath.
segment.target: listUsbDevices now yields dictionaries with device information including hardwareID and devicePath.
