segment.source: Dictionaries yielded by listComPorts now also contain a usbID entry for COM ports with USB VID/PID information in their hardware ID.
segment.target: Dictionaries yielded by listComPorts now also contain a usbID entry for COM ports with USB VID/PID information in their hardware ID.

segment.source: Updated wxPython to 4.0.3. (#7077)
segment.target: Updated wxPython to 4.0.3. (#7077)

segment.source: As NVDA now only supports Windows 7 SP1 and later, the key "minWindowsVersion" used to check if UIA should be enabled for a particular release of Windows has been removed. (#8422)
segment.target: As NVDA now only supports Windows 7 SP1 and later, the key "minWindowsVersion" used to check if UIA should be enabled for a particular release of Windows has been removed. (#8422)

segment.source: You can now register to be notified about configuration saves/reset actions via new config.pre_configSave, config.post_configSave, config.pre_configReset, and config.post_configReset actions. (#7598)
segment.target: You can now register to be notified about configuration saves/reset actions via new config.pre_configSave, config.post_configSave, config.pre_configReset, and config.post_configReset actions. (#7598)

segment.source: config.pre_configSave is used to be notified when NVDA's configuration is about to be saved, and config.post_configSave is called after configuration has been saved.
segment.target: config.pre_configSave is used to be notified when NVDA's configuration is about to be saved, and config.post_configSave is called after configuration has been saved.

segment.source: config.pre_configReset and config.post_configReset includes a factory defaults flag to specify if settings are reloaded from disk (false) or reset to defaults (true).
segment.target: config.pre_configReset and config.post_configReset includes a factory defaults flag to specify if settings are reloaded from disk (false) or reset to defaults (true).

segment.source: config.configProfileSwitch has been renamed to config.post_configProfileSwitch to reflect the fact that this action is called after profile switch takes place. (#7598)
segment.target: config.configProfileSwitch has been renamed to config.post_configProfileSwitch to reflect the fact that this action is called after profile switch takes place. (#7598)

segment.source: UI Automation interfaces updated to Windows 10 October 2018 Update and Server 2019 (IUIAutomation6 / IUIAutomationElement9). (#8473)
segment.target: UI Automation interfaces updated to Windows 10 October 2018 Update and Server 2019 (IUIAutomation6 / IUIAutomationElement9). (#8473)

segment.source: This release includes translation updates due to last-minute removal of a feature which caused problems.
segment.target: Táto verzia prináša aktualizácie prekladov potrebné po odstránení problematickej vlastnosti na poslednú chvíľu.

segment.source: Highlights of this release include Support for tables in Kindle for PC, support for HumanWare BrailleNote Touch and BI14 Braille displays, Improvements to both Onecore and Sapi5 speech synthesizers, improvements in Microsoft Outlook and much more.
segment.target: Prednosti tejto verzie zahŕňajú podporu pre čítanie tabuliek v programe Kindle (desktop), podporu pre brailové riadky Humanwear BrailleNote Touch a BI14, vylepšenú podporu pre hlasy Onecore a SAPI5, opravy pre Microsoft Outlook a oveľa viac.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nové vlastnosti

segment.source: row and column span for table cells is now reported in speech and braille. (#2642)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz dokáže oznamovať hlasom aj na brailovom riadku rozsah riadkov a stĺpcov v tabuľkách. (#2642)

segment.source: NVDA table navigation commands are now supported in Google Docs (with Braille mode enabled). (#7946)
segment.target: Skratky pre navigáciu v tabuľkách odteraz fungujú aj v dokumentoch google (vrátane podpory pre brailové riadky). (#7946)

segment.source: Added ability to read and navigate tables in Kindle for PC. (#7977)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre čítanie tabuliek v aplikácii Kindle (desktop) (#7977)

segment.source: Support for HumanWare BrailleNote touch and Brailliant BI 14 braille displays via both USB and bluetooth. (#6524)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre brailové riadky HumanWare BrailleNote touch a Brailliant BI 14 cez USB a bluetooth. (#6524)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Fall Creators Update and later, NVDA can announce notifications from apps such as Calculator and Windows Store. (#7984)
segment.target: V systéme Windows od aktualizácie Fall creators a novších, dokáže NVDA čítať notifikácie napríklad z aplikácie kalkulačka či Windows Obchod. (#7984)

segment.source: New braille translation tables: Lithuanian 8 dot, Ukrainian, Mongolian grade 2. (#7839)
segment.target: Pridané brailové tabuľky: Litovčina (8 bodová), Ukrajinčina, Mongolčina skratkopis. (#7839)

segment.source: Added a script to report formatting information for the text under a specific braille cell. (#7106)
segment.target: Pridaná možnosť oznamovať formátovanie textu pod brailovým znakom. (#7106)

segment.source: When updating NVDA, it is now possible to postpone the installation of the update to a later moment. (#4263)
segment.target: Po úspešnom stiahnutí aktualizácie NVDA, je samotnú inštaláciu novej verzie možné odložiť na neskôr. (#4263)

segment.source: New languages: Mongolian, Swiss German.
segment.target: NVDA je odteraz lokalizovaný do mongolčiny a Švajčiarskej Nemčiny.

segment.source: You can now toggle control, shift, alt, windows and NVDA from your braille keyboard and combine these modifiers with braille input (e.g. press control+s). (#7306)
segment.target: Odteraz je možné na brailových riadkoch emulovať klávesy ctrl, shift, alt a NVDA a kombinovať ich (napríklad odoslať skratku ctrl+s). (#7306)

segment.source: You can assign these new modifier toggles using the commands found under Emulated system keyboard keys in the Input gestures dialog.
segment.target: Tieto skratky je možné nastaviť v strome emulované klávesy v dialógu Klávesové skratky.

segment.source: Restored support for Handy Tech Braillino and Modular (with old firmware) displays. (#8016)
segment.target: Obnovená podpora pre riadky Handy Tech Braillino a Modular so staršým firmwérom. (#8016)

segment.source: Date and time for supported Handy Tech devices (such as Active Braille and Active Star) will now automatically be synchronized by NVDA when out of sync more than five seconds. (#8016)
segment.target: Pri podporovaných brailových riadkoch Handy Tech (napríklad Active Braille a Active Star) sa automaticky synchronizujeaktuálny dátum a čas v prípade, ak je rozdiel viac ako 5 sekúnd.

segment.source: An input gesture can be assigned to temporarily disable all configuration profile triggers. (#4935)
segment.target: Odteraz je možné klávesovou skratkou dočasne vypnúť všetky profili. (profili sa aktivujú po najbližšom reštarte a skratku môžete nastaviť v dialógu klávesové skratky). (#4935)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Zmeny

segment.source: The status column in the addons manager has been changed to indicate if the addon is enabled or disabled rather than running or suspended. (#7929)
segment.target: Upravené zobrazenie stavu doplnku v správcovy doplnkov (len v angličtine). (#7929)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 3.5.0. (#7839)
segment.target: brailová prekladová Tabuľka liblouis aktualizovaná na verziu 3.5.0. (#7839)

segment.source: The Lithuanian braille table has been renamed to Lithuanian 6 dot to avoid confusion with the new 8 dot table. (#7839)
segment.target: Litovská brailová tabuľka bola premenovaná na litovčina 6 bodov, keďže pribudla aj osembodová tabuľka pre Litovčinu. (#7839)

segment.source: The French (Canada) grade 1 and grade 2 tables have been removed. Instead, the French (unified) 6 dot computer braille and Grade 2 tables will be used respectively. (#7839)
segment.target: Odstránená Francúzska (kanadská) brailová tabuľka pre skratkopis a plnopis bola nahradená Francúszkou unifikovanou tabuľkou pre skratkopis a počítačový kód. (#7839)

segment.source: The secondary routing buttons on Alva BC6, EuroBraille and Papenmeier braille displays now report formatting information for the text under the braille cell of that button. (#7106)
segment.target: Sekundárne navigačné tlačidlá na riadkoch Alva BC6, EuroBraille a Papenmeier sa odteraz používajú na oznámovanie formátovania pod aktuálnym brailovýmznakom. (#7106)

segment.source: Contracted braille input tables will automatically fall back to uncontracted mode in non-editable cases (i.e. controls where there is no cursor or in browse mode). (#7306)
segment.target: Ak je nastavená tabuľka pre skratkopis, automaticky sa prepne do plnopisu v prípade, ak je fokus na prvku, ktorý sa nedá editovať (tam, kde nie je viditeľný kurzor alebo v režime prehliadania). (#7306)

segment.source: NVDA is now less verbose when an appointment or time slot in the Outlook calendar covers an entire day. (#7949)
segment.target: NVDA v Kalendári v MS Outlook jednoduchšie oznamuje celodenné udalosti. (#7949)

segment.source: All of NVDA's Preferences can now be found in one settings dialog under NVDA Menu -> Preferences -> Settings, rather than scattered throughout many dialogs. (#577)
segment.target: Všetky nastavenia NVDA boli presunuté do dialógu možnosti > Nastavenia. (#577)

segment.source: The default speech synthesizer when running on Windows 10 is now oneCore speech rather than eSpeak. (#8176)
segment.target: V systéme Windows 10 sa predvolene použije hlas Onecore namiesto eSpeaku. (#8176)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Opravy

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to read focused controls in the Microsoft Account sign-in screen in Settings after entering an email address. (#7997)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz dokáže čítať prvky, ktoré majú fokus na prihlasovacej obrazovke účtu microsoft, ak ste už zadali e-mailovú adresu. (#7997)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to read the page when going back to a previous page in Microsoft Edge. (#7997)
segment.target: NVDA dokáže správne zobraziť dokument v MS Edge v prípade, ak sa vrátite na predchádzajúcu stránku. (#7997)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer incorrectly announce the final character of a windows 10 sign-in PIN as the machine unlocks. (#7908)
segment.target: NVDA viac neprečíta posledný znak pin kódu pri odomikaní v systéme Windows 10. (#7908)

segment.source: Labels of checkboxes and radio buttons in Chrome and Firefox are no longer reported twice when tabbing or using quick navigation in Browse mode. (#7960)
segment.target: Popisy k začiarkávacím poliam a prepínačom nie sú viac v Chrome a Firefoxe čítané dvakrát pri prechádzaní stránky tabulátorom alebo skratkami rýchlej navigácie. (#7960)

segment.source: aria-current with a value of false will be announced as "false" instead of "true". (#7892).
segment.target: Prvok aria-current s hodnotou "false" nie je viac oznamovaný ako "pravdivý" ale ako "nepravdivý". (#7892)

segment.source: Windows OneCore Voices no longer fails to load if the configured voice has been uninstalled. (#7553)
segment.target: Načítanie hlasov Onecore nezlyhá v prípade, ak bol nastavený hlas odinštalovaný. (#7553)

segment.source: Changing voices in the Windows OneCore Voices is now a lot faster. (#7999)
segment.target: Zrýchlená zmena hlasu v rozhraní onecore. (#7999)

segment.source: Fixed malformed braille output for several braille tables, including capital signs in 8 dot contracted Danish braille. (#7526, #7693)
segment.target: Opravené nesprávne interpretovanie znakov v niektorých brailových tabuľkách (napríklad nesprávne zobrazovanie veľkých písmen v Dánskom počítačovom 8-bodovom kóde). (#7526, #7693)

segment.source: NVDA can now report more bullet types in Microsoft Word. (#6778)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz dokáže oznamovať viacero typov odrážok v programe MS Word. (#6778)

segment.source: Pressing the report formatting script no longer incorrectly moves the reviewPosition and therefore pressing it multiple times no longer gives different results. (#7869)
segment.target: Skratka na oznámenie formátovania textu nespôsobuje pohyb kurzora a tým pádom teraz NVDA správne oznamuje formátovanie pri opakovanom stlačení skratky. (#7869)

segment.source: Braille input no longer allows you to use contracted braille in cases where it is not supported (i.e. whole words will no longer be sent to the system outside text content and in browse mode). (#7306)
segment.target: Odteraz nie je možné používať skratkopis na miestach, kde nie je podporovaný (napríklad v režime prehliadania nebudú do systému odosielané celé slová). (#7306)

segment.source: Fixed connection stability issues for Handy Tech Easy Braille and Braille Wave displays. (#8016)
segment.target: Opravené nestabilné pripojenie brailových riadkov Handy Tech Easy Braille a Braille Wave. (#8016)

segment.source: On Windows 8 and later, NVDA will no longer announce "unknown" when opening quick link menu )Windows+X) and selecting items from this menu. (#8137)
segment.target: Pri otvorení menu rýchleho prístupu v systéme Windows 8 a novších (skratka windows+x) NVDA viac nehlási "neznáme" pri otvorení ponuky a pri pohybe kurzora. (#8137)

segment.source: Model specific gestures to buttons on Hims displays are now working as advertised in the user guide. (#8096)
segment.target: Skratky pre modely brailových riadkov Hims odteraz fungujú tak, ako sú popísané v používateľskej príručke. (#8096)

segment.source: NVDA will now try to correct system COM registration issues causing programs such as Firefox and Internet Explorer to become inaccessible and report "Unknown" by NVDA. (#2807)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz môže opraviť chyby v registroch systému, ktoré spôsobovali nemožnosť čítať dokumenty v režime prehliadania. (#2807)

segment.source: Worked around a bug in Task Manager causing NVDA to not allow users to access the contents of specific details about processes. (#8147)
segment.target: Opravená chyba, ktorá spôsobovala, že v správcovi úloh nebolo možné zistiť niektoré informácie o bežiacich procesoch. (#8147)

segment.source: Newer Microsoft SAPI5 voices no longer lag at the end of speech, making it much more efficient to navigate with these voices. (#8174)
segment.target: Novšie SAPI5 hlasy viac nemrznú na konci vyslovenej správy, takže práca pri použití takéhoto hlasu je teraz svižnejjšia. (#8174)

segment.source: NVDA no longer reports (LTR and RTL marks) in Braille or per-character speech when accessing the clock in recent versions of Windows. (#5729)
segment.target: NVDA viac nezobrazuje nadbytočné značky na brailovom riadku alebo pri čítaní po znakoch pri prezeraní systémových hodín na systémovom panely. (#5729)

segment.source: Detection of scroll keys on Hims Smart Beetle displays is once more no longer unreliable. (#6086)
segment.target: Opäť správne funguje spracovanie scrollovacích kláves na brailových riadkoch Hims. (#6086)

segment.source: In some text controls, particularly in Delphi applications, the information provided about editing and navigating is now much more reliable. (#636, #8102)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz presnejšie oznamuje zmeny v niektorých editačných poliach (napríklad v aplikácii Delphy). (#636, #8102)

segment.source: In Windows 10 RS5, NVDA no longer reports extra redundant information when switching tasks with alt+tab. (#8258)
segment.target: V systéme Windows 10 RS5, NVDA viac pri prepínaní úloh klávesovou skratkou alt+tab nečíta nadbitočné informácie. (#8258)

segment.source: Changes for developers
segment.target: Changes for developers

segment.source: The developer info for UIA objects now contains a list of the UIA patterns available. (#5712)
segment.target: The developer info for UIA objects now contains a list of the UIA patterns available. (#5712)

segment.source: App modules can now force certain windows to always use UIA by implementing the isGoodUIAWindow method. (#7961)
segment.target: App modules can now force certain windows to always use UIA by implementing the isGoodUIAWindow method. (#7961)

segment.source: The hidden boolean flag "outputPass1Only" in the braille section of the configuration has again been removed. Liblouis no longer supports pass 1 only output. (#7839)
segment.target: The hidden boolean flag "outputPass1Only" in the braille section of the configuration has again been removed. Liblouis no longer supports pass 1 only output. (#7839)

segment.source: This is a special release of NVDA which addresses a bug in the Onecore Windows Speech synthesizer driver, which was causing it to speak with a higher pitch and speed in Windows 10 Redstone 4 (1803). (#8082)
segment.target: Toto je špeciálna verzia NVDA. Opravená chyba v Onecore hlasoch, ktorá spôsobovala, že hlasy hovorili zrýchlene v aktualizácii Windows 10 Redstone 4 (1803). (#8082)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include support for charts in Microsoft word and PowerPoint, support for new braille displays including Eurobraille and the Optelec protocol converter, improved support for Hims and Optelec braille displays, performance improvements for Mozilla Firefox 58 and higher, and much more.
segment.target: Prednosti tejto verzie zahŕňajú podporu pre čítanie grafov v programoch MS Word a Powerpoint, pridanú podporu pre brailové riadky Eurobraille a Optelec protocol converter, vylepšenú podporu pre Bbrailové riadky Hims a Optelec, vylepšenú prácu s prehliadačom Mozilla Firefox od verzie 58 a oveľa viac.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nové vlastnosti

segment.source: It is now possible to interact with charts in Microsoft Word and Microsoft PowerPoint, similar to the existing support for charts in Microsoft Excel. (#7046)
segment.target: Odteraz je možné čítať grafy v programoch MS Word a MS Powerpoint podobne, ako to bolo doposiaľ možné v programe MS Excel. (#7046)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word: When in browse mode, cursor to an embedded chart and press enter to interact with it.
segment.target: Ak ste v dokumente programu MS Word: Zobrazte si dokument v režime prehliadania. Prejdite kurzorom na graf a stlačte enter.

segment.source: In Microsoft PowerPoint when editing a slide: tab to a chart object, and press enter or space to interact with the chart.
segment.target: Ak upravujete snímku v prezentácii programu MS Powerpoint, prejdite tabulátorom na graf a stlačte Enter alebo medzeru.

segment.source: To stop interacting with a chart, press escape.
segment.target: prezeranie grafu zatvoríte klávesom Escape.

segment.source: New language: Kyrgyz.
segment.target: NVDA je odteraz lokalizovaný do jazyka Kyrgyz.

segment.source: Added support for VitalSource Bookshelf. (#7155)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre program VitalSource Bookshelf. (#7155)

segment.source: Added support for the Optelec protocol converter, a device that allows one to use Braille Voyager and Satellite displays using the ALVA BC6 communication protocol. (#6731)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre Optelec protocol converter. Ide o zariadenie, ktoré umožňuje používať riadky Braille Voyager a Satellite cez komunikačný protokol riadkov ALVA BC6. (#6731)

segment.source: It is now possible to use braille input with an ALVA 640 Comfort braille display. (#7733)
segment.target: Odteraz je možné písať na klávesnici brailového riadka ALVA 640 Comfort. (#7733)

segment.source: NVDA's braille input functionality can be used with these as well as other BC6 displays with firmware 3.0.0 and above.
segment.target: Písanie funguje aj na riadkoch BC6 s firmwérom od verzie 3.0.0.

segment.source: Early support for Google Sheets with Braille mode enabled. (#7935)
segment.target: Prvotná podpora pre prácu s Google tabuľkami pomocou brailového riadka. (#7935)

segment.source: Support for Eurobraille Esys, Esytime and Iris braille displays. (#7488)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre riadky Eurobraille Esys, Esytime a Iris. (#7488)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Zmeny

segment.source: The HIMS Braille Sense/Braille EDGE/Smart Beetle and Hims Sync Braille display drivers have been replaced by one driver. The new driver will automatically be activated for former syncBraille driver users. (#7459)
segment.target: Staršie ovládače pre riadky HIMS Braille Sense/Braille EDGE/Smart Beetle a Hims Sync boli nahradené jedným, spoločným ovládačom. Ovládač sa automaticky aktivuje aj v prípade, ak ste doteraz používali tieto riadky so starším ovládačom. (#7459)

segment.source: Some keys , notably scroll keys, have been reassigned to follow the conventions used by Hims products. Consult the user guide for more details.
segment.target: niektoré klávesové príkazy pre tieto riadky boli upravené tak, aby zodpovedali príkazom, ktoré bežne tieto riadky používajú. Podrobnosti nájdete v používateľskej príručke NVDA.

segment.source: When typing with the on-screen keyboard via touch interaction, by default you now need to double tap each key the same way you would activate any other control. (#7309)
segment.target: Pri písaní na klávesnici na dotykovej obrazovke je odteraz potrebné dvakrát poklepať, aby ste napísali vybratý znak. (#7309)

segment.source: To use the existing "touch typing" mode where simply lifting your finger off the key is enough to activate it, Enable this option in the new Touch Interaction settings dialog found in the Preferences menu.
segment.target: Ak sa chcete vrátiť k predošlému stavu (v ktorom stačilo len prejsť prstom cez požadovaný znak a uvolniť prst), zmeňte nastavenie v dialógu Dotyková obrazovka. Dialóg nájdete v podmenu Možnosti NVDA.

segment.source: It is no longer necessary to explicitly tether braille to focus or review, as this will happen automatically by default. (#2385)
segment.target: Odteraz nie je potrebné prepínať zviazanie brailového kurzora na prezerací kurzor alebo na fokus. Zviazanie sa prepína automaticky podľa situácie.

segment.source: Note that automatic tethering to review will only occur when using a review cursor or object navigation command. Scrolling will not activate this new behavior.
segment.target: Upozorňujeme, že brailový kurzor sa zviaže s prezeracím kurzorom len vtedy, keď použijete prezerací kurzor alebo objektovú navigáciu. Posun riadka dopredu alebo dozadu nemá na nastavenie vplyv.

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Opravy

segment.source: Browseable messages such as showing current formatting when pressing NVDA+f twice quickly no longer fails when NVDA is installed on a path with non-ASCII characters. (#7474)
segment.target: NVDA viac nezamrzne, ak vyvoláte napríklad informáciu o formátovaní dokumentu dvojitým stlačení NVDA+F. Situácia nastávala, ak v ceste s nainštalovanou verziou NVDA boli použité znaky mimo Ascii tabuľky. (#7474)

segment.source: Focus is now once again restored correctly when returning to Spotify from another application. (#7689)
segment.target: Fokus sa odteraz korektne vráti, ak sa prepínate z inej aplikácie do okna aplikácie Spotify. (#7689)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Fall Creaters Update, NVDA no longer fails to update when Controlled Folder Access is enabled from Windows Defender Security Center. (#7696)
segment.target: Ak používate Windows 10 Fall Creators Update, NVDA sa správne aktualizuje aj v prípade, že máte aktívnu funkciu riadený prístup k priečinkom. (#7696)

segment.source: Detection of scroll keys on Hims Smart Beetle displays is no longer unreliable. (#6086)
segment.target: Odteraz správne funguje detekcia scrollovacích tlačidiel na brailových riadkoch Hims Smart Beetle. (#6086)

segment.source: A slight performance improvement when rendering large amounts of content in Mozilla Firefox 58 and later. (#7719)
segment.target: Zrýchlené načítavanie stránok v prehliadači Mozilla Ffirefox od verzie 58. (#7719)

segment.source: In Microsoft Outlook, reading emails containing tables no longer causes errors. (#6827)
segment.target: Čítanie tabuliek v e-mailových správach v programe MS Outlook viac nespôsobuje chyby. (#6827)

segment.source: Braille display gestures that emulate system keyboard key modifiers can now also be combined with other emulated system keyboard keys if one or more of the involved gestures are model specific. (#7783)
segment.target: Skratky, ktoré na brailových riadkoch simulujú tlačidlá klávesnice (napríklad Shift, ctrl...), môžu byť odteraz kombinované s inými klávesovými skratkami, ak sú tieto skratky špecifické pre konkrétny model brailového riadka. (#7783)

segment.source: In Mozilla Firefox, browse mode now works correctly in pop-ups created by extensions such as LastPass and bitwarden. (#7809)
segment.target: V prehliadači Mozilla Firefox sa dajú čítať vyskakovacie okná, ktoré zobrazujú napríklad doplnky LastPass a bitwarden. (#7809)

segment.source: NVDA no longer sometimes freezes on every focus change if Firefox or Chrome have stopped responding such as due to a freeze or crash. (#7818)
segment.target: NVDA viac nemrzne pri zmene fokusu, ak je otvorené okno s prehliadačom Firefox alebo Chrome a tento prehliadač zamrzol alebo nereaguje. (#7818)

segment.source: In twitter clients such as Chicken Nugget, NVDA will no longer ignore the last 20 characters of 280 character tweets when reading them. (#7828)
segment.target: V Twitter klientoch Chicken Nugget a podobných, NVDA viac neignoruje posledných 20 znakov zo zobrazeného Tweetu. (#7828)

segment.source: NVDA now uses the correct language when announcing symbols when text is selected. (#7687)
segment.target: NVDA používa správny jazyk pri oznamovaní symbolov počas označovania textu. (#7687)

segment.source: In recent versions of Office 365, it is again possible to navigate Excel charts using the arrow keys. (#7046)
segment.target: V najnovších verziách aplikácie Office 365 je opäť možné čítať grafy v MS Excely pomocou kurzorových šípok. (#7046)

segment.source: In speech and braille output, control states will now always be reported in the same order, regardless whether they are positive or negative. (#7076)
segment.target: Pri oznamovaní prvkov cez reč alebo Braill, stav prvkov je oznamovaný vždy v rovnakom poradí nezávisle od toho, či ide o pozitívny alebo negatívny stav. (#7076)

segment.source: In apps such as Windows 10 Mail, NVDA will no longer fail to announce deleted characters when pressing backspace. (#7456)
segment.target: V aplikáciách ako napríklad Windows Mail, NVDA odteraz oznamuje znaky zmazané klávesom backspace. (#7456)

segment.source: All keys on the Hims Braille Sense Polaris displays are now working as expected. (#7865)
segment.target: Všetky tlačidlá na brailovom riadku Hims Braille Sense Polaris odteraz pracujú správne. (#7865)

segment.source: NVDA no longer fails to start on Windows 7 complaining about an internal api-ms dll, when a particular version of the Visual Studio 2017 redistributables have been installed by another application. (#7975)
segment.target: NVDA sa viac neodmieta spustiť v systéme Windows 7 zobrazujúc chybovú hlášku v internej knižnici api-ms dll, keď iná aplikácia nainštalovala do systému konkrétnu verziu Visual Studio 2017 redistributables. (#7975)

segment.source: Changes for developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: Added a hidden boolean flag to the braille section in the configuration: "outputPass1Only". (#7301, #7693, #7702)
segment.target: Added a hidden boolean flag to the braille section in the configuration: "outputPass1Only". (#7301, #7693, #7702)

segment.source: This flag defaults to true. If false, liblouis multi pass rules will be used for braille output.
segment.target: This flag defaults to true. If false, liblouis multi pass rules will be used for braille output.

segment.source: A new dictionary (braille.RENAMED_DRIVERS) has been added to allow for smooth transition for users using drivers that have been superseded by others. (#7459)
segment.target: A new dictionary (braille.RENAMED_DRIVERS) has been added to allow for smooth transition for users using drivers that have been superseded by others. (#7459)

segment.source: Updated comtypes package to 1.1.3. (#7831)
segment.target: Updated comtypes package to 1.1.3. (#7831)

segment.source: Implemented a generic system in braille.BrailleDisplayDriver to deal with displays which send confirmation/acknowledgement packets. See the handyTech braille display driver as an example. (#7590, #7721)
segment.target: Implemented a generic system in braille.BrailleDisplayDriver to deal with displays which send confirmation/acknowledgement packets. See the handyTech braille display driver as an example. (#7590, #7721)

segment.source: A new "isAppX" variable in the config module can be used to detect if NVDA is running as a Windows Desktop Bridge Store app. (#7851)
segment.target: A new "isAppX" variable in the config module can be used to detect if NVDA is running as a Windows Desktop Bridge Store app. (#7851)

segment.source: For document implementations such as NVDAObjects or browseMode that have a textInfo, there is now a new documentBase.documentWithTableNavigation class that can be inherited from to gain standard table navigation scripts. Please refer to this class to see which helper methods must be provided by your implementation for table navigation to work. (#7849)
segment.target: For document implementations such as NVDAObjects or browseMode that have a textInfo, there is now a new documentBase.documentWithTableNavigation class that can be inherited from to gain standard table navigation scripts. Please refer to this class to see which helper methods must be provided by your implementation for table navigation to work. (#7849)

segment.source: The scons batch file now better handles when Python 3 is also installed, making use of the launcher to specifically launch python 2.7 32 bit. (#7541)
segment.target: The scons batch file now better handles when Python 3 is also installed, making use of the launcher to specifically launch python 2.7 32 bit. (#7541)

segment.source: hwIo.Hid now takes an additional parameter exclusive, which defaults to True. If set to False, other applications are allowed to communicate with a device while it is connected to NVDA. (#7859)
segment.target: hwIo.Hid now takes an additional parameter exclusive, which defaults to True. If set to False, other applications are allowed to communicate with a device while it is connected to NVDA. (#7859)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include many fixes and enhancements to web support including browse mode for web dialogs by default, better reporting of field group labels in browse mode, support for new Windows 10 technologies such as Windows Defender Application Guard and Windows 10 on ARM64, and automatic reporting of screen orientation and battery status.
segment.target: Prednosti tejto verzie zahŕňajú opravy týkajúce sa režimu prehliadania (podporu pre prezeranie dialógov v režime prehliadania, lepšie oznamovanie skupín prvkov), podporu pre Windows Defender Guard v systéme Windows 10, podporu systému Windows 10 na architektúre ARM64 a automatické oznamovanie zmeny orientácie obrazovky a stavu napájania.

segment.source: Please note that this version of NVDA no longer supports Windows XP or Windows Vista. The minimum requirement for NVDA is now windows 7 with Service Pack 1.
segment.target: Zdôrazňujeme, že táto verzia NVDA viac nepracuje v systémoch Windows XP a Vista. Aby ste mohli NVDA používať, musíte mať nainštalovaný Windows 7 a Service Pack 1.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nové vlastnosti

segment.source: In browse mode, it is now possible to skip past/to the start of landmarks using the skip to end/beginning of container commands (comma/shift+comma). (#5482)
segment.target: V režime prehliadania je možné preskakovať pred a za oblasti stránky skratkami rýchlej navigácie na prechod pred a za prvok (čiarka, shift+čiarka). (#5324)

segment.source: In Firefox, Chrome and Internet Explorer, quick navigation to edit fields and form fields now includes editable rich text content (I.e. contentEditable). (#5534)
segment.target: V prehliadačoch Firefox, Chrome a Internet Explorer je možné skratky rýchlej navigácie na prechod medzi prvkami formulára a editačnými poliami použiť tiež na prechod do poľa rich text (contentEditable) (#5534)

segment.source: In web browsers, the Elements List can now list form fields and buttons. (#588)
segment.target: V režime prehliadania je teraz možné v zozname prvkov zobraziť zoznam tlačidiel a prvkov formulára. (#588)

segment.source: Initial support for Windows 10 on ARM64. (#7508)
segment.target: Prvotná podpora pre Windows 10 na architektúre ARM64. (#7508)

segment.source: Early support for reading and interactive navigation of mathematical content for Kindle books with accessible math. (#7536)
segment.target: Prvotná podpora pre čítanie matematického obsahu v aplikácii Kindle. (#7536)

segment.source: Added support for Azardi e-book reader. (#5848)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre čítačku kníh Azardi. (#5848)

segment.source: Version information for add-ons is now reported when being updated. (#5324)
segment.target: Pri pokuse aktualizovať doplnok sa zobrazí informácia o verzii doplnku. (#5324)

segment.source: Added new command line parameters to create a portable copy of NVDA. (#6329)
segment.target: Pridaný argument príkazového riadka, ktorý umožní vytvoriť prenosnú verziu NVDA. (#6329)

segment.source: Support for Microsoft Edge running within Windows Defender Application Guard in Windows 10 Fall Creators Update. (#7600)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre Microsoft Edge, ak je spustený pod ochranou Windows Defender Guard v systéme Windows 10 Fall Creators update. (#7600)

segment.source: If running on a laptop or tablet, NVDA will now report when a charger is connected/disconnected, and when the screen orientation changes. (#4574, #4612)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz oznamuje zmenu orientácie obrazovky a tiež pripojenie a odpojenie nabíjačky. (#4574, #4612)

segment.source: New language: Macedonian.
segment.target: Pridaná lokalizácia NVDA do Macedónčiny.

segment.source: New braille translation tables: Croatian grade 1, Vietnamese grade 1. (#7518, #7565)
segment.target: Pridané nové brailové tabuľky: Chorvátčina Plnopis, vietnamčina plnopis. (#7518, #7565)

segment.source: Support for the Actilino braille display from Handy Tech has been added. (#7590)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre brailový riadok Actilino od firmy handy tech. (#7590)

segment.source: Braille input for Handy Tech braille displays is now supported. (#7590)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre písanie cez brailové riadky výrobcu Handy tech. )

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Zmeny

segment.source: The minimum supported Operating System for NVDA is now Windows 7 Service Pack 1, or Windows Server 2008 R2 Service Pack 1. (#7546)
segment.target: Najnižšie požiadavky pre NVDA sú odteraz Windows 7 Servicepack 1 alebo Windows Server 2008 R2 Service Pack 1. (#7546)

segment.source: Web dialogs in Firefox and Chrome web browsers now automatically use browse Mode, unless inside of a web application. (#4493)
segment.target: Webové dialógi v režime prehliadania v prehliadačoch Firefox a Chrome sa automaticky zobrazujú v režime prehliadania, ak nie ste vnorený priamo v aplikácii. (#4493)

segment.source: In browse mode, tabbing and moving with quick navigation commands no longer announces jumping out of containers such as lists and tables, which makes navigating more efficient. (#2591)
segment.target: pri použití tabulátora alebo skratiek rýchlej navigácie NVDA viac neoznamuje opustenie zoznamu alebo tabuľky, čo zrýchľuje navigáciu. (#2591)

segment.source: In Browse mode for Firefox and Chrome, the name of form field groups are now announced when moving into them with quick navigation or when tabbing. (#3321)
segment.target: V prehliadačoch Firefox a Chrome sú oznamované názvy skupín formulárových prvkov, ak sa medzi nimi presúvate skratkami rýchlej navigácie alebo tabulátorom. (#3321)

segment.source: In browse mode, the quick navigation command for embedded objects (o and shift+o) now includes audio and video elements as well as elements with the aria roles application and dialog. (#7239)
segment.target: Skratka O a shift+O v režime prehliadania odteraz presúva fokus aj na audio a videoprehrávače, tiež prvky s aria označením aplikácia a dialóg. (#7239)

segment.source: Espeak-ng has been updated to 1.49.2, resolving some issues with producing release builds. (#7385, #7583)
segment.target: Hlasový výstup eSpeak-ng aktualizovaný na verziu 1.49.2, opravené boli hlavne chyby v súvislosti s distribúciou verzií. (#7385, #7583)

segment.source: On the third activation of the 'read status bar' command, its contents is copied to the clipboard. (#1785)
segment.target: Trojnásobné stlačenie skratky na prečítanie stavového riadka skopíruje odteraz obsah stavového riadka do schránky. (#1785)

segment.source: When assigning gestures to keys on a Baum display, you can limit them to the model of the braille display in use (e.g. VarioUltra or Pronto). (#7517)
segment.target: Keď priraďujete skratky na riadku od firmy Baum, môžete určiť, na akom modely chcete skratku používať (napríklad VarioUltra alebo Pronto.) (#7517)

segment.source: The hotkey for the filter field in the elements list in browse mode has changed from alt+f to alt+e. (#7569)
segment.target: Skratka pre rýchly prístup k poľu filter v zozname prvkov sa zmenila z alt+F na alt+E. (#7569)

segment.source: An unbound command has been added for browse mode to toggle the inclusion of layout tables on the fly. You can find this command in the Browse mode category of the Input Gestures dialog. (#7634)
segment.target: Odteraz môžete vypínať a zapínať oznamovanie tabuliek formujúcich vzhľad klávesovou skratkou. Skratku si nastavíte v dialógu klávesové skratky v časti režim prehliadania. (#7634)

segment.source: Upgraded liblouis braille translator to 3.3.0. (#7565)
segment.target: brailová prekladová tabuľka liblouis aktualizovaná na verziu 3.3.0. (#7565)

segment.source: The hotkey for the regular expression radio button in the dictionary dialog has changed from alt+r to alt+e. (#6782)
segment.target: Klávesová skratka pre prepínač regulárny výraz v dialógoch rečové slovníky sa zmenila z alt+r na alt+e. (len v anglickom preklade NVDA. V slovenskom už dlhší čas používame alt+E). (#6782)

segment.source: Voice dictionary files are now versioned and have been moved to the 'speechDicts/voiceDicts.v1' directory. (#7592)
segment.target: Odteraz sa ukladajú zálohy rečových slovníkov a aktuálna verzia je presunutá do priečinka speechDicts/voiceDicts.v1 (#7592)

segment.source: Versioned files (user configuration, voice dictionaries) modifications are no longer saved when NVDA is run from the launcher. (#7688)
segment.target: Ak je spustená dočasná kópia NVDA, neukladajú sa zmeny do súborov s konfiguráciou a rečovými slovníkmi. (#7688)

segment.source: The Braillino, Bookworm and Modular (with old firmware) braille displays from Handy Tech are no longer supported out of the box. Install the Handy Tech Universal Driver and NVDA add-on to use these displays. (#7590)
segment.target: Staršie modely riadkov Handy tech (Braillino, Bookworm a Modular so starším firmwérom) nie sú viac priamo podporované. Pre správnu funkčnosť je potrebné nainštalovať univerzálny ovládač a príslušný doplnok do NVDA. (#7590)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Opravy

segment.source: Links are now indicated in braille in applications such as Microsoft Word. (#6780)
segment.target: Odkazy v dokumentoch MS Word a ostatných aplikáciách sú odteraz zobrazované aj na brailových riadkoch. (#6780)

segment.source: NVDA no longer becomes noticeably slower when many tabs are open in either Firefox or Chrome web browsers. (#3138)
segment.target: NVDA sa viac nespomalý, ak máte vo firefoxe alebo Chrome otvorené viaceré záložky. (#3138)

segment.source: Cursor routing for the MDV Lilli Braille display no longer incorrectly moves one braille cell ahead of where it should be. (#7469)
segment.target: Sledovanie kurzora funguje správne pri riadkoch MDV Lilli. (#7469)

segment.source: In Internet Explorer and other MSHTML documents, the HTML5 required attribute is now supported to indicate the required state of a form field. (#7321)
segment.target: V prehliadači Internet Explorer a iných MSHTML prvkoch je podporovaný prvok HTML5 na určenie, či je prvok formulára povinný. (#7321)

segment.source: Braille displays are now updated when typing Arabic characters in a left-aligned WordPad document. (#511)
segment.target: Obsah na brailovom riadku sa aktualizuje aj pri písaní arabských znakov v programe Wordpad v smere zprava doľava. (#511)

segment.source: Accessible labels for controls in Mozilla Firefox are now more readily reported in browse mode when the label does not appear as content itself. (#4773)
segment.target: Prístupné popisy k prvkom sú lepšie čítané v prehliadači Mozilla firefox, ak popis nie je súčasťou obsahu prvku. (#4773)

segment.source: On windows 10 Creaters Update, NVDA can again access Firefox after a restart of NVDA. (#7269)
segment.target: V systéme Windows 10 Creators NVDA opäť dokáže správne pracovať s prehliadačom Firefox aj po reštarte NVDA. (#7269)

segment.source: When restarting NVDA with Mozilla Firefox in focus, browse mode will again be available, though you may need to alt+tab away and back again. (#5758)
segment.target: Ak reštartujete NVDA, režim prehliadania v prehliadači Mozilla Firefox bude správne fungovať, je však niekedy potrebné z aplikácie vyskočiť a nanovo sa do nej vrátiť, napríklad skratkou alt+tab. (#5758)

segment.source: It is now possible to access math content in Google Chrome on a system with out Mozilla Firefox installed. (#7308)
segment.target: Odteraz je možné prezerať matematický obsah v prehliadači Google Chrome bez toho, aby ste museli mať nainštalovaný Firefox. (#7308)

segment.source: The Operating System and other applications should be more stable directly after installing NVDA before rebooting, as compaired with installs of previous NVDA versions. (#7563)
segment.target: Ak ste nainštalovali NVDA, aj pred reštartom počítača by mali aplikácie a systém fungovať stabilnejšie. (#7563)

segment.source: When using a content recognition command (e.g. NVDA+r), NVDA now reports an error message instead of nothing if the navigator object has disappeared. (#7567)
segment.target: Ak sa pokúsite rozpoznať text a rozpoznávaný objekt medzitým zmizne, NVDA na to upozorní. (#7567)

segment.source: Backward scrolling functionality has been fixed for Freedom Scientific braille displays containing a left bumper bar. (#7713)
segment.target: Opravené skrolovanie brailových riadkov pri modeloch od firmy Freedom Scientific. (#7713)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: "scons tests" now checks that translatable strings have translator comments. You can also run this alone with "scons checkPot". (#7492)
segment.target: "scons tests" now checks that translatable strings have translator comments. You can also run this alone with "scons checkPot". (#7492)

segment.source: There is now a new extensionPoints module which provides a generic framework to enable code extensibility at specific points in the code. This allows interested parties to register to be notified when some action occurs (extensionPoints.Action), to modify a specific kind of data (extensionPoints.Filter) or to participate in deciding whether something will be done (extensionPoints.Decider). (#3393)
segment.target: There is now a new extensionPoints module which provides a generic framework to enable code extensibility at specific points in the code. This allows interested parties to register to be notified when some action occurs (extensionPoints.Action), to modify a specific kind of data (extensionPoints.Filter) or to participate in deciding whether something will be done (extensionPoints.Decider). (#3393)

segment.source: You can now register to be notified about configuration profile switches via the config.configProfileSwitched Action. (#3393)
segment.target: You can now register to be notified about configuration profile switches via the config.configProfileSwitched Action. (#3393)

segment.source: Braille display gestures that emulate system keyboard key modifiers (such as control and alt) can now be combined with other emulated system keyboard keys without explicit definition. (#6213)
segment.target: Braille display gestures that emulate system keyboard key modifiers (such as control and alt) can now be combined with other emulated system keyboard keys without explicit definition. (#6213)

segment.source: For example, if you have a key on your display bound to the alt key and another display key to downArrow, combining these keys will result in the emulation of alt+downArrow.
segment.target: For example, if you have a key on your display bound to the alt key and another display key to downArrow, combining these keys will result in the emulation of alt+downArrow.

segment.source: The braille.BrailleDisplayGesture class now has an extra model property. If provided, pressing a key will generate an additional, model specific gesture identifier. This allows a user to bind gestures limited to a specific braille display model.
segment.target: The braille.BrailleDisplayGesture class now has an extra model property. If provided, pressing a key will generate an additional, model specific gesture identifier. This allows a user to bind gestures limited to a specific braille display model.

segment.source: See the baum driver as an example for this new functionality.
segment.target: See the baum driver as an example for this new functionality.

segment.source: NVDA is now compiled with Visual Studio 2017 and the Windows 10 SDK. (#7568)
segment.target: NVDA is now compiled with Visual Studio 2017 and the Windows 10 SDK. (#7568)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include input of contracted braille, support for new Windows OneCore voices available on Windows 10, in-built support for Windows 10 OCR, and many significant improvements regarding Braille and the web.
segment.target: Prednosti tejto verzie zahŕňajú možnosť písania v braillovom skratkopise cez brailový riadok, podporu pre hlasy One core a OCR v systéme Windows 10 a rôzne doplnkové opravy pre brailové riadky a web.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nové vlastnosti

segment.source: A Braille setting has been added to "show messages indefinitely". (#6669)
segment.target: Pridaná možnosť zobrazovať správy na brailovom riadku neobmedzený čas. (#6669)

segment.source: In Microsoft Outlook message lists, NVDA now reports if a message is flagged. (#6374)
segment.target: V zozname správ v programe Microsoft outlook NVDA oznamuje, ak má správa farebný príznak. (#6374)

segment.source: In Microsoft PowerPoint, the exact type of a shape is now reported when editing a slide (such as triangle, circle, video or arrow), rather than just "shape". (#7111)
segment.target: Pri úprave prezentácie v MS Powerpoint, NVDA oznamuje presný tvar objektu (trojuholník, kruh, video, šípky...) (#7111)

segment.source: Mathematical content (provided as MathML) is now supported in Google Chrome. (#7184)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre MathML pre prehliadač Google Chrome. (#7184)

segment.source: NVDA can now speak using the new Windows OneCore voices (also known as Microsoft Mobile voices) included in Windows 10. You access these by selecting Windows OneCore voices in NVDA's Synthesizer dialog. (#6159)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz dokáže rozprávať cez hlasy Onecore (označované aj ako Mobile) v systéme Windows 10. Hlas nastavíte v menu NVDA >možnosti > hlasový výstup. (#6159)

segment.source: NVDA user configuration files can now be stored in the user's local application data folder. This is enabled via a setting in the registry. See "System Wide Parameters" in the User Guide for more details. (#6812)
segment.target: odteraz je možné nastavenia NVDA ukladať v lokálnom adresári používateľa. Nastavenie sa dá upraviť v registroch systému Windows. Podrobný postup je popísaný v časti "systémové parametre" v používateľskej príručke. (#6812)

segment.source: In web browsers, NVDA now reports placeholder values for fields (specifically, aria-placeholder is now supported). (#7004)
segment.target: V režime prehliadania sú oznamované hodnoty zástupných symbolov (cez podporu aria-placeholder). (#7004)

segment.source: In Browse mode for Microsoft Word, it is now possible to navigate to spelling errors using quick navigation (w and shift+w). (#6942)
segment.target: V režime prehliadania v dokumentoch MS word je možné pohybovať sa medzi pravopisnými chybami skratkami rýchlej navigácie W a shift+W. (#6942)

segment.source: Added support for the Date picker control found in Microsoft Outlook Appointment dialogs. (#7217)
segment.target: pridaná podpora pre prvok výber dátumu v pripomienkach v programe MS Outlook. (#7217)

segment.source: The currently selected suggestion is now reported in Windows 10 Mail to/cc fields and the Windows 10 Settings search field. (#6241)
segment.target: V programe Pošta v systéme Windows 10 sú oznamované automatické návrhy v poli skrytá kópia a tiež v editačných poliach hľadania v aplikácii nastavenia. (#6241)

segment.source: A sound is now playd to indicate the appearance of suggestions in certain search fields in Windows 10 (E.g. start screen, settings search, Windows 10 mail to/cc fields). (#6241)
segment.target: NVDA dokáže oznamovať automatické návrhy zvukom (hľadanie v ponuke štart, vyhľadávanie v aplikácii Nastavenia, polia v aplikácii pošta...) (#6241)

segment.source: NVDA now automatically reports notifications in Skype for Business Desktop, such as when someone starts a conversation with you. (#7281)
segment.target: NVDA automaticky oznamuje upozornenia z aplikácie skype Business (desktop), napríklad ak niekto začal konverzáciu. (#7281)

segment.source: NVDA now automatically reports incoming chat messages while in a Skype for Business conversation. (#7286)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz automaticky oznamuje nové správy v aplikácii Skype Business (desktop). (#7286)

segment.source: NVDA now automatically reports notifications in Microsoft Edge, such as when a download starts. (#7281)
segment.target: Odteraz sú automaticky oznamované notifikácie v MS Edge, napríklad ak sa začne sťahovanie. (#7281)

segment.source: You can now type in both contracted and uncontracted braille on a braille display with a braille keyboard. See the Braille Input section of the User Guide for details. (#2439)
segment.target: Na brailovom riadku je teraz možné písať text v plnopise aj skratkopise. Podrobnosti sú popísané v príslušnej sekcii v používateľskej príručke. (#2439)

segment.source: You can now enter Unicode braille characters from the braille keyboard on a braille display by selecting Unicode braille as the input table in Braille Settings. (#6449)
segment.target: Odteraz je možné písať znaky Unicode na brailovom riadku. Ako vstupnú tabuľku je potrebné zvoliť unicode. (#6449)

segment.source: Added support for the SuperBraille braille display used in Taiwan. (#7352)
segment.target: Pridaná podpora pre brailový riadok superbraille, populárny hlavne v Tajvane. (#7352)

segment.source: New braille translation tables: Danish 8 dot computer braille, Lithuanian, Persian 8 dot computer braille, Persian grade 1, Slovenian 8 dot computer braille. (#6188, #6550, #6773, #7367)
segment.target: Nové brailové prekladové tabuľky: Dánsky 8-bodový počítačový kód, Litovčina, Persština 8-bodový počítačový kód a plnopis, Slovinský 8-bodový počítačový kód. (#6188, #6550, #6773, #7367)

segment.source: Improved English (U.S.) 8 dot computer braille table, including support for bullets, the euro sign and accented letters. (#6836)
segment.target: Upravená brailová tabuľka pre 8 bodový počítačový kód v Americkej Angličtine: pridaná podpora pre odrážky, znak euro a zvýraznené znaky. (#6836)

segment.source: NVDA can now use the OCR functionality included in Windows 10 to recognize the text of images or inaccessible applications. (#7361)
segment.target: NVDA odteraz podporuje optické rozpoznávanie textu cez rozhranie Windows 10 OCR. Rozpoznanie možno použiť v obrázkoch alebo neprístupných objektoch. (#7361)

segment.source: The language can be set from the new Windows 10 OCR dialog in NVDA Preferences.
segment.target: jazyk rozpoznávania sa nastavuje v možnostiach v dialogu rozpoznávanie textu.

segment.source: To recognize the content of the current navigator object, press NVDA+r.
segment.target: Rozpoznávanie spustíte skratkou NVDA+r.

segment.source: See the Content Recognition section of the User Guide for further details.
segment.target: Podrobnosti sú popísané v používateľskej príručke, v časti Optické rozpoznanie textu.

segment.source: You can now choose what context information is shown on a braille display when an object gets focus using the new "Focus context presentation" setting in the Braille Settings dialog. (#217)
segment.target: Odteraz je možné nastaviť, aké kontextové informácie sa zobrazia na brailovom riadku pri objekte, ktorý nadobudol fokus. Nastavenie s názvom "prezentácia fokusu" nádete v nastaveniach Braillu. (#217)

segment.source: For example, the "Fill display for context changes" and "Only when scrolling back" options can make working with lists and menus more efficient, since the items won't continually change their position on the display.
segment.target: Napríklad ak si nastavíte možnosti "len zmeny", alebo "len pri návrate späť", bude sa vám lepšie pracovať so zoznamami, lebo položky zoznamu nebudú neustále meniť polohu na riadku.

segment.source: See the section on the "Focus context presentation" setting in the User Guide for further details and examples.
segment.target: Podrobnejšie sú nastavenia popísané v časti "prezentácia kontextu" v používateľskej príručke.

segment.source: In Firefox and Chrome, NVDA now supports complex dynamic grids such as spreadsheets where only some of the content might be loaded or displayed (specifically, the aria-rowcount, aria-colcount, aria-rowindex and aria-colindex attributes introduced in ARIA 1.1). (#7410)
segment.target: V prehliadačoch Firefox a Chrome sú podporované komplexné dynamické mriežky, akými sú napríklad hárky, v ktorých sa zobrazí alebo načíta len časť obsahu (ide o podporu aria-rowcount, aria-colcount, aria-rowindex a aria-colindex. Atribúty doplnené v ARIA 1.1). (#7410)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Zmeny

segment.source: An unbound command has been added to restart NVDA on demand. You can find it in the Miscelaneous category of the Input Gestures dialog. (#6396)
segment.target: Pridaná možnosť priameho reštartu NVDA. Príkaz sa nachádza v časti rôzne v dialógu klávesové skratky. (#6396)

segment.source: The keyboard layout can now be set from the NVDA Welcome dialog. (#6863)
segment.target: Rozloženie klávesnice je odteraz možné nastaviť v dialógu Vitajte. (#6863)

segment.source: Many more control types and states have been abbreviated for braille. Landmarks have also been abbreviated. Please see "Control Type, State and Landmark Abbreviations" under Braille in the User Guide for a complete list. (#7188, #3975)
segment.target: pridané skratky pre prvky a ich stavy a tiež pre oblasti stránky, ktoré sa teraz zobrazujú na brailovom riadku. Pozrite časť "Skratky pre prvky, oblasti stránky a typy stavov v brailovom zobrazení" v používateľskej príručke. (#7188, #3975)

segment.source: Updated eSpeak NG to 1.49.1. (#7280)
segment.target: Hlasový výstup eSpeak NG aktualizovaný na verziu 1.49.1. (#7280)

segment.source: The output and input table lists in the Braille Settings dialog are now sorted alphabetically. (#6113)
segment.target: Zoznam tabuliek v nastaveniach Braillu je zoradený abecedne. (#6113)

segment.source: Updated liblouis braille translator to 3.2.0. (#6935)
segment.target: brailová prekladová tabuľka Liblouis aktualizovaná na verziu 3.2.0. (#6935)

segment.source: The default braille table is now Unified English Braille Code grade 1. (#6952)
segment.target: Predvolená brailová tabuľka je odteraz nastavená na jednotný anglický braill plnopis. (#6952)

segment.source: By default, NVDA now only shows the parts of the context information that have changed on a braille display when an object gets focus. (#217)
segment.target: Predvolene sa na brailovom riadku zobrazujú len čiastočné informácie o zmene kontextu prvku, ktorý má fokus. (#217)

segment.source: Previously, it always showed as much context information as possible, regardless of whether you have seen the same context information before.
segment.target: Doposiaľ sa neustále zobrazovala celá kontextová informácia bez ohľadu na to, či už bola pred tým zobrazená.

segment.source: You can revert to the old behaviour by changing the new "Focus context presentation" setting in the Braille Settings dialog to "Always fill display".
segment.target: Pôvodné nastavenie možno dosiahnúť tak, že v nastaveniach Braillu zmeníte nastavenie "prezentácia kontextu" na "vždy zobraziť".

segment.source: When using Braille, the cursor can be configured to be a different shape when tethered to focus or review. (#7122)
segment.target: Odteraz je možné nastaviť rôzne tvary pre kurzor zviazaný s fokusom alebo s prezeracím kurzorom. (#7112)

segment.source: The NVDA logo has been updated. The updated NVDA logo is a stylised blend of the letters NVDA in white, on a solid purple background. This ensures it will be visible on any colour background, and uses the purple from the NV Access logo. (#7446)
segment.target: Aktualizované logo NVDA. Nové logo je štylizovaná zmes písmen NVDA v bielej farbe na pevnom fialovom pozadí. To zabezpečí, že bude viditeľné na akomkoľvek farebnom pozadí a stále ostane zachovaná fialová farba z loga NV Access. (# 7446)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Opravy

segment.source: Editable div elements in Chrome no longer have their label reported as their value while in browse mode. (#7153)
segment.target: Editačné prvky div majú v prehliadači chrome správne zobrazené ako popis svoj popis a nie hodnotu. (#7153)

segment.source: Pressing end while in browse mode for an empty Microsoft Word document no longer causes a runtime error. (#7009)
segment.target: Ak v režime prehliadania v prázdnom dokumente MS Word stlačíte end, nezobrazí sa viac runtime error. (#7009)

segment.source: Browse mode is now correctly supported in Microsoft Edge where a document has been given a specific ARIA role of document. (#6998)
segment.target: Režim prehliadania je správne podporovaný v prehliadači MS Edge, ak má dokument rolu pridelenú cez atribút Aria. (#6998)

segment.source: In browse mode, you can now select or unselect to the end of the line using shift+end even when the caret is on the last character of the line. (#7157)
segment.target: V režime prehliadania je možné označiť a odznačiť text skratkou shift+end aj vtedy, ak je kurzor na poslednom znaku na riadku. (#7157)

segment.source: If a dialog contains a progress bar, the dialog text is now updated in braille when the progress bar changes. This means, for example, that the remaining time can now be read in NVDA's "Downloading Update" dialog. (#6862)
segment.target: Ak dialóg obsahuje indikátor priebehu, text dialógu sa automaticky aktualizuje na brailovom riadku. Takto môžete napríklad sledovať zostávajúci čas pri sťahovaní aktualizácie NVDA. (#6862)

segment.source: NVDA will now announce selection changes for certain Windows 10 combo boxes such as AutoPlay in Settings. (#6337).
segment.target: NVDA odteraz oznamuje zmeny výberu v zoznamových rámikoch v oknách systému Windows 10, napríklad pri nastavovaní automatického prehrávania. (#6337)

segment.source: Pointless information is no longer announced when entering Meeting / Appointment creation dialogs in Microsoft Outlook. (#7216)
segment.target: NVDA viac nečíta nepodstatné informácie pri vstupe do dialógu s vytvorením stretnutia alebo pripomienky v programe MS Outlook. (#7216)

segment.source: Beeps for indeterminate progress bar dialogs such as the update checker only when progress bar output is configured to include beeps. (#6759)
segment.target: Indikátor priebehu s neurčitým koncom (napríklad dialóg s aktualizáciou a inštaláciou NVDA) pípa len vtedy, ak je oznamovanie priebehu nastavené na pípanie. (#6759)

segment.source: In Microsoft Excel 2003 and 2007, cells are again reported when arrowing around a worksheet. (#7243)
segment.target: V dokumentoch MS Excel 2003 a 2007 sú správne oznamované bunky pri pohybe v hárku šípkami. (#7243)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Creators Update and later, browse mode is again automatically enabled when reading emails in Windows 10 Mail. (#7289)
segment.target: V systéme Windows 10 Creators a novších je automaticky aktivovaný režim prehliadania pri otvorení správi v aplikácii pošta. (#7289)

segment.source: On most braille displays with a braille keyboard, dot 7 now erases the last entered braille cell or character, and dot 8 presses the enter key. (#6054)
segment.target: Na väčšine brailových riadkov, ktoré majú klávesnicu, bod 7 maže posledne napísanýznak, bod 8 aktivuje kláves enter. (#6054)

segment.source: In editable text, when moving the caret (e.g. with the cursor keys or backspace), NVDA's spoken feedback is now more accurate in many cases, particularly in Chrome and terminal applications. (#6424)
segment.target: Pri pohybe kurzora v editačných poliach (šípky alebo aj kláves backspace) je pozícia oznamovaná presnejšie. Týka sa to hlavne prehliadača chrome a tiež terminálových aplikácii. (#6424)

segment.source: The content of the Signature Editor in Microsoft Outlook 2016 can now be read. (#7253)
segment.target: Odteraz je možné čítať obsah v editore podpisov v aplikácii MS Outlook 2016. (#7253)

segment.source: In Java Swing applications, NVDA no longer sometimes causes the application to crash when navigating tables. (#6992)
segment.target: NVDA viac nespôsobuje pád aplikácii postavených na Java Swing pri pokuse čítať tabuľku v okne takejto aplikácie. (#6992)

segment.source: In Windows 10 Creators Update, NVDA will no longer announce toast notifications multiple times. (#7128)
segment.target: NVDA v systéme Windows 10 neopakuje viackrát za sebou dlaždicové upozornenia. (#7128)

segment.source: In The start menu in Windows 10, pressing Enter to close the start menu after a search no longer causes NVDA to announce search text. (#7370)
segment.target: NVDA viac neoznamuje hľadaný text, ak zatvoríte hľadanie v ponuke štart vo Windowse 10 klávesom Enter. (#7370)

segment.source: Performing quick navigation to headings in Microsoft Edge is now significantly faster. (#7343)
segment.target: Zrýchlená navigácia po nadpisoch v režime prehliadania v programe MS Edge. (#7343)

segment.source: In Microsoft Edge, navigating in browse mode no longer skips large parts of certain web pages such as the Wordpress 2015 theme. (#7143)
segment.target: Skratky rýchlej navigácie v MS Edge nepreskakujú náhodne veľké kusy stránky (dialo sa napríklad v téme Wordpress 2015). (#7143)

segment.source: In Microsoft Edge, landmarks are correctly localized in languages other than English. (#7328)
segment.target: V MS Edge sú správne lokalizované oblasti stránky aj vtedy, ak sa používa iný jazyk ako angličtina. (#7328)

segment.source: Braille now correctly follows the selection when selecting text beyond the width of the display. For example, if you select multiple lines with shift+downArrow, braille now shows the last line you selected. (#5770)
segment.target: Zobrazenie na brailovom riadku správne sleduje vybratý text aj vtedy, ak text prekračuje rozsah brailového riadku. Ak označíte viacero riadkov, na riadku by ste mali vidieť posledný označený riadok. (#5770)

segment.source: In Firefox, NVDA no longer spuriously reports "section" several times when opening details for a tweet on twitter.com. (#5741)
segment.target: V Mozilla firefox na stránke twitter.com NVDA viac neoznamuje "sekcia" pri otvorení detailu tweetu. (#5741)

segment.source: Table navigation commands are no longer available for layout tables in Browse Mode unless reporting of layout tables is enabled. (#7382)
segment.target: Ak je vypnuté oznamovanie tabuliek formujúcih vzhľad, takéto tabuľky sa neukážu pri prechode tabuľkami skratkami rýchlej navigácie. (#7382)

segment.source: In Firefox and Chrome, Browse Mode table navigation commands now skip over hidden table cells. (#6652, #5655)
segment.target: V prehliadačoch Firefox a chrome skratky rýchlej navigácie pre tabuľky preskakujú skryté bunky tabuľky. (#6652, #5655)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: Timestamps in the log now include milliseconds. (#7163)
segment.target: Timestamps in the log now include milliseconds. (#7163)

segment.source: NVDA must now be built with Visual Studio Community 2015. Visual Studio Express is no longer supported. (#7110)
segment.target: NVDA must now be built with Visual Studio Community 2015. Visual Studio Express is no longer supported. (#7110)

segment.source: The Windows 10 Tools and SDK are now also required, which can be enabled when installing Visual Studio.
segment.target: The Windows 10 Tools and SDK are now also required, which can be enabled when installing Visual Studio.

segment.source: See the Installed Dependencies section of the readme for additional details.
segment.target: See the Installed Dependencies section of the readme for additional details.

segment.source: Support for content recognizers such as OCR and image description tools can be easily implemented using the new contentRecog package. (#7361)
segment.target: Support for content recognizers such as OCR and image description tools can be easily implemented using the new contentRecog package. (#7361)

segment.source: The Python json package is now included in NVDA binary builds. (#3050)
segment.target: The Python json package is now included in NVDA binary builds. (#3050)

segment.source: Highlights of this release include full support for audio ducking in the Windows 10 Creators Update; fixes for several selection issues in browse mode, including problems with select all; significant improvements in Microsoft Edge support; and improvements on the web such as indication of elements marked as current (using aria-current).
segment.target: Prednosti tejto verzie zahŕňajú podporu pre automatické stišovanie zvuku v systéme Windows 10 Creators; opravené problémy s označovaní textu v režime prehliadania; vylepšenú podporu pre MS Edge a zlepšenie oznamovania prvkov, ktoré sú označené ako aktuálne pomocou atribútu aria-current.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nové vlastnosti

segment.source: Cell border information can now be reported in Microsoft Excel by using NVDA+f. (#3044)
segment.target: Skratka NVDA+F odteraz oznamuje informáciu o orámovaní buniek tabuľky v MS Excely. (#3044)

segment.source: In web browsers, NVDA now indicates when an element has been marked as current (specifically, using the aria-current attribute). (#6358)
segment.target: V režime prehliadania NVDA oznamuje prvky, ktoré sú označené ako aktuálne (využíva sa atribút aria-current). (#6358)

segment.source: Automatic language switching is now supported in Microsoft Edge. (#6852)
segment.target: V programe MS Edge je podporované automatické prepínanie jazykov. (#6852)

segment.source: Added support for Windows Calculator on Windows 10 Enterprise LTSB (Long-Term Servicing Branch) and Server. (#6914)
segment.target: pridaná podpora pre windows kalkulačku v systémoch 10 Enterprise LTSB a Server. (#6914)

segment.source: Performing the read current line command three times quickly spells the line with character descriptions. (#6893)
segment.target: Ak stlačíte skratku na vyhláskovanie riadka trikrát za sebou, bude riadok vyhláskovaný foneticky. (#6893)

segment.source: New language: Burmese.
segment.target: Nový jazyk: Barmčina.

segment.source: Unicode up and down arrows and fraction symbols are now spoken appropriately. (#3805)
segment.target: Symboly v sade Unicode (konkrétne šípky hore a dole a tiež symboly označujúce rôzne zlomky) sú odteraz oznamované správne. (#3805)

segment.source: Changes
segment.target: Zmeny

segment.source: When navigating with simple review in applications using UI Automation, more extraneous objects are now ignored, making navigation easier. (#6948, #6950)
segment.target: Ak je zapnutý jednoduchý režim objektovej navigácie, prezeranie objektov v aplikáciách využívajúcich UI Automation ignoruje nadbytočné nepotrebné objekty. (#6948, #6950)

segment.source: Bug Fixes
segment.target: Opravy

segment.source: Web page menu items can now be activated while in browse mode. (#6735)
segment.target: V režime prehliadania je možné aktivovať položky menu. (#6735)

segment.source: Pressing escape while the configuration profile "Confirm Deletion" dialog is active now dismisses the dialog. (#6851)
segment.target: Ak v potvrdzovacom dialógu pri mazaní konfiguračného profilu stlačíte Escape, dialóg sa zatvorí.(#6851)

segment.source: Fixed some crashes in Mozilla Firefox and other Gecko applications where the multi-process feature is enabled. (#6885)
segment.target: Opravené pády v prehliadači Mozilla firefox a iných aplikáciách postavených na Gecko, ktoré nastávali v prípade, ak mali spustené viaceré procesy. (#6885)

segment.source: Reporting of background color in screen review is now more accurate when text was drawn with a transparent background. (#6467)
segment.target: Oznamovanie farieb pri prezeraní obrazovky je teraz presnejšie, keď je text zobrazený priehľadnými farbami. (#6467)

segment.source: Improved support for control descriptions provided on web pages in Internet Explorer 11 (specifically, support for aria-describedby within iframes and when multiple IDs are provided). (#5784)
segment.target: Vylepšená podpora pre oznamovanie popisov prvkov v prehliadači Internet Explorer 11 (konkrétne je pridaná podpora pre atribút aria-describedby v rámcoch a tiež v situáciách ak je dostupných viacero ID). (#5784)

segment.source: In the Windows 10 Creators Update, NVDA's audio ducking again works as in previous Windows releases; i.e. Duck with speech and sounds, always duck and no ducking are all available. (#6933)
segment.target: V systéme Windows 10 Creators opäť fungujú všetky režimi automatického stišovania. (#6933)

segment.source: NVDA will no longer fail to navigate to or report certain (UIA) controls where a keyboard shortcut is not defined. (#6779)
segment.target: NVDA oznamuje a dokáže navigovať aj k prvkom, ktoré v prostredí UIA nemajú priradenú klávesovú skratku. (#6779)

segment.source: Two empty spaces are no longer added in keyboard shortcut information for certain (UIA) controls. (#6790)
segment.target: V prvkoch UIA nie sú viac medzi popisom prvku a klávesovou skratkou vložené dve medzeri. (#6790)

segment.source: Certain combinations of keys on HIMS displays (e.g. space+dot4) no longer fail intermittently. (#3157)
segment.target: Opravená chyba, pri ktorej neočakávane nefungovali niektoré klávesové kombinácie na brailovom riadku HIMS. (#3157)

segment.source: Fixed an issue when opening a serial port on systems using certain languages other than English which caused connecting to braille displays to fail in some cases. (#6845)
segment.target: Opravená chyba, ktorá spôsobovala, že nebolo možné pripojiť brailový riadok cez sériový port, ak bol jazyk systému iný ako Angličtina. (#6845)

segment.source: Reduced the chance of the configuration file being corrupted when Windows shuts down. Configuration files are now written to a temporary file before replacing the actual configuration file. (#3165)
segment.target: Konfiguračné súbory sa zapisujú do dočasného adresára a až potom nahradia aktuálnu kópiu. Tým zabránime poškodeniu konfiguračných súborov v prípade nečakaného pádu Systému Windows. (#3165)

segment.source: When performing the read current line command twice quickly to spell the line, the appropriate language is now used for the spelled characters. (#6726)
segment.target: Pri hláskovaní aktuálneho riadka je vždy použitý správny jazyk. (#6726)

segment.source: Navigating by line in Microsoft Edge is now up to three times faster in the Windows 10 Creators Update. (#6994)
segment.target: zrýchlená navigácia po riadkoch v aplikácii MS Edge v systéme Windows 10 Creators. (#6994)

segment.source: NVDA no longer announces "Web Runtime grouping" when focusing Microsoft Edge documents in the Windows 10 Creators Update. (#6948)
segment.target: NVDA viac po prechode do aplikácie MS Edge neoznamuje "Web Runtime grouping". (#6948)

segment.source: All existing versions of SecureCRT are now supported. (#6302)
segment.target: Odteraz sú podporované všetky verzie SecureCRT. (#6302)

segment.source: Adobe Acrobat Reader no longer crashes in certain PDF documents (specifically, those containing empty ActualText attributes). (#7021, #7034)
segment.target: Adobe Acrobat Reader viac nepadá pri niektorých PDF dokumentoch (toto sa stávalo, ak dokument obsahoval prázdne textové atribúty). (#7021, #7034)

segment.source: In browse mode in Microsoft Edge, interactive tables (ARIA grids) are no longer skipped when navigating to tables with t and shift+t. (#6977)
segment.target: Pri navigácii po tabuľkáchv MS edge NVDA neignoruje interaktívne tabuľky (ARIA grids). (#6977)

segment.source: In browse mode, pressing shift+home after selecting forward now unselects to the beginning of the line as expected. (#5746)
segment.target: Ak v režime prehliadania označíte text smerom dopredu (napr shift+šípka doprava), shift+home tento text odznačí po začiatok riadka. (#5746)

segment.source: In browse mode, select all (control+a) no longer fails to select all text if the caret is not at the start of the text. (#6909)
segment.target: V režime prehliadania funguje označenie celého textu (ctrl+a) aj vtedy, ak je prehliadací kurzor uprostred textu. (#6909)

segment.source: Fixed some other rare selection problems in browse mode. (#7131)
segment.target: Opravené ostatné chyby pri označovaní textu v režime prehliadania. (#7131)

segment.source: Changes for Developers
segment.target: Zmeny pre vývojárov (anglicky)

segment.source: Commandline arguments are now processed with Python's argparse module, rather than optparse. This allows certain options such as -r and -q to be handled exclusively. (#6865)
segment.target: Commandline arguments are now processed with Python's argparse module, rather than optparse. This allows certain options such as -r and -q to be handled exclusively. (#6865)

segment.source: core.callLater now queues the callback to NVDA's main queue after the given delay, rather than waking the core and executing it directly. This stops possible freezes due to the core accidentally going to sleep after processing a callback, in the midle of a modal call such as the desplaying of a message box. (#6797)
segment.target: core.callLater now queues the callback to NVDA's main queue after the given delay, rather than waking the core and executing it directly. This stops possible freezes due to the core accidentally going to sleep after processing a callback, in the midle of a modal call such as the desplaying of a message box. (#6797)

segment.source: The InputGesture.identifiers property has been changed so that it is no longer normalized. (#6945)
segment.target: The InputGesture.identifiers property has been changed so that it is no longer normalized. (#6945)

segment.source: Subclasses no longer need to normalize identifiers before returning them from this property.
segment.target: Subclasses no longer need to normalize identifiers before returning them from this property.

segment.source: If you want normalized identifiers, there is now an InputGesture.normalizedIdentifiers property which normalizes the identifiers returned by the identifiers property .
segment.target: If you want normalized identifiers, there is now an InputGesture.normalizedIdentifiers property which normalizes the identifiers returned by the identifiers property .

segment.source: The InputGesture.logIdentifier property is now deprecated. Callers should use InputGesture.identifiers[0] instead. (#6945)
segment.target: The InputGesture.logIdentifier property is now deprecated. Callers should use InputGesture.identifiers[0] instead. (#6945)

segment.source: Removed some deprecated code:
segment.target: Removed some deprecated code:

segment.source: `speech.REASON_*` constants: `controlTypes.REASON_*` should be used instead. (#6846)
segment.target: `speech.REASON_*` constants: `controlTypes.REASON_*` should be used instead. (#6846)

segment.source: `i18nName` for synth settings: `displayName` and `displayNameWithAccelerator` should be used instead. (#6846, #5185)
segment.target: `i18nName` for synth settings: `displayName` and `displayNameWithAccelerator` should be used instead. (#6846, #5185)

segment.source: `config.validateConfig`. (#6846, #667)
segment.target: `config.validateConfig`. (#6846, #667)

segment.source: `config.save`: `config.conf.save` should be used instead. (#6846, #667)
segment.target: `config.save`: `config.conf.save` should be used instead. (#6846, #667)

segment.source: The list of completions in the autocomplete context menu of the Python Console no longer shows any object path leading up to the final symbol being completed. (#7023)
segment.target: The list of completions in the autocomplete context menu of the Python Console no longer shows any object path leading up to the final symbol being completed. (#7023)

segment.source: There is now a unit testing framework for NVDA. (#7026)
segment.target: There is now a unit testing framework for NVDA. (#7026)

segment.source: Unit tests and infrastructure are located in the tests/unit directory. See the docstring in the tests\unit\init.py file for details.
segment.target: Unit tests and infrastructure are located in the tests/unit directory. See the docstring in the tests\unit\init.py file for details.

segment.source: You can run tests using "scons tests". See the "Running Tests" section of readme.md for details.
segment.target: You can run tests using "scons tests". See the "Running Tests" section of readme.md for details.

segment.source: If you are submitting a pull request for NVDA, you should first run the tests and ensure they pass.
segment.target: If you are submitting a pull request for NVDA, you should first run the tests and ensure they pass.

segment.source: Highlights of this release include reporting of sections and text columns in Microsoft Word; Support for reading, navigating and annotating books in Kindle for PC; and improved support for Microsoft Edge.
segment.target: Prednosti tejto verzie zahŕňajú oznamovanie sekcií a textových stĺpcov v dokumentoch MS Word; podporu pre čítanie, navigáciu a poznámkovanie kníh v programe Kindle pre PC; vylepšenú podporu pre Microsoft Edge.

segment.source: New Features
segment.target: Nové vlastnosti

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, the types of section breaks and section numbers can now be reported. This is enabled with the "Report page numbers" option in the Document Formatting dialog. (#5946)
segment.target: V programe Microsoft Word si môžete aktivovať oznamovanie typov a čísel sekcií. Toto povolíte začiarknutím možnosti "oznamovať strany" v nastaveniach čítania textu. (#5946)

segment.source: In Microsoft Word, text columns can now be reported. This is enabled with the "Report page numbers" option in the document formatting dialog. (#5946)
